atk-s0513a1:689_0: Manussā disvā “amhākaṃ ayyo idāneva hasitvā puna parodi.
atk-s0513a1:689_2: amhākaṃ ayyaputtassa koci antarāyo bhavissatī”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:689_7: ‘mahatī vata me jāni bhavissatī’ti attānaṃ anusocanto rodāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:689_8: Tato so “kiṃ nu kho me ñātakesu koci etaṃ buddhabhūtaṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhissati,
atk-s0513a1:689_9: na labhissatī”ti upadhārento attano bhāgineyyaṃ nāḷakadārakaṃ addasa.
atk-s0513a1:689_10: So bhaginiyā gehaṃ gantvā “kahaṃ te putto nāḷako”ti?
atk-s0513a1:689_12: “Pakkosāhi na”nti pakkosāpetvā attano santikaṃ āgataṃ kumāraṃ āha – “tāta,
atk-s0513a1:689_18: Sattāsītikoṭidhane kule nibbattadārakopi “na maṃ mātulo anatthe niyojessatī”ti cintetvā tāvadeva antarāpaṇato
atk-s0513a1:689_19: kāsāyāni ceva mattikāpattañca āharāpetvā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā “yo loke uttamapuggalo,
atk-s0513a1:689_20: taṃ uddissa mayhaṃ pabbajjā”ti bodhisattābhimukhaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā pattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:689_21: thavikāya pakkhipitvā aṃsakūṭe laggetvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:689_22: So paramābhisambodhiṃ pattaṃ tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā nāḷakapaṭipadaṃ kathāpetvā puna himavantaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a1:689_23: arahattaṃ patvā ukkaṭṭhapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno satteva māse āyuṃ pāletvā ekaṃ suvaṇṇapabbataṃ nissāya ṭhitakova
atk-s0513a1:690_0: Bodhisattampi kho pañcame divase sīsaṃ nhāpetvā “nāmaggahaṇaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti rājabhavanaṃ catujjātikagandhehi
atk-s0513a1:690_1: vilimpitvā lājāpañcamakāni pupphāni vikiritvā asambhinnapāyāsaṃ pacāpetvā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāraṅgate aṭṭhasatabrāhmaṇe
atk-s0513a1:690_2: nimantetvā rājabhavane nisīdāpetvā subhojanaṃ bhojetvā mahāsakkāraṃ katvā “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti lakkhaṇāni
atk-s0513a1:691_0: “Rāmo dhajo lakkhaṇo cāpi mantī, koṇḍañño ca bhojo suyāmo sudatto;
atk-s0513a1:692_0: Ete tadā aṭṭha ahesuṃ brāhmaṇā, chaḷaṅgavā mantaṃ viyākariṃsū”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:693_2: Tesu satta janā dve aṅguliyo ukkhipitvā dvedhā byākariṃsu –
atk-s0513a1:693_3: “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato agāraṃ ajjhāvasamāno rājā hoti cakkavattī,
atk-s0513a1:693_6: Tesaṃ pana sabbadaharo gottato koṇḍañño nāma māṇavo bodhisattassa varalakkhaṇanipphattiṃ oloketvā –
atk-s0513a1:693_8: ekantenesa vivaṭṭacchado buddho bhavissatī”ti ekameva aṅguliṃ ukkhipitvā ekaṃsabyākaraṇaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0513a1:693_9: Ayañhi katādhikāro pacchimabhavikasatto paññāya itare satta jane abhibhavitvā “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgatassa agāramajjhe ṭhānaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:693_10: asaṃsayaṃ buddho bhavissatī”ti ekameva gatiṃ addasa,
atk-s0513a1:693_11: tasmā ekaṃ aṅguliṃ ukkhipitvā evaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0513a1:693_12: Athassa nāmaṃ gaṇhantā sabbalokassa atthasiddhikarattā “siddhattho”ti nāmamakaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:694_0: Atha te brāhmaṇā attano gharāni gantvā putte āmantayiṃsu – “tātā,
atk-s0513a1:694_2: suddhodanamahārājassa puttaṃ sabbaññutaṃ pattaṃ mayaṃ sambhaveyyāma vā no vā,
atk-s0513a1:694_3: tumhe tasmiṃ kumāre sabbaññutaṃ patte tassa sāsane pabbajeyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:694_4: Te sattapi janā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā yathākammaṃ gatā,
atk-s0513a1:694_6: So mahāsatte vuḍḍhimanvāya mahābhinikkhamanaṃ abhinikkhamitvā anukkamena uruvelaṃ gantvā “ramaṇīyo,
atk-s0513a1:694_8: alaṃ vatidaṃ kulaputtassa padhānatthikassa padhānāyā”ti cittaṃ uppādetvā tattha vāsaṃ upagate “mahāpuriso
atk-s0513a1:694_9: pabbajito”ti sutvā tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ putte upasaṅkamitvā evamāha “siddhatthakumāro kira pabbajito,
atk-s0513a1:694_17: Koṇḍaññabrāhmaṇaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā itare cattāro pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:694_18: Te pañcapi janā pañcavaggiyattherā nāma jātā.
atk-s0513a1:695_0: Tadā pana rājā “kiṃ disvā mayhaṃ putto pabbajissatī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:695_7: Rājā “ito paṭṭhāya evarūpānaṃ mama puttassa santikaṃ upasaṅkamituṃ mā adattha,
atk-s0513a1:695_9: ahaṃ mama puttaṃ dvisahassadīpaparivārānaṃ catunnaṃ mahādīpānaṃ issariyādhipaccaṃ rajjaṃ kārentaṃ chattiṃsayojanaparimaṇḍalāya
atk-s0513a1:695_11: Evañca pana vatvā imesaṃ catuppakārānaṃ nimittānaṃ kumārassa cakkhupathe āgamananivāraṇatthaṃ catūsu disāsu gāvute gāvute ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:695_12: Taṃ divasaṃ pana maṅgalaṭṭhāne sannipatitesu asītiyā ñātikulasahassesu ekeko ekamekaṃ puttaṃ paṭijāni –
atk-s0513a1:695_19: Rājāpi bodhisattassa uttamarūpasampannā vigatasabbadosā dhātiyo paccupaṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:695_20: Bodhisatto anantena parivārena mahantena sirisobhaggena vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0513a1:696_1: Taṃ divasaṃ sakalanagaraṃ devavimānaṃ viya alaṅkaronti.
atk-s0513a1:696_2: Sabbe dāsakammakarādayo ahatavatthanivatthā gandhamālādipaṭimaṇḍitā rājakule sannipatanti.
atk-s0513a1:696_4: Tasmiṃ pana divase ekenūnaaṭṭhasatanaṅgalāni saddhiṃ balibaddarasmiyottehi rajataparikkhatāni honti,
atk-s0513a1:696_7: Rājā mahatā parivārena nikkhanto puttaṃ gahetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:696_8: Kammantaṭṭhāne eko jamburukkho bahalapalāso sandacchāyo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:696_9: Tassa heṭṭhā kumārassa sayanaṃ paññapāpetvā upari suvaṇṇatārakakhacitaṃ vitānaṃ bandhāpetvā sāṇipākārena
atk-s0513a1:696_10: parikkhipāpetvā ārakkhaṃ ṭhapāpetvā rājā sabbālaṅkāraṃ alaṅkaritvā amaccagaṇaparivuto naṅgalakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:696_14: Te tāni gahetvā ito cito ca kasanti.
atk-s0513a1:696_15: Rājā pana orato vā pāraṃ gacchati,
atk-s0513a1:696_18: Bodhisattaṃ parivāretvā nisinnā dhātiyo “rañño sampattiṃ passissāmā”ti antosāṇito bahi nikkhantā.
atk-s0513a1:696_19: Bodhisatto ito cito ca olokento kañci adisvā vegena uṭṭhāya pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ānāpāne pariggahetvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattesi.
atk-s0513a1:696_22: tassa pana rukkhassa parimaṇḍalā hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:696_23: Dhātiyo “ayyaputto ekato”ti vegena sāṇiṃ ukkhipitvā anto pavisamānā bodhisattaṃ sayane pallaṅkena nisinnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:696_24: tañca pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā gantvā rañño ārocesuṃ – “deva,
atk-s0513a1:696_28: Rājā vegenāgantvā pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā – “idaṃ te, tāta,
atk-s0513a1:697_1: Rājā bodhisattassa tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavike tayo pāsāde kāresi –
atk-s0513a1:697_8: nippurisehi tūriyehi paricāriyamāno mahāsampattiṃ anubhavanto utuvārena tesu pāsādesu viharati.
atk-s0513a1:698_0: Tassevaṃ mahāsampattiṃ anubhavantassa ekadivasaṃ ñātisaṅghassa abbhantare ayaṃ kathā udapādi –
atk-s0513a1:698_5: tava ñātakā ‘siddhattho kiñci sippaṃ asikkhitvā kīḷāpasutova vicaratī’ti vadanti,
atk-s0513a1:698_8: nagare mama sippadassanatthaṃ bheriṃ carāpetha “ito sattame divase ñātakānaṃ sippaṃ dassessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:698_10: Bodhisatto akkhaṇavedhivālavedhidhanuggahe sannipātāpetvā mahājanassa majjhe aññehi dhanuggahehi asādhāraṇaṃ ñātakānaṃ dvādasavidhaṃ sippaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0513a1:699_0: Athekadivasaṃ bodhisatto uyyānabhūmiṃ gantukāmo sārathiṃ āmantetvā “rathaṃ yojehī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:699_1: So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā mahārahaṃ uttamarathaṃ sabbālaṅkārena alaṅkaritvā kumudapattavaṇṇe cattāro maṅgalasindhave yojetvā bodhisattassa paṭivedesi.
atk-s0513a1:699_2: Bodhisatto devavimānasadisaṃ rathaṃ abhiruhitvā uyyānābhimukho agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:699_4: pubbanimittaṃ dassessāmā”ti ekaṃ devaputtaṃ jarājajjaraṃ khaṇḍadantaṃ palitakesaṃ vaṅkaṃ obhaggasarīraṃ daṇḍahatthaṃ pavedhamānaṃ katvā dassesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:699_5: Taṃ bodhisatto ceva sārathi ca passanti.
atk-s0513a1:699_8: kesāpissa na yathā aññesa”nti mahāpadāne āgatanayena pucchitvā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “dhīratthu vata bho jāti,
atk-s0513a1:699_9: yatra hi nāma jātassa jarā paññāyissatī”ti saṃviggahadayo tatova paṭinivattitvā pāsādameva abhiruhi.
atk-s0513a1:699_10: Rājā “kiṃ kāraṇā mama putto khippaṃ paṭinivattī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:699_15: sampattiṃ anubhavanto pabbajjāya satiṃ na karissatī”ti vatvā ārakkhaṃ vaḍḍhetvā sabbadisāsu aḍḍhayojane aḍḍhayojane ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:700_0: Punekadivasaṃ bodhisatto tatheva uyyānaṃ gacchanto devatāhi nimmitaṃ byādhitaṃ purisaṃ disvā purimanayeneva
atk-s0513a1:700_2: Rājāpi pucchitvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva saṃvidahitvā puna vaḍḍhetvā samantā tigāvutappamāṇe padese ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:700_3: Aparaṃ ekadivasaṃ bodhisatto tatheva uyyānaṃ gacchanto devatāhi nimmitaṃ kālakataṃ disvā purimanayeneva
atk-s0513a1:700_4: pucchitvā saṃviggahadayo puna nivattitvā pāsādaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0513a1:700_5: Rājāpi pucchitvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva saṃvidahitvā puna vaḍḍhetvā samantā yojanappamāṇe padese ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:700_6: Aparaṃ pana ekadivasaṃ uyyānaṃ gacchanto tatheva devatāhi nimmitaṃ sunivatthaṃ supārutaṃ pabbajitaṃ disvā “ko nāmeso sammā”ti sārathiṃ pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:700_7: Sārathi kiñcāpi buddhuppādassa abhāvā pabbajitaṃ vā pabbajitaguṇe vā na jānāti,
atk-s0513a1:700_8: devatānubhāvena pana “pabbajito nāmāyaṃ devā”ti vatvā pabbajjāya guṇe vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0513a1:700_9: Bodhisatto pabbajjāya ruciṃ uppādetvā taṃ divasaṃ uyyānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:700_10: Dīghabhāṇakā panāhu “cattāri nimittāni ekadivaseneva disvā agamāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:701_0: So tattha divasabhāgaṃ kīḷitvā maṅgalapokkharaṇiyaṃ nhāyitvā atthaṅgate sūriye maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe nisīdi attānaṃ alaṅkārāpetukāmo.
atk-s0513a1:701_1: Athassa paricārakapurisā nānāvaṇṇāni dussāni nānappakārā ābharaṇavikatiyo mālāgandhavilepanāni ca ādāya samantā parivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:701_2: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakkassa nisinnāsanaṃ uṇhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:701_3: So “ko nu kho maṃ imamhā ṭhānā cāvetukāmo”ti upadhārento bodhisattassa alaṅkāretukāmataṃ ñatvā vissakammaṃ āmantesi “samma vissakamma,
atk-s0513a1:701_7: So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā devatānubhāvena taṅkhaṇaṃyeva upasaṅkamitvā tasseva kappakasadiso hutvā kappakassa
atk-s0513a1:701_8: hatthato veṭhanadussaṃ gahetvā bodhisattassa sīsaṃ veṭhesi.
atk-s0513a1:701_11: Veṭhanena veṭhitamatte sīse moḷiyaṃ maṇiratanākārena dussasahassaṃ abbhuggañchi.
atk-s0513a1:701_12: Puna veṭhentassa dussasahassanti dasakkhattuṃ veṭhentassa dasa dussasahassāni abbhuggacchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:701_18: Bodhisattassa sīsaṃ kiñjakkhagavacchitaṃ viya kuyyakapupphaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:702_0: Athassa sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitassa sabbatālāvacaresu sakāni sakāni paṭibhānāni dassayantesu,
atk-s0513a1:702_2: sūtamāgadhādīsu nānappakārehi maṅgalavacanatthutighosehi sambhāventesu sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ rathavaraṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0513a1:702_3: Tasmiṃ samaye “rāhulamātā puttaṃ vijātā”ti sutvā suddhodanamahārājā “puttassa me tuṭṭhiṃ nivedethā”ti sāsanaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0513a1:702_6: Rājā “kiṃ me putto avacā”ti pucchitvā taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “ito paṭṭhāya me nattā rāhulakumāroyeva nāma hotū”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:703_0: Bodhisattopi kho rathavaraṃ āruyha mahantena yasena atimanoramena sirisobhaggena nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:703_1: Tasmiṃ samaye kisāgotamī nāma khattiyakaññā uparipāsādavaratalagatā nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ kurumānassa bodhisattassa
atk-s0513a1:703_2: rūpasiriṃ disvā pītisomanassajātā idaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0513a1:704_0: “Nibbutā nūna sā mātā, nibbuto nūna so pitā;
atk-s0513a1:705_0: Nibbutā nūna sā nārī, yassāyaṃ īdiso patī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:706_0: Bodhisatto taṃ sutvā cintesi “ayaṃ evamāha ‘evarūpaṃ attabhāvaṃ passantiyā mātu hadayaṃ nibbāyati,
atk-s0513a1:706_2: pajāpatiyā hadayaṃ nibbāyatī’ti! Kismiṃ nu kho nibbute hadayaṃ nibbutaṃ nāma hotī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:706_7: mānadiṭṭhiādīsu sabbakilesadarathesu nibbutesu nibbutaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0513a1:706_10: ajjeva mayā gharāvāsaṃ chaḍḍetvā nikkhamma pabbajitvā nibbānaṃ gavesituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a1:706_11: ayaṃ imissā ācariyabhāgo hotū”ti kaṇṭhato omuñcitvā kisāgotamiyā satasahassagghanakaṃ muttāhāraṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:706_12: Sā “siddhatthakumāro mayi paṭibaddhacitto hutvā paṇṇākāraṃ pesesī”ti somanassajātā ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:707_0: Bodhisattopi mahantena sirisobhaggena attano pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā sirisayane nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:707_1: Tāvadeva ca naṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā naccagītādīsu susikkhitā devakaññā viya rūpasobhaggappattā itthiyo
atk-s0513a1:707_2: nānātūriyāni gahetvā samparivārayitvā abhiramāpentiyo naccagītavāditāni payojayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:707_3: Bodhisatto kilesesu virattacittatāya naccādīsu anabhirato muhuttaṃ niddaṃ okkami.
atk-s0513a1:707_6: idāni kimatthaṃ kilamāmā”ti gahitaggahitāni tūriyāni ajjhottharitvā nipajjiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:707_8: Bodhisatto pabujjhitvā sayanapiṭṭhe pallaṅkena nisinno addasa tā itthiyo tūriyabhaṇḍāni avattharitvā niddāyantiyo –
atk-s0513a1:707_17: So tāsaṃ taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā bhiyyosomattāya kāmesu virattacitto ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:707_18: Tassa alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ sakkabhavanasadisampi taṃ mahātalaṃ apaviddhanānākuṇapabharitaṃ āmakasusānaṃ viya upaṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0513a1:708_0: So “ajjeva mayā mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sayanā uṭṭhāya dvārasamīpaṃ gantvā “ko etthā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:708_1: Ummāre sīsaṃ katvā nipanno channo “ahaṃ ayyaputta channo”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:708_4: So “sādhu devā”ti assabhaṇḍikaṃ gahetvā assasālaṃ gantvā gandhatelapadīpesu jalantesu sumanapaṭṭavitānassa
atk-s0513a1:708_5: heṭṭhā ramaṇīye bhūmibhāge ṭhitaṃ kaṇḍakaṃ assarājānaṃ disvā “ajja mayā imameva kappetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti kaṇḍakaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:708_7: aññesu divasesu uyyānakīḷādigamane kappanā viya na hoti,
atk-s0513a1:708_8: mayhaṃ ayyaputto ajja mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitukāmo bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:708_11: devatā pana taṃ saddaṃ nirumbhitvā na kassaci sotuṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:709_0: Bodhisattopi kho channaṃ pesetvāva “puttaṃ tāva passissāmī”ti cintetvā nisinnapallaṅkato uṭṭhāya rāhulamātāya
atk-s0513a1:709_3: rāhulamātā sumanamallikādīnaṃ pupphānaṃ ambaṇamattena abhippakiṇṇasayane puttassa matthake hatthaṃ ṭhapetvā niddāyati.
atk-s0513a1:709_4: Bodhisatto ummāre pādaṃ ṭhapetvā ṭhitakova oloketvā “sacāhaṃ deviyā hatthaṃ apanetvā mama puttaṃ gaṇhissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:709_7: buddho hutvāva āgantvā puttaṃ passissāmī”ti pāsādatalato otari.
atk-s0513a1:709_8: Yaṃ pana jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tadā sattāhajāto rāhulakumāro hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:710_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto pāsādatalā otaritvā assasamīpaṃ gantvā evamāha –
atk-s0513a1:710_3: ahaṃ taṃ nissāya buddho hutvā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ tāressāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:710_5: Kaṇḍako gīvato paṭṭhāya āyāmena aṭṭhārasahattho hoti tadanucchavikena ubbedhena samannāgato thāmajavasampanno sabbaseto dhotasaṅkhasadiso.
atk-s0513a1:710_6: So sace haseyya vā padasaddaṃ vā kareyya,
atk-s0513a1:710_8: Tasmā devatā attano ānubhāvena tassa yathā na koci suṇāti,
atk-s0513a1:710_9: evaṃ hasitasaddaṃ sannirumbhitvā akkamanaakkamanapadavāre hatthatalāni upanāmesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:710_10: Bodhisatto assavarassa piṭṭhivemajjhagato channaṃ assassa vāladhiṃ gāhāpetvā aḍḍharattasamaye mahādvārasamīpaṃ patto.
atk-s0513a1:710_11: Tadā pana rājā “evaṃ bodhisatto yāya kāyaci velāya nagaradvāraṃ vivaritvā nikkhamituṃ na sakkhissatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:710_12: dvīsu dvārakavāṭesu ekekaṃ purisasahassena vivaritabbaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:710_17: ajja kaṇḍakassa piṭṭhe nisinnova vāladhiṃ gahetvā ṭhitena channena saddhiṃyeva kaṇḍakaṃ ūrūhi nippīḷetvā
atk-s0513a1:710_20: ahaṃ ayyaputtaṃ khandhe nisīdāpetvā kaṇḍakaṃ dakkhiṇena hatthena kucchiyaṃ parikkhipanto upakacchantare katvā pākāraṃ uppatitvā atikkamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:710_22: ahaṃ attano sāmikaṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ yathānisinnameva channena vāladhiṃ gahetvā ṭhitena saddhiṃyeva ukkhipitvā pākāraṃ uppatitvā atikkamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:710_24: yathācintitameva tesu tīsu janesu aññataro sampādeyya.
atk-s0513a1:710_25: Dvāre adhivatthā devatā pana dvāraṃ vivari.
atk-s0513a1:711_0: Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe māro “bodhisattaṃ nivattessāmī”ti āgantvā ākāse ṭhito āha – “mārisa,
atk-s0513a1:711_2: ito te sattame divase cakkaratanaṃ pātubhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:711_10: Māro “ito dāni te paṭṭhāya kāmavitakkaṃ vā byāpādavitakkaṃ vā vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ vā cintitakāle jānissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:712_0: Bodhisattopi hatthagataṃ cakkavattirajjaṃ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya anapekkho chaḍḍetvā mahantena sakkārena nagarā
atk-s0513a1:712_2: Nikkhamitvā ca puna nagaraṃ oloketukāmo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:712_4: na tayā nivattitvā olokanakammaṃ kata”nti vadamānā viya mahāpathavī kulālacakkaṃ viya bhijjitvā parivatti.
atk-s0513a1:712_5: Bodhisatto nagarābhimukho ṭhatvā nagaraṃ oloketvā tasmiṃ pathavippadese kaṇḍakanivattanacetiyaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:712_6: dassetvā gantabbamaggābhimukhaṃ kaṇḍakaṃ katvā pāyāsi mahantena sakkārena uḷārena sirisobhaggena.
atk-s0513a1:712_7: Tadā kirassa devatā purato saṭṭhi ukkāsahassāni dhārayiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:712_11: aparā devatā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ aparimāṇā ukkā dhārayiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:712_12: aparā devatā ca nāgasupaṇṇādayo ca dibbehi gandhehi mālāhi cuṇṇehi dhūmehi pūjayamānā gacchanti.
atk-s0513a1:712_13: Pāricchattakapupphehi ceva mandāravapupphehi ca ghanameghavuṭṭhikāle dhārāhi viya nabhaṃ nirantaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:712_16: samuddakucchiyaṃ meghatthanitakālo viya yugandharakucchiyaṃ sāgaranigghosakālo viya vattati.
atk-s0513a1:713_0: Iminā sirisobhaggena gacchanto bodhisatto ekaratteneva tīṇi rajjāni atikkamma tiṃsayojanamatthake anomānadītīraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:713_1: “Kiṃ pana asso tato paraṃ gantuṃ na sakkotī”ti? “No,
atk-s0513a1:713_3: So hi ekaṃ cakkavāḷagabbhaṃ nābhiyā ṭhitacakkassa nemivaṭṭiṃ maddanto viya antantena caritvā purepātarāsameva
atk-s0513a1:713_4: āgantvā attano sampāditaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjituṃ samattho.
atk-s0513a1:713_5: Tadā pana devanāgasupaṇṇādīhi ākāse ṭhatvā ossaṭṭhehi gandhamālādīhi yāva ūruppadesā sañchannaṃ sarīraṃ
atk-s0513a1:713_8: Atha bodhisatto nadītīre ṭhatvā channaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0513a1:713_11: “Amhākampi pabbajjā anomā bhavissatī”ti paṇhiyā ghaṭṭento assassa saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:713_12: Asso uppatitvā aṭṭhūsabhavitthārāya nadiyā pārimatīre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:714_0: Bodhisatto assapiṭṭhito oruyha rajatapaṭṭasadise vālukāpuline ṭhatvā channaṃ āmantesi – “samma, channa,
atk-s0513a1:714_1: tvaṃ mayhaṃ ābharaṇāni ceva kaṇḍakañca ādāya gaccha,
atk-s0513a1:714_5: gaccha tva”nti tikkhattuṃ paṭibāhitvā ābharaṇāni ceva kaṇḍakañca paṭicchāpetvā cintesi “ime mayhaṃ kesā samaṇasāruppā na hontī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:714_6: Añño bodhisattassa kese chindituṃ yuttarūpo natthi,
atk-s0513a1:714_7: tato “sayameva khaggena chindissāmī”ti dakkhiṇena hatthena asiṃ gaṇhitvā vāmahatthena moḷiyā saddhiṃ cūḷaṃ gahetvā chindi,
atk-s0513a1:714_8: kesā dvaṅgulamattā hutvā dakkhiṇato āvattamānā sīsaṃ allīyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:714_12: Bodhisatto saha moḷiyā cuḷaṃ gahetvā “sacāhaṃ buddho bhavissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:714_15: Taṃ cūḷāmaṇiveṭhanaṃ yojanappamāṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā ākāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:714_16: Sakko devarājā dibbacakkhunā oloketvā yojaniyaratanacaṅkoṭakena sampaṭicchitvā tāvatiṃsabhavane cūḷāmaṇicetiyaṃ nāma patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:717_0: Puna bodhisatto cintesi “imāni kāsikavatthāni mayhaṃ na samaṇasāruppānī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:717_1: Athassa kassapabuddhakāle purāṇasahāyako ghaṭīkāramahābrahmā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ jaraṃ apattena mittabhāvena cintesi –
atk-s0513a1:718_0: “Ticīvarañca patto ca, vāsī sūci ca bandhanaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:720_2: mama vacanena mātāpitūnaṃ ārogyaṃ vadehī”ti vatvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a1:720_3: Channo bodhisattaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:720_4: Kaṇḍako pana channena saddhiṃ mantayamānassa bodhisattassa vacanaṃ suṇanto ṭhatvā “natthi dāni mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:720_5: puna sāmino dassana”nti cakkhupathaṃ vijahanto sokaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto hadayena phalitena kālaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:720_6: tāvatiṃsabhavane kaṇḍako nāma devaputto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:720_8: kaṇḍakassa pana kālakiriyāya dutiyena sokena pīḷito rodanto paridevanto nagaraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:721_0: Bodhisattopi pabbajitvā tasmiṃyeva padese anupiyaṃ nāma ambavanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a1:721_1: tattha sattāhaṃ pabbajjāsukhena vītināmetvā ekadivaseneva tiṃsayojanamaggaṃ padasā gantvā rājagahaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:721_3: Sakalanagaraṃ bodhisattassa rūpadassanena dhanapālakena paviṭṭharājagahaṃ viya asurindena paviṭṭhadevanagaraṃ viya ca saṅkhobhaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:721_5: evarūpo nāma satto nagare piṇḍāya carati,
atk-s0513a1:721_6: ‘devo vā manusso vā nāgo vā supaṇṇo vā ko nāmeso’ti na jānāmā”ti ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:721_7: Rājā pāsādatale ṭhatvā mahāpurisaṃ disvā acchariyabbhutajāto purise āṇāpesi –
atk-s0513a1:722_0: Mahāpurisopi kho missakabhattaṃ saṃharitvā “alaṃ me ettakaṃ yāpanāyā”ti ñatvā paviṭṭhadvāreneva nagarā
atk-s0513a1:722_1: nikkhamitvā paṇḍavapabbatacchāyāya puratthābhimukho nisīditvā āhāraṃ paribhuñjituṃ āraddho.
atk-s0513a1:722_2: Athassa antāni parivattitvā mukhena nikkhamanākārappattāni viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:722_3: Tato tena attabhāvena evarūpassa āhārassa cakkhunāpi adiṭṭhapubbatāya tena paṭikūlāhārena aṭṭiyamāno evaṃ attanāva attānaṃ ovadi “siddhattha,
atk-s0513a1:722_4: tvaṃ sulabhannapāne kule tivassikagandhasālibhojanaṃ nānaggarasehi bhuñjanaṭṭhāne nibbattitvāpi ekaṃ
atk-s0513a1:722_5: paṃsukūlikaṃ disvā ‘kadā nu kho ahampi evarūpo hutvā piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:722_6: bhavissati nu kho me so kālo’ti cintetvā nikkhanto,
atk-s0513a1:722_8: Evaṃ attanāva attānaṃ ovaditvā nibbikāro hutvā āhāraṃ paribhuñji.
atk-s0513a1:723_0: Rājapurisā taṃ pavattiṃ disvā gantvā rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:723_1: Rājā dūtavacanaṃ sutvā vegena nagarā nikkhamitvā bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā iriyāpathasmiṃyeva pasīditvā bodhisattassa sabbaṃ issariyaṃ niyyādesi.
atk-s0513a1:723_3: vatthukāmehi vā kilesakāmehi vā attho natthi,
atk-s0513a1:723_5: Rājā anekappakāraṃ yācantopi tassa cittaṃ alabhitvā “addhā tvaṃ buddho bhavissasi,
atk-s0513a1:723_6: buddhabhūtena pana te paṭhamaṃ mama vijitaṃ āgantabba”nti paṭiññaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:723_9: yathā pabbaji cakkhumā”ti imaṃ pabbajjāsuttaṃ saddhiṃ aṭṭhakathāya oloketvā veditabbo.
atk-s0513a1:724_0: Bodhisattopi rañño paṭiññaṃ datvā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno āḷārañca kālāmaṃ udakañca rāmaputtaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0513a1:724_1: samāpattiyo nibbattetvā “nāyaṃ maggo bodhāyā”ti tampi samāpattibhāvanaṃ analaṅkaritvā sadevakassa lokassa
atk-s0513a1:724_2: attano thāmavīriyasandassanatthaṃ mahāpadhānaṃ padahitukāmo uruvelaṃ gantvā “ramaṇīyo vatāyaṃ bhūmibhāgo”ti
atk-s0513a1:724_4: Tepi kho koṇḍaññappamukhā pañca pabbajitā gāmanigamarājadhānīsu bhikkhāya carantā tattha bodhisattaṃ sampāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:724_5: Atha naṃ chabbassāni mahāpadhānaṃ padahantaṃ “idāni buddho bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:724_6: idāni buddho bhavissatī”ti pariveṇasammajjanādikāya vattapaṭipattiyā upaṭṭhahamānā santikāvacarāvassa ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:724_7: Bodhisattopi kho “koṭippattaṃ dukkarakāriyaṃ karissāmī”ti ekatilataṇḍulādīhipi vītināmesi,
atk-s0513a1:725_0: Athassa tāya nirāhāratāya paramakasimānappattakāyassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇo kāyo kāḷavaṇṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:725_2: Appekadā appāṇakaṃ jhānaṃ jhāyanto mahāvedanāhi abhitunno visaññībhūto caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ patati.
atk-s0513a1:725_3: Atha naṃ ekaccā devatā “kālakato samaṇo gotamo”ti vadanti,
atk-s0513a1:725_6: tā gantvā suddhodanamahārājassa ārocesuṃ “tumhākaṃ putto kālakato”ti.
atk-s0513a1:725_7: Mama putto buddho hutvā kālakato, ahutvāti?
atk-s0513a1:725_11: mama puttassa bodhiṃ appatvā kālakiriyā nāma natthī”ti paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0513a1:725_13: Kāḷadevīlatāpasassa vandāpanadivase jamburukkhamūle ca pāṭihāriyānaṃ diṭṭhattā.
atk-s0513a1:726_0: Puna bodhisatte saññaṃ paṭilabhitvā uṭṭhite tā devatā gantvā “arogo te mahārāja putto”ti ārocenti.
atk-s0513a1:726_2: Mahāsattassa chabbassāni dukkarakāriyaṃ karontassa ākāse gaṇṭhikaraṇakālo viya ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:726_3: So “ayaṃ dukkarakārikā nāma bodhāya maggo na hotī”ti oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āhāretuṃ gāmanigamesu piṇḍāya caritvā āhāraṃ āhari,
atk-s0513a1:726_6: Pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū “ayaṃ chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ karontopi sabbaññutaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0513a1:726_7: idāni gāmādīsu piṇḍāya caritvā oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āhariyamāno kiṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0513a1:726_9: sīsaṃ nhāyitukāmassa ussāvabindutakkanaṃ viya amhākaṃ etassa santikā visesatakkanaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:726_10: kiṃ no iminā”ti mahāpurisaṃ pahāya attano attano pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ gantvā isipatanaṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:727_0: Tena kho pana samayena uruvelāyaṃ senānigame senānikuṭumbikassa gehe nibbattā sujātā nāma dārikā vayappattā
atk-s0513a1:727_1: ekasmiṃ nigrodharukkhe patthanaṃ akāsi “sace samajātikaṃ kulagharaṃ gantvā paṭhamagabbhe puttaṃ labhissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:727_4: Sā mahāsattassa dukkarakārikaṃ karontassa chaṭṭhe vasse paripuṇṇe visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ balikammaṃ kātukāmā
atk-s0513a1:727_5: hutvā puretaraṃ dhenusahassaṃ laṭṭhimadhukavane carāpetvā tāsaṃ khīraṃ pañca dhenusatāni pāyetvā tāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:727_6: khīraṃ aḍḍhatiyānīti evaṃ yāva soḷasannaṃ dhenūnaṃ khīraṃ aṭṭha dhenuyo pivanti,
atk-s0513a1:727_7: tāva khīrassa bahalatañca madhuratañca ojavantatañca patthayamānā khīraparivattanaṃ nāma akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:727_8: Sā visākhapuṇṇamadivase “pātova balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya tā aṭṭha dhenuyo duhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:727_10: thanamūle pana navabhājane upanītamatte attano dhammatāya khīradhārā pavattiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:727_11: Taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā sujātā sahattheneva khīraṃ gahetvā navabhājane pakkhipitvā sahattheneva aggiṃ katvā pacituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:728_0: Tasmiṃ pāyāse paccamāne mahantamahantā bubbuḷā uṭṭhahitvā dakkhiṇāvattā hutvā sañcaranti,
atk-s0513a1:728_3: Tasmiṃ samaye cattāro lokapālā āgantvā uddhane ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:728_6: Devatā dvisahassadīpaparivāresu catūsu mahādīpesu devānañca manussānañca upakappanaojaṃ attano devānubhāvena
atk-s0513a1:728_7: daṇḍakabaddhaṃ madhupaṭalaṃ pīḷetvā madhuṃ gaṇhamānā viya saṃharitvā tattha pakkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:728_8: Aññesu hi kālesu devatā kabaḷe kabaḷe ojaṃ pakkhipanti,
atk-s0513a1:728_9: sambodhidivase ca pana parinibbānadivase ca ukkhaliyaṃyeva pakkhipanti.
atk-s0513a1:728_10: Sujātā ekadivaseyeva tattha attano pākaṭāni anekāni acchariyāni disvā puṇṇaṃ dāsiṃ āmantesi “amma puṇṇe,
atk-s0513a1:728_12: mayā ettake kāle evarūpaṃ acchariyaṃ nāma na diṭṭhapubbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:728_15: ayye”ti tassā vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā turitaturitā rukkhamūlaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:729_0: Bodhisattopi kho tasmiṃ rattibhāge pañca mahāsupine disvā pariggaṇhanto “nissaṃsayenāhaṃ ajja buddho
atk-s0513a1:729_1: bhavissāmī”ti katasanniṭṭhāno tassā rattiyā accayena katasarīrapaṭijaggano bhikkhācārakālaṃ āgamayamāno
atk-s0513a1:729_2: pātova āgantvā tasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi attano pabhāya sakalarukkhaṃ obhāsayamāno.
atk-s0513a1:729_3: Atha kho sā puṇṇā āgantvā addasa bodhisattaṃ rukkhamūle pācīnalokadhātuṃ olokayamānaṃ nisinnaṃ,

atk-s0513a1:729_6: “ajja amhākaṃ devatā rukkhato oruyha sahattheneva balikammaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ nisinnā maññe”ti ubbegappattā
atk-s0513a1:730_0: Sujātā tassā vacanaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhamānasā hutvā “ajja dāni paṭṭhāya mama jeṭṭhadhītuṭṭhāne tiṭṭhāhī”ti dhītu anucchavikaṃ sabbālaṅkāraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:730_1: Yasmā pana buddhabhāvaṃ pāpuṇanadivase satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a1:730_2: tasmā sā “suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ pāyāsaṃ pakkhipissāmī”ti cittaṃ uppādetvā satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ
atk-s0513a1:730_3: nīharāpetvā tattha pāyāsaṃ pakkhipitukāmā pakkabhājanaṃ āvajjesi.
atk-s0513a1:730_4: ‘Sabbo pāyāso padumapattā udakaṃ viya vinivattitvā pātiyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0513a1:730_6: Sā taṃ pātiṃ aññāya suvaṇṇapātiyā paṭikujjitvā odātavatthena veṭhetvā sabbālaṅkārehi attabhāvaṃ alaṅkaritvā
atk-s0513a1:730_7: taṃ pātiṃ attano sīse ṭhapetvā mahantena ānubhāvena nigrodharukkhamūlaṃ gantvā bodhisattaṃ oloketvā balavasomanassajātā
atk-s0513a1:730_8: “rukkhadevatā”ti saññāya diṭṭhaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya onatonatā gantvā sīsato pātiṃ otāretvā vivaritvā suvaṇṇabhiṅkārena
atk-s0513a1:730_9: gandhapupphavāsitaṃ udakaṃ gahetvā bodhisattaṃ upagantvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:730_10: Ghaṭīkāramahābrahmunā dinno mattikāpatto ettakaṃ addhānaṃ bodhisattaṃ avijahitvā tasmiṃ khaṇe adassanaṃ gato,
atk-s0513a1:730_11: bodhisatto pattaṃ apassanto dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā udakaṃ sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0513a1:730_12: Sujātā saheva pātiyā pāyāsaṃ mahāpurisassa hatthe ṭhapesi,
atk-s0513a1:730_16: gaṇhitvā yathāruciṃ gacchathā”ti vanditvā “yathā mayhaṃ manoratho nipphanno,
atk-s0513a1:730_17: evaṃ tumhākampi nipphajjatū”ti vatvā satasahassagghanikāya suvaṇṇapātiyā purāṇapaṇṇe viya anapekkhā hutvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:731_0: Bodhisattopi kho nisinnaṭṭhānā uṭṭhāya rukkhaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pātiṃ ādāya nerañjarāya tīraṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:731_1: anekesaṃ bodhisattasahassānaṃ abhisambujjhanadivase otaritvā nhānaṭṭhānaṃ suppatiṭṭhitatitthaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0513a1:731_2: tassa tīre pātiṃ ṭhapetvā otaritvā nhatvā anekabuddhasatasahassānaṃ nivāsanaṃ arahaddhajaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0513a1:731_3: puratthābhimukho nisīditvā ekaṭṭhitālapakkappamāṇe ekūnapaññāsa piṇḍe katvā sabbaṃ appodakaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:731_5: So eva hissa buddhabhūtassa sattasattāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍe vasantassa ekūnapaññāsa divasāni āhāro ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:731_6: Ettakaṃ kālaṃ neva añño āhāro atthi,
atk-s0513a1:731_11: Taṃ pana pāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā suvaṇṇapātiṃ gahetvā “sacāhaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:731_16: Sā sotaṃ chindamānā nadīmajjhaṃ gantvā majjhamajjhaṭṭhāneneva javasampanno asso viya asītihatthamattaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:731_17: paṭisotaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ āvaṭṭe nimujjitvā kāḷanāgarājabhavanaṃ gantvā tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ paribhogapātiyo
atk-s0513a1:731_18: “kili kilī”ti ravaṃ kārayamānā paharitvāva tāsaṃ sabbaheṭṭhimā hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:731_19: Kāḷo nāgarājā taṃ saddaṃ sutvā “hiyyo eko buddho nibbatto,
atk-s0513a1:731_20: puna ajja eko nibbatto”ti vatvā anekehi padasatehi thutiyo vadamāno uṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:731_21: Tassa kira mahāpathaviyā ekayojanatigāvutappamāṇaṃ nabhaṃ pūretvā ārohanakālo “ajja vā hiyyo vā”ti sadiso ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:732_0: Bodhisattopi nadītīramhi supupphitasālavane divāvihāraṃ katvā sāyanhasamaye pupphānaṃ vaṇṭato muccanakāle
atk-s0513a1:732_1: devatāhi alaṅkatena aṭṭhūsabhavitthārena maggena sīho viya vijambhamāno bodhirukkhābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a1:732_4: dasasahassī lokadhātu ekagandhā ekamālā ekasādhukārā ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:732_5: Tasmiṃ samaye sotthiyo nāma tiṇahārako tiṇaṃ ādāya paṭipathe āgacchanto mahāpurisassa ākāraṃ ñatvā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:732_6: Bodhisatto tiṇaṃ gahetvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha dakkhiṇadisābhāge uttarābhimukho aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:732_7: Tasmiṃ khaṇe dakkhiṇacakkavāḷaṃ osīditvā heṭṭhā avīcisampattaṃ viya ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:732_8: uttaracakkavāḷaṃ ullaṅghitvā upari bhavaggappattaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:732_9: Bodhisatto “idaṃ sambodhiṃ pāpuṇanaṭṭhānaṃ na bhavissati maññe”ti padakkhiṇaṃ karonto pacchimadisābhāgaṃ gantvā puratthābhimukho aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0513a1:732_10: tato pacchimacakkavāḷaṃ osīditvā heṭṭhā avīcisampattaṃ viya ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:732_11: puratthimacakkavāḷaṃ ullaṅghitvā upari bhavaggappattaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:732_12: Ṭhitaṭṭhitaṭṭhāne kirassa nemivaṭṭipariyante akkante nābhiyā patiṭṭhitamahāsakaṭacakkaṃ viya mahāpathavī onatunnatā ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:732_13: Bodhisatto “idampi sambodhiṃ pāpuṇanaṭṭhānaṃ na bhavissati maññe”ti padakkhiṇaṃ karonto uttaradisābhāgaṃ gantvā dakkhiṇābhimukho aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0513a1:732_14: tato uttaracakkavāḷaṃ osīditvā heṭṭhā avīcisampattaṃ viya ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:732_15: dakkhiṇacakkavāḷaṃ ullaṅghitvā upari bhavaggappattaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:732_16: Bodhisatto “idampi sambodhiṃ pāpuṇanaṭṭhānaṃ na bhavissati maññe”ti padakkhiṇaṃ karonto puratthimadisābhāgaṃ gantvā pacchimābhimukho aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:732_20: Mahāsatto “idaṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ avijahitaṃ acalaṭṭhānaṃ kilesapañjaraviddhaṃsanaṭṭhāna”nti ñatvā tāni tiṇāni agge gahetvā cālesi,
atk-s0513a1:732_22: Tānipi kho tiṇāni tathārūpena saṇṭhānena saṇṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:732_23: yathārūpaṃ sukusalopi cittakāro vā potthakāro vā ālikhitumpi samattho natthi.
atk-s0513a1:732_24: Bodhisatto bodhikkhandhaṃ piṭṭhito katvā puratthābhimukho daḷhamānaso hutvā –
atk-s0513a1:733_0: “Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca, aṭṭhi ca avasissatu;
atk-s0513a1:735_0: Na tvevāhaṃ sammāsambodhiṃ appatvā imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmīti asanisatasannipātenapi abhejjarūpaṃ aparājitapallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:736_0: Tasmiṃ samaye māro devaputto “siddhatthakumāro mayhaṃ vasaṃ atikkamitukāmo,
atk-s0513a1:736_1: na dānissa atikkamituṃ dassāmī”ti mārabalassa santikaṃ gantvā etamatthaṃ ārocetvā māraghosanaṃ nāma ghosāpetvā mārabalaṃ ādāya nikkhami.
atk-s0513a1:736_2: Sā mārasenā mārassa purato dvādasayojanā hoti,
atk-s0513a1:736_6: yassā unnadantiyā unnādasaddo yojanasahassato paṭṭhāya pathaviundriyanasaddo viya suyyati.
atk-s0513a1:736_7: Atha māro devaputto diyaḍḍhayojanasatikaṃ girimekhalaṃ nāma hatthiṃ abhiruhitvā bāhusahassaṃ māpetvā nānāvudhāni aggahesi.
atk-s0513a1:736_8: Avasesāyapi māraparisāya dve janā ekasadisaṃ āvudhaṃ na gaṇhiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:736_9: nānappakāravaṇṇā nānappakāramukhā hutvā mahāsattaṃ ajjhottharamānā āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:737_0: Dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā pana mahāsattassa thutiyo vadamānā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:737_3: Sakiṃ vātaṃ gāhāpetvā dhamanto cattāro māse saddaṃ karitvā nissaddo hoti.
atk-s0513a1:737_6: Mārabale pana bodhimaṇḍaṃ upasaṅkamante tesaṃ ekopi ṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0513a1:737_8: Kāḷo nāgarājā pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā pañcayojanasatikaṃ mañjerikanāgabhavanaṃ gantvā ubhohi hatthehi mukhaṃ pidahitvā nipanno.
atk-s0513a1:737_9: Sakko vijayuttarasaṅkhaṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ katvā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:737_10: Mahābrahmā setacchattaṃ cakkavāḷakoṭiyaṃ ṭhapetvā brahmalokameva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:738_0: Māropi attano parisaṃ āha “tātā suddhodanaputtena siddhatthena sadiso añño puriso nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:738_1: mayaṃ sammukhā yuddhaṃ dātuṃ na sakkhissāma,
atk-s0513a1:738_3: Mahāpurisopi tīṇi passāni oloketvā sabbadevatānaṃ palātattā suññāni addasa.
atk-s0513a1:738_4: Puna uttarapassena mārabalaṃ ajjhottharamānaṃ disvā “ayaṃ ettako jano maṃ ekakaṃ sandhāya mahantaṃ vāyāmaṃ parakkamaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a1:738_5: imasmiṃ ṭhāne mayhaṃ mātā vā pitā vā bhātā vā añño vā koci ñātako natthi,
atk-s0513a1:738_6: imā pana dasa pāramiyova mayhaṃ dīgharattaṃ puṭṭhaparijanasadisā,
atk-s0513a1:738_7: tasmā pāramiyova phalakaṃ katvā pāramisattheneva paharitvā ayaṃ balakāyo mayā viddhaṃsetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti dasa pāramiyo āvajjamāno nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:739_0: Atha kho māro devaputto “eteneva siddhatthaṃ palāpessāmī”ti vātamaṇḍalaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:739_2: padāletvā vanagaccharukkhādīni ummūletvā samantā gāmanigame cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ kātuṃ samatthāpi mahāpurisassa
atk-s0513a1:739_3: puññatejena vihatānubhāvā bodhisattaṃ patvā cīvarakaṇṇamattampi cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:739_4: Tato “udakena na ajjhottharitvā māressāmī”ti mahāvassaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:739_5: Tassānubhāvena uparūpari satapaṭalasahassapaṭalādibhedā valāhakā uṭṭhahitvā vassiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:739_7: Vanarukkhādīnaṃ uparibhāgena mahāmegho āgantvā mahāsattassa cīvare ussāvabinduṭṭhānamattampi temetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a1:739_9: Mahantāni mahantāni pabbatakūṭāni dhūmāyantāni pajjalantāni ākāsenāgantvā bodhisattaṃ patvā dibbamālāguḷabhāvaṃ āpajjiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:739_11: Ekatodhārāubhatodhārāasisattikhurappādayo dhūmāyantā pajjalantā ākāsenāgantvā bodhisattaṃ patvā dibbapupphāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:739_13: Kiṃsukavaṇṇā aṅgārā ākāsenāgantvā bodhisattassa pādamūle dibbapupphāni hutvā vikiriṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:739_15: Accuṇho aggivaṇṇo kukkuḷo ākāsenāgantvā bodhisattassa pādamūle dibbacandanacuṇṇaṃ hutvā nipati.
atk-s0513a1:739_17: Atisukhumavālukā dhūmāyantā pajjalantā ākāsenāgantvā bodhisattassa pādamūle dibbapupphāni hutvā nipatiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:739_19: Taṃ kalalaṃ dhūmāyantaṃ pajjalantaṃ ākāsenāgantvā bodhisattassa pādamūle dibbavilepanaṃ hutvā nipati.
atk-s0513a1:739_20: Tato “iminā bhiṃsetvā siddhatthaṃ palāpessāmī”ti andhakāraṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:739_21: Taṃ caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ viya mahātamaṃ hutvā bodhisattaṃ patvā sūriyappabhāvihataṃ viya andhakāraṃ antaradhāyi.
atk-s0513a1:740_0: Evaṃ māro imāhi navahi vātavassapāsāṇapaharaṇaaṅgārakukkuḷavālukākalalaandhakāravuṭṭhīhi bodhisattaṃ palāpetuṃ asakkonto “kiṃ bhaṇe,
atk-s0513a1:740_2: imaṃ siddhatthakumāraṃ gaṇhatha hanatha palāpethā”ti parisaṃ āṇāpetvā sayampi girimekhalassa hatthino
atk-s0513a1:740_3: khandhe nisinno cakkāvudhaṃ ādāya bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “siddhattha uṭṭhāhi etasmā pallaṅkā,
atk-s0513a1:741_0: Māro kuddho kodhavegaṃ asahanto mahāpurisassa cakkāvudhaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0513a1:741_1: Taṃ tassa dasa pāramiyo āvajjentassa uparibhāge mālāvitānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:741_2: Taṃ kira khuradhāracakkāvudhaṃ aññadā tena kuddhena vissaṭṭhaṃ ekaghanapāsāṇatthambhe vaṃsakaḷīre viya chindantaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0513a1:741_3: idāni pana tasmiṃ mālāvitānaṃ hutvā ṭhite avasesā māraparisā “idāni pallaṅkato vuṭṭhāya palāyissatī”ti mahantamahantāni selakūṭāni vissajjesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:741_4: Tānipi mahāpurisassa dasa pāramiyo āvajjentassa mālāguḷabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā bhūmiyaṃ patiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:741_5: Devatā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ ṭhitā gīvaṃ pasāretvā sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā “naṭṭho vata so siddhatthakumārassa rūpaggappatto attabhāvo,
atk-s0513a1:742_0: Tato mahāpuriso “pūritapāramīnaṃ bodhisattānaṃ abhisambujjhanadivase pattapallaṅko mayhaṃva pāpuṇātī”ti vatvā ṭhitaṃ māraṃ āha –
atk-s0513a1:742_2: Māro “ime ettakā janā sakkhino”ti mārabalābhimukhaṃ hatthaṃ pasāresi.
atk-s0513a1:742_7: Mahāpuriso “tuyhaṃ tāva dānassa dinnabhāve sacetanā sakkhino,
atk-s0513a1:742_8: mayhaṃ pana imasmiṃ ṭhāne sacetano koci sakkhī nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:742_10: vessantarattabhāve pana ṭhatvā mayhaṃ sattasatakamahādānassa dinnabhāve ayaṃ acetanāpi ghanamahāpathavī
atk-s0513a1:742_11: sakkhī”ti cīvaragabbhantarato dakkhiṇahatthaṃ abhinīharitvā “vessantarattabhāve ṭhatvā mayhaṃ sattasatakamahādānassa
atk-s0513a1:742_12: dinnabhāve tvaṃ sakkhī na sakkhī”ti mahāpathaviabhimukhaṃ hatthaṃ pasāresi.
atk-s0513a1:742_13: Mahāpathavī “ahaṃ te tadā sakkhī”ti viravasatena viravasahassena viravasatasahassena mārabalaṃ avattharamānā viya unnadi.
atk-s0513a1:743_0: Tato mahāpurise “dinnaṃ te siddhattha mahādānaṃ uttamadāna”nti vessantaradānaṃ sammasante diyaḍḍhayojanasatiko
atk-s0513a1:743_4: sīsābharaṇāni ceva nivatthavatthāni ca pahāya sammukhasammukhadisāhiyeva palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:743_5: Tato devasaṅghā palāyamānaṃ mārabalaṃ disvā “mārassa parājayo jāto,
atk-s0513a1:743_11: ugghosetvā gandhamālādihatthā mahāpurisassa santikaṃ bodhipallaṅkaṃ agamaṃsu.

atk-s0513a1:748_0: Ugghosayuṃ bodhimaṇḍe pamoditā, supaṇṇasaṅghāpi jayaṃ mahesino.

atk-s0513a1:752_0: Ugghosayuṃ bodhimaṇḍe pamoditā, jayaṃ tadā brahmagaṇāpi tādino”ti.
atk-s0513a1:753_0: Avasesā dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu devatā mālāgandhavilepanehi ca pūjayamānā nānappakārā thutiyo ca vadamānā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:753_1: Evaṃ anatthaṅgateyeva sūriye mahāpuriso mārabalaṃ vidhametvā cīvarūpari patamānehi bodhirukkhaṅkurehi
atk-s0513a1:753_2: rattapavāḷapallavehi viya pūjiyamāno paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ anussaritvā,
atk-s0513a1:753_5: Athassa dvādasapadikaṃ paccayākāraṃ vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena anulomapaṭilomato sammasantassa dasasahassī lokadhātu
atk-s0513a1:754_0: Mahāpurise pana dasasahassilokadhātuṃ unnādetvā aruṇuggamanavelāya sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhante sakaladasasahassī lokadhātu alaṅkatapaṭiyattā ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:754_1: Pācīnacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ ussāpitānaṃ dhajānaṃ paṭākānaṃ raṃsiyo pacchimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ paharanti,
atk-s0513a1:754_5: pathavitale ussāpitānaṃ pana dhajānaṃ paṭākānaṃ brahmalokaṃ āhacca aṭṭhaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:754_13: silātalāni bhinditvā uparūpari satta satta hutvā daṇḍakapadumāni uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:754_14: Dasasahassī lokadhātu vaṭṭetvā vissaṭṭhamālāguḷā viya susanthatapupphasanthāro viya ca ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:754_15: Cakkavāḷantaresu aṭṭhayojanasahassalokantarikā sattasūriyappabhāyapi anobhāsitapubbā ekobhāsā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:755_0: Evaṃ aparimāṇena sirivibhavena pūjiyamāno mahāpuriso anekappakāresu acchariyadhammesu pātubhūtesu sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:759_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-s0513a1:761_0: Iti tusitapurato paṭṭhāya yāva ayaṃ bodhimaṇḍe sabbaññutappatti,
atk-s0513a1:764_0: “Santikenidānaṃ pana ‘bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
atk-s0513a1:764_1: Vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāya’nti evaṃ tesu tesu ṭhānesu viharato tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāneyeva labbhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:764_3: atha kho pana tampi ādito paṭṭhāya evaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:764_4: udānaṃ udānetvā jayapallaṅke nisinnassa hi bhagavato etadahosi “ahaṃ kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri
atk-s0513a1:764_6: ettakaṃ me kālaṃ imasseva pallaṅkassa kāraṇā alaṅkatasīsaṃ gīvāya chinditvā dinnaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:764_8: jālīkumārasadisā puttā kaṇhājinakumārisadisā dhītaro maddīdevisadisā bhariyāyo ca paresaṃ dāsatthāya dinnā,
atk-s0513a1:764_9: ayaṃ me pallaṅko jayapallaṅko varapallaṅko ca.
atk-s0513a1:764_11: na tāva ito uṭṭhahissāmī”ti anekakoṭisatasahassā samāpattiyo samāpajjanto sattāhaṃ tattheva nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:764_12: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “atha kho bhagavā sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:765_0: Atha ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ “ajjāpi nūna siddhatthassa kattabbakiccaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a1:765_1: pallaṅkasmiñhi ālayaṃ na vijahatī”ti parivitakko udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:765_2: Satthā devatānaṃ parivitakkaṃ ñatvā tāsaṃ vitakkavūpasamanatthaṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0513a1:766_0: Evaṃ satthā iminā pāṭihāriyena devatānaṃ vitakkaṃ vūpasametvā pallaṅkato īsakaṃ pācīnanissite uttaradisābhāge
atk-s0513a1:766_1: ṭhatvā “imasmiṃ vata me pallaṅke sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭividdha”nti cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca
atk-s0513a1:766_2: pūritānaṃ pāramīnaṃ phalādhigamaṭṭhānaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bodhirukkhañca animisehi akkhīhi olokayamāno sattāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:766_5: Atha pallaṅkassa ca ṭhitaṭṭhānassa ca antarā caṅkamaṃ māpetvā puratthimapacchimato āyate ratanacaṅkame caṅkamanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi,
atk-s0513a1:767_0: Catutthe pana sattāhe bodhito pacchimuttaradisābhāge devatā ratanagharaṃ māpayiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:767_1: tattha pallaṅkena nisīditvā abhidhammapiṭakaṃ visesato cettha anantanayaṃ samantapaṭṭhānaṃ vicinanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi.
atk-s0513a1:767_2: Ābhidhammikā panāhu “ratanagharaṃ nāma na sattaratanamayaṃ gehaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:767_6: Tato paṭṭhāya pana taṃ ṭhānaṃ ratanagharacetiyaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:767_7: Evaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva cattāri sattāhāni vītināmetvā pañcame sattāhe bodhirukkhamūlā yena ajapālanigrodho tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0513a1:767_8: tatrāpi dhammaṃ vicinantoyeva vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedento nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:768_0: Tasmiṃ samaye māro devaputto “ettakaṃ kālaṃ anubandhanto otārāpekkhopi imassa na kiñci khalitaṃ addasaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:768_1: atikkantodāni esa mama vasa”nti domanassappatto mahāmagge nisīditvā soḷasa kāraṇāni cintento bhūmiyaṃ soḷasa lekhā kaḍḍhi –
atk-s0513a1:768_3: tenamhi iminā sadiso na jāto”ti ekaṃ lekhaṃ kaḍḍhi.
atk-s0513a1:768_13: tenamhi iminā sadiso na jāto”ti dasamaṃ lekhaṃ kaḍḍhi.
atk-s0513a1:768_14: Tathā “ahaṃ eso viya asādhāraṇassa indriyaparopariyattañāṇassa paṭivedhāya upanissayabhūtā dasa pāramiyo na pūresiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:768_15: tenamhi iminā sadiso na jāto”ti ekādasamaṃ lekhaṃ kaḍḍhi.
atk-s0513a1:768_20: sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭivedhāya upanissayabhūtā dasa pāramiyo na pūresiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:768_21: tenamhi iminā sadiso na jāto”ti soḷasamaṃ lekhaṃ kaḍḍhi.
atk-s0513a1:768_22: Evaṃ imehi kāraṇehi mahāmagge soḷasa lekhā kaḍḍhamāno nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:769_1: ragāti tisso māradhītaro “pitā no na paññāyati,
atk-s0513a1:769_2: kahaṃ nu kho etarahī”ti olokayamānā taṃ domanassappattaṃ bhūmiṃ vilekhamānaṃ nisinnaṃ disvā pitu santikaṃ gantvā “kasmā, tāta,
atk-s0513a1:769_5: ettakaṃ kālaṃ olokento otāramassa daṭṭhuṃ nāsakkhiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:769_8: mayametaṃ attano vase katvā ādāya āgamissāmāti. Na sakkā, ammā,
atk-s0513a1:769_11: “Tāta mayaṃ itthiyo nāma idāneva naṃ rāgapāsādīhi bandhitvā ānessāma,
atk-s0513a1:769_12: tumhe mā cintayitthā”ti bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “pāde te samaṇa paricāremā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:769_13: Bhagavā va tāsaṃ vacanaṃ manasi akāsi,
atk-s0513a1:769_15: anuttare upadhisaṅkhaye vimuttamānaso vivekasukhaññeva anubhavanto nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:770_4: yaṃnūna mayaṃ nānappakārehi rūpehi palobheyyāmā”ti ekamekā kumārivaṇṇādivasena sataṃ sataṃ attabhāve abhinimminitvā kumāriyo, avijātā,
atk-s0513a1:770_7: mahitthiyo ca hutvā chakkhattuṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “pāde te samaṇa paricāremā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:770_10: Keci panācariyā vadanti “tā mahitthibhāvena upagatā disvā bhagavā ‘evamevaṃ etā khaṇḍadantā palitakesā hontū’ti adhiṭṭhāsī”ti,
atk-s0513a1:770_12: Na hi satthā evarūpaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ karoti.
atk-s0513a1:770_15: evarūpaṃ nāma avītarāgādīnaṃ purato kātuṃ yuttaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:771_0: “Yassa jitaṃ nāvajīyati, jitamassa noyāti koci loke;
atk-s0513a1:772_0: Taṃ buddhamanantagocaraṃ, apadaṃ kena padena nessatha.
atk-s0513a1:773_0: “Yassa jālinī visattikā, taṇhā natthi kuhiñci netave;
atk-s0513a1:774_0: Taṃ buddhamanantagocaraṃ, apadaṃ kena padena nessathā”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:775_0: Imā dhammapade buddhavagge dve gāthā vadanto dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:775_2: arahaṃ sugato loke na rāgena suvānayo”tiādīni vatvā pitu santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:776_0: Bhagavāpi tattha sattāhaṃ vītināmetvā mucalindamūlaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:776_1: Tattha sattāhavaddalikāya uppannāya sītādipaṭibāhanatthaṃ mucalindena nāgarājena sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi
atk-s0513a1:776_2: parikkhitto asambādhāya gandhakuṭiyaṃ viharanto viya vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvediyamāno sattāhaṃ vītināmetvā
atk-s0513a1:777_0: Athassa tasmiṃ sattasattāhamatthake ekūnapaññāsatime divase tattha nisinnassa “mukhaṃ dhovissāmī”ti cittaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:777_5: Satthā taṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā anotattadahodakena mukhaṃ dhovitvā tattheva rājāyatanamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:778_0: Tasmiṃ samaye tapussabhallikā nāma dve vāṇijā pañcahi sakaṭasatehi ukkalājanapadā majjhimadesaṃ gacchantā
atk-s0513a1:778_1: attano ñātisālohitāya devatāya sakaṭāni sannirumbhitvā satthu āhārasampādane ussāhitā manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca
atk-s0513a1:778_3: bhagavā imaṃ āhāraṃ anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:778_4: Bhagavā pāyāsapaṭiggahaṇadivaseyeva pattassa antarahitattā “na kho tathāgatā hatthesu paṭiggaṇhanti,
atk-s0513a1:778_5: kimhi nu kho ahaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya”nti cintesi.
atk-s0513a1:778_6: Athassa cittaṃ ñatvā catūhi disāhi cattāro mahārājāno indanīlamaṇimaye patte upanāmesuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:778_9: Bhagavā catunnampi devaputtānaṃ anukampāya cattāropi patte paṭiggahetvā uparūpari ṭhapetvā “eko hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0513a1:778_10: cattāropi mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ paññāyamānalekhā hutvā majjhimena pamāṇena ekattaṃ upagamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:778_11: Bhagavā tasmiṃ paccagghe selamaye patte āhāraṃ paṭiggaṇhitvā paribhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:778_12: Dve bhātaro vāṇijā buddhañca dhammañca saraṇaṃ gantvā dvevācikā upāsakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:778_14: paricaritabbaṭṭhānaṃ dethā”ti vadantānaṃ dakkhiṇahatthena attano sīsaṃ parāmasitvā kesadhātuyo adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:778_15: Te attano nagare tā dhātuyo suvaṇṇasamuggassa anto pakkhipitvā cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:779_0: Sammāsambuddhopi kho tato uṭṭhāya puna ajapālanigrodhameva gantvā nigrodhamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:779_1: Athassa tattha nisinnamattasseva attanā adhigatassa dhammassa gambhīrataṃ paccavekkhantassa sabbabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:779_2: āciṇṇo “adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo”ti paresaṃ dhammaṃ adesetukamyatākārapavatto vitakko udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:779_3: Atha brahmā sahampati “nassati vata bho loko,
atk-s0513a1:779_4: vinassati vata bho loko”ti dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi sakkasuyāmasantusitasunimmitavasavattimahābrahmāno ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā “desetu, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:780_0: Satthā tassa paṭiññaṃ datvā “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti cintento “āḷāro paṇḍito,
atk-s0513a1:780_1: so imaṃ dhammaṃ khippaṃ ājānissatī”ti cittaṃ uppādetvā puna olokento tassa sattāhakālakatabhāvaṃ ñatvā udakaṃ āvajjesi.
atk-s0513a1:780_2: Tassāpi abhidosakālakatabhāvaṃ ñatvā “bahūpakārā kho me pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū”ti pañcavaggiye ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:780_3: manasikāraṃ katvā “kahaṃ nu kho te etarahi viharantī”ti āvajjento “bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye”ti
atk-s0513a1:780_4: ñatvā “tattha gantvā dhammacakkaṃ pavattessāmī”ti katipāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍasāmantāyeva piṇḍāya caranto viharitvā
atk-s0513a1:780_5: āsāḷhipuṇṇamāsiyaṃ “bārāṇasiṃ gamissāmī”ti cātuddasiyaṃ paccūsasamaye vibhātāya rattiyā kālasseva pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0513a1:780_6: aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ paṭipanno antarāmagge upakaṃ nāma ājīvakaṃ disvā tassa attano buddhabhāvaṃ ācikkhitvā
atk-s0513a1:781_0: Pañcavaggiyā therā tathāgataṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā “ayaṃ āvuso samaṇo gotamo paccayabāhullāya āvattitvā
atk-s0513a1:781_5: Bhagavā sadevakassa lokassa cittācāraṃ jānanasamatthena ñāṇena “kiṃ nu kho ime cintayiṃsū”ti āvajjetvā cittaṃ aññāsi.
atk-s0513a1:781_6: Atha ne sabbadevamanussesu anodissakavasena pharaṇasamatthaṃ mettacittaṃ saṅkhipitvā odissakavasena mettacittena phari.
atk-s0513a1:781_7: Te bhagavatā mettacittena phuṭṭhā tathāgate upasaṅkamante sakāya katikāya saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānādīni sabbakiccāni akaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:781_8: sammāsambuddhabhāvaṃ panassa ajānamānā kevalaṃ nāmena ca āvusovādena ca samudācaranti.
atk-s0513a1:782_2: tathāgataṃ nāmena ca āvusovādena ca samudācaratha, arahaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:782_4: tathāgato sammāsambuddho”ti attano buddhabhāvaṃ saññāpetvā paññatte varabuddhāsane nisinno uttarāsāḷhanakkhattayoge
atk-s0513a1:782_5: vattamāne aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi parivuto pañcavaggiye there āmantetvā dhammacakkappavattanasuttantaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a1:782_6: Tesu aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesento suttapariyosāne aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:782_7: Satthā tattheva vassaṃ upagantvā punadivase vappattheraṃ ovadanto vihāreyeva nisīdi,
atk-s0513a1:782_12: punadivase assajittheranti sabbe sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā pañcamiyaṃ pakkhassa pañcapi jane sannipātetvā anattalakkhaṇasuttantaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a1:782_14: Atha satthā yasakulaputtassa upanissayaṃ disvā taṃ rattibhāge nibbijjitvā gehaṃ pahāya nikkhantaṃ “ehi
atk-s0513a1:782_17: aparepi tassa sahāyake catupaṇṇāsa jane ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā arahattaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:783_0: Evaṃ loke ekasaṭṭhiyā arahantesu jātesu satthā vutthavasso pavāretvā “caratha,
atk-s0513a1:783_2: cārika”nti saṭṭhi bhikkhū disāsu pesetvā sayaṃ uruvelaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge kappāsikavanasaṇḍe tiṃsa jane bhaddavaggiyakumāre vinesi.
atk-s0513a1:783_5: Tepi sabbe ehibhikkhubhāveneva pabbājetvā disāsu pesetvā uruvelaṃ gantvā aḍḍhuḍḍhāni pāṭihāriyasahassāni
atk-s0513a1:783_6: dassetvā uruvelakassapādayo sahassajaṭilaparivāre tebhātikajaṭile vinetvā ehibhikkhubhāveneva pabbājetvā
atk-s0513a1:783_7: gayāsīse nisīdāpetvā ādittapariyāyadesanāya arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā tena arahantasahassena parivuto “bimbisārarañño
atk-s0513a1:783_8: dinnaṃ paṭiññaṃ mocessāmī”ti rājagahaṃ gantvā nagarūpacāre laṭṭhivanuyyānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:783_9: Rājā uyyānapālassa santikā “satthā āgato”ti sutvā dvādasanahutehi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi parivuto satthāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:783_10: upasaṅkamitvā cakkavicittatalesu suvaṇṇapaṭṭavitānaṃ viya pabhāsamudayaṃ vissajjantesu tathāgatassa pādesu
atk-s0513a1:783_11: sirasā nipatitvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi saddhiṃ parisāya.
atk-s0513a1:784_0: Atha kho tesaṃ brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ etadahosi “kiṃ nu kho mahāsamaṇo uruvelakassape brahmacariyaṃ carati,
atk-s0513a1:784_2: Bhagavā tesaṃ cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya theraṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0513a1:785_0: “Kimeva disvā uruvelavāsi, pahāsi aggiṃ kisako vadāno;
atk-s0513a1:786_0: Pucchāmi taṃ kassapa etamatthaṃ, kathaṃ pahīnaṃ tava aggihutta”nti. ;
atk-s0513a1:788_0: “Rūpe ca sadde ca atho rase ca, kāmitthiyo cābhivadanti yaññā;
atk-s0513a1:789_0: Etaṃ malanti upadhīsu ñatvā, tasmā na yiṭṭhe na hute arañji”nti. –
atk-s0513a1:790_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā attano sāvakabhāvapakāsanatthaṃ tathāgatassa pādapiṭṭhe sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā “satthā me, bhante, bhagavā,
atk-s0513a1:790_1: sāvakohamasmī”ti vatvā ekatālaṃ dvitālaṃ titālanti yāva sattatālappamāṇaṃ sattakkhattuṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā
atk-s0513a1:790_3: Taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā mahājano “aho mahānubhāvā buddhā,
atk-s0513a1:790_4: evaṃ thāmagatadiṭṭhiko nāma ‘arahā’ti maññamāno uruvelakassapopi diṭṭhijālaṃ bhinditvā tathāgatena damito”ti satthu guṇakathaṃyeva kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:790_6: atītepi esa mayā damitoyevā”ti vatvā imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā mahānāradakassapajātakaṃ kathetvā cattāri saccāni pakāsesi.
atk-s0513a1:790_7: Magadharājā ekādasahi nahutehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0513a1:790_9: Rājā satthu santike nisinnoyeva pañca assāsake pavedetvā saraṇaṃ gantvā svātanāya nimantetvā āsanā vuṭṭhāya bhagavantaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:791_2: sabbepi rājagahavāsino aṭṭhārasakoṭisaṅkhā manussā tathāgataṃ daṭṭhukāmā pātova rājagahato laṭṭhivanuyyānaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:791_5: Mahājano dasabalassa rūpasobhaggappattaṃ attabhāvaṃ passanto tittiṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a1:791_7: Evarūpesu hi ṭhānesu tathāgatassa lakkhaṇānubyañjanādippabhedā sabbāpi rūpakāyasirī vaṇṇetabbā.
atk-s0513a1:791_8: Evaṃ rūpasobhaggappattaṃ dasabalassa sarīraṃ passamānena mahājanena nirantaraṃ phuṭe uyyāne ca magge ca ekabhikkhussapi nikkhamanokāso nāhosi.
atk-s0513a1:791_9: Taṃ divasaṃ kira bhagavā chinnabhatto bhaveyya,
atk-s0513a1:791_10: taṃ mā ahosīti sakkassa nisinnāsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0513a1:791_11: So āvajjamāno taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā māṇavakavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā buddhadhammasaṅghapaṭisaṃyuttā thutiyo
atk-s0513a1:791_12: vadamāno dasabalassa purato otaritvā devatānubhāvena okāsaṃ katvā –
atk-s0513a1:800_0: Imāhi gāthāhi satthu vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno purato pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a1:800_1: Tadā mahājano māṇavakassa rūpasiriṃ disvā “ativiya abhirūpo ayaṃ māṇavako,
atk-s0513a1:800_2: na kho pana amhehi diṭṭhapubbo”ti cintetvā “kuto ayaṃ māṇavako,
atk-s0513a1:802_0: Arahaṃ sugato loke, tassāhaṃ paricārako”ti. – gāthamāha;
atk-s0513a1:803_0: Satthā sakkena katokāsaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjitvā bhikkhusahassaparivuto rājagahaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:803_1: Rājā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:803_2: tīṇi ratanāni vinā vattituṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:803_3: velāya vā avelāya vā bhagavato santikaṃ āgamissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:803_5: idaṃ pana amhākaṃ veḷuvanaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ nātidūre nāccāsanne gamanāgamanasampannaṃ buddhārahaṃ senāsanaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:803_6: Idaṃ me bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātū”ti suvaṇṇabhiṅkārena pupphagandhavāsitaṃ maṇivaṇṇaṃ udakaṃ ādāya veḷuvanuyyānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:803_8: Tasmiṃ ārāmapaṭiggahaṇe “buddhasāsanassa mūlāni otiṇṇānī”ti mahāpathavī kampi.
atk-s0513a1:803_9: Jambudīpasmiñhi ṭhapetvā veḷuvanaṃ aññaṃ mahāpathaviṃ kampetvā gahitasenāsanaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a1:803_10: Tambapaṇṇidīpepi ṭhapetvā mahāvihāraṃ aññaṃ pathaviṃ kampetvā gahitasenāsanaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a1:803_11: Satthā veḷuvanārāmaṃ paṭiggahetvā rañño anumodanaṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto veḷuvanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:804_0: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye sāriputto ca moggallāno cāti dve paribbājakā rājagahaṃ upanissāya viharanti amataṃ pariyesamānā.
atk-s0513a1:804_1: Tesu sāriputto assajittheraṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ disvā pasannacitto payirupāsitvā “ye dhammā hetuppabhavā”ti
atk-s0513a1:804_2: gāthaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya attano sahāyakassa moggallānaparibbājakassapi tameva gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:804_4: Te ubhopi janā sañcayaṃ oloketvā attano parisāya saddhiṃ bhagavato santike pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:804_7: Ubhopi ca ne satthā aggasāvakaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:805_0: Tathāgate pana tasmiṃyeva veḷuvanuyyāne viharante suddhodanamahārājā “putto kira me chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:805_1: caritvā paramābhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattavaradhammacakko rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane viharatī”ti sutvā
atk-s0513a1:805_3: purisasahassaparivāro rājagahaṃ gantvā mama vacanena ‘pitā vo suddhodanamahārājā daṭṭhukāmo’ti vatvā puttaṃ me gaṇhitvā ehī”ti āha. So “evaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:805_4: devā”ti rañño vacanaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchitvā purisasahassaparivāro khippameva saṭṭhiyojanamaggaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:805_5: dasabalassa catuparisamajjhe nisīditvā dhammadesanāvelāya vihāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:805_6: So “tiṭṭhatu tāva rañño pahitasāsana”nti pariyante ṭhito satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā yathāṭhitova saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:805_9: sabbe taṅkhaṇaṃyeva iddhimayapattacīvaradharā saṭṭhivassattherā viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:805_10: Arahattaṃ pattakālato paṭṭhāya pana ariyā nāma majjhattāva hontīti so raññā pahitasāsanaṃ dasabalassa na kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:805_13: tvaṃ gacchāhī”ti teneva niyāmena aññaṃ amaccaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:805_14: Sopi gantvā purimanayeneva saddhiṃ parisāya arahattaṃ patvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:805_15: Rājā eteneva niyāmena purisasahassaparivāre nava amacce pesesi,
atk-s0513a1:805_16: sabbe attano kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā tuṇhībhūtā tattheva vihariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:806_0: Rājā sāsanamattampi āharitvā ācikkhantaṃ alabhitvā cintesi “ettakā janā mayi sinehābhāvena sāsanamattampi na paccāhariṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:806_1: ko nu kho mama vacanaṃ karissatī”ti sabbaṃ rājabalaṃ olokento kāḷudāyiṃ addasa.
atk-s0513a1:806_2: So kira rañño sabbatthasādhako amacco abbhantariko ativissāsiko bodhisattena saddhiṃ ekadivase jāto sahapaṃsukīḷako sahāyo.
atk-s0513a1:806_4: kāḷudāyi ahaṃ mama puttaṃ passitukāmo nava purisasahassāni pesesiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:806_8: sakkhissasi nu kho me puttaṃ dassetu”nti.
atk-s0513a1:806_11: tvaṃ pabbajitvā vā apabbajitvā vā mayhaṃ puttaṃ dassehīti.
atk-s0513a1:806_13: devā”ti rañño sāsanaṃ ādāya rājagahaṃ gantvā satthu dhammadesanāvelāya parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:806_14: sutvā saparivāro arahattaphalaṃ patvā ehibhikkhubhāve patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:807_0: Satthā buddho hutvā paṭhamaṃ antovassaṃ isipatane vasitvā vutthavasso pavāretvā uruvelaṃ gantvā tattha
atk-s0513a1:807_1: tayo māse vasanto tebhātikajaṭile vinetvā bhikkhusahassaparivāro phussamāsapuṇṇamāyaṃ rājagahaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:807_3: Ettāvatā bārāṇasito nikkhantassa pañca māsā jātā,
atk-s0513a1:807_8: manussehi sassādīni uddharitvā sammukhasammukhaṭṭhānehi maggā dinnā,
atk-s0513a1:808_0: “Aṅgārino dāni dumā bhadante, phalesino chadanaṃ vippahāya;
atk-s0513a1:809_0: Te accimantova pabhāsayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ…pe….
atk-s0513a1:811_0: Saddalā haritā bhūmi, esa kālo mahāmunī”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:812_0: Saṭṭhimattāhi gāthāhi dasabalassa kulanagaraṃ gamanatthāya gamanavaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0513a1:812_1: Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ nu kho udāyi madhurassarena gamanavaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇesī”ti āha. Bhante,
atk-s0513a1:813_1: kapilavatthuvāsīnaṃ dasahi sahassehīti sabbeheva vīsatisahassehi khīṇāsavabhikkhūhi parivuto rājagahā nikkhamitvā divase divase yojanaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:813_2: “Rājagahato saṭṭhiyojanaṃ kapilavatthuṃ dvīhi māsehi pāpuṇissāmī”ti aturitacārikaṃ pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:813_3: Theropi “bhagavato nikkhantabhāvaṃ rañño ārocessāmī”ti vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā rañño nivesane pāturahosi.
atk-s0513a1:813_4: Rājā theraṃ disvā tuṭṭhacitto mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā attano paṭiyāditassa nānaggarasabhojanassa pattaṃ pūretvā adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:813_12: Rājā tuṭṭhamānaso āha “tumhe imaṃ paribhuñjitvā yāva mama putto imaṃ nagaraṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0513a1:813_15: Rājā theraṃ parivisitvā pattaṃ gandhacuṇṇena ubbaṭṭetvā uttamabhojanassa pūretvā “tathāgatassa dethā”ti therassa hatthe patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:813_16: Thero sabbesaṃ passantānaṃyeva pattaṃ ākāse khipitvā sayampi vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā satthu hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:813_20: Theropi bhattakiccāvasāne divase divase “ajja ettakaṃ bhagavā āgato,
atk-s0513a1:813_21: ajja ettaka”nti buddhaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttāya kathāya sakalaṃ rājakulaṃ satthu dassanaṃ vināyeva satthari sañjātappasādaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:813_24: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kulappasādakānaṃ yadidaṃ kāḷudāyī”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:814_0: Sākiyāpi kho “anuppatte bhagavati amhākaṃ ñātiseṭṭhaṃ passissāmā”ti sannipatitvā bhagavato vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:814_1: vīmaṃsamānā “nigrodhasakkassa ārāmo ramaṇīyo”ti sallakkhetvā tattha sabbaṃ paṭijagganavidhiṃ kāretvā
atk-s0513a1:814_2: gandhapupphahatthā paccuggamanaṃ karontā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍite daharadahare nāgaradārake ca nāgaradārikāyo
atk-s0513a1:814_5: tesaṃ anantaraṃ sāmaṃ gandhapupphacuṇṇādīhi pūjayamānā bhagavantaṃ gahetvā nigrodhārāmameva agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:814_11: nattā”ti cintetvā daharadahare rājakumāre āhaṃsu “tumhe vandatha,
atk-s0513a1:815_0: Tesu evaṃ avanditvā nisinnesu bhagavā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā “na maṃ ñātayo vandanti,
atk-s0513a1:815_1: handa dāni ne vandāpessāmī”ti abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā
atk-s0513a1:815_2: tesaṃ sīse pādapaṃsuṃ okiramāno viya kaṇḍambarukkhamūle yamakapāṭihāriyasadisaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:815_4: “bhagavā tumhākaṃ jātadivase kāḷadevalassa vandanatthaṃ upanītānaṃ pāde vo parivattitvā brāhmaṇassa matthake patiṭṭhite disvāpi ahaṃ tumhe vandiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:815_6: Vappamaṅgaladivase jambucchāyāya sirisayane nisinnānaṃ vo jambucchāyāya aparivattanaṃ disvāpi pāde vandiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:815_8: Idāni imaṃ adiṭṭhapubbaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvāpi ahaṃ tumhākaṃ pāde vandāmi,
atk-s0513a1:815_10: Raññā pana vandite bhagavantaṃ avanditvā ṭhātuṃ samattho nāma ekasākiyopi nāhosi,
atk-s0513a1:816_0: Iti bhagavā ñātayo vandāpetvā ākāsato otaritvā paññattāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:816_9: Satthā “na idāneva mayhaṃ ñātisamāgame pokkharavassaṃ vassati,
atk-s0513a1:816_10: atītepi vassī”ti imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā vessantarajātakaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:816_11: Dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sabbe uṭṭhāya vanditvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:816_12: Ekopi rājā vā rājamahāmatto vā “sve amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vatvā gato nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a1:817_0: Satthā punadivase vīsatisahassabhikkhuparivuto kapilavatthuṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:817_3: Bhagavā indakhīle ṭhitova āvajjesi “kathaṃ nu kho pubbabuddhā kulanagare piṇḍāya cariṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:817_6: Tato ekabuddhassapi uppaṭipāṭiyā gamanaṃ adisvā “mayāpi idāni ayameva vaṃso,
atk-s0513a1:817_8: āyatiñca me sāvakāpi mamaññeva anusikkhantā piṇḍacārikavattaṃ paripūressantī”ti koṭiyaṃ niviṭṭhagehato paṭṭhāya sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya cari.
atk-s0513a1:817_9: “Ayyo kira siddhatthakumāro piṇḍāya caratī”ti dvibhūmakatibhūmakādīsu pāsādesu sīhapañjare vivaritvā mahājano dassanabyāvaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:818_0: Rāhulamātāpi devī “ayyaputto kira imasmiṃyeva nagare mahantena rājānubhāvena suvaṇṇasivikādīhi vicaritvā
atk-s0513a1:818_1: idāni kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyavatthavasano kapālahattho piṇḍāya carati,
atk-s0513a1:818_2: sobhati nu kho”ti sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā olokayamānā bhagavantaṃ nānāvirāgasamujjalāya sarīrappabhāya
atk-s0513a1:818_4: anopamāya buddhasiriyā virocamānaṃ disvā uṇhīsato paṭṭhāya yāva pādatalā –
atk-s0513a1:822_0: Cāmarihatthavibhūsitapaṇho, esa hi tuyhaṃ pitā narasīho.
atk-s0513a1:824_0: Lokahitāya āgato naravīro, esa hi tuyhaṃ pitā narasīho.
atk-s0513a1:826_0: Indadhanuabhinīlabhamuko, esa hi tuyhaṃ pitā narasīho.
atk-s0513a1:828_0: Mattagajindavilāsitagāmī, esa hi tuyhaṃ pitā narasīho.
atk-s0513a1:830_0: Vīsativīsatisetasudanto, esa hi tuyhaṃ pitā narasīho.
atk-s0513a1:832_0: Sīlasamādhipatiṭṭhitacitto, esa hi tuyhaṃ pitā narasīho.
atk-s0513a1:834_0: Kañcanasucchaviuttamavaṇṇo, esa hi tuyhaṃ pitā narasīho.
atk-s0513a1:836_0: Osadhipaṇḍarasuddhasuuṇṇo, esa hi tuyhaṃ pitā narasīho.
atk-s0513a1:838_0: Sāvakamajjhagato samaṇindo, esa hi tuyhaṃ pitā narasīho”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:839_0: Evamimāhi dasahi narasīhagāthāhi nāma abhitthavitvā “tumhākaṃ putto kira idāni piṇḍāya caratī”ti rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:839_1: Rājā saṃviggahadayo hatthena sāṭakaṃ saṇṭhapento turitaturitaṃ nikkhamitvā vegena gantvā bhagavato purato ṭhatvā āha – “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:839_4: kiṃ ‘ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ na sakkā bhattaṃ laddhu’nti saññaṃ karitthā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:839_8: tattha ca ekakhattiyopi bhikkhācaro nāma natthīti. “Ayaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:839_12: Ete ca aññe ca anekasahassasaṅkhā buddhā bhikkhācarā,
atk-s0513a1:841_0: Dhammacārī sukhaṃ seti, asmiṃ loke paramhi cā”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:842_0: Imaṃ gāthamāha. Gāthāpariyosāne rājā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:843_0: “Dhammaṃ care sucaritaṃ, na naṃ duccaritaṃ care;
atk-s0513a1:844_0: Dhammacārī sukhaṃ seti, asmiṃ loke paramhi cā”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:845_0: Imaṃ pana gāthaṃ sutvā sakadāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:845_2: maraṇasamaye setacchattassa heṭṭhā sirisayane nipannoyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:845_4: Sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchikatvāyeva pana bhagavato pattaṃ gahetvā saparisaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahāpāsādaṃ āropetvā paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena parivisi.
atk-s0513a1:845_5: Bhattakiccapariyosāne sabbaṃ itthāgāraṃ āgantvā bhagavantaṃ vandi ṭhapetvā rāhulamātaraṃ.
atk-s0513a1:845_7: ayyaputtaṃ vandāhī”ti parijanena vuccamānāpi “sace mayhaṃ guṇo atthi,
atk-s0513a1:845_9: āgatameva naṃ vandissāmī”ti vatvā na agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:846_0: Bhagavā rājānaṃ pattaṃ gāhāpetvā dvīhi aggasāvakehi saddhiṃ rājadhītāya sirigabbhaṃ gantvā “rājadhītā
atk-s0513a1:846_1: yathāruci vandamānā na kiñci vattabbā”ti vatvā paññattāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:846_2: Sā vegenāgantvā gopphakesu gahetvā pādapiṭṭhiyaṃ sīsaṃ parivattetvā yathāajjhāsayaṃ vandi.
atk-s0513a1:846_4: mama dhītā ‘tumhehi kāsāyāni vatthāni nivāsitānī’ti sutvā tato paṭṭhāya kāsāyavatthanivatthā jātā,
atk-s0513a1:846_6: tumhehi mahāsayanassa chaḍḍitabhāvaṃ sutvā paṭṭikāmañcakeyeva nipannā,
atk-s0513a1:846_7: tumhākaṃ mālāgandhādīhi viratabhāvaṃ ñatvā viratamālāgandhāva jātā,
atk-s0513a1:846_8: attano ñātakehi ‘mayaṃ paṭijaggissāmā’ti sāsane pesitepi ekañātakampi na olokesi,
atk-s0513a1:846_11: yaṃ idāni tayā rakkhiyamānā rājadhītā paripakke ñāṇe attānaṃ rakkheyya,
atk-s0513a1:846_12: esā pubbe anārakkhā pabbatapāde vicaramānā aparipakke ñāṇe attānaṃ rakkhī”ti vatvā candakinnarījātakaṃ kathetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:847_0: Dutiyadivase pana nandassa rājakumārassa abhisekagehappavesanavivāhamaṅgalesu vattamānesu tassa gehaṃ
atk-s0513a1:847_1: gantvā kumāraṃ pattaṃ gāhāpetvā pabbājetukāmo maṅgalaṃ vatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:847_5: Sopi bhagavantaṃ “pattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vattuṃ avisahamāno vihāraṃyeva agamāsi,
atk-s0513a1:847_7: Iti bhagavā kapilavatthuṃ gantvā tatiyadivase nandaṃ pabbājesi.
atk-s0513a1:848_0: Sattame divase rāhulamātā kumāraṃ alaṅkaritvā bhagavato santikaṃ pesesi “passa, tāta,
atk-s0513a1:848_4: tyāssa nikkhamanakālato paṭṭhāya na passāma, gaccha,
atk-s0513a1:848_6: ‘ahaṃ tāta kumāro abhisekaṃ patvā cakkavattī bhavissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:848_10: Kumāro ca bhagavato santikaṃ gantvā pitu sinehaṃ paṭilabhitvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho “sukhā te, samaṇa,
atk-s0513a1:848_11: chāyā”ti vatvā aññañca bahuṃ attano anurūpaṃ vadanto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:848_12: Bhagavā katabhattakicco anumodanaṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:848_17: parijanopi bhagavatā saddhiṃ gacchantaṃ nivattetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a1:848_18: Iti so bhagavatā saddhiṃ ārāmameva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:849_0: Tato bhagavā cintesi “yaṃ ayaṃ pitu santakaṃ dhanaṃ icchati,
atk-s0513a1:849_2: handassa bodhimaṇḍe paṭiladdhaṃ sattavidhaṃ ariyadhanaṃ demi,
atk-s0513a1:849_3: lokuttaradāyajjassa naṃ sāmikaṃ karomī”ti āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ āmantesi “tena hi,
atk-s0513a1:849_7: Pabbajite pana kumāre rañño adhimattaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0513a1:849_8: Taṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto bhagavato nivedetvā “sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:849_9: ayyā mātāpitūhi ananuññātaṃ puttaṃ na pabbājeyyu”nti varaṃ yāci.
atk-s0513a1:849_10: Bhagavā tassa taṃ varaṃ datvā punadivase rājanivesane katapātarāso ekamantaṃ nisinnena raññā “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:849_11: tumhākaṃ dukkarakārikakāle ekā devatā maṃ upasaṅkamitvā ‘putto te kālakato’ti āha,
atk-s0513a1:849_12: tassā vacanaṃ asaddahanto ‘na mayhaṃ putto bodhiṃ appatvā kālaṃ karotī’ti taṃ paṭikkhipi”nti vutte “idāni kiṃ saddahissatha,
atk-s0513a1:849_13: ye tumhe pubbepi aṭṭhikāni dassetvā ‘putto te mato’ti vutte na saddahitthā”ti imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā mahādhammapālajātakaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:850_0: Iti bhagavā pitaraṃ tīsu phalesu patiṭṭhāpetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto punadeva rājagahaṃ gantvā veḷuvane vihāsi.
atk-s0513a1:850_1: Tasmiṃ samaye anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati pañcahi sakaṭasatehi bhaṇḍaṃ ādāya rājagahe attano piyasahāyakassa
atk-s0513a1:850_2: seṭṭhino gehaṃ gantvā tattha buddhassa bhagavato uppannabhāvaṃ sutvā balavapaccūsasamaye devatānubhāvena
atk-s0513a1:850_3: vivaṭena dvārena satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya dutiyadivase buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0513a1:850_4: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā sāvatthiṃ āgamanatthāya satthu paṭiññaṃ gahetvā antarāmagge pañcacattālīsayojanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:850_5: satasahassaṃ satasahassaṃ datvā yojanike yojanike vihāre kāretvā jetavanaṃ koṭisanthārena aṭṭhārasahiraññakoṭīhi
atk-s0513a1:850_10: manoramaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpetvā dasabalassa āgamanatthāya dūtaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:850_11: Satthā dūtassa vacanaṃ sutvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto rājagahā nikkhamitvā anupubbena sāvatthinagaraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:851_0: Mahāseṭṭhipi kho vihāramahaṃ sajjetvā tathāgatassa jetavanappavisanadivase puttaṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:851_1: katvā alaṅkatapaṭiyatteheva pañcahi kumārasatehi saddhiṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:851_2: So saparivāro pañcavaṇṇavatthasamujjalāni pañca dhajasatāni gahetvā dasabalassa purato ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:851_3: Tesaṃ pacchato mahāsubhaddā cūḷasubhaddāti dve seṭṭhidhītaro pañcahi kumārikāsatehi saddhiṃ puṇṇaghaṭe gahetvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:851_4: Tāsaṃ pacchato seṭṭhibhariyā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā pañcahi mātugāmasatehi saddhiṃ puṇṇapātiyo gahetvā nikkhami.
atk-s0513a1:851_5: Sabbesaṃ pacchato sayaṃ mahāseṭṭhi ahatavatthanivattho ahatavatthanivattheheva pañcahi seṭṭhisatehi saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ abbhuggañchi.
atk-s0513a1:851_6: Bhagavā imaṃ upāsakaparisaṃ purato katvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto attano sarīrappabhāya suvaṇṇarasasekapiñjarāni
atk-s0513a1:851_7: viya vanantarāni kurumāno anantāya buddhalīḷāya apaṭisamāya buddhasiriyā jetavanavihāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:852_3: Tena hi gahapati imaṃ vihāraṃ āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dehīti. “Sādhu,
atk-s0513a1:852_4: bhante”ti mahāseṭṭhi suvaṇṇabhiṅkāraṃ ādāya dasabalassa hatthe udakaṃ pātetvā “imaṃ jetavanavihāraṃ āgatānāgatassa
atk-s0513a1:854_0: Sarīsape ca makase, sisire cāpi vuṭṭhiyo.
atk-s0513a1:858_0: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ atthamattano.
atk-s0513a1:863_0: Yaṃ so dhammaṃ idhaññāya, parinibbāti anāsavo”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:864_3: anāthapiṇḍikassa pana vihāramaho navahi māsehi niṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:864_5: Iti ekasmiṃyeva vihāre catupaṇṇāsakoṭisaṅkhyaṃ dhanaṃ pariccaji.
atk-s0513a1:865_0: Atīte pana vipassissa bhagavato kāle punabbasumitto nāma seṭṭhi suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāsanthārena kiṇitvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne yojanappamāṇaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:865_1: Sikhissa bhagavato kāle sirivaḍḍho nāma seṭṭhi suvaṇṇaphālasanthārena kiṇitvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne tigāvutappamāṇaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:865_2: Vessabhussa bhagavato kāle sotthijo nāma seṭṭhi suvaṇṇahatthipadasanthārena kiṇitvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne aḍḍhayojanappamāṇaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:865_3: Kakusandhassa bhagavato kāle accuto nāma seṭṭhi suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāsanthārena kiṇitvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne gāvutappamāṇaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:865_4: Koṇāgamanassa bhagavato kāle uggo nāma seṭṭhi suvaṇṇakacchapasanthārena kiṇitvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne aḍḍhagāvutappamāṇaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:865_5: Kassapassa bhagavato kāle sumaṅgalo nāma seṭṭhi suvaṇṇakaṭṭisanthārena kiṇitvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne soḷasakarīsappamāṇaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:865_6: Amhākaṃ pana bhagavato kāle anāthapiṇḍiko nāma seṭṭhi kahāpaṇakoṭisanthārena kiṇitvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne aṭṭhakarīsappamāṇaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:866_0: Iti mahābodhimaṇḍe sabbaññutappattito yāva mahāparinibbānamañcā yasmiṃ yasmiṃ ṭhāne bhagavā vihāsi,
atk-s0513a1:872_0: Imaṃ tāva apaṇṇakadhammadesanaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiṃ upanissāya jetavanamahāvihāre viharanto kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:872_1: Kaṃ pana ārabbha ayaṃ kathā samuṭṭhitāti?
atk-s0513a1:872_3: Ekasmiñhi divase anāthapiṇḍiko seṭṭhi attano sahāyake pañcasate aññatitthiyasāvake ādāya bahuṃ mālāgandhavilepanañceva
atk-s0513a1:872_4: sappitelamadhuphāṇitavatthacchādanāni ca gāhāpetvā jetavanaṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā gandhamālādīhi
atk-s0513a1:872_5: pūjetvā bhesajjāni ceva vatthāni ca bhikkhusaṅghassa vissajjetvā cha nisajjādose vajjetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:872_6: Tepi aññatitthiyasāvakā tathāgataṃ vanditvā satthu puṇṇacandasassirikaṃ mukhaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:872_8: āveḷāveḷā yamakayamakā hutvā niccharantiyo ghanabuddharasmiyo ca olokayamānā anāthapiṇḍikassa samīpeyeva nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:873_0: Atha nesaṃ satthā manosilātale sīhanādaṃ nadanto taruṇasīho viya gajjanto pāvussakamegho viya ca ākāsagaṅgaṃ
atk-s0513a1:873_1: otārento viya ca ratanadāmaṃ ganthento viya ca aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena savanīyena kamanīyena brahmassarena
atk-s0513a1:873_3: Te satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannacittā uṭṭhāya dasabalaṃ vanditvā aññatitthiyasaraṇaṃ bhinditvā buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:873_4: Te tato paṭṭhāya niccakālaṃ anāthapiṇḍikena saddhiṃ gandhamālādihatthā vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanti,
atk-s0513a1:874_0: Atha bhagavā sāvatthito punadeva rājagahaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:874_1: Te tathāgatassa gatakāle taṃ saraṇaṃ bhinditvā puna aññatitthiyasaraṇaṃ gantvā attano mūlaṭṭhāneyeva patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0513a1:874_2: Bhagavāpi sattaṭṭha māse vītināmetvā puna jetavanameva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:874_3: Anāthapiṇḍiko punapi te ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:874_5: Atha nesaṃ tathāgate cārikaṃ pakkante gahitasaraṇaṃ bhinditvā puna aññatitthiyasaraṇameva gahetvā mūle patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:875_0: Bhagavā aparimitakappakoṭiyo nirantaraṃ pavattitavacīsucaritānubhāvena dibbagandhagandhitaṃ nānāgandhapūritaṃ
atk-s0513a1:875_1: ratanakaraṇḍakaṃ vivaranto viya mukhapadumaṃ vivaritvā madhurassaraṃ nicchārento “saccaṃ kira tumhe upāsakā
atk-s0513a1:875_2: tīṇi saraṇāni bhinditvā aññatitthiyasaraṇaṃ gatā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:875_3: Atha tehi paṭicchādetuṃ asakkontehi “saccaṃ bhagavā”ti vutte satthā “upāsakā heṭṭhā avīciṃ upari bhavaggaṃ
atk-s0513a1:875_4: paricchedaṃ katvā tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu sīlādīhi guṇehi buddhena sadiso nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:875_7: sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā,
atk-s0513a1:875_9: yaṃ kiñci vittaṃ idha vā huraṃ vā…pe…
atk-s0513a1:875_10: aggato ve pasannāna”ntiādīhi suttehi pakāsite ratanattayaguṇe pakāsetvā “evaṃ uttamaguṇehi samannāgataṃ
atk-s0513a1:875_11: ratanattayaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā upāsakā vā upāsikā vā nirayādīsu nibbattakā nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:875_12: apāyanibbattito pana muccitvā devaloke uppajjitvā mahāsampattiṃ anubhonti,
atk-s0513a1:875_13: tasmā tumhehi evarūpaṃ saraṇaṃ bhinditvā aññatitthiyasaraṇaṃ gacchantehi ayuttaṃ kata”nti āha.
atk-s0513a1:876_0: Ettha ca tīṇi ratanāni mokkhavasena uttamavasena saraṇagatānaṃ apāyesu nibbattiyā abhāvadīpanatthaṃ imāni suttāni dassetabbāni –
atk-s0513a1:877_0: “Ye keci buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ;
atk-s0513a1:879_0: “Ye keci dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ;
atk-s0513a1:881_0: “Ye keci saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ;
atk-s0513a1:883_0: “Bahuṃ ve saraṇaṃ yanti, pabbatāni vanāni ca;
atk-s0513a1:887_0: “Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato;
atk-s0513a1:893_0: Na kevalañca nesaṃ satthā ettakaṃyeva dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0513a1:893_10: arahattaphalaṃ detī”tievamādīhipi nayehi dhammaṃ desetvā “evarūpaṃ nāma saraṇaṃ bhindantehi ayuttaṃ tumhehi kata”nti āha.
atk-s0513a1:893_13: bhāvito bahulīkato ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0513a1:894_0: Evaṃ bhagavā nānappakārehi upāsake ovaditvā “upāsakā pubbepi manussā asaraṇaṃ ‘saraṇa’nti takkaggāhena
atk-s0513a1:894_1: viraddhaggāhena gahetvā amanussapariggahite kantāre yakkhabhakkhā hutvā mahāvināsaṃ pattā,
atk-s0513a1:894_2: apaṇṇakaggāhaṃ pana ekaṃsikaggāhaṃ aviraddhaggāhaṃ gahitamanussā tasmiṃyeva kantāre sotthibhāvaṃ pattā”ti vatvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:894_3: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā abhitthavitvā sirasmiṃ añjaliṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā evamāha “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:894_4: idāni tāva imesaṃ upāsakānaṃ uttamasaraṇaṃ bhinditvā takkaggahaṇaṃ amhākaṃ pākaṭaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:894_5: pubbe pana amanussapariggahite kantāre takkikānaṃ vināso,
atk-s0513a1:894_8: sādhu vata no bhagavā ākāse puṇṇacandaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya imaṃ kāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ karotū”ti.
atk-s0513a1:894_10: aparimitakālaṃ dasa pāramiyo pūretvā lokassa kaṅkhacchedanatthameva sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭividdhaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:894_11: sīhavasāya suvaṇṇanāḷiṃ pūrento viya sakkaccaṃ sotaṃ odahitvā suṇohī”ti seṭṭhino satuppādaṃ janetvā himagabbhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:894_12: padāletvā puṇṇacandaṃ nīharanto viya bhavantarena paṭicchannakāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:895_0: Atīte kāsiraṭṭhe bārāṇasinagare brahmadatto nāma rājā ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:895_1: Tadā bodhisatto satthavāhakule paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasamāsaccayena mātukucchito nikkhamitvā anupubbena
atk-s0513a1:895_2: vayappatto pañcahi sakaṭasatehi vaṇijjaṃ karonto vicarati.
atk-s0513a1:895_5: Bārāṇasiyaṃyeva aññopi satthavāhaputto atthi bālo abyatto anupāyakusalo.
atk-s0513a1:895_6: Tadā bodhisatto bārāṇasito mahagghaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pañca sakaṭasatāni pūretvā gamanasajjāni katvā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:895_7: Sopi bālasatthavāhaputto tatheva pañca sakaṭasatāni pūretvā gamanasajjāni katvā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:896_0: Tadā bodhisatto cintesi “sace ayaṃ bālasatthavāhaputto mayā saddhiṃyeva gamissati,
atk-s0513a1:896_1: sakaṭasahasse ekato maggaṃ gacchante maggopi nappahossati,
atk-s0513a1:896_4: etena vā mayā vā purato gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:896_5: So taṃ pakkosāpetvā etamatthaṃ ārocetvā “dvīhipi amhehi ekato gantuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0513a1:896_8: So cintesi “mayi purato gacchante bahū ānisaṃsā,
atk-s0513a1:896_13: yathāruciṃ agghaṃ ṭhapetvā bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇissāmī”ti. So “ahaṃ, samma,
atk-s0513a1:896_15: Bodhisattopi pacchato gamane bahū ānisaṃse addasa.
atk-s0513a1:896_19: purato gatehi balibaddehi pariṇatathaddhatiṇe khādite mama goṇā puna uṭṭhitāni madhuratiṇāni khādissanti,
atk-s0513a1:896_20: gahitapaṇṇaṭṭhānato uṭṭhitaṃ manussānaṃ sūpeyyapaṇṇaṃ madhuraṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:896_21: anudake ṭhāne āvāṭaṃ khanitvā ete udakaṃ uppādessanti,
atk-s0513a1:896_22: tehi katesu āvāṭesu mayaṃ udakaṃ pivissāma,
atk-s0513a1:896_24: ahaṃ pacchato gantvā etehi ṭhapitagghena bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:896_27: sammā”ti bālasatthavāho sakaṭāni yojetvā nikkhanto anupubbena manussāvāsaṃ atikkamitvā kantāramukhaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:897_8: Yattha nhāyituṃ vā pātuṃ vā udakaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a1:897_12: Imasmiṃ pañcavidhe kantāre taṃ kantāraṃ nirudakakantārañceva amanussakantārañca.
atk-s0513a1:897_13: Tasmā so bālasatthavāhaputto sakaṭesu mahantamahantā cāṭiyo ṭhapetvā udakassa pūrāpetvā saṭṭhiyojanikaṃ kantāraṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0513a1:898_0: Athassa kantāramajjhaṃ gatakāle kantāre adhivatthayakkho “imehi manussehi gahitaṃ udakaṃ chaḍḍāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:898_1: dubbale katvā sabbeva ne khādissāmī”ti sabbasetataruṇabalibaddayuttaṃ manoramaṃ yānakaṃ māpetvā dhanukalāpaphalakāvudhahatthehi
atk-s0513a1:898_2: dasahi dvādasahi amanussehi parivuto uppalakumudāni piḷandhitvā allakoso allavattho issarapuriso viya
atk-s0513a1:898_3: tasmiṃ yānake nisīditvā kaddamamakkhitehi cakkehi paṭipathaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:898_4: Parivāraamanussāpissa purato ca pacchato ca gacchantā allakesā allavatthā uppalakumudamālā piḷandhitvā
atk-s0513a1:898_5: padumapuṇḍarīkakalāpe gahetvā bhisamuḷālāni khādantā udakabindūhi ceva kalalehi ca paggharantehi agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:898_6: Satthavāhā ca nāma yadā dhuravāto vāyati,
atk-s0513a1:898_7: tadā yānake nisīditvā upaṭṭhākaparivutā rajaṃ pariharantā purato gacchanti.
atk-s0513a1:899_0: Yakkho taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā attano yānakaṃ maggā okkamāpetvā “kahaṃ gacchathā”ti tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:899_1: Satthavāhopi attano yānakaṃ maggā okkamāpetvā sakaṭānaṃ gamanokāsaṃ datvā ekamante ṭhito taṃ yakkhaṃ avoca “bho,
atk-s0513a1:899_3: Tumhe pana uppalakumudāni piḷandhitvā padumapuṇḍarīkahatthā bhisamuḷālāni khādantā kaddamamakkhitā udakabindūhi paggharantehi āgacchatha.
atk-s0513a1:899_4: Kiṃ nu kho tumhehi āgatamagge devo vassati,
atk-s0513a1:899_12: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne padumādisañchannāni sarāni atthī”ti vatvā paṭipāṭiyā gacchantesu sakaṭesu “imāni sakaṭāni ādāya kahaṃ gacchathā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:899_16: “Pacchato āgacchantaṃ sakaṭaṃ ativiya garukaṃ hutvā āgacchati,
atk-s0513a1:899_19: “Parato tāva udakaṃ ānentehi vo manāpaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0513a1:899_20: ito paṭṭhāya pana udakena kiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a1:899_22: cāṭiyo bhinditvā udakaṃ chaḍḍetvā sukhena gacchathā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:899_24: amhākaṃ papañco hotī”ti thokaṃ gantvā tesaṃ adassanaṃ patvā attano yakkhanagarameva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:900_0: Sopi bālasatthavāho attano bālatāya yakkhassa vacanaṃ gahetvā cāṭiyo bhindāpetvā pasatamattampi udakaṃ
