atk-s0513a1:1174_0: Na kiratthi rasehi pāpiyoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto cūḷapiṇḍapātikatissattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1174_1: Satthari kira rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane viharante tissakumāro nāma mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhikulassa putto
atk-s0513a1:1174_2: ekadivasaṃ veḷuvanaṃ gantvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pabbajitukāmo pabbajjaṃ yācitvā mātāpitūhi ananuññātattā
atk-s0513a1:1174_3: paṭikkhitto sattāhaṃ bhattacchedaṃ katvā raṭṭhapālatthero viya mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā satthu santike pabbaji.
atk-s0513a1:1174_4: Satthā taṃ pabbājetvā aḍḍhamāsamattaṃ veḷuvane viharitvā jetavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1174_5: Tatrāyaṃ kulaputto terasa dhutaṅgāni samādāya sāvatthiyaṃ sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāno kālaṃ vītināmeti,
atk-s0513a1:1174_6: “cūḷapiṇḍapātikatissatthero nāmā”ti vutte gaganatale puṇṇacando viya buddhasāsane pākaṭo paññāto ahosi.

atk-s0513a1:1177_0: Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā “cūḷapiṇḍapātikatissattheraṃ kira ekā vaṇṇadāsī rasataṇhāya bandhitvā ādāya gatā”ti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1177_1: Satthā dhammasabhaṃ upagantvā alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvā “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0513a1:1177_6: idāneva eso bhikkhu rasataṇhāya bajjhitvā tassā vasaṃ gato,
atk-s0513a1:1177_7: pubbepi tassā vasaṃ gatoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1178_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ rañño brahmadattassa sañjayo nāma uyyānapālo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1178_1: Atheko vātamigo taṃ uyyānaṃ āgantvā sañjayaṃ disvā palāyati,
atk-s0513a1:1178_4: Uyyānapālo uyyāne nānappakārāni pupphaphalāni gahetvā divase divase rañño abhiharati.
atk-s0513a1:1178_5: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ rājā pucchi “samma uyyānapāla,
atk-s0513a1:1178_8: eko pana vātamigo āgantvā uyyāne carati,
atk-s0513a1:1178_11: “Thokaṃ madhuṃ labhanto anto rājanivesanampi naṃ ānetuṃ sakkhissāmi, devā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1178_13: So taṃ gahetvā uyyānaṃ gantvā vātamigassa caraṇaṭṭhāne tiṇāni madhunā makkhetvā nilīyi.
atk-s0513a1:1178_14: Migo āgantvā madhumakkhitāni tiṇāni khāditvā rasataṇhāya baddho aññatra agantvā uyyānameva āgacchati.
atk-s0513a1:1178_15: Uyyānapālo tassa madhumakkhitatiṇesu paluddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā anukkamena attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0513a1:1178_16: So taṃ disvā katipāhaṃ palāyitvā punappunaṃ passanto vissāsaṃ āpajjitvā anukkamena uyyānapālassa hatthe ṭhitatiṇāni khādituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:1179_0: So tassa vissāsaṃ āpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā yāva rājanivesanā vīthiṃ kilañjehi parikkhipitvā tahiṃ tahiṃ sākhābhaṅgaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1179_1: pātetvā madhulābukaṃ aṃse laggetvā tiṇakalāpaṃ upakacchake ṭhapetvā madhumakkhitāni tiṇāni migassa purato
atk-s0513a1:1179_4: Migo manusse disvā kampamāno maraṇabhayatajjito antonivesanaṅgaṇe ādhāvati paridhāvati.
atk-s0513a1:1179_5: Rājā pāsādā oruyha taṃ kampamānaṃ disvā “vātamigo nāma manussānaṃ diṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ sattāhaṃ na gacchati,
atk-s0513a1:1179_7: so evarūpo gahananissito vātamigo rasataṇhāya baddho idāni evarūpaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgato,
atk-s0513a1:1179_8: natthi vata bho loke rasataṇhāya pāpataraṃ nāmā”ti imāya gāthāya dhammadesanaṃ paṭṭhapesi –
atk-s0513a1:1181_0: “Na kiratthi rasehi pāpiyo, āvāsehiva santhavehi vā;
atk-s0513a1:1183_3: Āvāsehiva santhavehi vāti nibaddhavasanaṭṭhānasaṅkhātesu hi āvāsesupi mittasanthavesupi chandarāgo pāpakova,
atk-s0513a1:1183_4: tehi pana sacchandarāgaparibhogehi āvāsehi vā mittasanthavehi vā sataguṇena ca sahassaguṇena ca satasahassaguṇena
atk-s0513a1:1183_5: ca dhuvapaṭisevanaṭṭhena āhāraṃ vinā jīvitindriyapālanāya abhāvena ca sacchandarāgaparibhogarasāva pāpatarāti.
atk-s0513a1:1183_6: Bodhisatto pana anussavāgataṃ viya imamatthaṃ katvā “na kiratthi rasehi pāpiyo,
atk-s0513a1:1183_12: idaṃ nāma araññāyatane gahananissitaṃ vātamigaṃ sañjayo uyyānapālo madhurasehi attano vasaṃ ānesi,
atk-s0513a1:1183_13: sabbathāpi sacchandarāgaparibhogehi rasehi nāma aññaṃ pāpataraṃ lāmakataraṃ natthīti rasataṇhāya ādīnavaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1183_14: Kathetvā ca pana taṃ migaṃ araññameva pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:1184_2: sā vaṇṇadāsī idāneva etaṃ rasataṇhāya bandhitvā attano vase karoti,

atk-s0513a1:1188_0: Aṭṭhakkhuraṃ kharādiyeti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ dubbacabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1188_1: So kira bhikkhu dubbaco ovādaṃ na gaṇhāti.
atk-s0513a1:1188_2: Atha naṃ satthā pucchi “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu dubbaco ovādaṃ na gaṇhāsī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1188_4: Satthā “pubbepi tvaṃ dubbacatāya paṇḍitānaṃ ovādaṃ aggahetvā pāsena baddho jīvitakkhayaṃ patto”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1189_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto migo hutvā migagaṇaparivuto araññe vasati.
atk-s0513a1:1189_4: So taṃ bhāgineyyaṃ “asukavelāya nāma āgantvā uggaṇhāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1189_7: evaṃ satta divase sattovāde atikkanto so migamāyaṃ anuggaṇhitvāva vicaranto pāse bajjhi.
atk-s0513a1:1189_11: na te puttena migamāyā uggahitā”ti vatvā idānipi taṃ anovaditukāmova hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1193_0: Tattha aṭṭhakkhuranti ekekasmiṃ pāde dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ vasena aṭṭhakkhuraṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1193_7: Sattahi kālātikkantanti sattahi ovādakālehi ovādaṃ atikkantaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1193_8: Na naṃ ovaditussaheti etaṃ dubbacamigaṃ ahaṃ ovadituṃ na ussahāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1193_9: etassa me ovādatthāya cittampi na uppajjatīti dasseti.
atk-s0513a1:1193_10: Atha naṃ dubbacamigaṃ pāse baddhaṃ luddo māretvā maṃsaṃ ādāya pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:1194_1: pubbepi dubbacoyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi.
atk-s0513a1:1198_0: Migaṃ tipallatthanti idaṃ satthā kosambiyaṃ badarikārāme viharanto sikkhākāmaṃ rāhulattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1198_1: Ekasmiñhi kāle satthari āḷavinagaraṃ upanissāya aggāḷave cetiye viharante bahū upāsakā upāsikā bhikkhū
atk-s0513a1:1198_4: Gacchante pana kāle upāsikāyo bhikkhuniyo ca na gacchiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1198_7: Dhammassavanapariyosāne therā bhikkhū attano attano vasanaṭṭhānāni gacchanti.
atk-s0513a1:1198_8: Daharā sāmaṇerā ca upāsakehi saddhiṃ upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ sayanti.
atk-s0513a1:1198_9: Tesu niddaṃ upagatesu ekacce ghurughurupassāsā kākacchamānā dante khādantā nipajjiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1198_11: Te taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1198_12: Bhagavā “yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya pācittiya”nti sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetvā kosambiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1199_4: Pubbe pana te bhikkhū bhagavati ca gāravaṃ tassa cāyasmato sikkhākāmataṃ paṭicca taṃ attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ ativiya saṅgaṇhanti,
atk-s0513a1:1199_6: Taṃ divasaṃ pana sikkhāpadabhayena vasanaṭṭhānampi na adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1199_10: “cūḷapitā me”ti ānandattherassa vā santikaṃ agantvā dasabalassa vaḷañjanavaccakuṭiṃ brahmavimānaṃ pavisanto viya pavisitvā vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:1199_15: Rāhulabhaddo pana na tassā kuṭiyā imaṃ sampattiṃ paṭicca tattha vāsaṃ upagato,
atk-s0513a1:1199_16: bhikkhūhi pana “vasanaṭṭhānaṃ jānāhī”ti vuttattā ovādagāravena sikkhākāmatāya tattha vāsaṃ upagato.
atk-s0513a1:1199_17: Antarantarā hi bhikkhū taṃ āyasmantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā tassa vīmaṃsanatthāya muṭṭhisammajjaniṃ
atk-s0513a1:1199_18: vā kacavarachaḍḍanakaṃ vā bahi khipitvā tasmiṃ āgate “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:1199_20: Tattha kehici “rāhulo iminā maggena gato”ti vutte so āyasmā “nāhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1199_21: etaṃ jānāmī”ti avatvāva taṃ paṭisāmetvā “khamatha me,
atk-s0513a1:1200_0: So taṃ sikkhākāmataṃyeva paṭicca tattha vāsaṃ upagato.
atk-s0513a1:1200_1: Atha satthā purearuṇaṃyeva vaccakuṭidvāre ṭhatvā ukkāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1200_9: idāni attano āpattibhayena vasanaṭṭhānaṃ na denti,
atk-s0513a1:1200_10: svāhaṃ ‘idaṃ aññesaṃ asaṅghaṭṭanaṭṭhāna’nti iminā kāraṇena idha nipannosmīti.
atk-s0513a1:1200_11: Atha bhagavato “rāhulaṃ tāva bhikkhū evaṃ pariccajanti,
atk-s0513a1:1200_12: aññe kuladārake pabbājetvā kiṃ karissantī”ti dhammasaṃvego udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:1201_0: Atha bhagavā pātova bhikkhū sannipātāpetvā dhammasenāpatiṃ pucchi “jānāsi pana tvaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1201_8: tumhe rāhulaṃ evaṃ pariccajantā aññe kuladārake pabbājetvā kiṃ karissatha?
atk-s0513a1:1201_9: Evañhi sante imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitā na patiṭṭhā bhavissanti,
atk-s0513a1:1201_10: ito dāni paṭṭhāya anupasampannena ekaṃ dve divase attano santike vasāpetvā tatiyadivase tesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1201_11: ñatvā bahi vāsethā”ti imaṃ anupaññattiṃ katvā puna sikkhāpadaṃ paññapesi.
atk-s0513a1:1202_0: Tasmiṃ samaye dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā bhikkhū rāhulassa guṇakathaṃ kathenti “passathāvuso,
atk-s0513a1:1202_2: ‘tava vasanaṭṭhānaṃ jānāhī’ti vutto nāma ‘ahaṃ dasabalassa putto,
atk-s0513a1:1202_3: tumhākaṃ senāsanasmā tumheyeva nikkhamathā’ti ekaṃ bhikkhumpi appaṭippharitvā vaccakuṭiyaṃ vāsaṃ kappesī”ti.

atk-s0513a1:1202_12: pubbe tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattopi sikkhākāmoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1203_0: Atīte rājagahe eko magadharājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:1203_1: Tadā bodhisatto migayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā migagaṇaparivuto araññe vasati.
atk-s0513a1:1203_3: imaṃ te bhāgineyyaṃ migamāyaṃ sikkhāpehī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1203_6: So mātulena vuttavelaṃ anatikkamitvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā migamāyaṃ sikkhi.
atk-s0513a1:1203_7: So ekadivasaṃ vane vicaranto pāsena baddho baddharavaṃ ravi,
atk-s0513a1:1203_8: migagaṇo palāyitvā “putto te pāsena baddho”ti tassa mātuyā ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:1203_11: Bodhisatto “mā tvaṃ puttassa kiñci pāpakaṃ āsaṅki,
atk-s0513a1:1203_13: idāni taṃ hāsayamāno āgacchissatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1206_0: Ekena sotena chamāssasanto, chahi kalāhitibhoti bhāgineyyo”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1207_2: ubhohi passehi ujukameva ca nipannakavasenāti tīhākārehi pallatthaṃ assa,
atk-s0513a1:1207_6: Aṭṭhakkhuranti ekekasmiṃ pāde dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ vasena aṭṭhahi khurehi samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1207_7: Aḍḍharattāpapāyinti purimayāmaṃ atikkamitvā majjhimayāme araññato āgamma pānīyassa pivanato aḍḍharatte āpaṃ pivatīti aḍḍharattāpapāyī.
atk-s0513a1:1207_9: Mama bhāgineyyaṃ migaṃ ahaṃ sādhukaṃ migamāyaṃ uggaṇhāpesiṃ. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0513a1:1207_14: yathā ekasmiṃ uparimanāsikāsote vātaṃ sannirumbhitvā pathaviyā allīnena ekena heṭṭhimasotena tattheva
atk-s0513a1:1207_15: chamāyaṃ assasanto chahi kalāhi luddakaṃ atibhoti,
atk-s0513a1:1207_18: Cattāro pāde pasāretvā ekena passena seyyāya,
atk-s0513a1:1208_5: adho avakkhipanenāti imāhi chahi kalāhi yathā atibhoti,
atk-s0513a1:1209_2: yathā ekena sotena chamāssasanto chahi kalāhiti dvīsupi nayesu dassitehi chahi kāraṇehi kalāhiti kalāyissati,
atk-s0513a1:1209_5: Bhāgineyyoti evaṃ chahi kāraṇehi vañcanakaṃ bhāgineyyaṃ niddisati.
atk-s0513a1:1209_6: Evaṃ bodhisatto bhāgineyyassa migamāyāya sādhukaṃ uggahitabhāvaṃ dassento bhaginiṃ samassāseti.
atk-s0513a1:1210_0: Sopi migapotako pāse baddho avipphanditvāyeva bhūmiyaṃ mahāphāsukapassena pāde pasāretvā nipanno pādānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1210_1: āsannaṭṭhāne khureheva paharitvā paṃsuñca tiṇāni ca uppāṭetvā uccārapassāvaṃ vissajjetvā sīsaṃ pātetvā
atk-s0513a1:1210_2: jivhaṃ ninnāmetvā sarīraṃ kheḷakilinnaṃ katvā vātaggahaṇena udaraṃ uddhumātakaṃ katvā akkhīni parivattetvā
atk-s0513a1:1210_3: heṭṭhā nāsikāsotena vātaṃ sañcarāpento uparimanāsikāsotena vātaṃ sannirumbhitvā sakalasarīraṃ thaddhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1210_7: Luddo āgantvā udaraṃ hatthena paharitvā “atipātova baddho bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:1210_8: pūtiko jāto”ti tassa bandhanarajjukaṃ mocetvā “etthevadāni naṃ ukkantitvā maṃsaṃ ādāya gamissāmī”ti nirāsaṅko hutvā sākhāpalāsaṃ gahetuṃ āraddho.
atk-s0513a1:1210_9: Migapotakopi uṭṭhāya catūhi pādehi ṭhatvā kāyaṃ vidhunitvā gīvaṃ pasāretvā mahāvātena chinnavalāhako viya vegena mātu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1211_3: pubbepi sikkhākāmoyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1215_0: Kāḷe vā yadi vā juṇheti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dve vuḍḍhapabbajite ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1215_1: Te kira kosalajanapade ekasmiṃ araññāvāse vasanti.
atk-s0513a1:1215_11: Te ubhopi attano kaṅkhaṃ chindituṃ asakkontā satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1215_12: sītaṃ nāma kasmiṃ kāle hotī”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1215_16: bhavasaṅkhepagatattā pana na sallakkhayitthā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1216_0: Atīte ekasmiṃ pabbatapāde sīho ca byaggho ca dve sahāyā ekissāyeva guhāya vasanti.
atk-s0513a1:1216_1: Tadā bodhisattopi isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tasmiṃyeva pabbatapāde vasati.
atk-s0513a1:1216_2: Athekadivasaṃ tesaṃ sahāyakānaṃ sītaṃ nissāya vivādo udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:1216_5: Te ubhopi attano kaṅkhaṃ chindituṃ asakkontā bodhisattaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1218_0: “Kāḷe vā yadi vā juṇhe, yadā vāyati māluto;
atk-s0513a1:1220_0: Tattha kāḷe vā yadi vā juṇheti kāḷapakkhe vā juṇhapakkhe vā.
atk-s0513a1:1220_1: Yadā vāyati mālutoti yasmiṃ samaye puratthimādibhedo vāto vāyati,
atk-s0513a1:1220_6: kāḷapakkho vā juṇhapakkho vā ettha apamāṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1220_7: Ubhotthamaparājitāti ubhopi tumhe imasmiṃ pañhe aparājitāti.
atk-s0513a1:1221_1: pubbepi mayā tumhākaṃ ayaṃ pañho kathito”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:1221_3: Satthā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā byaggho kāḷo ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:1225_0: Evaṃ ce sattā jāneyyunti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto matakabhattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1225_1: Tasmiñhi kāle manussā bahū ajeḷakādayo māretvā kālakate ñātake uddissa matakabhattaṃ nāma denti.
atk-s0513a1:1225_2: Bhikkhū te manusse tathā karonte disvā satthāraṃ pucchiṃsu “etarahi, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1225_3: manussā bahū pāṇe jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā matakabhattaṃ nāma denti.
atk-s0513a1:1225_8: ‘matakabhattaṃ dassāmā’ti katepi pāṇātipāte kāci vuḍḍhi nāma atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1225_9: pubbe paṇḍitā ākāse nisajja dhammaṃ desetvā ettha ādīnavaṃ kathetvā sakalajambudīpavāsike etaṃ kammaṃ jahāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1225_10: Idāni pana bhavasaṅkhepagatattā puna pātubhūta”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1226_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente eko tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū disāpāmokkho ācariyabrāhmaṇo “matakabhattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1226_1: dassāmī”ti ekaṃ eḷakaṃ gāhāpetvā antevāsike āha – “tātā,
atk-s0513a1:1226_2: imaṃ eḷakaṃ nadiṃ netvā nhāpetvā kaṇṭhe mālaṃ parikkhipitvā pañcaṅgulikaṃ datvā maṇḍetvā ānethā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1226_3: Te “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā taṃ ādāya nadiṃ gantvā nhāpetvā maṇḍetvā nadītīre ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1226_4: So eḷako attano pubbakammaṃ disvā “evarūpā nāma dukkhā ajja muccissāmī”ti somanassajāto mattikāghaṭaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1226_5: bhindanto viya mahāhasitaṃ hasitvā puna “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo maṃ ghātetvā mayā laddhadukkhaṃ labhissatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1226_6: brāhmaṇe kāruññaṃ uppādetvā mahantena saddena parodi.
atk-s0513a1:1227_0: Atha naṃ te māṇavā pucchiṃsu “samma eḷaka,
atk-s0513a1:1227_1: tvaṃ mahāsaddena hasi ceva rodi ca,
atk-s0513a1:1227_4: “Tumhe maṃ imaṃ kāraṇaṃ attano ācariyassa santike puccheyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1227_5: Te taṃ ādāya gantvā idaṃ kāraṇaṃ ācariyassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1227_6: Ācariyo tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā eḷakaṃ pucchi “kasmā tvaṃ eḷaka, hasi,
atk-s0513a1:1227_8: Eḷako attanā katakammaṃ jātissarañāṇena anussaritvā brāhmaṇassa kathesi “ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a1:1227_9: pubbe tādisova mantajjhāyakabrāhmaṇo hutvā ‘matakabhattaṃ dassāmī’ti ekaṃ eḷakaṃ māretvā matakabhattaṃ adāsiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1227_10: svāhaṃ ekassa eḷakassa ghātitattā ekenūnesu pañcasu attabhāvasatesu sīsacchedaṃ pāpuṇiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1227_11: ayaṃ me koṭiyaṃ ṭhito pañcasatimo attabhāvo,
atk-s0513a1:1227_12: svāhaṃ ‘ajja evarūpā dukkhā muccissāmī’ti somanassajāto iminā kāraṇena hasiṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1227_13: Rodanto pana ‘ahaṃ tāva ekaṃ eḷakaṃ māretvā pañca jātisatāni sīsacchedadukkhaṃ patvā ajja tamhā dukkhā muccissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1227_14: ayaṃ pana brāhmaṇo maṃ māretvā ahaṃ viya pañca jātisatāni sīsacchedadukkhaṃ labhissatī’ti tayi kāruññena rodi”nti. “Eḷaka, mā bhāyi,
atk-s0513a1:1227_18: tayi mārentepi amārentepi na sakkā ajja mayā maraṇā muccitu”nti. “Eḷaka, mā bhāyi,
atk-s0513a1:1227_19: ahaṃ te ārakkhaṃ gahetvā tayā saddhiṃyeva vicarissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1228_0: Brāhmaṇo eḷakaṃ muñcitvā “imaṃ eḷakaṃ kassacipi māretuṃ na dassāmī”ti antevāsike ādāya eḷakeneva saddhiṃ vicari.
atk-s0513a1:1228_1: Eḷako vissaṭṭhamattova ekaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭhiṃ nissāya jātagumbe gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā paṇṇāni khādituṃ āraddho.
atk-s0513a1:1228_3: tato ekā pāsāṇasakalikā chijjitvā eḷakassa pasāritagīvāya patitvā sīsaṃ chindi,
atk-s0513a1:1228_5: Tadā bodhisatto tasmiṃ ṭhāne rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatto.
atk-s0513a1:1228_6: So passantasseva tassa mahājanassa devatānubhāvena ākāse pallaṅkena nisīditvā “ime sattā evaṃ pāpassa
atk-s0513a1:1228_7: phalaṃ jānamānā appevanāma pāṇātipātaṃ na kareyyu”nti madhurassarena dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1231_0: Na pāṇo pāṇinaṃ haññe, pāṇaghātī hi socatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1232_0: Tattha evaṃ ce sattā jāneyyunti ime sattā evaṃ ce jāneyyuṃ. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0513a1:1232_1: Dukkhāyaṃ jātisambhavoti ayaṃ tattha tattha jāti ca jātassa anukkamena vaḍḍhisaṅkhāto sambhavo ca jarābyādhimaraṇaappiyasampayogapiyavippayogahatthapādacchedādīnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1232_3: Na pāṇo pāṇinaṃ haññeti “paraṃ vadhanto jātisambhave vadhaṃ labhati,
atk-s0513a1:1232_4: pīḷento pīḷaṃ labhatī”ti jātisambhavassa dukkhavatthutāya dukkhabhāvaṃ jānanto koci pāṇo aññaṃ pāṇinaṃ na haññe,
atk-s0513a1:1232_8: yasmā sāhatthikādīsu chasu payogesu yena kenaci payogena parassa jīvitindriyupacchedanena pāṇaghātī puggalo
atk-s0513a1:1232_9: aṭṭhasu mahānirayesu soḷasasu ussadanirayesu nānappakārāya tiracchānayoniyā pettivisaye asurakāyeti imesu
atk-s0513a1:1232_10: catūsu apāyesu mahādukkhaṃ anubhavamāno dīgharattaṃ antonijjhāyanalakkhaṇena sokena socati.
atk-s0513a1:1232_12: evaṃ dīgharattaṃ socatītipi ñatvā na pāṇo pāṇinaṃ haññe,
atk-s0513a1:1232_14: Mohena pana mūḷhā avijjāya andhīkatā imaṃ ādīnavaṃ apassantā pāṇātipātaṃ karontīti.
atk-s0513a1:1233_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto nirayabhayena tajjetvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a1:1233_1: Manussā taṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā nirayabhayabhītā pāṇātipātā viramiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1233_2: Bodhisattopi dhammaṃ desetvā mahājanaṃ sīle patiṭṭhāpetvā yathākammaṃ gato,
atk-s0513a1:1233_3: mahājanopi bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni katvā devanagaraṃ pūresi.
atk-s0513a1:1233_4: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “ahaṃ tena samayena rukkhadevatā ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1237_0: Sace mucce pecca mucceti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto devatānaṃ āyācanabalikammaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1237_1: Tadā kira manussā vaṇijjāya gacchantā pāṇe vadhitvā devatānaṃ balikammaṃ katvā “mayaṃ anantarāyena atthasiddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1237_2: patvā āgantvā puna tumhākaṃ balikammaṃ karissāmā”ti āyācitvā gacchanti.
atk-s0513a1:1237_3: Tatthānantarāyena atthasiddhiṃ patvā āgatā “devatānubhāvena idaṃ jāta”nti maññamānā bahū pāṇe vadhitvā āyācanato muccituṃ balikammaṃ karonti,
atk-s0513a1:1237_4: taṃ disvā bhikkhū “atthi nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1238_0: Atīte kāsiraṭṭhe ekasmiṃ gāmake kuṭumbiko gāmadvāre ṭhitanigrodharukkhe devatāya balikammaṃ paṭijānitvā
atk-s0513a1:1238_1: anantarāyena āgantvā bahū pāṇe vadhitvā “āyācanato muccissāmī”ti rukkhamūlaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1240_0: “Sace mucce pecca mucce, muccamāno hi bajjhati;
atk-s0513a1:1241_0: Na hevaṃ dhīrā muccanti, mutti bālassa bandhana”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1242_0: Tattha sace mucce pecca mucceti bho purisa,
atk-s0513a1:1242_2: Pecca mucceti yathā paraloke na bajjhasi,
atk-s0513a1:1242_4: Muccamāno hi bajjhatīti yathā pana tvaṃ pāṇaṃ vadhitvā muccituṃ icchasi,
atk-s0513a1:1242_6: Tasmā na hevaṃ dhīrā muccantīti ye paṇḍitapurisā,
atk-s0513a1:1242_10: esā pāṇātipātaṃ katvā mutti nāma bālassa bandhanameva hotīti dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a1:1242_11: Tato paṭṭhāya manussā evarūpā pāṇātipātakammā viratā dhammaṃ caritvā devanagaraṃ pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1243_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “ahaṃ tena samayena rukkhadevatā ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1247_0: Disvā padamanuttiṇṇanti idaṃ satthā kosalesu cārikaṃ caramāno naḷakapānagāmaṃ patvā naḷakapānapokkharaṇiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1247_2: Tadā kira bhikkhū naḷakapānapokkharaṇiyaṃ nhatvā sūcigharatthāya sāmaṇerehi naḷadaṇḍake gāhāpetvā te
atk-s0513a1:1247_5: te mūlato yāva aggā sabbatthakameva chiddā,
atk-s0513a1:1248_0: Pubbe kira so vanasaṇḍo arañño ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1248_1: Tassāpi pokkharaṇiyā eko dakarakkhaso otiṇṇotiṇṇe khādati.
atk-s0513a1:1248_2: Tadā bodhisatto rohitamigapotakappamāṇo kapirājā hutvā asītisahassamattavānaraparivuto yūthaṃ pariharanto tasmiṃ araññe vasati.
atk-s0513a1:1248_5: tumhe akhāditapubbaṃ phalāphalaṃ khādantā vā apītapubbaṃ pānīyaṃ pivantā vā maṃ paṭipuccheyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1248_6: Te “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā ekadivasaṃ agatapubbaṭṭhānaṃ gatā tattha bahudeva divasaṃ caritvā pānīyaṃ gavesamānā
atk-s0513a1:1248_7: ekaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ disvā pānīyaṃ apivitvāva bodhisattassāgamanaṃ olokayamānā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1248_11: tātā”ti bodhisatto pokkharaṇiṃ āvijjhitvā padaṃ paricchindanto otiṇṇameva passi,
atk-s0513a1:1248_13: So “nissaṃsayaṃ esā amanussapariggahitā”ti ñatvā “suṭṭhu vo kataṃ, tātā,
atk-s0513a1:1249_0: Dakarakkhasopi tesaṃ anotaraṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā nīlodaro paṇḍaramukho surattahatthapādo bībhacchadassano hutvā
atk-s0513a1:1249_3: Atha naṃ bodhisatto pucchi “tvaṃ idha nibbattadakarakkhasosī”ti? “Āma, aha”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1249_5: ahaṃ idhotiṇṇaṃ antamaso sakuṇikaṃ upādāya na kiñci muñcāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1249_13: “Mayañhi anotaritvā asītisahassānipi ekamekaṃ naḷadaṇḍakaṃ gahetvā uppalanāḷena udakaṃ pivantā viya tava pokkharaṇiyā pānīyaṃ pivissāma,
atk-s0513a1:1249_14: evaṃ no tvaṃ khādituṃ na sakkhissasī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1249_15: Etamatthaṃ viditvā satthā abhisambuddho hutvā imissā gāthāya purimapadadvayaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0513a1:1252_2: so kapirājā tassā pokkharaṇiyā ekampi uttiṇṇapadaṃ nāddasa,
atk-s0513a1:1252_4: Evaṃ disvā padaṃ anuttiṇṇaṃ disvāna otaritaṃ padaṃ “addhāyaṃ pokkharaṇī amanussapariggahitā”ti ñatvā tena saddhiṃ sallapanto sapariso āha –
atk-s0513a1:1254_0: Tassattho – mayaṃ tava pokkharaṇiyaṃ naḷena pānīyaṃ pivissāmāti. Puna mahāsatto āha –
atk-s0513a1:1256_0: Evaṃ naḷena pānīyaṃ pivantaṃ saparisampi maṃ tvaṃ neva vadhissasīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:1257_0: Evañca pana vatvā bodhisatto ekaṃ naḷadaṇḍakaṃ āharāpetvā pāramiyo āvajjetvā saccakiriyaṃ katvā mukhena dhami,
atk-s0513a1:1257_1: naḷo anto kiñci gaṇṭhiṃ asesetvā sabbatthakameva susiro ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1257_2: Iminā niyāmena aparampi aparampi āharāpetvā mukhena dhamitvā adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1257_5: Bodhisatto pana “imaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ parivāretvā jātā sabbepi naḷā ekacchiddā hontū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1257_7: Tato paṭṭhāya sabbepi taṃ pokkharaṇiṃ parivāretvā uṭṭhitanaḷā ekacchiddā jātā.
atk-s0513a1:1257_10: Cande sasalakkhaṇaṃ sakalampi imaṃ kappaṃ ṭhassati,
atk-s0513a1:1257_11: vaṭṭakajātake aggino nibbutaṭṭhānaṃ sakalampi imaṃ kappaṃ aggi na jhāyissati,
atk-s0513a1:1257_12: ghaṭīkāranivesanaṭṭhānaṃ sakalampi imaṃ kappaṃ anovassakaṃ ṭhassati,
atk-s0513a1:1257_13: imaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ parivāretvā uṭṭhitanaḷā sakalampi imaṃ kappaṃ ekacchiddā bhavissantīti imāni cattāri kappaṭṭhiyapāṭihāriyāni nāma.
atk-s0513a1:1258_0: Bodhisatto evaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā ekaṃ naḷaṃ ādāya nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:1258_1: Tepi asītisahassavānarā ekekaṃ ādāya pokkharaṇiṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1258_2: Tepi bodhisattassa naḷena ākaḍḍhitvā pānīyaṃ pivanakāle sabbe tīre nisinnāva piviṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1258_3: Evaṃ tehi pānīye pivite dakarakkhaso kiñci alabhitvā anattamano sakanivesanameva gato.
atk-s0513a1:1259_2: naḷānaṃ ekacchiddabhāvo nāma mayhamevetaṃ porāṇakaadhiṭṭhāna”nti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1269_0: Ñātametaṃ kuruṅgassāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1269_1: Ekasmiñhi samaye dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitā bhikkhū “āvuso devadatto tathāgatassa ghātanatthāya dhanuggahe payojesi,
atk-s0513a1:1269_4: sabbathāpi dasabalassa vadhāya parisakkatī”ti devadattassa avaṇṇaṃ kathentā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1269_8: devadatto tumhākaṃ vadhāya parisakkatīti tassa aguṇakathāya sannisinnāmhāti.
atk-s0513a1:1269_13: na ca pana maṃ vadhituṃ asakkhī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1270_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kuruṅgamigo hutvā ekasmiṃ araññāyatane phalāni khādanto vasati.
atk-s0513a1:1270_1: So ekasmiṃ kāle phalasampanne sepaṇṇirukkhe sepaṇṇiphalāni khādati.
atk-s0513a1:1270_2: Atheko gāmavāsī aṭṭakaluddako phalarukkhamūlesu migānaṃ padāni upadhāretvā uparirukkhe aṭṭakaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1270_3: tattha nisīditvā phalāni khādituṃ āgatāgate mige sattiyā vijjhitvā tesaṃ maṃsaṃ vikkiṇanto jīvikaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0513a1:1270_4: So ekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ rukkhamūle bodhisattassa padavaḷañjaṃ disvā tasmiṃ sepaṇṇirukkhe aṭṭakaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1270_5: pātova bhuñjitvā sattiṃ ādāya vanaṃ pavisitvā taṃ rukkhaṃ āruhitvā aṭṭake nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:1270_6: Bodhisattopi pātova vasanaṭṭhānā nikkhamitvā “sepaṇṇiphalāni khādissāmī”ti āgamma taṃ rukkhamūlaṃ sahasāva
atk-s0513a1:1270_8: atthi nu kho evarūpo upaddavo”ti pariggaṇhanto bāhiratova aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1271_0: Luddakopi bodhisattassa anāgamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā aṭṭake nisinnova sepaṇṇiphalāni khipitvā khipitvā tassa purato pātesi.
atk-s0513a1:1271_1: Bodhisatto “imāni phalāni āgantvā mayhaṃ purato patanti,
atk-s0513a1:1271_2: atthi nu kho upari luddako”ti punappunaṃ ullokento luddakaṃ disvā apassanto viya hutvā “ambho, rukkha-
atk-s0513a1:1271_3: pubbe tvaṃ olambakaṃ cārento viya ujukameva phalāni pātesi,
atk-s0513a1:1271_5: evaṃ tayā rukkhadhamme pariccatte ahampi aññaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mayhaṃ āhāraṃ pariyesissāmī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1274_0: Aññaṃ sepaṇṇi gacchāmi, na me te ruccate phala”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1275_3: Yaṃ tvaṃ sepaṇṇi seyyasīti yaṃ tvaṃ ambho sepaṇṇirukkha purato phalāni pātayamāno seyyasi viseyyasi visiṇṇaphalo hosi,
atk-s0513a1:1275_5: Na me te ruccate phalanti evaṃ phalaṃ dadamānāya na me tava phalaṃ ruccati,
atk-s0513a1:1276_0: Athassa luddako aṭṭake nisinnova sattiṃ khipitvā “gaccha,
atk-s0513a1:1276_4: aṭṭha pana mahāniraye soḷasaussadaniraye pañcavidhabandhanādīni ca kammakāraṇāni aviraddhoyevāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1276_5: Evañca pana vatvā palāyitvā yathāruciṃ gato,
atk-s0513a1:1277_4: na ca pana maṃ vadhituṃ asakkhī”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1281_0: Ye kukkurāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ñātatthacariyaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1281_2: Idaṃ pana vatthuṃ patiṭṭhapetvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1282_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tathārūpaṃ kammaṃ paṭicca kukkurayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:1282_2: Athekadivasaṃ rājā setasindhavayuttaṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ rathaṃ āruyha uyyānaṃ gantvā tattha divasabhāgaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1282_4: Tassa taṃ rathavarattaṃ yathānaddhameva rājaṅgaṇe ṭhapayiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1282_6: Uparipāsādato koleyyakasunakhā otaritvā tassa cammañca naddhiñca khādiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1282_8: niddhamanamukhena sunakhā pavisitvā rathassa cammañca naddhiñca khādiṃsū”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1282_9: Rājā sunakhānaṃ kujjhitvā “diṭṭhadiṭṭhaṭṭhāne sunakhe ghātethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1282_11: Te diṭṭhidiṭṭhaṭṭhāne ghātiyamānā palāyitvā susānaṃ gantvā bodhisattassa santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1283_2: Te “antepure kira rathassa cammañca naddhi ca sunakhehi khāditā’ti kuddho rājā sunakhavadhaṃ āṇāpesi,
atk-s0513a1:1283_5: Bodhisatto cintesi “ārakkhaṭṭhāne bahi sunakhānaṃ okāso natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1283_7: Idāni pana corānaṃ kiñci bhayaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1283_9: yaṃnūnāhaṃ core rañño dassetvā ñātisaṅghassa jīvitadānaṃ dadeyya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1283_13: tāva idheva hothā”ti pāramiyo āvajjetvā mettābhāvanaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā “mayhaṃ upari leḍḍuṃ vā muggaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1283_14: vā mā koci khipituṃ ussahī”ti adhiṭṭhāya ekakova antonagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1283_15: Atha naṃ disvā ekasattopi kujjhitvā olokento nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0513a1:1283_16: Rājāpi sunakhavadhaṃ āṇāpetvā sayaṃ vinicchaye nisinno hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1283_17: Bodhisatto tattheva gantvā pakkhanditvā rañño āsanassa heṭṭhā pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1284_0: So thokaṃ vissamitvā heṭṭhāsanā nikkhamitvā rājānaṃ vanditvā “deva,
atk-s0513a1:1284_8: “‘Ime nāma cammakhādakacorā’ti tathato ajānitvā diṭṭhadiṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva mārāpanaṃ na yuttaṃ, devā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1284_9: “Rathacammassa kukkurehi khāditattā ‘diṭṭhadiṭṭhe sabbeva mārethā’ti sunakhavadhaṃ āṇāpesi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1284_10: “Kiṃ pana vo manussā sabbeva kukkure mārenti,
atk-s0513a1:1284_12: amhākaṃ ghare koleyyakā maraṇaṃ na labhantī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1284_13: Mahārāja idāneva tumhe “rathacammassa kukkurehi khāditattā ‘diṭṭhadiṭṭhe sabbeva mārethā’ti sunakhavadhaṃ āṇāpesi”nti avocuttha,
atk-s0513a1:1284_14: idāni pana “amhākaṃ ghare koleyyakā maraṇaṃ na labhantī”ti vadetha.
atk-s0513a1:1284_15: “Nanu evaṃ sante tumhe chandādivasena agatigamanaṃ gacchatha,
atk-s0513a1:1284_18: raññā nāma kāraṇagavesakena tulāsadisena bhavituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a1:1284_19: idāni ca koleyyakā maraṇaṃ na labhanti,
atk-s0513a1:1284_23: Evañca pana vatvā mahāsatto madhurassaraṃ nicchāretvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:1284_25: nāyaṃ dhammo”ti rañño dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1287_0: Teme na vajjhā mayamasma vajjhā, nāyaṃ saghaccā dubbalaghātikāya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1288_9: Vaṇṇabalūpapannāti sarīravaṇṇena ceva kāyabalena ca sampannā.
atk-s0513a1:1288_10: Teme na vajjhāti te ime sassāmikā sārakkhā na vajjhā.
atk-s0513a1:1288_11: Mayamasma vajjhāti assāmikā anārakkhā mayaṃ vajjhā nāma jātā.
atk-s0513a1:1288_12: Nāyaṃ saghaccāti evaṃ sante ayaṃ avisesena saghaccā nāma na hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1288_13: Dubbalaghātikāyanti ayaṃ pana dubbalānaṃyeva ghātanato dubbalaghātikā nāma hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1288_14: Rājūhi nāma corā niggaṇhitabbā, no acorā.
atk-s0513a1:1288_15: Idha pana corānaṃ kiñci bhayaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1289_9: “Tumhākaṃ ghare koleyyakasunakhe āharāpetvā thokaṃ takkañca dabbatiṇāni ca āharāpethā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1289_11: Atha naṃ mahāsatto “imāni tiṇāni takkena maddāpetvā ete sunakhe pāyethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1289_13: pītā pītā sunakhā saddhiṃ cammehi vamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1289_14: Rājā “sabbaññubuddhassa byākaraṇaṃ viyā”ti tuṭṭho bodhisattassa setacchattena pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1289_16: mātāpitūsu khattiyā”tiādīhi tesakuṇajātake āgatāhi dasahi dhammacariyagāthāhi rañño dhammaṃ desetvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:1289_17: ito paṭṭhāya appamatto hohī”ti rājānaṃ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā setacchattaṃ raññova paṭiadāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1290_0: Rājā mahāsattassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā sabbasattānaṃ abhayaṃ datvā bodhisattaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbasunakhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1290_1: attano bhojanasadisameva niccabhattaṃ paṭṭhapetvā bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhito yāvatāyukaṃ dānādīni puññāni
atk-s0513a1:1291_3: pubbepi cariyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1295_0: Api passena semānoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ ossaṭṭhavīriyaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1295_1: Tasmiñhi samaye satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantetvā “bhikkhu,
atk-s0513a1:1295_3: pahāraṃ laddhāpi neva ossajiṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1296_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto bhojājānīyasindhavakule nibbatto sabbālaṅkārasampanno bārāṇasirañño maṅgalasso ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1296_1: So satasahassagghanikāya suvaṇṇapātiyaṃyeva nānaggarasasampannaṃ tivassikagandhasālibhojanaṃ bhuñjati,
atk-s0513a1:1296_3: taṃ ṭhānaṃ rattakambalasāṇiparikkhittaṃ upari suvaṇṇatārakakhacitacelavitānaṃ samosaritagandhadāmamālādāmaṃ avijahitagandhatelapadīpaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1296_4: Bārāṇasirajjaṃ pana apatthentā rājāno nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a1:1296_5: Ekaṃ samayaṃ satta rājāno bārāṇasiṃ parikkhipitvā “amhākaṃ rajjaṃ vā detu,
atk-s0513a1:1296_7: Rājā amacce sannipātetvā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā “idāni kiṃ karoma,
atk-s0513a1:1296_9: tumhehi tāva āditova yuddhāya na gantabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1296_10: asukaṃ nāma assārohaṃ pesetvā yuddhaṃ kāretha,
atk-s0513a1:1296_13: sattahi rājūhi saddhiṃ yuddhaṃ kātu”nti āha. “Deva,
atk-s0513a1:1297_1: devā”ti rājānaṃ vanditvā pāsādā oruyha bhojājānīyasindhavaṃ āharāpetvā suvammitaṃ katvā attanāpi sabbasannāhasannaddho
atk-s0513a1:1297_2: khaggaṃ bandhitvā sindhavapiṭṭhivaragato nagarā nikkhamma vijjulatā viya caramāno paṭhamaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1297_3: bhinditvā ekaṃ rājānaṃ jīvaggāhameva gahetvā āgantvā nagare balassa niyyādetvā puna gantvā dutiyaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1297_4: bhinditvā tathā tatiyanti evaṃ pañca rājāno jīvaggāhaṃ gahetvā chaṭṭhaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ bhinditvā chaṭṭhassa
atk-s0513a1:1297_8: Assāroho tassa pahaṭabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhojājānīyasindhavaṃ rājadvāre nipajjāpetvā sannāhaṃ sithilaṃ katvā aññaṃ assaṃ sannayhituṃ āraddho.
atk-s0513a1:1297_9: Bodhisatto mahāphāsukapassena nipannova akkhīni ummiletvā assārohaṃ disvā “ayaṃ aññaṃ assaṃ sannayhati,
atk-s0513a1:1297_10: ayañca asso sattamaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ bhinditvā sattamaṃ rājānaṃ gaṇhituṃ na sakkhissati,
atk-s0513a1:1297_14: ṭhapetvā maṃ añño asso sattamaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ bhinditvā sattamaṃ rājānaṃ gahetuṃ samattho nāma natthī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1297_16: sattamaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ bhinditvā sattamaṃ rājānaṃ gahetuṃ samattho ṭhapetvā maṃ añño asso nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1297_18: mamaññeva uṭṭhāpetvā sannayhāhī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1300_0: Seyyova vaḷavā bhojjho, yuñja maññeva sārathī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1301_0: Tattha api passena semānoti ekena passena sayamānakopi.
atk-s0513a1:1301_2: Seyyova vaḷavā bhojjhoti vaḷavāti sindhavakulesu ajāto khaluṅkasso.
atk-s0513a1:1301_4: Iti etasmā vaḷavā sallehi viddhopi bhojājānīyasindhavova seyyo varo uttamo.
atk-s0513a1:1301_5: Yuñja maññeva sārathīti yasmā eva gatopi ahameva seyyo,
atk-s0513a1:1302_0: Assāroho bodhisattaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā vaṇaṃ bandhitvā susannaddhaṃ sannayhitvā tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ nisīditvā sattamaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1302_1: balakoṭṭhakaṃ bhinditvā sattamaṃ rājānaṃ jīvaggāhaṃ gahetvā rājabalassa niyyādesi,
atk-s0513a1:1302_8: mayhañca assārohassa ca dātabbaṃ yasaṃ assārohasseva detha,
atk-s0513a1:1302_9: satta rājāno gahetvā dinnayodhaṃ nāma nāsetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0513a1:1302_13: Evaṃ bodhisattena rañño ovāde dinne bodhisattassa sannāhaṃ mocayiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1302_15: Rājā tassa sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā assārohassa mahantaṃ yasaṃ datvā satta rājāno puna attanno adubbhāya
atk-s0513a1:1302_16: sapathaṃ kāretvā sakasakaṭṭhānāni pesetvā dhammena samena rajjaṃ kāretvā jīvitapariyosāne yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1303_0: Satthā “evaṃ bhikkhu pubbe paṇḍitā anāyatanepi vīriyaṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1303_2: tvaṃ pana evarūpe niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā kasmā vīriyaṃ ossajasī”ti vatvā cattāri saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:1304_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1308_0: Yadā yadāti idampi satthā jetavane viharanto ossaṭṭhavīriyameva bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1308_1: Taṃ pana bhikkhuṃ satthā āmantetvā “bhikkhu pubbe paṇḍitā anāyatanepi laddhappahārāpi hutvā vīriyaṃ akaṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1309_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente purimanayeneva satta rājāno nagaraṃ parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1309_1: Atheko rathikayodho dve bhātikasindhave rathe yojetvā nagarā nikkhamma cha balakoṭṭhake bhinditvā cha rājāno aggahesi.
atk-s0513a1:1309_3: Rathiko rathaṃ pesento rājadvāraṃ āgantvā jeṭṭhabhātikaṃ rathā mocetvā sannāhaṃ sithilaṃ katvā ekeneva
atk-s0513a1:1309_4: passena nipajjāpetvā aññaṃ assaṃ sannayhituṃ āraddho.
atk-s0513a1:1309_5: Bodhisatto taṃ disvā purimanayeneva cintetvā rathikaṃ pakkosāpetvā nipannakova imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1311_0: “Yadā yadā yattha yadā, yattha yattha yadā yadā;
atk-s0513a1:1312_0: Ājañño kurute vegaṃ, hāyanti tattha vāḷavā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1313_0: Tattha yadā yadāti pubbaṇhādīsu yasmiṃ yasmiṃ kāle.
atk-s0513a1:1313_1: Yatthāti yasmiṃ ṭhāne magge vā saṅgāmasīse vā.
atk-s0513a1:1313_3: Yattha yatthāti sattannaṃ balakoṭṭhakānaṃ vasena bahūsu yuddhamaṇḍalesu.
atk-s0513a1:1313_4: Yadā yadāti yasmiṃ yasmiṃ kāle pahāraṃ laddhakāle vā aladdhakāle vā.
atk-s0513a1:1313_5: Ājañño kurute veganti sārathissa cittarucitaṃ kāraṇaṃ ājānanasabhāvo ājañño varasindhavo vegaṃ karoti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati.
atk-s0513a1:1313_6: Hāyanti tattha vāḷavāti tasmiṃ vege kariyamāne itare vaḷavasaṅkhātā khaḷuṅkassā hāyanti parihāyanti,
atk-s0513a1:1313_7: tasmā imasmiṃ rathe maṃyeva yojehīti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1314_0: Sārathi bodhisattaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā rathe yojetvā sattamaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ bhinditvā sattamaṃ rājānaṃ ādāya
atk-s0513a1:1314_1: rathaṃ pesento rājadvāraṃ āgantvā sindhavaṃ mocesi.
atk-s0513a1:1314_2: Bodhisatto ekena passena nipanno purimanayeneva rañño ovādaṃ datvā nirujjhi.
atk-s0513a1:1314_3: Rājā tassa sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā sārathissa sammānaṃ katvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1315_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:1315_2: Satthā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā rājā ānandatthero ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:1319_0: Aññamaññehi titthehīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dhammasenāpatissa saddhivihārikaṃ ekaṃ suvaṇṇakārapubbakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1319_3: Tasmā dhammasenāpati attano āsayānusayañāṇassa natthitāya saddhivihārikassa āsayānusayaṃ ajānanto asubhakammaṭṭhānameva kathesi,
atk-s0513a1:1319_5: So kira paṭipāṭiyā pañca jātisatāni suvaṇṇakārageheyeva paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a1:1319_6: athassa dīgharattaṃ parisuddhasuvaṇṇadassanavasena paricitattā asubhaṃ na sappāyamahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1319_7: So tattha nimittamattampi uppādetuṃ asakkonto cattāro māse khepesi.
atk-s0513a1:1320_0: Dhammasenāpati attano saddhivihārikassa arahattaṃ dātuṃ asakkonto “addhā ayaṃ buddhaveneyyo bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:1320_1: tathāgatassa santikaṃ nessāmī”ti cintetvā pātova taṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1320_4: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ ādāya āgatosī”ti pucchi. “Ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1320_6: ayaṃ pana catūhi māsehi nimittamattampi na uppādesi,
atk-s0513a1:1320_7: svāhaṃ ‘buddhaveneyyo eso bhavissatī’ti cintetvā tumhākaṃ santikaṃ ādāya āgato”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1320_9: kataraṃ pana te kammaṭṭhānaṃ saddhivihārikassa dinna”nti?
atk-s0513a1:1320_13: tvaṃ sāyanhasamaye āgantvā tava saddhivihārikaṃ ādāya gaccheyyāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1320_14: Evaṃ satthā theraṃ uyyojetvā tassa bhikkhussa manāpaṃ cīvarañca nivāsanañca dāpetvā taṃ ādāya gāmaṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0513a1:1320_15: pavisitvā paṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ dāpetvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro puna vihāraṃ āgantvā gandhakuṭiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1320_16: divasabhāgaṃ khepetvā sāyanhasamaye taṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā vihāracārikaṃ caramāno ambavane ekaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1320_18: tatrāpi ca mahantaṃ ekaṃ padumapupphaṃ māpetvā “bhikkhu imaṃ pupphaṃ olokento nisīdā”ti nisīdāpetvā gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1321_0: So bhikkhu taṃ pupphaṃ punappunaṃ oloketi.
atk-s0513a1:1321_2: taṃ tassa passantasseva jaraṃ patvā vivaṇṇaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1321_3: Athassa pariyantato paṭṭhāya pattāni patantāni muhuttena sabbāni patiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1321_6: So bhikkhu taṃ passanto cintesi “idaṃ padumapupphaṃ idāneva abhirūpaṃ ahosi dassanīyaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1321_13: Satthā “tassa cittaṃ vipassanaṃ āruḷha”nti ñatvā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova obhāsaṃ pharitvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1324_0: So bhikkhu gāthāpariyosāne arahattaṃ patvā “mutto vatamhi sabbabhavehī”ti cintetvā –
atk-s0513a1:1326_0: Visuddhasīlo susamāhitindriyo, cando yathā rāhumukhā pamutto.
atk-s0513a1:1328_0: Ālokapajjotakaro pabhaṅkaro, sahassaraṃsī viya bhāṇumā nabhe”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:1329_1: Udānetvā ca pana gantvā bhagavantaṃ vandi.
atk-s0513a1:1329_2: Theropi āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā attano saddhivihārikaṃ gahetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1329_3: Ayaṃ pavatti bhikkhūnaṃ antare pākaṭā jātā.
atk-s0513a1:1329_4: Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ dasabalassa guṇe vaṇṇayamānā nisīdiṃsu – “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:1329_5: sāriputtatthero āsayānusayañāṇassa abhāvena attano saddhivihārikassa āsayaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0513a1:1329_6: satthā pana ñatvā ekadivaseneva tassa saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1330_8: svāhaṃ etarahi buddho hutvā tassa āsayaṃ jānāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1330_9: pubbepāhaṃ tassa āsayaṃ jānāmiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1331_1: Tadā bodhisatto taṃ rājānaṃ atthe ca dhamme ca anusāsati.
atk-s0513a1:1331_2: Tadā rañño maṅgalaassanhānatitthe aññataraṃ vaḷavaṃ khaḷuṅkassaṃ nhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1331_3: Maṅgalasso vaḷavena nhānatitthaṃ otāriyamāno jigucchitvā otarituṃ na icchi.
atk-s0513a1:1331_7: jānāhi kena kāraṇena asso titthaṃ otāriyamāno na otaratī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1331_9: devā”ti nadītīraṃ gantvā assaṃ oloketvā nirogabhāvamassa ñatvā “kena nu kho kāraṇena ayaṃ imaṃ titthaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1331_10: na otaratī”ti upadhārento “paṭhamataraṃ ettha añño nhāpito bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:1331_11: tenesa jigucchamāno titthaṃ na otarati maññe”ti cintetvā assagopake pucchi “ambho,
atk-s0513a1:1332_0: Bodhisatto “esa attano sindhavatāya jigucchanto ettha nhāyituṃ na icchati,
atk-s0513a1:1332_1: imaṃ aññatitthe nhāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tassa āsayaṃ ñatvā “bho assagopaka,
atk-s0513a1:1332_2: sappimadhuphāṇitādibhisaṅkhatapāyāsampi tāva punappunaṃ bhuñjantassa titti hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1332_3: Ayaṃ asso bahū vāre idha titthe nhāto,
atk-s0513a1:1332_4: aññampi tāva naṃ titthaṃ otāretvā nhāpetha ca pāyetha cā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1336_5: Pāyāsassapi tappatīti sappiādīhi abhisaṅkhatena madhurapāyāsena tappati titto hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1336_6: dhāto suhito na puna bhuñjitukāmataṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0513a1:1336_7: Tasmā ayampi asso imasmiṃ titthe nibaddhaṃ nhānena pariyattiṃ āpanno bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:1337_0: Te tassa vacanaṃ sutvā assaṃ aññatitthaṃ otāretvā pāyiṃsu ceva nhāpayiṃsu ca.
atk-s0513a1:1337_1: Bodhisatto assassa pānīyaṃ pivitvā nhānakāle rañño santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1337_3: asso nhāto ca pīto cā”ti pucchi. “Āma, devā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1337_7: aho paṇḍito”ti bodhisattassa mahantaṃ yasaṃ datvā jīvitapariyosāne yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1338_3: pubbepi jānāmiyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1342_0: Purāṇacorāna vaco nisammāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1342_2: Ajātasattukumāro devadattassa gayāsīse vihāraṃ kāretvā nānaggarasehi tivassikagandhasālibhojanassa divase divase pañca thālipākasatāni abhihari.
atk-s0513a1:1342_3: Lābhasakkāraṃ nissāya devadattassa parivāro mahanto jāto,
atk-s0513a1:1342_8: Te aññamaññaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhānepi passanti,
atk-s0513a1:1343_1: kiṃ tvaṃ devasikaṃ sedehi muccamānehi piṇḍāya carasi,
atk-s0513a1:1343_2: devadatto gayāsīsavihāre nisīditvāva nānaggarasehi subhojanaṃ bhuñjati,
atk-s0513a1:1343_5: kiṃ te pātova gayāsīsaṃ āgantvā sauttaribhaṅgaṃ yāguṃ pivitvā aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ khajjakaṃ khāditvā nānaggarasehi subhojanaṃ bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1343_6: So punappunaṃ vuccamāno gantukāmo hutvā tato paṭṭhāya gayāsīsaṃ gantvā bhuñjitvā kālasseva veḷuvanaṃ āgacchati.
atk-s0513a1:1343_8: “gayāsīsaṃ gantvā devadattassa paṭṭhapitaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjatī”ti na cirasseva pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:1343_15: na pana me devadatto bhattaṃ deti,
atk-s0513a1:1343_17: devadatto buddhānaṃ paṭikaṇṭako dussīlo ajātasattuṃ pasādetvā adhammena attano lābhasakkāraṃ uppādesi,
atk-s0513a1:1343_18: tvaṃ evarūpe niyyānike buddhasāsane pabbajitvā devadattassa adhammena uppannaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjasi,
atk-s0513a1:1343_19: ehi taṃ satthu santikaṃ nessāmā”ti taṃ bhikkhuṃ ādāya dhammasabhaṃ āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1344_4: ayaṃ bhikkhu tumhākaṃ santike pabbajitvā devadattassa adhammena uppannaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1344_5: “Saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu devadattassa adhammena uppannaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjasī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1344_12: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ idha pabbajitvā mama sāsanaṃ bhajantoyeva devadattassa bhattaṃ bhuñjasi,
atk-s0513a1:1344_13: niccakālampi bhajanasīlakova tvaṃ diṭṭhadiṭṭheyeva bhajasī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1345_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa amacco ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1345_1: Tadā rañño mahiḷāmukho nāma maṅgalahatthī ahosi sīlavā ācārasampanno,
atk-s0513a1:1345_3: Athekadivasaṃ tassa sālāya samīpe rattibhāgasamanantare corā āgantvā tassa avidūre nisinnā coramantaṃ mantayiṃsu “evaṃ ummaṅgo bhinditabbo,
atk-s0513a1:1345_5: ummaṅgañca sandhicchedañca maggasadisaṃ titthasadisaṃ nijjaṭaṃ niggumbaṃ katvā bhaṇḍaṃ harituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a1:1345_7: evaṃ uṭṭhātuṃ samattho nāma na bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:1345_8: corena ca nāma sīlācārayuttena na bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1345_11: Eteneva upāyena punadivasepi punadivasepīti bahū divase tattha āgantvā mantayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1345_12: So tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “te maṃ sikkhāpentī”ti saññāya “idāni mayā kakkhaḷena pharusena sāhasikena bhavitabba”nti tathārūpova ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1345_13: Pātova āgataṃ hatthigopakaṃ soṇḍāya gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ pothetvā māresi.
atk-s0513a1:1345_14: Aparampi tathā aparampi tathāti āgatāgataṃ māretiyeva.
atk-s0513a1:1346_0: “Mahiḷāmukho ummattako jāto diṭṭhadiṭṭhe māretī”ti rañño ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1346_2: jānāhi kena kāraṇena so duṭṭho jāto”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1346_3: Bodhisatto gantvā tassa sarīre arogabhāvaṃ ñatvā “kena nu kho kāraṇena esa duṭṭho jāto”ti upadhārento
atk-s0513a1:1346_4: “addhā avidūre kesañci vacanaṃ sutvā ‘maṃ ete sikkhāpentī’ti saññāya duṭṭho jāto”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:1346_5: hatthigopake pucchi “atthi nu kho hatthisālāya samīpe rattibhāge kehici kiñci kathitapubba”nti? “Āma, sāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1346_11: “Sīlavante samaṇabrāhmaṇe hatthisālāyaṃ nisīdāpetvā sīlācārakathaṃ kathāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1347_0: Bodhisatto gantvā sīlavante samaṇabrāhmaṇe hatthisālāyaṃ nisīdāpetvā “sīlakathaṃ kathetha,
atk-s0513a1:1347_2: Te hatthissa avidūre nisinnā “na koci parāmasitabbo na māretabbo,
atk-s0513a1:1347_3: sīlācārasampannena khantimettānuddayayuttena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sīlakathaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1347_5: ito dāni paṭṭhāya sīlavantena bhavitabba”nti sīlavā ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1347_9: “Evarūpo duṭṭhahatthī paṇḍite nissāya porāṇakadhammeyeva patiṭṭhito”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1350_0: Susaññatānañhi vaco nisamma, gajuttamo sabbaguṇesu aṭṭhā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1351_13: Rājā “tiracchānagatassāpi āsayaṃ jānātī”ti bodhisattassa mahantaṃ yasaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1351_14: So yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā saddhiṃ bodhisattena yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1352_2: dhammikānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā dhammike bhajī”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1356_0: Nālaṃ kabaḷaṃ padātaveti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ upāsakañca mahallakattherañca ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1356_2: Tesu eko pabbajitvā devasikaṃ itarassa gharaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:1356_3: So tassa bhikkhaṃ datvā sayampi bhuñjitvā teneva saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā ālāpasallāpena nisīditvā nagaraṃ pavisati,
atk-s0513a1:1356_4: itaropi naṃ yāva nagaradvārā anugantvā nivattati.
atk-s0513a1:1356_5: So tesaṃ vissāso bhikkhūnaṃ antare pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:1356_6: Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū tesaṃ vissāsakathaṃ kathentā dhammasabhāyaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1356_15: pubbepi vissāsikāyeva ahesu”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1357_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa amacco ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1357_1: Tadā eko kukkuro maṅgalahatthisālaṃ gantvā maṅgalahatthissa bhuñjanaṭṭhāne patitāni bhattasitthāni khādati.
atk-s0513a1:1357_2: So teneva bhojanena saṃvaddhamāno maṅgalahatthissa vissāsiko jāto hatthisseva santike bhuñjati,
atk-s0513a1:1357_4: So hatthī naṃ soṇḍāya gahetvā aparāparaṃ karonto kīḷati,
atk-s0513a1:1357_6: Athekadivasaṃ eko gāmikamanusso hatthigopakassa mūlaṃ datvā taṃ kukkuraṃ ādāya attano gāmaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1357_7: Tato paṭṭhāya so hatthī kukkuraṃ apassanto neva khādati na pivati na nhāyati.
atk-s0513a1:1358_0: Bodhisatto hatthisālaṃ gantvā hatthissa dummanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “imassa sarīre rogo na paññāyati,
atk-s0513a1:1358_2: taṃ apassanto esa maññe sokābhibhūto”ti hatthigopake pucchi “atthi nu kho imassa kenaci saddhiṃ vissāso”ti? “Āma,
atk-s0513a1:1358_3: atthi sāmi ekena sunakhena saddhiṃ balavā mettī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1358_11: taṃ apassanto na bhuñjati maññe”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1360_0: “Nālaṃ kabaḷaṃ padātave, na ca piṇḍaṃ na kuse na ghaṃsituṃ;
atk-s0513a1:1362_5: Na ca piṇḍanti vaḍḍhetvā dīyamānaṃ bhattapiṇḍampi nālaṃ gahetuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1362_6: Na kuseti khādanatthāya dinnāni tiṇānipi nālaṃ gahetuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1362_7: Na ghaṃsitunti nhāpiyamāno sarīrampi ghaṃsituṃ nālaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1362_8: Evaṃ yaṃ yaṃ so hatthī kātuṃ na samattho,
atk-s0513a1:1362_9: taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ rañño ārocetvā tassa asamatthabhāve attanā sallakkhitakāraṇaṃ ārocento “maññāmī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0513a1:1363_0: Rājā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “idāni kiṃ kātabbaṃ paṇḍitā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:1363_1: “‘Amhākaṃ kira maṅgalahatthissa sahāyaṃ sunakhaṃ eko manusso gahetvā gato,
atk-s0513a1:1363_3: tassa ayaṃ nāma daṇḍo’ti bheriṃ carāpetha devā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1363_5: Taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā so puriso sunakhaṃ vissajjesi,
atk-s0513a1:1363_7: Hatthī taṃ soṇḍāya gahetvā kumbhe ṭhapetvā roditvā paridevitvā kumbhā otāretvā tena bhutte pacchā attanāpi bhuñji.
atk-s0513a1:1363_8: “Tiracchānagatassa āsayaṃ jānātī”ti rājā bodhisattassa mahantaṃ yasaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1364_3: pubbepi vissāsikāyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā catusaccakathāya vinivaṭṭetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi.
atk-s0513a1:1364_4: Idaṃ catusaccakathāya vinivaṭṭanaṃ nāma sabbajātakesupi atthiyeva.
atk-s0513a1:1369_0: Manuññameva bhāseyyāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto chabbaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ omasavādaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1369_1: Tasmiñhi samaye chabbaggiyā kalahaṃ karontā pesale bhikkhū khuṃsenti vambhenti ovijjhanti,
atk-s0513a1:1369_4: Bhagavā chabbaggiye pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira bhikkhavo”ti pucchitvā “sacca”nti vutte vigarahitvā “bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:1369_6: pubbepi eko tiracchānagato attānaṃ pharusena samudācarantaṃ sahassaṃ parājesī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1370_0: Atīte gandhāraraṭṭhe takkasilāyaṃ gandhārarājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:1370_2: Atha naṃ taruṇavacchakakāleyeva eko brāhmaṇo godakkhiṇādāyakānaṃ santikā labhitvā “nandivisālo”ti nāmaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1370_3: katvā puttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā sampiyāyamāno yāgubhattādīni datvā posesi.
atk-s0513a1:1370_4: Bodhisatto vayappatto cintesi “ahaṃ iminā brāhmaṇena kicchena paṭijaggito,
atk-s0513a1:1370_5: mayā ca saddhiṃ sakalajambudīpe añño samadhuro goṇo nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1370_6: yaṃnūnāhaṃ attano balaṃ dassetvā brāhmaṇassa posāvaniyaṃ dadeyya”nti so ekadivasaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ āha “gaccha, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a1:1370_7: ekaṃ govittakaseṭṭhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā ‘mayhaṃ balibaddo atibaddhaṃ sakaṭasataṃ pavaṭṭetī’ti vatvā sahassena abbhutaṃ karohī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1370_8: So brāhmaṇo seṭṭhissa santikaṃ gantvā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi “imasmiṃ nagare kassa goṇo thāmasampanno”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1370_9: Atha naṃ seṭṭhi “asukassa ca asukassa cā”ti vatvā “sakalanagare pana amhākaṃ goṇehi sadiso nāma natthī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1370_10: Brāhmaṇo “mayhaṃ eko goṇo atibaddhaṃ sakaṭasataṃ pavaṭṭetuṃ samattho atthī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1371_0: So sakaṭasataṃ vālukāsakkharapāsāṇānaṃyeva pūretvā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetvā sabbāni akkhabandhanayottena ekato
atk-s0513a1:1371_1: bandhitvā nandivisālaṃ nhāpetvā gandhapañcaṅgulikaṃ katvā kaṇṭhe mālaṃ piḷandhitvā purimasakaṭadhure
