atk-s0513a1:1371_4: Bodhisatto “ayaṃ maṃ akūṭaṃ kūṭavādena samudācaratī”ti cattāro pāde thambhe viya niccale katvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1371_6: Brāhmaṇo sahassaparājito goṇaṃ muñcitvā gharaṃ gantvā sokābhibhūto nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:1371_7: Nandivisālo caritvā āgato brāhmaṇaṃ sokābhibhūtaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā “kiṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a1:1371_10: mayā ettakaṃ kālaṃ tava gehe vasantena atthi kiñci bhājanaṃ vā bhinditapubbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1371_14: Atha tvaṃ maṃ kasmā kūṭavādena samudācarasi,
atk-s0513a1:1371_17: tena saddhiṃ dvīhi sahassehi abbhutaṃ karohi,
atk-s0513a1:1371_18: kevalaṃ maṃ akūṭaṃ kūṭavādena mā samudācarasīti.
atk-s0513a1:1372_0: Brāhmaṇo tassa vacanaṃ sutvā gantvā dvīhi sahassehi abbhutaṃ katvā purimanayeneva sakaṭasataṃ atibandhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1372_3: Yugaṃ dhure niccalaṃ bandhitvā ekāya koṭiyā nandivisālaṃ yojetvā ekaṃ koṭiṃ dhurayottena paliveṭhetvā
atk-s0513a1:1372_4: yugakoṭiñca akkhapādañca nissāya muṇḍarukkhadaṇḍakaṃ datvā tena yottena niccalaṃ bandhitvā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:1372_5: Evañhi kate yugaṃ etto vā ito vā na gacchati,
atk-s0513a1:1372_7: Athassa brāhmaṇo dhure nisīditvā nandivisālassa piṭṭhiṃ parimajjitvā “gaccha bhadra, vahassu,
atk-s0513a1:1372_9: Bodhisatto atibaddhaṃ sakaṭasataṃ ekavegeneva ākaḍḍhitvā pacchā ṭhitaṃ sakaṭaṃ purato ṭhitassa sakaṭassa ṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:1372_10: Govittakaseṭṭhi parājito brāhmaṇassa dve sahassāni adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1372_11: Aññepi manussā bodhisattassa bahuṃ dhanaṃ adaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1372_13: Evaṃ so bodhisattaṃ nissāya bahuṃ dhanaṃ labhi.
atk-s0513a1:1373_2: pharusavacanaṃ nāma kassaci manāpa”nti chabbaggiye bhikkhū garahitvā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1377_0: Dhanañca naṃ alābhesi, tena cattamano ahū”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1378_0: Tattha manuññameva bhāseyyāti parena saddhiṃ bhāsamāno catudosavirahitaṃ madhuraṃ manāpaṃ saṇhaṃ mudukaṃ piyavacanameva bhāseyya.
atk-s0513a1:1378_1: Garuṃ bhāraṃ udaddharīti nandivisālo balibaddo amanāpaṃ bhāsamānassa bhāraṃ anuddharitvā pacchā manāpaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1378_2: piyavacanaṃ bhāsamānassa brāhmaṇassa garuṃ bhāraṃ uddhari,
atk-s0513a1:1379_0: Iti satthā “manuññameva bhāseyyā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1383_0: Yato yato garu dhuranti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1383_1: Taṃ saddhiṃ devorohaṇena terasakanipāte sarabhamigajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:1383_2: Sammāsambuddhe pana yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā devaloke temāsaṃ vasitvā mahāpavāraṇāya saṅkassanagaradvāre
atk-s0513a1:1383_3: oruyha mahantena parivārena jetavanaṃ paviṭṭhe bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitvā “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:1383_5: tathāgatena vuḷhadhuraṃ añño vahituṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1383_7: mayameva pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmā’ti vatvā ekampi pāṭihāriyaṃ na akaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1383_8: aho satthā asamadhuro”ti satthu guṇakathaṃ kathentā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1383_16: pubbe tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattopi ahaṃ attanā samadhuraṃ kañci nālattha”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1384_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto goyoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:1384_1: Atha naṃ sāmikā taruṇavacchakakāleyeva ekissā mahallikāya ghare vasitvā tassā nivāsavetanato paricchinditvā adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1384_2: Sā taṃ yāgubhattādīhi paṭijaggamānā puttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā vaḍḍhesi.
atk-s0513a1:1384_4: Vayappatto ca añjanavaṇṇo hutvā gāmagoṇehi saddhiṃ carati,
atk-s0513a1:1384_6: Gāmadārakā siṅgesupi kaṇṇesupi galepi gahetvā olambanti,
atk-s0513a1:1384_11: yaṃnūnāhaṃ bhatiṃ katvā imaṃ duggatabhāvato moceyya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1384_12: So tato paṭṭhāya bhatiṃ upadhārento carati.
atk-s0513a1:1385_0: Athekadivasaṃ eko satthavāhaputto pañcahi sakaṭasatehi visamatitthaṃ sampatto,
atk-s0513a1:1385_1: tassa goṇā sakaṭāni uttāretuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0513a1:1385_2: pañcasu sakaṭasatesu goṇā yugaparamparāya yojitā ekampi sakaṭaṃ uttāretuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1385_3: Bodhisattopi gāmagoṇehi saddhiṃ tattha samīpe carati.
atk-s0513a1:1385_5: so “atthi nu kho etesaṃ gunnaṃ antare imāni sakaṭāni uttāretuṃ samattho usabhājānīyo”ti upadhārayamāno
atk-s0513a1:1385_6: bodhisattaṃ disvā “ayaṃ ājānīyo sakkhissati mayhaṃ sakaṭāni uttāretuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1385_7: ko nu kho assa sāmiko”ti gopālake pucchi “ko nu kho bho imassa sāmiko,
atk-s0513a1:1385_8: ahaṃ imaṃ sakaṭe yojetvā sakaṭesu uttāritesu vetanaṃ dassāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1385_11: So naṃ nāsāya rajjukena bandhitvā ākaḍḍhento cāletumpi nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a1:1385_12: Bodhisatto kira “bhatiyā kathitāya gamissāmī”ti na agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1385_14: tayā pañcasu sakaṭasatesu uttāritesu ekekassa sakaṭassa dve dve kahāpaṇe bhatiṃ katvā sahassaṃ dassāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1385_17: Atha naṃ ekavegeneva ukkhipitvā thale patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1386_0: Satthavāhaputto ekekassa sakaṭassa ekekaṃ katvā pañcasatāni bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā tassa gale bandhi.
atk-s0513a1:1386_1: So “ayaṃ mayhaṃ yathāparicchinnaṃ bhatiṃ na deti,
atk-s0513a1:1386_2: na dānissa gantuṃ dassāmī”ti gantvā sabbapurimasakaṭassa purato maggaṃ nivāretvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1386_4: Satthavāhaputto “jānāti maññe esa attano bhatiyā ūnabhāva”nti ekekasmiṃ sakaṭe dve dve katvā sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1386_6: So sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ ādāya mātu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1386_7: Gāmadārakā “kiṃ nāmetaṃ ayyikākāḷakassa gale”ti bodhisattassa santikaṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0513a1:1386_8: So te anubandhitvā dūratova palāpento mātu santikaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1386_9: Pañcannaṃ pana sakaṭasatānaṃ uttāritattā rattehi akkhīhi kilantarūpo paññāyittha.
atk-s0513a1:1386_11: ayaṃ te kahaṃ laddhā”ti gopālakadārake pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā “tāta,
atk-s0513a1:1386_13: kiṃkāraṇā evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhosī”ti vatvā bodhisattaṃ uṇhodakena nhāpetvā sakalasarīraṃ telena makkhetvā
atk-s0513a1:1386_14: pānīyaṃ pāyetvā sappāyaṃ bhojanaṃ bhojetvā jīvitapariyosāne saddhiṃ bodhisattena yathākammaṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a1:1387_3: pubbepi asamadhuroyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1390_0: Tadāssu kaṇhaṃ yuñjanti, svāssu taṃ vahate dhura”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1391_0: Tattha yato yato garu dhuranti yasmiṃ yasmiṃ ṭhāne dhuraṃ garu bhāriyaṃ hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1391_4: yasmiṃ ṭhāne udakacikkhallamahantatāya vā visamacchinnataṭabhāvena vā maggo gambhīro hotīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:1391_5: Tadāssu kaṇhaṃ yuñjantīti ettha assūti nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1391_7: Yadā dhurañca garu hoti maggo ca gambhīro,
atk-s0513a1:1391_8: tadā aññe balibadde apanetvā kaṇhameva yojentīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1391_9: Svāssu taṃ vahate dhuranti etthāpi assūti nipātamattameva,
atk-s0513a1:1392_2: kaṇhova taṃ dhuraṃ vahatī”ti dassetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1396_0: Mā munikassa pihayīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto thullakumārikāpalobhanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1396_2: Satthā pana taṃ bhikkhuṃ “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchi. “Āma,
atk-s0513a1:1396_7: pubbepi tvaṃ imissā vivāhadivase jīvitakkhayaṃ patvā mahājanassa uttaribhaṅgabhāvaṃ patto”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1397_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ gāmake ekassa kuṭumbikassa gehe goyoniyaṃ nibbatti “mahālohito”ti nāmena,
atk-s0513a1:1397_2: Teyeva dve bhātike nissāya tasmiṃ kule kammadhuraṃ vattati.
atk-s0513a1:1397_3: Tasmiṃ pana kule ekā kumārikā atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1397_4: taṃ eko nagaravāsī kulaputto attano puttassa vāresi.
atk-s0513a1:1397_5: Tassā mātāpitaro “kumārikāya vivāhakāle āgatānaṃ pāhunakānaṃ uttaribhaṅgo bhavissatī”ti yāgubhattaṃ datvā munikaṃ nāma sūkaraṃ posesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1397_6: Taṃ disvā cūḷalohito bhātaraṃ pucchi “imasmiṃ kule kammadhuraṃ vattamānaṃ amhe dve bhātike nissāya vattati,
atk-s0513a1:1397_9: kena nu kho kāraṇena esa etaṃ labhatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1397_13: Etissā hi kumārikāya vivāhakāle āgatānaṃ pāhunakānaṃ uttaribhaṅgo bhavissatīti ime etaṃ sūkaraṃ posenti,
atk-s0513a1:1397_15: atha naṃ sūkaraṃ pādesu gahetvā kaḍḍhentā heṭṭhāmañcato nīharitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā pāhunakānaṃ sūpabyañjanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1401_0: Tattha mā munikassa pihayīti munikassa bhojane pihaṃ mā uppādayi,
atk-s0513a1:1401_1: “esa muniko subhojanaṃ bhuñjatī”ti mā munikassa pihayi,
atk-s0513a1:1401_2: “kadā nu kho ahampi evaṃ sukhito bhaveyya”nti mā munikabhāvaṃ patthayi.
atk-s0513a1:1401_5: Appossukko bhusaṃ khādāti tassa bhojane nirussukko hutvā attanā laddhaṃ bhusaṃ khāda.
atk-s0513a1:1401_7: Tato na cirasseva te manussā āgamiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1401_13: etassa bhojanato sataguṇena sahassaguṇena amhākaṃ tiṇapalālabhusamattameva uttamañca anavajjañca dīghāyulakkhaṇañcāti.
atk-s0513a1:1402_0: Satthā “evaṃ kho tvaṃ bhikkhu pubbepi imaṃ kumārikaṃ nissāya jīvitakkhayaṃ patvā mahājanassa uttaribhaṅgabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1402_1: gato”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:1411_0: Kulāvakāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aparissāvetvā pānīyaṃ pītaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1411_1: Sāvatthito kira dve sahāyakā daharabhikkhū janapadaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ phāsukaṭṭhāne yathājjhāsayaṃ vasitvā
atk-s0513a1:1411_2: “sammāsambuddhaṃ passissāmā”ti puna tato nikkhamitvā jetavanābhimukhā pāyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1411_7: Parissāvanasāmiko itarassa parissāvanaṃ adatvā sayameva pānīyaṃ parissāvetvā pivi,
atk-s0513a1:1411_8: itaro pana parissāvanaṃ alabhitvā pipāsaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto aparissāvetvā pānīyaṃ pivi.
atk-s0513a1:1411_9: Te ubhopi anupubbena jetavanaṃ patvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1411_10: Satthā sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathetvā “kuto āgatatthā”ti pucchi. “Bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1411_11: mayaṃ kosalajanapade ekasmiṃ gāmake vasitvā tato nikkhamitvā tumhākaṃ dassanatthāya āgatā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1411_14: antarāmagge mayā saddhiṃ vivādaṃ katvā parissāvanaṃ nādāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1411_17: “Saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu jānaṃ sapāṇakaṃ udakaṃ pivī”ti? “Āma, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1411_19: Satthā “bhikkhu pubbe paṇḍitā devanagare rajjaṃ kārentā yuddhaparājitā samuddapiṭṭhena palāyantā ‘issariyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1411_20: nissāya pāṇavadhaṃ na karissāmā’ti tāva mahantaṃ yasaṃ pariccajitvā supaṇṇapotakānaṃ jīvitaṃ datvā rathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1412_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhe rājagahe eko māgadharājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:1412_1: Tadā bodhisatto yathā etarahi sakko purimattabhāve magadharaṭṭhe macalagāmake nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:1412_2: evaṃ tasmiṃyeva macalagāmake mahākulassa putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:1412_9: tepi tettiṃsa kulā manussā ekadivasaṃ gāmamajjhe ṭhatvā gāmakammaṃ karonti.
atk-s0513a1:1412_10: Bodhisatto ṭhitaṭṭhāne pādehi paṃsuṃ viyūhitvā taṃ padesaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ katvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1412_11: athañño eko āgantvā tasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhito.
atk-s0513a1:1412_12: Bodhisatto aparaṃ ṭhānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ katvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1412_14: Bodhisatto aparampi aparampīti sabbesampi ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ katvā aparena samayena tasmiṃ ṭhāne maṇḍapaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0513a1:1413_0: Aparena samayena tepi tettiṃsajanā bodhisattena samānacchandā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1413_1: Te bodhisatto pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā tato paṭṭhāya tehi saddhiṃ puññāni karonto vicarati.
atk-s0513a1:1413_2: Tepi teneva saddhiṃ puññāni karontā kālasseva vuṭṭhāya vāsipharasumusalahatthā catumahāpathādīsu musalena pāsāṇe ubbattetvā pavaṭṭenti,
atk-s0513a1:1413_10: Evaṃ yebhuyyena sakalagāmavāsino bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhatvā sīlāni rakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1414_0: Atha nesaṃ gāmabhojako cintesi “ahaṃ pubbe etesu suraṃ pivantesu pāṇātipātādīni karontesu cāṭikahāpaṇādivasena
atk-s0513a1:1414_2: idāni pana magho māṇavo sīlaṃ rakkhāpeti,
atk-s0513a1:1414_4: idāni pana te pañca sīlāni na rakkhāpessāmī”ti kuddho rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “deva,
atk-s0513a1:1414_5: bahū corā gāmaghātādīni karontā vicarantī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1414_8: So gantvā sabbepi te bandhitvā ānetvā “ānītā, deva,
atk-s0513a1:1414_10: Rājā tesaṃ kammaṃ asodhetvāva “hatthinā ne maddāpethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1414_11: Tato sabbepi te rājaṅgaṇe nipajjāpetvā hatthiṃ ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1414_12: Bodhisatto tesaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi “tumhe sīlāni āvajjetha,
atk-s0513a1:1414_13: pesuññakārake ca raññe ca hatthimhi ca attano sarīre ca ekasadisameva mettaṃ bhāvethā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1415_0: Rājā “etesaṃ hatthe kiñci osadhaṃ bhavissatī”ti cintetvā “vicinathā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1415_9: rājā sabbepi te pakkosāpetvā “tumhākaṃ jānanamantaṃ kathethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1415_12: amhe pana tettiṃsamattā janā pāṇaṃ na hanāma,
atk-s0513a1:1415_22: ayaṃ amhākaṃ manto ca parittañca vuḍḍhi cā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1415_23: Rājā tesaṃ pasanno pesuññakārakassa sabbaṃ gehavibhavaṃ tañca tesaṃyeva dāsaṃ katvā adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1416_0: Te tato paṭṭhāya yathāruciyā puññāni karontā “catumahāpathe mahantaṃ sālaṃ kāressāmā”ti vaḍḍhakiṃ pakkosāpetvā sālaṃ paṭṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1416_1: Mātugāmesu pana vigatacchandatāya tassā sālāya mātugāmānaṃ pattiṃ nādaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1416_2: Tena ca samayena bodhisattassa gehe sudhammā, cittā, nandā,
atk-s0513a1:1416_4: Tāsu sudhammā vaḍḍhakinā saddhiṃ ekato hutvā “bhātika,
atk-s0513a1:1416_5: imissā sālāya maṃ jeṭṭhikaṃ karohī”ti vatvā lañjaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1416_6: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā paṭhamameva kaṇṇikārukkhaṃ sukkhāpetvā tacchetvā vijjhitvā kaṇṇikaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā vatthena paliveṭhetvā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:1416_13: pubbeyeva chinditvā tacchetvā vijjhitvā ṭhapitakaṇṇikā laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1416_15: “Sace kassaci gehe niṭṭhāpetvā ṭhapitā vikkāyikakaṇṇikā atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1416_17: Te pariyesantā sudhammāya gehe disvā mūlena na labhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1416_19: dassāmī”ti vutte “na mayaṃ mātugāmānaṃ pattiṃ damhā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1417_2: ṭhapetvā brahmalokaṃ aññaṃ mātugāmarahitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1417_4: evaṃ sante amhākaṃ kammaṃ niṭṭhaṃ gamissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1417_5: Te “sādhū”ti kaṇṇikaṃ gahetvā sālaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā āsanaphalakāni santharitvā pānīyacāṭiyo ṭhapetvā yāgubhattaṃ nibandhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1417_6: Sālaṃ pākārena parikkhipitvā dvāraṃ yojetvā antopākāre vālukaṃ ākiritvā bahipākāre tālapantiyo ropesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1417_9: Nandāpi tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne pokkharaṇiṃ kāresi pañcavaṇṇehi padumehi sañchannaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1418_0: Bodhisatto mātu upaṭṭhānaṃ pitu upaṭṭhānaṃ kule jeṭṭhāpacāyikakammaṃ saccavācaṃ apharusavācaṃ apisuṇavācaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1422_0: Taṃ ve devā tāvatiṃsā, āhu sappuriso itī”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:1423_0: Evaṃ pasaṃsiyabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā jīvitapariyosāne tāvatiṃsabhavane sakko devarājā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:1423_3: Sakko devarājā “kiṃ no sādhāraṇena rajjenā”ti asure dibbapānaṃ pāyetvā matte samāne pādesu gāhāpetvā sinerupabbatapāde khipāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1424_1: tattha devānaṃ pāricchattako viya cittapāṭali nāma kappaṭṭhiyarukkho hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1424_2: Te cittapāṭaliyā pupphitāya jānanti “nāyaṃ amhākaṃ devaloko,
atk-s0513a1:1424_4: Atha te “jarasakko amhe matte katvā mahāsamuddapiṭṭhe khipitvā amhākaṃ devanagaraṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a1:1424_5: te mayaṃ tena saddhiṃ yujjhitvā amhākaṃ devanagarameva gaṇhissāmā”ti kipillikā viya thambhaṃ sineruṃ anusañcaramānā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1424_6: Sakko “asurā kira uṭṭhitā”ti sutvā samuddapiṭṭheyeva abbhuggantvā yujjhamāno tehi parājito diyaḍḍhayojanasatikena
atk-s0513a1:1424_8: Athassa ratho samuddapiṭṭhena vegena gacchanto simbalivanaṃ pakkhanto,
atk-s0513a1:1424_9: tassa gamanamagge simbalivanaṃ naḷavanaṃ viya chijjitvā chijjitvā samuddapiṭṭhe patati.
atk-s0513a1:1424_14: tumhākaṃ rathavegena vicuṇṇite simbalivane patante supaṇṇapotakā maraṇabhayatajjitā ekaviravaṃ viravantī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1425_2: na mayaṃ issariyaṃ nissāya pāṇavadhakammaṃ karoma,
atk-s0513a1:1425_3: etesaṃ pana atthāya mayaṃ jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā asurānaṃ dassāma,
atk-s0513a1:1428_0: Kāmaṃ cajāma asuresu pāṇaṃ, māme dijā vikulāvā ahesu”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1429_2: Simbalisminti passa ete simbalirukkhe olambantā ṭhitāti dasseti.
atk-s0513a1:1429_3: Īsāmukhena parivajjayassūti ete etassa rathassa īsāmukhena yathā na haññanti,
atk-s0513a1:1429_5: Kāmaṃ cajāma asuresu pāṇanti yadi amhesu asurānaṃ pāṇaṃ cajantesu etesaṃ sotthi hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1429_6: kāmaṃ cajāma ekaṃseneva mayaṃ asuresu amhākaṃ pāṇaṃ cajāma.
atk-s0513a1:1429_7: Māme dijā vikulāvā ahesunti ime pana dijā ime garuḷapotakā viddhastavicuṇṇitakulāvakatāya vikulāvā mā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1429_8: mā amhākaṃ dukkhaṃ etesaṃ upari khipa,
atk-s0513a1:1429_10: Mātalisaṅgāhako tassa vacanaṃ sutvā rathaṃ nivattetvā aññena maggena devalokābhimukhaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1429_11: Asurā pana taṃ nivattayamānameva disvā “addhā aññehipi cakkavāḷehi sakkā āgacchanti,
atk-s0513a1:1429_12: balaṃ labhitvā ratho nivatto bhavissatī”ti maraṇabhayabhītā palāyitvā asurabhavanameva pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1430_0: Sakkopi devanagaraṃ pavisitvā dvīsu devalokesu devagaṇena parivuto nagaramajjhe aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1430_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe pathaviṃ bhinditvā yojanasahassubbedho vejayantapāsādo uṭṭhahi.
atk-s0513a1:1430_3: Atha sakko puna asurānaṃ anāgamanatthāya pañcasu ṭhānesu ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:1432_0: Uragakaroṭipayassa ca hārī, madanayutā caturo ca mahantā”ti. ;
atk-s0513a1:1433_0: Dve nagarānipi yuddhena gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ayujjhapurāni nāma jātāni devanagarañca asuranagarañca.
atk-s0513a1:1433_2: atha devehi palāyitvā devanagaraṃ pavisitvā dvāre pihite asurānaṃ satasahassampi kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0513a1:1433_4: atha asurehi palāyitvā asuranagaraṃ pavisitvā dvāre pihite sakkānaṃ satasahassampi kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0513a1:1433_5: Iti imāni dve nagarāni ayujjhapurāni nāma.
atk-s0513a1:1433_6: Tesaṃ antarā etesu uragādīsu pañcasu ṭhānesu sakkena ārakkhā ṭhapitā.
atk-s0513a1:1433_10: tasmā sinerussa paṭhamālinde tesaṃ ārakkhā. Karoṭi-
atk-s0513a1:1433_23: Caturo ca mahantāti cattāro mahārājāno vuttā,
atk-s0513a1:1433_25: Tasmā yadi asurā kupitā āvilacittā devapuraṃ upayanti,
atk-s0513a1:1434_0: Imesu pana pañcasu ṭhānesu ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā sakke devānaminde dibbasampattiṃ anubhavamāne sudhammā cavitvā tasseva pādaparicārikā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:1434_1: kaṇṇikāya dinnanissandena cassā pañcayojanasatikā sudhammā nāma devasabhā udapādi,
atk-s0513a1:1434_2: yattha dibbasetacchattassa heṭṭhā yojanappamāṇe kañcanapallaṅke nisinno sakko devānamindo devamanussānaṃ kattabbakiccāni karoti.
atk-s0513a1:1434_3: Cittāpi cavitvā tasseva pādaparicārikā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:1434_4: uyyānassa karaṇanissandena cassā cittalatāvanaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:1434_5: Nandāpi cavitvā tasseva pādaparicārikā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:1434_6: pokkharaṇiyā nissandena cassā nandā nāma pokkharaṇī udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:1435_0: Sujā pana kusalakammassa akatattā ekasmiṃ araññe kandarāya bakasakuṇikā hutvā nibbattā.
atk-s0513a1:1435_2: kattha nu kho nibbattā”ti āvajjento taṃ disvā tattha gantvā taṃ ādāya devalokaṃ āgantvā tassā ramaṇīyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1435_3: devanagaraṃ sudhammaṃ devasabhaṃ cittalatāvanaṃ nandāpokkharaṇiñca dassetvā “etā kusalaṃ katvā mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1435_5: tvaṃ pana kusalaṃ akatvā tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattā,
atk-s0513a1:1435_6: ito paṭṭhāya sīlaṃ rakkhāhī”ti taṃ ovaditvā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā tattheva netvā vissajjesi.
atk-s0513a1:1435_8: Sakko katipāhaccayena “sakkā nu kho sīlaṃ rakkhitu”nti gantvā maccharūpena uttāno hutvā purato nipajji,
atk-s0513a1:1435_14: Sā tato cutā bārāṇasiyaṃ kumbhakāragehe nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:1436_0: Sakko “kahaṃ nu kho nibbattā”ti tattha nibbattabhāvaṃ ñatvā suvaṇṇaeḷālukānaṃ yānakaṃ pūretvā majjhe
atk-s0513a1:1436_12: Sujā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “mayhaṃ ānītaṃ bhavissatī”ti cintetvā gantvā taṃ “dehi,
atk-s0513a1:1436_16: “Idaṃ mayā tuyhameva atthāya ābhata”nti saddhiṃ yānakena gehadvāre ṭhapetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:1437_0: Sāpi yāvajīvaṃ sīlaṃ rakkhitvā tato cutā vepacittissa asurindassa dhītā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:1437_2: So tassā vayappattakāle “mayhaṃ dhītā attano cittarucitaṃ sāmikaṃ gaṇhatū”ti asure sannipātesi.
atk-s0513a1:1437_3: Sakko “kahaṃ nu kho sā nibbattā”ti olokento tattha nibbattabhāvaṃ ñatvā “sujā cittarucitaṃ sāmikaṃ gaṇhantī
atk-s0513a1:1437_4: maṃ gaṇhissatī”ti asuravaṇṇaṃ māpetvā tattha agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1437_5: Sujaṃ alaṅkaritvā sannipātaṭṭhānaṃ ānetvā “cittarucitaṃ sāmikaṃ gaṇhā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1437_6: Sā olokentī sakkaṃ disvā pubbepi sinehavasena uppannapemena mahoghena viya ajjhotthaṭahadayā hutvā “ayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1437_7: me sāmiko”ti vatvā tassa upari pupphadāmaṃ khipitvā aggahesi.
atk-s0513a1:1437_8: Asurā “amhākaṃ rājā ettakaṃ kālaṃ dhītu anucchavikaṃ alabhitvā idāni labhati,
atk-s0513a1:1437_9: ayamevassā dhītu pitāmahato mahallako anucchaviko”ti lajjamānā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1437_10: So taṃ devanagaraṃ ānetvā aḍḍhateyyānaṃ nāṭikākoṭīnaṃ jeṭṭhikaṃ katvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1438_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ bhikkhu pubbe paṇḍitā devanagare rajjaṃ kārayamānā attano jīvitaṃ pariccajantāpi pāṇātipātaṃ na kariṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1438_1: tvaṃ nāma evarūpe niyyānike sāsane pabbajitvā aparissāvitaṃ sapāṇakaṃ udakaṃ pivissasī”ti taṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1442_0: Rudaṃ manuññanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ bahubhaṇḍikaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1442_2: Satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu bahubhaṇḍo”ti pucchi. “Āma,
atk-s0513a1:1442_5: So ettakaṃ sutvāva kuddho nivāsanapārupanaṃ chaḍḍetvā “iminā dāni nīhārena vicarāmī”ti satthu purato naggo aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1442_8: Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā “satthu nāma purato evarūpaṃ karissatī”ti tassa aguṇakathaṃ kathesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1442_11: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti bhikkhū pucchi. Bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1442_12: “so hi nāma bhikkhu tumhākaṃ purato catuparisamajjhe hirottappaṃ pahāya gāmadārako viya naggo ṭhatvā
atk-s0513a1:1442_13: manussehi jigucchiyamāno hīnāyāvattitvā sāsanā parihīno”ti tassa aguṇakathāya nisinnāmhāti.
atk-s0513a1:1442_16: idāneva so bhikkhu hirottappābhāvena ratanasāsanā parihīno,
atk-s0513a1:1442_17: pubbe itthiratanapaṭilābhatopi parihīnoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1443_0: Atīte paṭhamakappe catuppadā sīhaṃ rājānaṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1443_3: Tassa pana suvaṇṇahaṃsarājassa dhītā haṃsapotikā abhirūpā ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1443_6: Haṃsarājā tassā varaṃ datvā himavante sabbe sakuṇe sannipātāpesi,
atk-s0513a1:1443_7: nānappakārā haṃsamorādayo sakuṇagaṇā samāgantvā ekasmiṃ mahante pāsāṇatale sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1443_8: Haṃsarājā “attano cittarucitaṃ sāmikaṃ āgantvā gaṇhātū”ti dhītaraṃ pakkosāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1443_9: Sā sakuṇasaṅghaṃ olokentī maṇivaṇṇagīvaṃ citrapekhuṇaṃ moraṃ disvā “ayaṃ me sāmiko hotū”ti ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:1443_11: ayaṃ rājadhītā ettakānaṃ sakuṇānaṃ majjhe sāmikaṃ rocentī tayi ruciṃ uppādesī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1443_12: Moro “ajjāpi tāva me balaṃ na passatī”ti atituṭṭhiyā hirottappaṃ bhinditvā tāva mahato sakuṇasaṅghassa majjhe pakkhe pasāretvā naccituṃ ārabhi,
atk-s0513a1:1444_0: Suvaṇṇahaṃsarājā lajjito “imassa neva ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā hirī atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1444_2: nāssa bhinnahirottappassa mama dhītaraṃ dassāmī”ti sakuṇasaṅghamajjhe imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1446_0: “Rudaṃ manuññaṃ rucirā ca piṭṭhi, veḷuriyavaṇṇūpanibhā ca gīvā;
atk-s0513a1:1447_0: Byāmamattāni ca pekhuṇāni, naccena te dhītaraṃ no dadāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1448_5: Rucirā ca piṭṭhīti piṭṭhipi te citrā ceva sobhanā ca.
atk-s0513a1:1448_9: Naccena te dhītaraṃ no dadāmīti hirottappaṃ bhinditvā naccitabhāveneva te evarūpassa nillajjassa dhītaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1448_10: no dadāmīti vatvā haṃsarājā tasmiṃyeva parisamajjhe attano bhāgineyyassa haṃsapotakassa dhītaraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1448_11: Moro haṃsapotikaṃ alabhitvā lajjitvā tatova uppatitvā palāyi.
atk-s0513a1:1449_2: idāneva esa hirottappaṃ bhinditvā ratanasāsanā parihīno,
atk-s0513a1:1449_3: pubbepi itthiratanapaṭilābhato parihīnoyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1453_0: Sammodamānāti idaṃ satthā kapilavatthuṃ upanissāya nigrodhārāme viharanto cumbaṭakakalahaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1453_2: Tadā pana satthā ñātake āmantetvā “mahārājā ñātakānaṃ aññamaññaṃ viggaho nāma na yutto,
atk-s0513a1:1453_3: tiracchānagatāpi hi pubbe samaggakāle paccāmitte abhibhavitvā sotthiṃ pattā yadā vivādamāpannā,
atk-s0513a1:1453_4: tadā mahāvināsaṃ pattā”ti vatvā ñātirājakulehi āyācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1454_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto vaṭṭakayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā anekavaṭṭakasahassaparivāro araññe paṭivasati.
atk-s0513a1:1454_1: Tadā eko vaṭṭakaluddako tesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vaṭṭakavassitaṃ katvā tesaṃ sannipatitabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0513a1:1454_2: tesaṃ upari jālaṃ khipitvā pariyantesu maddanto sabbe ekato katvā pacchiṃ pūretvā gharaṃ gantvā te vikkiṇitvā
atk-s0513a1:1454_8: ito dāni paṭṭhāya etena tumhākaṃ upari jāle khittamatte ekeko ekekasmiṃ jālakkhike sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā jālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1454_9: ukkhipitvā icchitaṭṭhānaṃ haritvā ekasmiṃ kaṇṭakagumbe pakkhipatha,
atk-s0513a1:1454_10: evaṃ sante heṭṭhā tena tena ṭhānena palāyissāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1454_12: Dutiyadivase upari jāle khitte te bodhisattena vuttanayeneva jālaṃ ukkhipitvā ekasmiṃ kaṇṭakagumbe khipitvā sayaṃ heṭṭhābhāgena tato tato palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1454_13: Sākuṇikassa gumbato jālaṃ mocentasseva vikālo jāto,
atk-s0513a1:1455_1: Sopi yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā jālameva mocento kiñci alabhitvā tucchahatthova gehaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:1455_2: Athassa bhariyā kujjhitvā “tvaṃ divase divase tucchahattho āgacchasi,
atk-s0513a1:1455_3: aññampi te bahi positabbaṭṭhānaṃ atthi maññe”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1455_6: apica kho pana te vaṭṭakā samaggā hutvā caranti,
atk-s0513a1:1455_7: mayā khittamatte jālaṃ ādāya kaṇṭakagumbe khipitvā gacchanti,
atk-s0513a1:1455_8: na kho panete sabbakālameva sammodamānā viharissanti,
atk-s0513a1:1455_11: tadā te sabbeva ādāya tava mukhaṃ hāsayamāno āgacchissāmī”ti vatvā bhariyāya imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1458_0: Yadā te vivadissanti, tadā ehinti me vasa”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1459_0: Tattha yadā te vivadissantīti yasmiṃ kāle te vaṭṭakā nānāladdhikā nānāgāhā hutvā vivadissanti,
atk-s0513a1:1459_2: Tadā ehinti me vasanti tasmiṃ kāle sabbepi te mama vasaṃ āgacchissanti.
atk-s0513a1:1459_3: Athāhaṃ te gahetvā tava mukhaṃ hāsento āgacchissāmīti bhariyaṃ samassāsesi.
atk-s0513a1:1460_0: Katipāhasseva pana accayena eko vaṭṭako gocarabhūmiṃ otaranto asallakkhetvā aññassa sīsaṃ akkami,
atk-s0513a1:1460_4: Te punappunaṃ kathentā “tvameva maññe jālaṃ ukkhipasī”ti aññamaññaṃ vivādaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1460_5: Tesu vivadantesu bodhisatto cintesi “vivādake sotthibhāvo nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1460_9: mayā imasmiṃ ṭhāne na sakkā vasitu”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1460_10: So attano parisaṃ ādāya aññattha gato.
atk-s0513a1:1460_11: Sākuṇikopi kho katipāhaccayena āgantvā vaṭṭakavassitaṃ vassitvā tesaṃ sannipatitānaṃ upari jālaṃ khipi.
atk-s0513a1:1460_12: Atheko vaṭṭako “tuyhaṃ kira jālaṃ ukkhipantasseva matthake lomāni patitāni,
atk-s0513a1:1460_14: Aparo “tuyhaṃ kira jālaṃ ukkhipantasseva dvīsu pakkhesu pattāni patitāni,
atk-s0513a1:1460_17: tvaṃ ukkhipā”ti vadantānaññeva sākuṇiko jālaṃ ukkhipitvā sabbeva te ekato katvā pacchiṃ pūretvā bhariyaṃ hāsayamāno gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1461_0: Satthā “evaṃ mahārājā ñātakānaṃ kalaho nāma na yutto,
atk-s0513a1:1461_1: kalaho vināsamūlameva hotī”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1465_0: Na maṃ sītaṃ na maṃ uṇhanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto purāṇadutiyikāpalobhanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1465_1: Tadā hi satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchi. “Saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1465_7: Atha naṃ satthā “bhikkhu esā itthī tava anatthakārikā,
atk-s0513a1:1465_8: pubbepi tvaṃ etaṃ nissāya maraṇaṃ pāpuṇanto maṃ āgamma maraṇā mutto”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1466_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa purohito ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1466_2: Atheko mahāmaccho rativasena attano macchiyā saddhiṃ kīḷamāno āgacchati.
atk-s0513a1:1466_3: Tassa sā macchī purato gacchamānā jālagandhaṃ ghāyitvā jālaṃ pariharamānā gatā.
atk-s0513a1:1466_4: So pana kāmagiddho lolamaccho jālakucchimeva paviṭṭho.
atk-s0513a1:1466_5: Kevaṭṭā tassa jālaṃ paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā jālaṃ ukkhipitvā macchaṃ gahetvā amāretvāva vālikāpiṭṭhe khipitvā
atk-s0513a1:1466_8: Maccho “etaṃ aṅgāratāpanaṃ vā sūlavijjhanaṃ vā aññaṃ vā pana dukkhaṃ na maṃ kilameti,
atk-s0513a1:1466_9: yaṃ panesā macchī ‘aññaṃ so nūna ratiyā gato’ti mayi domanassaṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0513a1:1466_10: tameva maṃ bādhatī”ti paridevamāno imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1468_0: “Na maṃ sītaṃ na maṃ uṇhaṃ, na maṃ jālasmi bādhanaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:1469_0: Yañca maṃ maññate macchī, aññaṃ so ratiyā gato”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1470_0: Tattha na maṃ sītaṃ na maṃ uṇhanti macchānaṃ udakā nīhaṭakāle sītaṃ hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1470_2: tadubhayampi sandhāya “na maṃ sītaṃ na maṃ uṇhaṃ bādhatī”ti paridevati.
atk-s0513a1:1470_5: Na maṃ jālasmi bādhananti yampi me jālasmiṃ bādhanaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:1470_8: sā macchī mama jāle patitassa imehi kevaṭṭehi gahitabhāvaṃ ajānantī maṃ apassamānā “so maccho idāni aññaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1470_10: taṃ tassā domanassappattāya cintanaṃ maṃ bādhatīti vālikāpiṭṭhe nipanno paridevati.
atk-s0513a1:1471_0: Tasmiṃ samaye purohito dāsaparivuto nhānatthāya nadītīraṃ āgato.
atk-s0513a1:1471_2: Tenassa macchaparidevanaṃ sutvā etadahosi “ayaṃ maccho kilesavasena paridevati,
atk-s0513a1:1471_3: evaṃ āturacitto kho panesa mīyamāno nirayeyeva nibbattissati,
atk-s0513a1:1471_4: ahamassa avassayo bhavissāmī”ti kevaṭṭānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “ambho tumhe amhākaṃ ekadivasampi byañjanatthāya macchaṃ na dethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1471_10: Bodhisatto taṃ ubhohi hatthehi gahetvā nadītīre nisīditvā “ambho maccha,
atk-s0513a1:1471_13: idāni ito paṭṭhāya mā kilesavasiko ahosī”ti ovaditvā udake vissajjetvā nhatvā nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1472_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:1472_4: maccho ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu purohito pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1476_0: Santi pakkhā apatanāti idaṃ satthā magadhesu cārikaṃ caramāno dāvagginibbānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1476_1: Ekasmiñhi samaye satthā magadhesu cārikaṃ caramāno aññatarasmiṃ magadhagāmake piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1476_4: purato ca pacchato ca bahū bhikkhū dissanti,
atk-s0513a1:1476_5: sopi kho aggi ekadhūmo ekajālo hutvā avattharamāno āgacchateva.
atk-s0513a1:1476_7: tena daḍḍhaṭṭhānaṃ itaro aggi na ottharissatī”ti araṇisahitaṃ nīharitvā aggiṃ karonti.
atk-s0513a1:1476_13: sineruṃ nissāya ṭhitā sineruṃ apassantā viya sadevake loke aggapuggalaṃ attanā saddhiṃ gacchantameva
atk-s0513a1:1476_17: Te purato ca pacchato ca gacchantā sabbepi ekato hutvā dasabalassa santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1476_20: Āgantvā tathāgatassa ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ patvā tassa padesassa samantā soḷasakarīsamattaṭṭhānaṃ patto udake opilāpitatiṇukkā viya nibbāyi,
atk-s0513a1:1477_2: ayañhi nāma acetano aggi buddhānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ avattharituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a1:1477_8: yaṃ imaṃ bhūmippadesaṃ patvā esa aggi nibbāyati.
atk-s0513a1:1477_10: Imasmiñhi padese sakalampi imaṃ kappaṃ aggi na jalissati,
atk-s0513a1:1477_12: Athāyasmā ānando satthu nisīdanatthāya catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paññapesi,
atk-s0513a1:1477_18: taṃ no pākaṭaṃ karothā”ti bhikkhūhi āyācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1478_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhe tasmiṃyeva padese bodhisatto vaṭṭakayoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā mātukucchito jāto
atk-s0513a1:1478_1: aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā nikkhantakāle mahāgeṇḍukappamāṇo vaṭṭakapotako ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1478_2: Atha naṃ mātāpitaro kulāvake nipajjāpetvā mukhatuṇḍakena gocaraṃ āharitvā posenti.
atk-s0513a1:1478_3: Tassa pakkhe pasāretvā ākāse gamanabalaṃ vā pāde ukkhipitvā thale gamanabalaṃ vā natthi.
atk-s0513a1:1478_4: Tañca padesaṃ saṃvacchare saṃvacchare dāvaggi gaṇhāti,
atk-s0513a1:1478_5: so tasmimpi samaye mahāravaṃ ravanto taṃ padesaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a1:1478_6: sakuṇasaṅghā attano attano kulāvakehi nikkhamitvā maraṇabhayabhītā viravantā palāyanti,
atk-s0513a1:1478_7: bodhisattassapi mātāpitaro maraṇabhayabhītā bodhisattaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1478_8: Bodhisatto kulāvake nipannakova gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā avattharitvā āgacchantaṃ aggiṃ disvā cintesi “sace mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1478_13: Mātāpitaropi kho me maraṇabhayabhītā maṃ ekakaṃ pahāya attānaṃ parittāyantā palātā.
atk-s0513a1:1478_16: kiṃ nu kho ajja mayā kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1479_0: Athassa etadahosi “imasmiṃ loke sīlaguṇo nāma atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1479_2: atīte pāramiyo pūretvā bodhimūle nisīditvā abhisambuddhā sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttivimuttiñāṇadassanasampannā
atk-s0513a1:1479_3: saccānuddayakāruññakhantisamannāgatā sabbasattesu samappavattamettābhāvanā sabbaññubuddhā nāma atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1479_4: tehi ca paṭividdhā dhammaguṇā nāma atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1479_7: tasmā atīte buddhe ceva tehi paṭividdhaguṇe ca āvajjetvā mayi vijjamānaṃ saccasabhāvadhammaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:1479_8: saccakiriyaṃ katvā aggiṃ paṭikkamāpetvā ajja mayā attano ceva sesasakuṇānañca sotthibhāvaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1484_0: Atha bodhisatto atīte parinibbutānaṃ buddhānaṃ guṇe āvajjetvā attani vijjamānaṃ saccasabhāvaṃ ārabbha saccakiriyaṃ karonto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1488_0: Tattha santi pakkhā apatanāti mayhaṃ pakkhā nāma atthi upalabbhanti,
atk-s0513a1:1488_1: no ca kho sakkā etehi uppatituṃ ākāsena gantunti apatanā.
atk-s0513a1:1488_2: Santi pādā avañcanāti pādāpi me atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1488_3: tehi pana vañcituṃ padavāragamanena gantuṃ na sakkāti avañcanā.
atk-s0513a1:1488_4: Mātāpitā ca nikkhantāti ye ca maṃ aññattha neyyuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1489_4: mātāpitūnaṃ maṃ kulāvakeyeva chaḍḍetvā palātabhāvo ca sacco sabhāvabhūtoyeva, jātaveda,
atk-s0513a1:1489_5: etena saccena tvaṃ ito paṭikkamā”ti kulāvake nipannakova saccakiriyaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1489_6: Tassa saha saccakiriyāya soḷasakarīsamatte ṭhāne jātavedo paṭikkami.
atk-s0513a1:1489_7: Paṭikkamanto ca na jhāyamānova aññaṃ gato,
atk-s0513a1:1489_8: udake pana opilāpitā ukkā viya tattheva nibbāyi.
atk-s0513a1:1491_0: Vajjesi soḷasa karīsāni, udakaṃ patvā yathā sikhī”ti. ;
atk-s0513a1:1492_0: Taṃ pana ṭhānaṃ sakalepi imasmiṃ kappe agginā anabhibhavanīyattā kappaṭṭhiyapāṭihāriyaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1492_1: Evaṃ bodhisatto saccakiriyaṃ katvā jīvitapariyosāne yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1493_2: imassa vanassa agginā anajjhottharaṇaṃ etarahi mayhaṃ balaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1493_3: porāṇaṃ panetaṃ vaṭṭapotakakāle mayhameva saccabala”nti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi.
atk-s0513a1:1497_0: Yaṃ nissitāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto daḍḍhapaṇṇasālaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1497_1: Eko kira bhikkhu satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā jetavanato nikkhamma kosalesu ekaṃ paccantagāmaṃ nissāya ekasmiṃ araññasenāsane vasati.
atk-s0513a1:1497_10: madditvā”ti evaṃ taṃ taṃ kammaṃ apadisantāyeva temāsaṃ vītināmesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1497_11: So bhikkhu temāsaṃ ajjhokāse dukkhaṃ vasanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhetvā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a1:1497_12: Pavāretvā pana satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:1497_13: Satthā tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “kiṃ bhikkhu sukhena vassaṃvutthosi,
atk-s0513a1:1497_15: So taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā “senāsanasappāyassa me abhāvena kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ na patta”nti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1497_16: Satthā “pubbe bhikkhu tiracchānagatāpi attano sappāyāsappāyaṃ jāniṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1497_17: tvaṃ kasmā na aññāsī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1498_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sakuṇayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā sakuṇasaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0513a1:1498_2: Athekadivasaṃ tassa rukkhassa sākhāsu aññamaññaṃ ghaṃsantīsu cuṇṇaṃ patati,
atk-s0513a1:1498_4: Taṃ disvā bodhisatto cintesi “imā dve sākhā evaṃ ghaṃsamānā aggiṃ vissajjessanti,
atk-s0513a1:1500_0: “Yaṃ nissitā jagatiruhaṃ vihaṅgamā, svāyaṃ aggiṃ pamuñcati;
atk-s0513a1:1501_0: Disā bhajatha vakkaṅgā, jātaṃ saraṇato bhaya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1502_4: Disā bhajathāti imaṃ rukkhaṃ muñcitvā ito palāyantā catasso disā bhajatha.
atk-s0513a1:1502_6: Te hi uttamaṅgaṃ galaṃ kadāci kadāci vaṅkaṃ karonti,
atk-s0513a1:1502_8: Vaṅkā vā tesaṃ ubhosu passesu pakkhā jātāti vakkaṅgā.
atk-s0513a1:1502_9: Jātaṃ saraṇato bhayanti amhākaṃ avassayarukkhatoyeva bhayaṃ nibbattaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1503_0: Bodhisattassa vacanakarā paṇḍitasakuṇā tena saddhiṃ ekappahāreneva uppatitvā aññattha gatā.
atk-s0513a1:1503_2: te “evameva esa bindumatte udake kumbhīle passatī”ti tassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā tattheva vasiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1503_3: Tato na cirasseva bodhisattena cintitākāreneva aggi nibbattitvā taṃ rukkhaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0513a1:1503_4: Dhūmesu ca jālāsu ca uṭṭhitāsu dhūmandhā sakuṇā aññattha gantuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1504_0: Satthā “evaṃ bhikkhu pubbe tiracchānagatāpi rukkhagge vasantā attano sappāyāsappāyaṃ jānanti,
atk-s0513a1:1504_1: tvaṃ kasmā na aññāsī”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi.
atk-s0513a1:1508_0: Ye vuḍḍhamapacāyantīti idaṃ satthā sāvatthiṃ gacchanto sāriputtattherassa senāsanapaṭibāhanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1508_1: Anāthapiṇḍikena hi vihāraṃ kāretvā dūte pesite satthā rājagahā nikkhamma vesāliṃ patvā tattha yathābhirantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1508_3: Tena ca samayena chabbaggiyānaṃ antevāsikā purato purato gantvā therānaṃ senāsanesu aggahitesveva “idaṃ senāsanaṃ amhākaṃ upajjhāyassa,
atk-s0513a1:1508_6: Pacchā āgatā therā senāsanāni na labhanti.
atk-s0513a1:1508_7: Sāriputtattherassāpi antevāsikā therassa senāsanaṃ pariyesantā na labhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1508_8: Thero senāsanaṃ alabhanto satthu senāsanassa avidūre ekasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisajjāya ca caṅkamena ca rattiṃ vītināmesi.
atk-s0513a1:1508_16: Satthā therassa vacanaṃ sutvā “idāni tāva mayi jīvanteyeva bhikkhū aññamaññaṃ agāravā apatissā viharanti,
atk-s0513a1:1508_17: parinibbute kiṃ nu kho karissantī”ti āvajjentassa dhammasaṃvego udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:1509_0: So pabhātāya rattiyā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū pucchi “saccaṃ kira,
atk-s0513a1:1509_2: chabbaggiyā bhikkhū purato purato gantvā therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ senāsanaṃ paṭibāhantī”ti. “Saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1509_4: Tato chabbaggiye garahitvā dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi “ko nu kho,
atk-s0513a1:1509_19: Evaṃ tehi bhikkhūhi attano attano rucivasena aggāsanādirahānaṃ kathitakāle satthā āha – “na,
atk-s0513a1:1509_21: mayhaṃ sāsane aggāsanādīni patvā khattiyakulā pabbajito pamāṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1509_30: imasmiṃ sāsane yathāvuḍḍhaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1509_36: sāriputto mayhaṃ aggasāvako anudhammacakkappavattako mamānantaraṃ senāsanaṃ laddhuṃ arahati,
atk-s0513a1:1509_37: so imaṃ rattiṃ senāsanaṃ alabhanto rukkhamūle vītināmesi,
atk-s0513a1:1509_39: gacchante gacchante kāle kinti katvā viharissathā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1509_43: yaṃ mayaṃ aññamaññaṃ agāravā apatissā asabhāgavuttino vihareyyāma,
atk-s0513a1:1509_44: amhesu mahallakataraṃ jānitvā tassa abhivādanādīni karissāmā’ti sādhukaṃ vīmaṃsitvā ‘ayaṃ no mahallako’ti
atk-s0513a1:1509_45: ñatvā tassa abhivādanādīni katvā devapathaṃ pūrayamānā gatā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1510_0: Atīte himavantappadese ekaṃ mahānigrodhaṃ upanissāya tayo sahāyā vihariṃsu – tittiro, makkaṭo, hatthīti.
atk-s0513a1:1510_1: Te aññamaññaṃ agāravā apatissā asabhāgavuttino ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1510_2: Atha nesaṃ etadahosi “na yuttaṃ amhākaṃ evaṃ viharituṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1510_5: “Ko pana no mahallakataro”ti cintentā ekadivasaṃ “attheso upāyo”ti tayopi janā nigrodhamūle nisīditvā
atk-s0513a1:1510_6: tittiro ca makkaṭo ca hatthiṃ pucchiṃsu “samma hatthi,
atk-s0513a1:1510_7: tvaṃ imaṃ nigrodharukkhaṃ kīvappamāṇakālato paṭṭhāya jānāsī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1510_9: ahaṃ taruṇapotakakāle imaṃ nigrodhagacchaṃ antarasatthīsu katvā gacchāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1510_10: avattharitvā ṭhitakāle ca pana me etassa aggasākhā nābhiṃ ghaṭṭeti,
atk-s0513a1:1510_11: evāhaṃ imaṃ gacchakālato paṭṭhāya jānāmī”ti puna ubhopi janā purimanayeneva makkaṭaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1510_12: So āha “ahaṃ sammā makkaṭacchāpako samāno bhūmiyaṃ nisīditvā gīvaṃ anukkhipitvāva imassa nigrodhapotakassa aggaṅkure khādāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1510_14: Atha itare ubhopi purimanayeneva tittiraṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1510_16: pubbe asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne mahānigrodharukkho ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:1510_17: ahaṃ tassa phalāni khāditvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne vaccaṃ pātesiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1511_0: Evaṃ vutte makkaṭo ca hatthī ca tittirapaṇḍitaṃ āhaṃsu “samma,
atk-s0513a1:1511_2: ito paṭṭhāya mayaṃ tava sakkāragarukāramānanavandanapūjanāni ceva abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānaañjalikammasāmīcikammāni ca karissāma,
atk-s0513a1:1511_4: tvaṃ pana ito paṭṭhāya amhākaṃ ovādānusāsaniṃ dadeyyāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1511_5: Tato paṭṭhāya tittiro tesaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1511_8: Te tayopi janā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāya aññamaññaṃ sagāravā sappatissā sabhāgavuttino hutvā jīvitapariyosāne devalokaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1511_9: Tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ samādānaṃ tittiriyaṃ brahmacariyaṃ nāma ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1512_3: tumhe evaṃ svākhāte dhammavinaye pabbajitvā kasmā aññamaññaṃ agāravā apatissā viharatha.
atk-s0513a1:1512_6: ito paṭṭhāya tumhākaṃ yathāvuḍḍhaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1512_8: na ito paṭṭhāya ca navakatarena vuḍḍhataro senāsanena paṭibāhitabbo,
atk-s0513a1:1512_10: āpattidukkaṭassāti evaṃ satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1515_0: Diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṃsā, samparāye ca suggatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1516_6: Tesu guṇasampanno vayovuḍḍho imasmiṃ ṭhāne “vuḍḍho”ti adhippeto.
atk-s0513a1:1516_11: Samparāye ca suggatīti samparetabbe imaṃ lokaṃ hitvā gantabbe paralokepi tesaṃ sugatiyeva hotīti.
atk-s0513a1:1516_14: khattiyā vā hontu brāhmaṇā vā vessā vā suddā vā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā tiracchānagatā vā,
atk-s0513a1:1516_15: ye keci sattā jeṭṭhāpacitikamme chekā kusalā guṇasampannānaṃ vayovuḍḍhānaṃ apacitiṃ karonti,
atk-s0513a1:1516_16: te imasmiñca attabhāve jeṭṭhāpacitikārakāti pasaṃsaṃ vaṇṇanaṃ thomanaṃ labhanti,
atk-s0513a1:1517_0: Evaṃ satthā jeṭṭhāpacitikammassa guṇaṃ kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1521_0: Nāccantaṃ nikatippaññoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto cīvaravaḍḍhakaṃ bhikkhu ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1521_1: Eko kira jetavanavāsiko bhikkhu yaṃkiñci cīvare kattabbaṃ chedanaghaṭṭanavicāraṇasibbanādikaṃ kammaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1521_6: Jiṇṇapilotikāsu hatthakammaṃ dassetvā suphassikaṃ manāpaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā rajanapariyosāne piṭṭhodakena
atk-s0513a1:1521_7: rajitvā saṅkhena ghaṃsitvā ujjalaṃ manuññaṃ katvā nikkhipati.
atk-s0513a1:1521_8: Cīvarakammaṃ kātuṃ ajānantā bhikkhū ahate sāṭake gahetvā tassa santikaṃ āgantvā “mayaṃ cīvaraṃ kātuṃ na jānāma,
atk-s0513a1:1521_12: ime sāṭake ṭhapetvā taṃ gaṇhitvā gacchathā”ti nīharitvā dasseti.
atk-s0513a1:1521_13: Te tassa vaṇṇasampattimeva disvā antaraṃ ajānantā “thira”nti saññāya ahatasāṭake cīvaravaḍḍhakassa datvā taṃ gaṇhitvā gacchanti.
atk-s0513a1:1521_14: Taṃ tehi thokaṃ kiliṭṭhakāle uṇhodakena dhoviyamānaṃ attano pakatiṃ dasseti,
atk-s0513a1:1521_17: Evaṃ āgatāgate pilotikāhi vañcento so bhikkhu sabbattha pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:1522_1: tathā aññatarasmiṃ gāmakepi eko cīvaravaḍḍhako lokaṃ vañceti.
atk-s0513a1:1522_3: jetavane kira eko cīvaravaḍḍhako evaṃ lokaṃ vañcetī”ti ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1522_5: taṃ nagaravāsikaṃ vañcemī”ti pilotikacīvaraṃ atimanāpaṃ katvā surattaṃ rajitvā taṃ pārupitvā jetavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1522_12: imāhaṃ tuyhaṃ datvā attanā kiṃ pārupissāmī”ti? “Bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1522_16: tayi pana evaṃ vadante kiṃ sakkā kātuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1522_17: gaṇhāhi na”nti tassa pilotikacīvaraṃ datvā ahatasāṭake ādāya taṃ vañcetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:1522_18: Jetavanavāsikopi taṃ cīvaraṃ pārupitvā katipāhaccayena uṇhodakena dhovanto jiṇṇapilotikabhāvaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a1:1522_19: lajjito “gāmavāsicīvaravaḍḍhakena kira jetavanavāsiko vañcito”ti tassa vañcitabhāvo saṅghamajjhe pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:1523_0: Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ taṃ kathaṃ kathentā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1523_9: Na gāmavāsikenāpi idāneva esa jetavanavāsī cīvaravaḍḍhako vañcito,
atk-s0513a1:1524_0: Atīte ekasmiṃ araññāyatane bodhisatto aññataraṃ padumasaraṃ nissāya ṭhite varaṇarukkhe rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:1524_1: Tadā aññatarasmiṃ nātimahante sare nidāghasamaye udakaṃ mandaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:1524_3: Atheko bako te macche disvā “ekena upāyena ime macche vañcetvā khādissāmī”ti gantvā udakapariyante cintento nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:1524_11: idānime macchā kiṃ nāma karissantī’ti tumhākaṃ cintento nisinnomhī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1524_14: ahaṃ vo ekekaṃ mukhatuṇḍakena gahetvā ekaṃ pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchannaṃ mahāsaraṃ netvā vissajjeyya”nti. “Ayya,
atk-s0513a1:1524_15: paṭhamakappikato paṭṭhāya macchānaṃ cintanakabako nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1524_18: “Sace pana sarassa atthibhāvaṃ mayhaṃ na saddahatha,
atk-s0513a1:1524_19: ekaṃ macchaṃ mayā saddhiṃ saraṃ passituṃ pesethā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1524_20: Macchā tassa saddahitvā “ayaṃ jalepi thalepi samattho”ti ekaṃ kāḷamahāmacchaṃ adaṃsu “imaṃ gahetvā gacchathā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1524_21: So taṃ gahetvā netvā sare vissajjetvā sabbaṃ saraṃ dassetvā puna ānetvā tesaṃ macchānaṃ santike vissajjesi.
atk-s0513a1:1524_22: So tesaṃ macchānaṃ sarassa sampattiṃ vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0513a1:1524_23: Te tassa kathaṃ sutvā gantukāmā hutvā “sādhu, ayya,
atk-s0513a1:1525_0: Bako paṭhamaṃ taṃ kāḷamahāmacchameva gahetvā saratīraṃ netvā saraṃ dassetvā saratīre jāte varaṇarukkhe
atk-s0513a1:1525_1: nilīyitvā taṃ viṭapantare pakkhipitvā tuṇḍena vijjhanto jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā maṃsaṃ khāditvā kaṇṭake
atk-s0513a1:1525_4: añño āgacchatū”ti etenupāyena ekekaṃ gahetvā sabbe macche khāditvā puna āgato ekaṃ macchampi nāddasa.
atk-s0513a1:1525_8: mayā sabbete macchā netvā padumasañchanne mahāsare vissajjitā,
atk-s0513a1:1525_16: Kakkaṭako cintesi “imassa macche netvā sare vissajjanaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a1:1526_1: na kho tvaṃ suggahitaṃ gahetuṃ sakkhissasi,
atk-s0513a1:1526_3: sacāhaṃ aḷehi tava gīvaṃ gahetuṃ labhissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1526_4: tava gīvaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā tayā saddhiṃ gamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1526_5: So taṃ “vañcetukāmo esa ma”nti ajānanto “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0513a1:1526_6: Kakkaṭako attano aḷehi kammārasaṇḍāsena viya tassa gīvaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā “idāni gacchā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1526_7: So taṃ netvā saraṃ dassetvā varaṇarukkhābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1526_12: na bhaginiputtosi vata me tva”nti vatvā “tvaṃ ‘esa maṃ ukkhipitvā vicaranto mayhaṃ dāso’ti saññaṃ karosi maññe,
atk-s0513a1:1526_14: yathā me te sabbe macchā khāditā,
atk-s0513a1:1526_16: Kakkaṭako “ete macchā attano bālatāya tayā khāditā,
atk-s0513a1:1526_17: ahaṃ pana te maṃ khādituṃ na dassāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1526_19: Tvañhi bālatāya mayā vañcitabhāvaṃ na jānāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1526_21: ahaṃ te sīsaṃ chinditvā bhūmiyaṃ khipissāmī”ti vatvā kammārasaṇḍāsena viya aḷehi tassa gīvaṃ nippīḷesi.
atk-s0513a1:1526_22: So vivaṭena mukhena akkhīhi assunā paggharantena maraṇabhayatajjito “sāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1526_26: So nivattitvā sarameva otaritvā kakkaṭakaṃ sarapariyante paṅkapiṭṭhe ṭhapesi,
atk-s0513a1:1526_27: kakkaṭako kattarikāya kumudanāḷaṃ kappento viya tassa gīvaṃ kappetvā udakaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1527_0: Taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā varaṇarukkhe adhivatthā devatā sādhukāraṃ dadamānā vanaṃ unnādayamānā madhurassarena imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1531_2: nikatippañño vañcanapañño puggalo tāya nikatyā nikatiyā vañcanāya na accantaṃ sukhamedhati,
atk-s0513a1:1531_6: Nikatippaññoti kerāṭikabhāvaṃ sikkhitapañño pāpapuggalo attanā katassa pāpassa phalaṃ ārādheti paṭilabhati vindatīti attho. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0513a1:1531_9: evaṃ pāpapuggalo attanā katapāpato diṭṭhadhamme vā samparāye vā bhayaṃ ārādheti paṭilabhatīti imamatthaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1531_10: pakāsento mahāsatto vanaṃ unnādento dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a1:1532_3: atītepi vañcitoyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1536_0: Maññe sovaṇṇayo rāsīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāriputtattherassa saddhivihārikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1536_1: So kira bhikkhu subbaco ahosi vacanakkhamo,
atk-s0513a1:1536_3: Athekaṃ samayaṃ thero satthāraṃ āpucchitvā cārikaṃ caranto dakkhiṇāgirijanapadaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1536_4: So bhikkhu tattha gatakāle mānatthaddho hutvā therassa vacanaṃ na karoti “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:1536_5: idaṃ nāma karohī”ti vutte pana therassa paṭipakkho hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1536_7: So tattha cārikaṃ caritvā puna jetavanaṃ āgato.
atk-s0513a1:1536_8: So bhikkhu therassa jetavanavihāraṃ āgatakālato paṭṭhāya puna tādisova jāto.
atk-s0513a1:1536_10: mayhaṃ eko saddhivihāriko ekasmiṃ ṭhāne satena kītadāso viya hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1536_11: ekasmiṃ ṭhāne mānatthaddho hutvā ‘idaṃ nāma karohī’ti vutte paṭipakkho hotī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1536_15: pubbepesa ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ gato satena kītadāso viya hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1536_16: Ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ gato paṭipakkho paṭisattu hotī”ti vatvā therena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1537_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ kuṭumbiyakule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:1537_4: So cintesi “ayaṃ itthī taruṇattā mamaccayena kañcideva purisaṃ gahetvā imaṃ dhanaṃ vināseyya,
atk-s0513a1:1537_6: yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ dhanaṃ pathavigataṃ kareyya”nti ghare nandaṃ nāma dāsaṃ gahetvā araññaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1537_7: ṭhāne taṃ dhanaṃ nidahitvā tassa ācikkhitvā “tāta, nanda,
atk-s0513a1:1537_8: imaṃ dhanaṃ mamaccayena mayhaṃ puttassa ācikkheyyāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1537_9: mā ca naṃ pariccajasī”ti ovaditvā kālamakāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1538_2: tava pitā nandaṃ dāsaṃ gahetvā dhanaṃ nidhesi,
atk-s0513a1:1538_5: atthi kiñci mayhaṃ pitarā dhanaṃ nidahita”nti. “Āma, sāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1538_7: “Tena hi gacchāmā”ti kuddālapiṭakaṃ ādāya nidhiṭṭhānaṃ gantvā “kahaṃ mātula,
atk-s0513a1:1538_9: Nando āruyha dhanamatthake ṭhatvā dhanaṃ nissāya mānaṃ uppādetvā “are dāsiputta ceṭaka,
atk-s0513a1:1538_10: kuto te imasmiṃ ṭhāne dhana”nti kumāraṃ akkosati.
atk-s0513a1:1538_11: Kumāro tassa pharusavacanaṃ sutvā asuṇanto viya “tena hi gacchāmā”ti taṃ gahetvā paṭinivattitvā puna dve tayo divase atikkamitvā agamāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1538_13: Kumāro tena saddhiṃ pharusavacanaṃ avatvāva nivattitvā “ayaṃ dāso ito paṭṭhāya ‘dhanaṃ ācikkhissāmī’ti gacchati,
atk-s0513a1:1538_16: atthi kho pana me pitu sahāyo kuṭumbiko,
atk-s0513a1:1538_17: taṃ paṭipucchitvā jānissāmī”ti bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā “kiṃ nu kho, tāta,
atk-s0513a1:1539_5: kiṃ akkosasī’ti ākaḍḍhitvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ bhinditvā kulasantakaṃ dhanaṃ nīharitvā dāsaṃ ukkhipāpetvā dhanaṃ āharā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1542_0: Yattha dāso āmajāto, ṭhito thullāni gajjatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1543_6: Sovaṇṇamālā cāti tuyhaṃ pitusantakā suvaṇṇamālā ca etthevāti maññāmi.
atk-s0513a1:1543_7: Nandako yattha dāsoti yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhito nandako dāso.
atk-s0513a1:1543_9: ahaṃ vo dāsī”ti evaṃ dāsabyaṃ upagatāya āmadāsisaṅkhātāya dāsiyā putto.
atk-s0513a1:1543_10: Ṭhito thullāni gajjatīti “so yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhito thullāni pharusavacanāni vadati,
atk-s0513a1:1543_12: evaṃ ahaṃ taṃ maññāmī”ti bodhisatto kumārassa dhanaggahaṇūpāyaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0513a1:1544_0: Kumāro bodhisattaṃ vanditvā gharaṃ gantvā nandaṃ ādāya nidhiṭṭhānaṃ gantvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjitvā
atk-s0513a1:1544_1: taṃ dhanaṃ āharitvā kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapetvā bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhito dānādīni puññāni katvā jīvitapariyosāne
atk-s0513a1:1545_0: Satthā “pubbepesa evaṃsīloyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1549_0: Kāmaṃ patāmi nirayanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anāthapiṇḍikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1549_1: Anāthapiṇḍiko hi vihārameva ārabbha catupaññāsakoṭidhanaṃ buddhasāsane pariccajitvā vikiritvā ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a1:1549_2: tīṇi ratanāni aññattha ratanasaññameva anuppādetvā satthari jetavane viharante devasikaṃ tīṇi mahāupaṭṭhānāni gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:1549_7: Gacchanto ca “kiṃ nu kho ādāya āgatoti sāmaṇerā vā daharā vā hatthampi me olokeyyu”nti tucchahattho nāma na gatapubbo.
atk-s0513a1:1549_11: Evaṃ divase divase pariccajantassa panassa pariccāge pamāṇaṃ natthi.
atk-s0513a1:1550_0: Bahū vohārūpajīvinopissa hatthato paṇṇe āropetvā aṭṭhārasakoṭisaṅkhyaṃ dhanaṃ iṇaṃ gaṇhiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1550_2: Aññā panassa kulasantakā aṭṭhārasa koṭiyo nadītīre nidahitvā ṭhapitā aciravatodakena nadīkūle bhinne mahāsamuddaṃ paviṭṭhā,
atk-s0513a1:1550_3: tā yathāpihitalañchi tāva lohacāṭiyo aṇḍavakucchiyaṃ pavaṭṭantā vicaranti.
atk-s0513a1:1550_4: Gehe panassa pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ niccabhattaṃ nibaddhameva hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1550_5: Seṭṭhino hi gehaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa catumahāpathe khatapokkharaṇisadisaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1550_9: Sesabhikkhūnaṃ pana gacchantānañca āgacchantānañca pamāṇaṃ natthi.
atk-s0513a1:1550_11: tassa catutthe dvārakoṭṭhake ekā micchādiṭṭhikā devatā vasati,
atk-s0513a1:1550_12: sā sammāsambuddhe gehaṃ pavisante attano vimāne ṭhātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a1:1550_14: Asītimahātheresupi avasesattheresupi pavisantesu ca nikkhamantesu ca tatheva karoti.
atk-s0513a1:1550_15: Sā cintesi “samaṇe gotame ca sāvakesu cassa imaṃ gehaṃ pavisantesu mayhaṃ sukhaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1550_16: niccakālaṃ otaritvā otaritvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhātuṃ na sakkhissāmi.
atk-s0513a1:1550_17: Yathā ime etaṃ gharaṃ na pavisanti,
atk-s0513a1:1550_19: Athekadivasaṃ sayanūpagatasseva mahākammantikassa santikaṃ gantvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1550_20: “Ko etthā”ti ca vutte “ahaṃ catutthadvārakoṭṭhake nibbattadevatā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1550_23: attano pacchimakālaṃ anoloketvā dhanaṃ nīharitvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃyeva pūjeti,
atk-s0513a1:1550_28: Yathā ca samaṇo gotamo sasāvako imaṃ gharaṃ na pavisati,
atk-s0513a1:1550_31: seṭṭhi dhanaṃ vissajjento niyyānike buddhasāsane vissajjeti,
atk-s0513a1:1550_32: so sace maṃ cūḷāyaṃ gahetvā vikkiṇissati,
atk-s0513a1:1550_35: Sā punekadivasaṃ seṭṭhino jeṭṭhaputtaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tatheva ovadi,
atk-s0513a1:1550_37: Seṭṭhinā pana saddhiṃ kathetuṃyeva na sakkoti.
atk-s0513a1:1551_0: Seṭṭhinopi nirantaraṃ dānaṃ dentassa vohāre akarontassa āye mandībhūte dhanaṃ parikkhayaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1551_1: Athassa anukkamena dāliddiyappattassa paribhogasāṭakasayanabhojanānipi purāṇasadisāni na bhaviṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1551_3: paṇītaṃ pana katvā dātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0513a1:1551_4: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ vanditvā nisinnaṃ satthā “dīyati pana te, gahapati,
atk-s0513a1:1551_10: Cittasmiñhi paṇīte buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ dinnadānaṃ lūkhaṃ nāma na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0513a1:1551_12: Cittañhi paṇītaṃ kātuṃ sakkontassa dānaṃ lūkhaṃ nāma natthīti cetaṃ evaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:1553_0: Tathāgate vā sambuddhe, atha vā tassa sāvake. ;
atk-s0513a1:1555_0: Sukkhāya aloṇikāya ca, passa phalaṃ kummāsapiṇḍiyā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1556_1: tvaṃ tāva lūkhaṃ dānaṃ dadamāno aṭṭhannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ desi,
atk-s0513a1:1556_2: ahaṃ velāmakāle sakalajambudīpaṃ unnaṅgalaṃ katvā satta ratanāni dadamāno pañca mahānadiyo ekoghapuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1556_3: katvā viya ca mahādānaṃ pavattayamāno tisaraṇagataṃ vā pañcasīlarakkhanakaṃ vā kañci nālatthaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1556_5: Tasmā ‘lūkhaṃ me dāna’nti mā cittaṃ saṅkocayitthā”ti evañca pana vatvā velāmasuttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1557_0: Atha kho sā devatā issarakāle seṭṭhinā saddhiṃ kathetumpi asakkontī “idānāyaṃ duggatattā mama vacanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1557_1: gaṇhissatī”ti maññamānā aḍḍharattasamaye sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā ākāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1557_10: samaṇassa te gotamassa sāsane bahuṃ dhanaṃ vippakiṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1557_11: so tvaṃ ativelaṃ dhanavissajjanena vā vaṇijjādikammānaṃ akaraṇena vā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ nissāya duggato jāto,
atk-s0513a1:1557_17: ito paṭṭhāya pana sayañca samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ mā gamittha,
atk-s0513a1:1557_18: sāvakānañcassa imaṃ gharaṃ pavisituṃ mā adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1557_19: samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ nivattitvāpi anolokento attano vohāre ca vaṇijjañca katvā kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapehī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1557_20: Atha naṃ so evamāha “ayaṃ tayā mayhaṃ dātabbaovādo”ti. “Āma, ayyā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1557_21: Tādisānaṃ devatānaṃ satenapi sahassenapi satasahassenapi akampanīyo ahaṃ dasabalena kato.
atk-s0513a1:1557_22: Mama hi saddhā sineru viya acalā suppatiṭṭhitā,
atk-s0513a1:1557_26: evarūpāya anācārāya dussīlāya kāḷakaṇṇiyā saddhiṃ tayā mama ekagehe vasanakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1557_27: sīghaṃ mama gehā nikkhamitvā aññattha gacchāti.
atk-s0513a1:1558_0: Sā sotāpannassa ariyasāvakassa vacanaṃ sutvā ṭhātuṃ asakkontī attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā dārake hatthena gahetvā nikkhami.
atk-s0513a1:1558_1: Nikkhamitvā ca pana aññattha vasanaṭṭhānaṃ alabhamānā “seṭṭhiṃ khamāpetvā tattheva vasissāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0513a1:1558_2: nagarapariggāhakadevaputtassa santikaṃ gantvā taṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1558_4: attano bālatāya anupadhāretvā anāthapiṇḍikena seṭṭhinā saddhiṃ kathesiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1558_6: maṃ seṭṭhissa santikaṃ netvā khamāpetvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ me dethā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1558_7: “Kiṃ pana tayā seṭṭhi vutto”ti “ito paṭṭhāya buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ saṅghupaṭṭhānaṃ mā kari,
atk-s0513a1:1558_8: samaṇassa gotamassa gharappavesanaṃ mā adāsī”ti “evaṃ me vutto, sāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1558_11: “ahaṃ taṃ ādāya seṭṭhino santikaṃ gantuṃ na ussahāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1558_12: Sā tassa santikā saṅgahaṃ alabhitvā catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1559_0: Tehipi tatheva paṭikkhittā sakkaṃ devarājaṃ upasaṅkamitvā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā “ahaṃ, deva,
atk-s0513a1:1559_1: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ alabhamānā dārake hatthena gahetvā anāthā vicarāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1559_2: tumhākaṃ siriyā mayhaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ dāpethā”ti suṭṭhutaraṃ yāci.
atk-s0513a1:1559_5: ahampi taṃ nissāya seṭṭhinā saddhiṃ kathetuṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0513a1:1559_6: ekaṃ pana te seṭṭhissa khamanūpāyaṃ kathessāmī”ti. “Sādhu, deva,
atk-s0513a1:1559_8: Mahāseṭṭhissa hatthato manussehi paṇṇe āropetvā aṭṭhārasakoṭisaṅkhyaṃ dhanaṃ gahitaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1559_9: tvaṃ tassa āyuttakavesaṃ gahetvā kañci ajānāpetvā tāni paṇṇāni ādāya katipayehi yakkhataruṇehi parivāritā ekena hatthena paṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1559_10: ekena lekhaniṃ gahetvā tesaṃ gehaṃ gantvā gehamajjhe ṭhitā attano yakkhānubhāvena te uttāsetvā “idaṃ tumhākaṃ iṇapaṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1559_11: amhākaṃ seṭṭhi attano issarakāle tumhe na kiñci āha,
atk-s0513a1:1559_13: tumhehi gahitakahāpaṇāni dethā”ti attano yakkhānubhāvaṃ dassetvā sabbāpi tā aṭṭhārasa hiraññakoṭiyo sādhetvā
atk-s0513a1:1559_14: seṭṭhissa tucchakoṭṭhake pūretvā aññaṃ aciravatinadītīre nidahitaṃ dhanaṃ nadīkūle bhinne samuddaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1559_15: tampi attano ānubhāvena āharitvā tucchakoṭṭhake pūretvā,
atk-s0513a1:1559_16: aññampi asukaṭṭhāne nāma assāmikaṃ aṭṭhārasakoṭimattameva dhanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1559_18: imāhi catupaññāsakoṭīhi imaṃ tucchakoṭṭhakapūrakaṃ daṇḍakammaṃ katvā mahāseṭṭhiṃ khamāpehīti.
atk-s0513a1:1560_1: devā”ti tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā vuttanayeneva sabbaṃ dhanaṃ āharitvā koṭṭhake pūretvā aḍḍharattasamaye
atk-s0513a1:1560_2: seṭṭhissa sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā ākāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1560_3: “Ko eso”ti vutte “ahaṃ te mahāseṭṭhi catutthadvārakoṭṭhake adhivatthā andhabāladevatā,
atk-s0513a1:1560_4: mayā mahāmohamūḷhāya buddhaguṇe ajānitvā purimesu divasesu tumhehi saddhiṃ kiñci kathitaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1560_6: Sakkassa hi me devarājassa vacanena tumhākaṃ iṇaṃ sodhetvā aṭṭhārasa koṭiyo,
atk-s0513a1:1560_8: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne assāmikadhanassa aṭṭhārasa koṭiyoti catupaṇṇāsa koṭiyo āharitvā tucchakoṭṭhakapūraṇena daṇḍakammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1560_9: jetavanavihāraṃ ārabbha parikkhayaṃ gatadhanaṃ sabbaṃ sampiṇḍitaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1560_11: mayā aññāṇatāya kathitaṃ manasi akatvā khamatha mahāseṭṭhī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1561_0: Anāthapiṇḍiko tassā vacanaṃ sutvā cintesi “ayaṃ devatā ‘daṇḍakammañca me kata’nti vadati,
atk-s0513a1:1561_2: satthā imaṃ vinetvā attano guṇe jānāpessati,
atk-s0513a1:1561_9: So “sādhū”ti vatvā vibhātāya rattiyā pātova taṃ gahetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā tāya katakammaṃ sabbaṃ tathāgatassa ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:1561_18: tadā bhadrameva passatī”ti vatvā imā dhammapade dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a1:1562_0: “Pāpopi passatī bhadraṃ, yāva pāpaṃ na paccati;
atk-s0513a1:1563_0: Yadā ca paccatī pāpaṃ, atha pāpo pāpāni passati.
atk-s0513a1:1564_0: “Bhadropi passatī pāpaṃ, yāva bhadraṃ na paccati;
atk-s0513a1:1565_0: Yadā ca paccatī bhadraṃ, atha bhadro bhadrāni passatī”ti. ;
atk-s0513a1:1566_0: Imāsañca pana gāthānaṃ pariyosāne sā devatā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1566_1: Sā cakkaṅkitesu satthu pādesu nipatitvā “mayā, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1566_2: rāgarattāya dosapaduṭṭhāya mohamūḷhāya avijjandhāya tumhākaṃ guṇe ajānantiyā pāpakaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1566_3: taṃ me khamathā”ti satthāraṃ khamāpetvā mahāseṭṭhimpi khamāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1567_0: Tasmiṃ samaye anāthapiṇḍiko satthu purato attano guṇaṃ kathesi “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1567_1: ayaṃ devatā ‘buddhupaṭṭhānādīni mā karohī’ti vārayamānāpi maṃ vāretuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0513a1:1567_2: ‘dānaṃ na dātabba’nti imāya vāriyamānopahaṃ dānaṃ adāsimeva, nūna esa, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1567_4: Satthā “tvaṃ khosi gahapati sotāpanno ariyasāvako acalasaddho visuddhadassano,
atk-s0513a1:1567_5: tuyhaṃ imāya appesakkhadevatāya vārentiyā avāritabhāvo na acchariyo.
atk-s0513a1:1567_6: Yaṃ pana pubbe paṇḍitā anuppanne buddhe aparipakkañāṇe ṭhitā kāmāvacarissarena mārena ākāse ṭhatvā ‘sace dānaṃ dassasi,
atk-s0513a1:1567_7: imasmiṃ niraye paccissasī’ti asītihatthagambhīraṃ aṅgārakāsuṃ dassetvā ‘mā dānaṃ adāsī’ti vāritāpi padumakaṇṇikāmajjhe ṭhatvā dānaṃ adaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1567_8: idaṃ acchariya”nti vatvā anāthapiṇḍikena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1568_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto bārāṇasiseṭṭhissa kule nibbattitvā nānappakārehi
atk-s0513a1:1568_1: sukhūpakaraṇehi devakumāro viya saṃvaḍḍhiyamāno anukkamena viññutaṃ patvā soḷasavassakāleyeva sabbasippesu
atk-s0513a1:1568_3: So pitu accayena seṭṭhiṭṭhāne ṭhatvā catūsu nagaradvāresu catasso dānasālāyo,
atk-s0513a1:1568_5: attano nivesanadvāre ekanti cha dānasālāyo kāretvā mahādānaṃ deti,
atk-s0513a1:1569_0: Athekadivasaṃ pātarāsavelāya bodhisattassa nānaggarase manuññabhojane upanīyamāne eko paccekabuddho sattāhaccayena
atk-s0513a1:1569_1: nirodhā vuṭṭhāya bhikkhācāravelaṃ sallakkhetvā “ajja mayā bārāṇasiseṭṭhissa gehadvāraṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1569_2: nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā anotattadahe mukhadhovanaṃ katvā manosilātale ṭhito nivāsetvā vijjulatāsadisaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1569_3: kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā iddhimayamattikāpattaṃ ādāya ākāsenāgantvā bodhisattassa bhatte
atk-s0513a1:1569_5: Bodhisatto taṃ disvāva āsanā vuṭṭhāya nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā parikammakārakaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0513a1:1569_7: sāmī”ti ca vutte “ayyassa pattaṃ āharathā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1569_8: Taṅkhaṇaññeva māro pāpimā vikampamāno uṭṭhāya “ayaṃ paccekabuddho ito sattame divase āhāraṃ labhi,
atk-s0513a1:1569_11: seṭṭhino ca dānantarāyaṃ karissāmī”ti taṅkhaṇaññeva āgantvā antaravatthumhi asītihatthamattaṃ aṅgārakāsuṃ nimmini.
atk-s0513a1:1569_12: Sā khadiraṅgārapuṇṇā sampajjalitā sajotibhūtā avīcimahānirayo viya khāyittha.
atk-s0513a1:1569_13: Taṃ pana māpetvā sayaṃ ākāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1569_14: Pattāharaṇatthāya gacchamāno puriso taṃ disvā mahābhayappatto nivatti.
atk-s0513a1:1569_17: Ayaṃ sāmi antaravatthumhi mahatī aṅgārakāsu sampajjalitā sajotibhūtāti.
atk-s0513a1:1569_18: Athañño athaññoti evaṃ āgatāgatā sabbepi bhayappattā vegena palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1570_0: Bodhisatto cintesi “ajja mayhaṃ dānantarāyaṃ kātukāmo vasavattī māro uyyutto bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:1570_1: na kho pana jānāti mārasatena mārasahassenapi mayhaṃ akampiyabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1570_2: ajja dāni mayhaṃ vā mārassa vā balamahantataṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1570_3: ānubhāvamahantataṃ jānissāmī”ti taṃ yathāsajjitameva bhattapātiṃ sayaṃ ādāya gehā nikkhamma aṅgārakāsutaṭe
atk-s0513a1:1570_4: ṭhatvā ākāsaṃ ulloketvā māraṃ disvā “kosi tva”nti āha. “Ahaṃ, māro”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1570_7: “Tava dānassa antarāyakaraṇatthāya ca paccekabuddhassa ca jīvitanāsanatthāyā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1570_8: Bodhisatto “neva te ahaṃ attano dānassa antarāyaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1570_10: ajja dāni mayhaṃ vā tuyhaṃ vā balamahantataṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1570_12: paccekabuddha ahaṃ imissā aṅgārakāsuyā adhosīso patamānopi na nivattissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1570_13: kevalaṃ tumhe mayā dinnaṃ bhojanaṃ paṭiggaṇhathā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1574_1: paccekavarabuddha sacepahaṃ tumhākaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dento ekaṃseneva imaṃ nirayaṃ uddhaṃpādo avaṃsiro hutvā patāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1574_2: tathāpi yadidaṃ adānañca asīlañca ariyehi akattabbattā anariyehi ca kattabbattā “anariya”nti vuccati,
atk-s0513a1:1574_4: handa imaṃ mayā dīyamānaṃ piṇḍaṃ paṭiggaha paṭiggaṇhāhī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1575_0: Evaṃ vatvā bodhisatto daḷhasamādānena bhattapātiṃ gahetvā aṅgārakāsumatthakena pakkhanto,
atk-s0513a1:1575_1: tāvadeva asītihatthagambhīrāya aṅgārakāsuyā talato uparūparijātaṃ satapattapupphitaṃ ekaṃ mahāpadumaṃ uggantvā bodhisattassa pāde sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0513a1:1575_2: Tato mahātumbamattā reṇu uggantvā mahāsattassa muddhani ṭhatvā sakalasarīraṃ suvaṇṇacuṇṇasamokiṇṇamiva akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1575_3: So padumakaṇṇikāya ṭhatvā nānaggarasabhojanaṃ paccekabuddhassa patte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1575_4: So taṃ paṭiggahetvā anumodanaṃ katvā pattaṃ ākāse khipitvā passantasseva mahājanassa sayampi vehāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1575_5: abbhuggantvā nānappakāraṃ valāhakapantiṃ maddamāno viya himavantameva gato.
atk-s0513a1:1575_6: Māropi parājito domanassaṃ patvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0513a1:1575_7: Bodhisatto pana padumakaṇṇikāya ṭhitakova mahājanassa dānasīlasaṃvaṇṇanena dhammaṃ desetvā mahājanena
atk-s0513a1:1575_8: parivuto attano nivesanameva pavisitvā yāvajīvaṃ dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1576_2: yaṃ tvaṃ evaṃ dassanasampanno etarahi devatāya na kampito,
atk-s0513a1:1576_3: pubbe paṇḍitehi katameva acchariya”nti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā paccekabuddho tattheva parinibbāyi,
atk-s0513a1:1576_4: māraṃ parājetvā padumakaṇṇikāya ṭhatvā paccekabuddhassa piṇḍapātadāyako bārāṇasiseṭṭhi pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1585_0: Yo atthakāmassāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto losakatissattheraṃ nāma ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1585_2: Kosalaraṭṭhe eko attano kulanāsako kevaṭṭaputtako alābhī bhikkhu.
atk-s0513a1:1585_3: So kira nibbattaṭṭhānetā cavitvā kosalaraṭṭhe ekasmiṃ kulasahassavāse kevaṭṭagāme ekissā kevaṭṭiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:1585_4: Tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇadivase taṃ kulasahassaṃ jālahatthaṃ nadiyañca taḷākādīsu ca macche pariyesantaṃ ekaṃ khuddakamacchampi nālattha.
atk-s0513a1:1585_5: Tato paṭṭhāya ca te kevaṭṭā parihāyantiyeva.
atk-s0513a1:1585_6: Tasmiñhi kucchigateyeva nesaṃ gāmo satta vāre agginā daḍḍho,
atk-s0513a1:1585_12: dve bhāgā homā”ti pañca pañca kulasatāni ekato ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1585_17: tampi dvidhāti evaṃ yāva tameva kulaṃ ekaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:1585_18: tāva vibhajitvā tesaṃ kāḷakaṇṇibhāvaṃ ñatvā pothetvā nikkaḍḍhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1586_0: Athassa mātā kicchena jīvamānā paripakke gabbhe ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vijāyi.
atk-s0513a1:1586_2: antoghaṭe padīpo viya tassa hadaye arahattassa upanissayo jalati.
atk-s0513a1:1586_3: Sā taṃ dārakaṃ paṭijaggitvā ādhāvitvā paridhāvitvā vicaraṇakāle ekamassa kapālakaṃ hatthe datvā “putta,
atk-s0513a1:1586_5: So tato paṭṭhāya ekakova hutvā tattha tattha bhikkhaṃ pariyesitvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne sayati,
atk-s0513a1:1586_9: So anukkamena sattavassiko hutvā ekasmiṃ gehadvāre ukkhalidhovanassa chaḍḍitaṭṭhāne kāko viya ekekaṃ bhattasitthaṃ uccinitvā khādati.
atk-s0513a1:1587_0: Atha naṃ dhammasenāpati sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caramāno disvā “ayaṃ satto atikāruññappatto,
atk-s0513a1:1587_1: kataragāmavāsiko nu kho”ti tasmiṃ mettacittaṃ vaḍḍhetvā “ehi,
atk-s0513a1:1587_5: kahaṃ vā te mātāpitaro”ti pucchi. “Ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1587_7: mayhaṃ mātāpitaro maṃ nissāya ‘kilantamhā’ti maṃ chaḍḍetvā palātā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1587_13: Thero tassa khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ datvā taṃ vihāraṃ netvā sahattheneva nhāpetvā pabbājetvā paripuṇṇavassaṃ upasampādesi.
atk-s0513a1:1587_15: Tena kira asadisadānepi kucchipūro na laddhapubbo,
atk-s0513a1:1587_17: Tassa hi patte ekasmiṃyeva yāguuḷuṅke dinne patto samatittiko viya hutvā paññāyati.
atk-s0513a1:1587_18: Atha manussā “imassa patto pūro”ti heṭṭhā yāguṃ denti.
atk-s0513a1:1587_19: Tassa patte yāguṃ dānakāle manussānaṃ bhājane yāgu antaradhāyatītipi vadanti.
atk-s0513a1:1588_0: So aparena samayena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhitopi appalābhova ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1588_1: Athassa anupubbena āyusaṅkhāresu parihīnesu parinibbānadivaso sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:1588_2: Dhammasenāpati āvajjento tassa parinibbānabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ losakatissatthero ajja parinibbāyissati,
atk-s0513a1:1588_3: ajja mayā etassa yāvadatthaṃ āhāraṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti taṃ ādāya sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1588_4: Thero taṃ nissāya tāva bahumanussāya sāvatthiyā hatthaṃ pasāretvā vandanamattampi nālattha.
atk-s0513a1:1588_10: Taṃ gahetvā gatā losakatissattheraṃ asaritvā sayameva bhuñjiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1588_11: Atha therassa uṭṭhāya vihāraṃ gamanakāle losakatissatthero āgantvā theraṃ vandi,
atk-s0513a1:1588_18: idheva nisīdā”ti losakattheraṃ āsanasālāyaṃ nisīdāpetvā kosalarañño nivesanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1588_19: Rājā therassa pattaṃ gāhāpetvā “bhattassa akālo”ti pattapūraṃ catumadhuraṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1588_21: tissa imaṃ catumadhuraṃ bhuñjā”ti vatvā pattaṃ gahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1588_22: So there gāravena lajjanto na paribhuñjati.
atk-s0513a1:1588_28: Athāyasmā losakatissatthero aggasāvake dhammasenāpatimhi pattaṃ gahetvā ṭhite catumadhuraṃ paribhuñji.
atk-s0513a1:1588_29: Taṃ therassa ariyiddhibalena parikkhayaṃ na agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1588_30: Tadā losakatissatthero yāvadatthaṃ udarapūraṃ katvā paribhuñji,
atk-s0513a1:1588_31: taṃ divasaṃyeva ca anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0513a1:1589_2: evarūpena nāma appapuññena appalābhinā kathaṃ ariyadhammo laddho”ti kathentā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1589_9: eso bhikkhu attano alābhibhāvañca ariyadhammalābhibhāvañca attanāva akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1589_10: Ayañhi pubbe paresaṃ lābhantarāyaṃ katvā appalābhī jāto, “aniccaṃ, dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1589_11: anattā”ti vipassanāya yuttabhāvassa balena ariyadhammalābhī jāto”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1590_0: Atīte kira kassapasammāsambuddhakāle aññataro bhikkhu ekaṃ kuṭumbikaṃ nissāya gāmakāvāse vasati pakatatto sīlavā vipassanāya yuttappayutto.
atk-s0513a1:1590_1: Atheko khīṇāsavatthero samavattavāsaṃ vasamāno anupubbena tassa bhikkhuno upaṭṭhākakuṭumbikassa vasanagāmaṃ sampatto.
atk-s0513a1:1590_2: Kuṭumbiko therassa iriyāpatheyeva pasīditvā pattaṃ ādāya gharaṃ pavesetvā sakkaccaṃ bhojetvā thokaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā theraṃ vanditvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1590_5: Thero vihāraṃ gantvā nevāsikattheraṃ vanditvā āpucchitvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:1590_6: Sopi tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “laddho te, āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:1590_11: Evañca pana vatvā attano senāsanaṃ pucchitvā paṭijaggitvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā jhānasukhena phalasukhena ca vītināmento nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:1591_0: Sopi kuṭumbiko sāyanhe gandhamālañceva padīpeyyañca gāhāpetvā vihāraṃ gantvā nevāsikattheraṃ vanditvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1591_5: So tassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno dhammakathaṃ sutvā sītalavelāya cetiyañca bodhiñca
atk-s0513a1:1591_6: pūjetvā dīpe jāletvā ubhopi jane nimantetvā gato.
atk-s0513a1:1591_9: na maṃ esa kismiñci gaṇayissatī”ti there anattamanataṃ āpajjitvā “imasmiṃ vihāre etassa avasanākāro mayā
atk-s0513a1:1591_10: kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tena upaṭṭhānavelāya āgatena saddhiṃ kiñci na kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1591_11: Khīṇāsavatthero tassa ajjhāsayaṃ jānitvā “ayaṃ thero mama kule vā gaṇe vā apalibuddhabhāvaṃ na jānātī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1591_12: attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā jhānasukhena phalasukhena vītināmesi.
atk-s0513a1:1592_0: Nevāsikopi punadivase nakhapiṭṭhena gaṇḍiṃ paharitvā nakhena dvāraṃ ākoṭetvā kuṭumbikassa gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1592_1: So tassa pattaṃ gahetvā paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā “āgantukatthero kahaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1592_4: gaṇḍiṃ paharantopi dvāraṃ ākoṭentopi pabodhetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1592_5: hiyyo tava gehe paṇītabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā jīrāpetuṃ asakkonto idāni niddaṃ okkantoyeva bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:1592_6: tvaṃ pasīdamāno evarūpesuyeva ṭhānesu pasīdasī”ti āha –
atk-s0513a1:1592_7: “khīṇāsavattheropi attano bhikkhācāravelaṃ sallakkhetvā sarīraṃ paṭijaggitvā pattacīvaramādāya ākāse uppatitvā aññattha agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1592_8: So kuṭumbiko nevāsikattheraṃ sappimadhusakkharābhisaṅkhataṃ pāyāsaṃ pāyetvā pattaṃ gandhacuṇṇehi ubbaṭṭetvā puna pūretvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1592_11: Itaro apaṭikkhipitvāva gahetvā gacchanto “sace so bhikkhu imaṃ pāyāsaṃ pivissati,
atk-s0513a1:1592_13: Sace panāhaṃ imaṃ pāyāsaṃ manussānaṃ dassāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1592_19: Kattha nu kho imaṃ chaḍḍeyya”nti upadhārento ekaṃ jhāmakkhettaṃ disvā aṅgāre viyūhitvā tattha pakkhipitvā
atk-s0513a1:1592_20: upari aṅgārehi paṭicchādetvā vihāraṃ gato taṃ bhikkhuṃ adisvā cintesi “addhā so bhikkhu khīṇāsavo mama
atk-s0513a1:1592_22: aho mayā udarahetu ayuttaṃ kata”nti tāvadevassa mahantaṃ domanassaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:1592_23: Tato paṭṭhāyeva ca manussapeto hutvā na cirasseva kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:1593_0: So bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā pakkāvasesena paṭipāṭiyā pañcajātisatesu yakkho hutvā ekadivasampi udarapūraṃ āhāraṃ na labhi.
atk-s0513a1:1593_4: sesakāle pana tena udarapūro āhāro nāma na laddhapubbo.
atk-s0513a1:1593_5: Sunakhayonito pana cavitvā kāsiraṭṭhe ekasmiṃ gāme duggatakule nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:1593_6: Tassa nibbattito paṭṭhāya taṃ kulaṃ paramaduggatameva jātaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1593_9: Mātāpitaro chātakadukkhaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkontā “gaccha kāḷakaṇṇī”ti taṃ pothetvā nīhariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1593_11: Tadā bodhisatto bārāṇasiyaṃ disāpāmokkho ācariyo hutvā pañca māṇavakasatāni sippaṃ vāceti.
atk-s0513a1:1593_12: Tadā bārāṇasivāsino duggatānaṃ paribbayaṃ datvā sippaṃ sikkhāpenti.
atk-s0513a1:1593_13: Ayampi mittavindako bodhisattassa santike sippaṃ sikkhati.
atk-s0513a1:1593_14: So pharuso anovādakkhamo taṃ taṃ paharanto vicarati,
atk-s0513a1:1594_0: Atha so māṇavakehi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā ovādaṃ aggaṇhanto tato palāyitvā āhiṇḍanto ekaṃ paccantagāmaṃ patvā bhatiṃ katvā jīvati.
atk-s0513a1:1594_1: So tattha ekāya duggatitthiyā saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:1594_2: Sā taṃ nissāya dve dārake vijāyi.
atk-s0513a1:1594_3: Gāmavāsino “amhākaṃ susāsanaṃ dussāsanaṃ āroceyyāsī”ti mittavindakassa bhatiṃ datvā taṃ gāmadvāre kuṭikāya vasāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1594_4: Taṃ pana mittavindakaṃ nissāya te paccantagāmavāsino sattakkhattuṃ rājadaṇḍaṃ agamaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1594_7: Te cintayiṃsu “amhākaṃ pubbe imassa mittavindakassa anāgamanakāle evarūpaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1594_8: idāni panassa āgatakālato paṭṭhāya parihāyāmā”ti taṃ pothetvā nīhariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1595_0: So attano dārake gahetvā aññattha gacchanto ekaṃ amanussapariggahaṃ aṭaviṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1595_1: Tatthassa amanussā dārake ca bhariyañca māretvā maṃsaṃ khādiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1595_2: So tato palāyitvā tato tato āhiṇḍanto ekaṃ gambhīraṃ nāma paṭṭanagāmaṃ nāvāvissajjanadivaseyeva patvā kammakārako hutvā nāvaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0513a1:1595_3: Nāvā samuddapiṭṭhe sattāhaṃ gantvā sattame divase samuddamajjhe ākoṭetvā ṭhapitā viya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1595_6: Manussā tassekaṃ veḷukalāpaṃ datvā hatthe gahetvā samuddapiṭṭhe khipiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1595_8: Mittavindako veḷukalāpe nipajjitvā samuddapiṭṭhe gacchanto kassapasammāsambuddhakāle rakkhitasīlassa
atk-s0513a1:1595_9: phalena samuddapiṭṭhe ekasmiṃ phalikavimāne catasso devadhītaro paṭilabhitvā tāsaṃ santike sukhaṃ anubhavamāno
atk-s0513a1:1595_11: Tā pana vimānapetiyo sattāhaṃ sukhaṃ anubhavanti,
atk-s0513a1:1595_13: Sattāhaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavituṃ gacchamānā “yāva mayaṃ āgacchāma,
atk-s0513a1:1596_0: Mittavindako tāsaṃ gatakāle veḷukalāpe nipajjitvā purato gacchanto rajatavimāne aṭṭha devadhītaro labhi.
atk-s0513a1:1596_3: Tāsampi vacanaṃ akatvā parato gacchanto antaradīpake ekaṃ yakkhanagaraṃ addasa.
atk-s0513a1:1596_5: Mittavindako tassā yakkhinibhāvaṃ ajānanto “ajamaṃsaṃ khādissāmī”ti taṃ pāde aggahesi,
atk-s0513a1:1596_7: So tāya khitto samuddamatthakena gantvā bārāṇasiyaṃ parikhāpiṭṭhe ekasmiṃ kaṇṭakagumbamatthake patitvā pavaṭṭamāno bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1596_8: Tasmiñca samaye tasmiṃ parikhāpiṭṭhe rañño ajikā caramānā corā haranti.
atk-s0513a1:1596_10: Mittavindako pavaṭṭitvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhito tā ajikā disvā cintesi “ahaṃ samudde ekasmiṃ dīpake ajikaṃ pāde gahetvā tāya khitto idha patito.
atk-s0513a1:1596_11: Sace idāni ekaṃ ajikaṃ pāde gahessāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1596_12: sā maṃ parato samuddapiṭṭhe vimānadevatānaṃ santike khipissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1596_13: So evaṃ ayoniso manasikaritvā ajikaṃ pāde gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a1:1596_15: Ajikagopakā ito cito ca āgantvā taṃ gahetvā “ettakaṃ kālaṃ rājakule ajikakhādako esa coro”ti taṃ koṭṭetvā bandhitvā rañño santikaṃ nenti.
atk-s0513a1:1597_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe bodhisatto pañcasatamāṇavakaparivuto nagarā nikkhamma nhāyituṃ gacchanto mittavindakaṃ disvā sañjānitvā te manusse āha – “tātā,
atk-s0513a1:1597_10: tvaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ kahaṃ vasī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:1597_12: Bodhisatto “atthakāmānaṃ vacanaṃ akaronto evaṃ dukkhaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1599_0: “Yo atthakāmassa hitānukampino, ovajjamāno na karoti sāsanaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:1601_3: Na karoti sāsananti anusiṭṭhaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0513a1:1601_5: Mittako viya socatīti yathāyaṃ mittavindako ajikāya pādaṃ gahetvā socati kilamati,
atk-s0513a1:1601_6: evaṃ niccakālaṃ socatīti imāya gāthāya bodhisatto dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a1:1602_0: Evaṃ tena therena ettake addhāne tīsuyeva attabhāvesu kucchipūro laddhapubbo.
atk-s0513a1:1602_4: Evaṃ parassa lābhantarāyakaraṇaṃ nāma mahādosanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1602_5: Tasmiṃ pana kāle sopi ācariyo mittavindakopi yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1603_2: attano appalābhibhāvañca ariyadhammalābhibhāvañca sayameva esa akāsī”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1607_0: Yo atthakāmassāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ lolabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1607_1: Tassa lolabhāvo navakanipāte kākajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:1607_4: Atha naṃ satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu lolosī”ti pucchi. “Āma,
atk-s0513a1:1607_6: Satthā “pubbepi tvaṃ bhikkhu lolo lolakāraṇā jīvitakkhayaṃ patto,
atk-s0513a1:1607_7: paṇḍitāpi taṃ nissāya attano vasanaṭṭhānā parihīnā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1608_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto pārāvatayoniyaṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:1608_1: Tadā bārāṇasivāsino puññakāmatāya tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne sakuṇānaṃ sukhavasanatthāya thusapacchiyo olambenti.
atk-s0513a1:1608_2: Bārāṇasiseṭṭhinopi bhattakārako attano mahānase ekaṃ thusapacchiṃ olambetvā ṭhapesi,
atk-s0513a1:1608_4: So pātova nikkhamitvā gocare caritvā sāyaṃ āgantvā tattha vasanto kālaṃ khepesi.
atk-s0513a1:1608_5: Athekadivasaṃ eko kāko mahānasamatthakena gacchanto ambilānambilamacchamaṃsānaṃ dhūpanavāsaṃ ghāyitvā
atk-s0513a1:1608_6: lobhaṃ uppādetvā “kaṃ nu kho nissāya imaṃ macchamaṃsaṃ labhissāmī”ti avidūre nisīditvā pariggaṇhanto
atk-s0513a1:1608_7: sāyaṃ bodhisattaṃ āgantvā mahānasaṃ pavisantaṃ disvā “imaṃ pārāvataṃ nissāya macchamaṃsaṃ labhissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1608_8: punadivase pātova āgantvā bodhisattassa nikkhamitvā gocaratthāya gamanakāle piṭṭhito piṭṭhito agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1608_16: tumhākaṃ gocaraggahaṇakāle ahampi gocaraṃ gahetvā tumhehi saddhiṃyeva gamissāmī”ti. “Sādhu,
atk-s0513a1:1608_17: kevalaṃ te appamattena bhavitabba”nti evaṃ bodhisatto kākaṃ ovaditvā gocaraṃ caranto tiṇabījādīni khādati.
atk-s0513a1:1608_18: Bodhisattassa pana gocaraggahaṇakāle kāko gantvā gomayapiṇḍaṃ apanetvā pāṇake khāditvā udaraṃ pūretvā bodhisattassa santikaṃ āgantvā “sāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1608_20: atibahubhakkhena nāma bhavituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā bodhisattena gocaraṃ gahetvā sāyaṃ āgacchantena saddhiṃyeva mahānasaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1608_21: Bhattakārako “amhākaṃ kapoto aññampi gahetvā āgato”ti kākassapi pacchiṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:1609_1: Taṃ ādāya bhattakārako mahānase tattha tattha olambesi.
atk-s0513a1:1609_2: Kāko taṃ disvā lobhaṃ uppādetvā “sve gocarabhūmiṃ agantvā mayā idameva khāditabba”nti rattiṃ nitthunanto nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:1609_7: kākānaṃ kucchirogo nāma na kadāci bhūtapubbo,
atk-s0513a1:1609_8: rattiṃ tīsu yāmesu ekekasmiṃ yāme mucchitā honti,
atk-s0513a1:1609_9: dīpavaṭṭiṃ gilitakāle pana nesaṃ muhuttaṃ titti hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1609_16: lobhavasaṃ agantvā appamatto hohī”ti taṃ ovaditvā bodhisatto gocarāya gato.
atk-s0513a1:1610_0: Bhattakārako nānappakāraṃ macchamaṃsavikatiṃ sampādetvā usumanikkhamanatthaṃ bhājanāni thokaṃ vivaritvā
