atk-s0513a1:2346_11: pātetuṃ dāni vaṭṭatī”ti maṇiṃ paṭicchannaṃ katvā ādāya antosāṇiṃ pavisitvā cāṭiyaṃ pātetvā nikkhami.
atk-s0513a1:2346_12: Sabbesaṃ nikkhantakāle udakaṃ chaḍḍetvā maṇiṃ addasaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2346_13: Rājā “theraṃ nissāya mahājanaṃ akilametvāva me maṇi laddho”ti tussi,
atk-s0513a1:2346_15: “Therassānubhāvena rañño cūḷāmaṇi laddho”ti therassānubhāvo sakalanagare ceva bhikkhusaṅghe ca pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:2347_0: Dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā bhikkhū therassa guṇaṃ vaṇṇayiṃsu “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:2347_1: ānandatthero attano bahussutatāya paṇḍiccena upāyakusalatāya mahājanaṃ akilametvā upāyeneva rañño maṇiṃ dassesī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2347_4: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2347_7: pubbepi paṇḍitā mahājanaṃ akilametvā upāyeneva tiracchānahatthagataṃ bhaṇḍaṃ dassayiṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2348_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patto tasseva amacco ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2348_1: Athekadivasaṃ rājā mahantena parivārena uyyānaṃ gantvā vanantarāni vicaritvā udakakīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmo maṅgalapokkharaṇiṃ otaritvā itthāgārampi pakkosi.
atk-s0513a1:2348_2: Itthiyo attano attano sīsūpagagīvūpagādīni ābharaṇāni omuñcitvā uttarāsaṅgesu pakkhipitvā samuggapiṭṭhesu
atk-s0513a1:2348_4: Athekā uyyānamakkaṭī sākhantare nisinnā deviṃ piḷandhanāni omuñcitvā uttarāsaṅge pakkhipitvā samuggapiṭṭhe
atk-s0513a1:2348_5: ṭhapayamānaṃ disvā tassā muttāhāraṃ piḷandhitukāmā hutvā dāsiyā pamādaṃ olokayamānā nisīdi,
atk-s0513a1:2348_6: dāsīpi taṃ rakkhamānā tahaṃ tahaṃ oloketvā nisinnāyeva niddāyituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:2348_7: Makkaṭī tassā pamādabhāvaṃ ñatvā vātavegena otaritvā mahāmuttāhāraṃ gīvāya paṭimuñcitvā vātavegena uppatitvā
atk-s0513a1:2348_8: sākhantare nisīditvā aññāsaṃ makkaṭīnaṃ dassanabhayena ekasmiṃ rukkhasusiraṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā upasantūpasantā
atk-s0513a1:2349_0: Sāpi kho dāsī paṭibujjhitvā muttāhāraṃ apassantī kampamānā aññaṃ upāyaṃ adisvā “puriso deviyā muttāhāraṃ gahetvā palāto”ti mahāviravaṃ viravi.
atk-s0513a1:2349_1: Ārakkhamanussā tato tato sannipatitvā tassā vacanaṃ sutvā rañño ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2349_4: coraṃ gaṇhathā”ti ito cito ca olokenti.
atk-s0513a1:2349_5: Atheko jānapado balikārakapuriso taṃ saddaṃ sutvā kampamāno palāyi.
atk-s0513a1:2349_6: Taṃ disvā rājapurisā “ayaṃ coro bhavissatī”ti anubandhitvā taṃ gahetvā pothetvā “are,
atk-s0513a1:2349_8: evaṃ mahāsāraṃ nāma piḷandhanaṃ avaharissasī”ti paribhāsiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2349_14: Atha naṃ bandhitvā rañño santikaṃ ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2349_15: Rājāpi naṃ pucchi “gahitaṃ te mahāsārapiḷandhana”nti? “Āma, devā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2349_17: mayā mahāsāraṃ nāma mañcapīṭhampi na diṭṭhapubbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2350_0: Rājā seṭṭhiṃ pakkosāpetvā “gahitaṃ te imassa hatthato mahāsārapiḷandhana”nti pucchi. “Āma, devā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2350_5: Tampi pakkosāpetvā “purohitassa hatthato te mahāsārapiḷandhanaṃ gahita”nti pucchi. “Āma, devā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2350_10: Te pañca jane pucchantānaññeva sūriyo atthaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2350_12: sve jānissāmā”ti te pañca jane amaccānaṃ datvā nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:2351_4: tasmā antovaḷañjanakānampi taṃ gahetvā palāyituṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0513a1:2351_7: Iminā duggatamanussena ‘seṭṭhissa me dinna’nti kathentena attano mokkhatthāya kathitaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2351_8: seṭṭhināpi ‘purohitassa me dinna’nti kathentena ‘ekato hutvā nittharissāmī’ti cintetvā kathitaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2351_9: purohitenāpi ‘gandhabbassa me dinna’nti kathentena ‘bandhanāgāre gandhabbaṃ nissāya sukhena vasissāmā’ti cintetvā kathitaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2351_10: gandhabbenāpi ‘vaṇṇadāsiyā me dinna’nti kathentena ‘ekantena anukkaṇṭhitā bhavissāmā’ti cintetvā kathitaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2351_13: piḷandhanena ekissā makkaṭiyā hatthe āruḷhena bhavitabba”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2352_0: Bodhisatto attano dāsapurise pakkosāpetvā te pañca jane ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne vasāpetvā samantā ārakkhaṃ katvā kaṇṇaṃ datvā “yaṃ te aññamaññaṃ kathenti,
atk-s0513a1:2352_3: Tato manussānaṃ sannisinnavelāya seṭṭhi taṃ gahapatikaṃ āha – “are,
atk-s0513a1:2352_7: kadā te mayhaṃ piḷandhanaṃ dinna”nti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2352_9: ahaṃ mahāsāraṃ nāma rukkhasārapādakaṃ mañcapīṭhampi na jānāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2352_10: ‘taṃ nissāya pana mokkhaṃ labhissāmī’ti evaṃ avacaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2352_14: tvaṃ iminā attano adinnakameva mayhaṃ kathaṃ adāsī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:2352_16: amhākaṃ ekato hutvā ṭhitakāle kammaṃ khippaṃ nipphajjissatī”ti kathesinti.
atk-s0513a1:2352_19: “Ahaṃ taṃ nissāya vasanaṭṭhāne sukhaṃ vasissāmī”ti kathesinti.
atk-s0513a1:2352_27: Bodhisatto payojitamanussānaṃ santikā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā tesaṃ tathato acorabhāvaṃ ñatvā “makkaṭiyā gahitapiḷandhanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2352_28: upāyeneva pātessāmī”ti geṇḍumayāni bahūni piḷandhanāni kāretvā uyyāne makkaṭiyo gāhāpetvā hatthapādagīvāsu
atk-s0513a1:2352_30: Itarā makkaṭī piḷandhanaṃ rakkhamānā uyyāne eva nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:2353_4: Tāpi kho makkaṭiyo “piḷandhanaṃ no laddha”nti tuṭṭhapahaṭṭhā uyyāne vicarantiyo tassā santikaṃ gantvā “passa amhākaṃ piḷandhana”nti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2353_5: Sā makkaṭī asahamānā “kiṃ iminā geṇḍupiḷandhanenā”ti muttāhāraṃ piḷandhitvā nikkhami.
atk-s0513a1:2353_6: Atha naṃ te purisā disvā piḷandhanaṃ chaḍḍāpetvā āharitvā bodhisattassa adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2353_7: So taṃ ādāya rañño dassetvā “idaṃ te deva piḷandhanaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2353_9: idaṃ pana uyyāne makkaṭiyā ābhata”nti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2353_14: Rājā tuṭṭhamānaso “saṅgāmasīsādīsu nāma sūrādayo icchitabbā hontī”ti bodhisattassa thutiṃ karonto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2356_0: Piyañca annapānamhi, atthe jāte ca paṇḍita”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2357_2: Sūramicchantīti asaniyāpi matthake patamānāya apalāyinaṃ sūraṃ icchanti,
atk-s0513a1:2357_3: tasmiṃ khaṇe evarūpo saṅgāmayodho patthetabbo hoti.
atk-s0513a1:2357_4: Mantīsu akutūhalanti kattabbākattabbakiccaṃ sammantanakāle uppanne mantīsu yo akutūhalo avikiṇṇavāco mantaṃ na bhindati,
atk-s0513a1:2357_7: Piyañca annapānamhīti madhure annapāne paccupaṭṭhite sahaparibhuñjanatthāya piyapuggalaṃ patthenti,
atk-s0513a1:2357_9: Atthe jāte ca paṇḍitanti atthagambhīre dhammagambhīre kismiñcideva kāraṇe vā pañhe vā uppanne paṇḍitaṃ vicakkhaṇaṃ icchanti.
atk-s0513a1:2357_10: Tathārūpo hi tasmiṃ samaye patthetabbo hotīti.
atk-s0513a1:2358_0: Evaṃ rājā bodhisattaṃ vaṇṇetvā thometvā ghanavassaṃ vassento mahāmegho viya sattāhi ratanehi pūjetvā
atk-s0513a1:2358_1: tassovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato,
atk-s0513a1:2359_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā therassa guṇaṃ kathetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2363_0: Na vissase avissattheti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto vissāsabhojanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2363_1: Tasmiṃ kira samaye yebhuyyena bhikkhū “mātarā no dinnaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2363_7: Amhākaṃ gihikālepi bhikkhukālepi ete dātuṃ yuttarūpāvā”ti ñātīhi dinne cattāro paccaye vissatthā hutvā apaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanti.
atk-s0513a1:2363_8: Satthā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “bhikkhūnaṃ mayā dhammadesanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti bhikkhū sannipātāpetvā “bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:2363_9: bhikkhunā nāma ñātīhipi aññātīhipi dinnake cattāro paccaye paccavekkhitvāva paribhogo kātabbo.
atk-s0513a1:2363_10: Apaccavekkhitvā paribhogaṃ katvā hi kālaṃ kurumāno bhikkhu yakkhapetaattabhāvato na muccati,
atk-s0513a1:2363_12: Visañhi vissāsikena dinnakampi avissāsikena dinnakampi māretiyeva.
atk-s0513a1:2363_13: Pubbepi vissāsena dinnaṃ visaṃ paribhuñjitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pattā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2364_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2364_1: Tasseko gopālako kiṭṭhasambādhasamaye gāvo gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā tattha gosālaṃ katvā rakkhanto vasati.
atk-s0513a1:2364_2: Seṭṭhino ca kālena kālaṃ gorasaṃ āharati.
atk-s0513a1:2364_3: Athassa gosālāya avidūre sīho nivāsaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:2364_4: Gāvīnaṃ sīhasantāsena milātānaṃ khīraṃ mandaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2364_5: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ sappiṃ ādāya āgataṃ seṭṭhi pucchi “kiṃ nu kho,
atk-s0513a1:2364_14: “Tena hi taṃ gahetvā tassā nalāṭato paṭṭhāya sarīre lomāni visena punappunaṃ rajitvā sukkhāpetvā dve
atk-s0513a1:2364_15: tayo divase atikkāmetvā taṃ migamātukaṃ vissajjehi,
atk-s0513a1:2364_16: so tassā sinehena sarīraṃ lehitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇissati.
atk-s0513a1:2364_17: Athassa cammanakhadāṭhā ceva vasañca maṃsañca gahetvā āgaccheyyāsī”ti halāhalavisaṃ datvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a1:2365_0: So gopālako jālaṃ khipitvā upāyena taṃ migamātukaṃ gaṇhitvā tathā akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2365_1: Sīho taṃ disvāva balavasinehena tassā sarīraṃ lehitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:2365_2: Gopālakopi cammādīni gahetvā bodhisattassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2365_3: Bodhisatto taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “paresu sineho nāma na kātabbo,
atk-s0513a1:2365_4: evaṃ balasampannopi sīho migarājā kilesavasena saṃsaggaṃ nissāya migamātukāya sarīraṃ lehanto visaparibhogaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2365_5: katvā jīvitakkhayaṃ patto”ti vatvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2369_1: yo pubbe sabhayo attani avissattho ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2369_11: yathā mittasanthavavasena katavissāsāya migamātukāya santikā sīhassa bhayaṃ anveti,
atk-s0513a1:2369_13: Yathā vā vissāsavasena sīhaṃ migamātukā anvetā upagatātipi attho.
atk-s0513a1:2370_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desetvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2371_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā mahāseṭṭhi ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2375_0: Sotatto sosinno cevāti idaṃ satthā vesāliṃ upanissāya pāṭikārāme viharanto sunakkhattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2375_1: Ekasmiñhi samaye sunakkhatto satthu upaṭṭhāko hutvā pattacīvaramādāya vicaramāno korakkhattiyassa dhammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2375_2: rocento dasabalassa pattacīvaraṃ niyyādetvā korakkhattiyaṃ nissāya vasati.
atk-s0513a1:2375_3: Tassa kālakañjikaasurayoniyaṃ nibbattakāle gihi hutvā “natthi samaṇassa gotamassa uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso,
atk-s0513a1:2375_4: takkapariyāhataṃ samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ deseti vīmaṃsānucaritaṃ sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2375_5: Yassa ca khvāssa atthāya dhammo desito,
atk-s0513a1:2375_6: na so niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyā”ti vesāliyaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pākārānaṃ antare vicaranto satthu avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0513a1:2376_0: Athāyasmā sāriputto piṇḍāya caranto tassevaṃ avaṇṇaṃ bhāsantassa sutvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto tamatthaṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:2376_5: kodhavasenāpi pana ‘na so niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyā’ti vadanto ajānitvāpi mayhaṃ guṇameva bhāsati.
atk-s0513a1:2376_6: Na kho pana so moghapuriso mayhaṃ guṇaṃ jānāti. Mayhañhi,
atk-s0513a1:2376_15: Evaṃ uttarimanussadhammasamannāgataṃ pana maṃ yo evaṃ vadeyya ‘natthi samaṇassa gotamassa uttarimanussadhammo’ti,
atk-s0513a1:2376_16: so taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye”ti
atk-s0513a1:2376_17: evaṃ attano vijjamānaṃ uttarimanussadhammassa guṇaṃ kathetvā “sunakkhatto kira,
atk-s0513a1:2376_20: micchātape pasīdantena pana mayi eva pasīdituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0513a1:2376_21: Ahañhi ito ekanavutikappamatthake ‘atthi nu kho ettha sāro’ti bāhirakaṃ micchātapaṃ vīmaṃsanto caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2376_25: pavivitto sudaṃ homi paramapavivitto”ti vatvā therena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2377_0: Atīte ekanavutikappamatthake bodhisatto “bāhirakatapaṃ vīmaṃsissāmī”ti ājīvakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā acelako ahosi rajojalliko,
atk-s0513a1:2377_5: appamādavihāratthāya araññe ekasmiṃ bhiṃsanake vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2377_6: Tasmimpi viharanto himapātasamaye antaraṭṭhake rattiṃ vanasaṇḍā nikkhamitvā abbhokāse viharitvā sūriye uggate vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0513a1:2377_7: So yathā rattiṃ abbhokāse himodakena tinto,
atk-s0513a1:2377_8: tatheva divā vanasaṇḍato paggharantehi udakabindūhi temayi.
atk-s0513a1:2377_10: Gimhānaṃ pana pacchime māse divā abbhokāse viharitvā rattiṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0513a1:2377_11: So yathā divā abbhokāse ātapena pariḷāhappatto,
atk-s0513a1:2377_12: tatheva rattiṃ nivāte vanasaṇḍe pariḷāhaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0513a1:2377_14: Athassa pubbe assutapubbā ayaṃ gāthā paṭibhāsi –
atk-s0513a1:2381_2: Eko bhiṃsanake vaneti yattha paviṭṭhānaṃ yebhuyyena lomāni haṃsanti,
atk-s0513a1:2381_3: tathārūpe bhiṃsanakevanasaṇḍe eko adutiyova ahosinti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a1:2381_4: Naggo na caggimāsīnoti naggo ca na ca aggimāsīno.
atk-s0513a1:2381_5: Tathā sītena pīḷiyamānopi neva nivāsanapārupanaṃ vā ādiyiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2381_6: na ca aggiṃ āgamma nisīdinti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a1:2381_7: Esanāpasutoti abrahmacariyepi tasmiṃ brahmacariyasaññī hutvā “brahmacariyamevetaṃ esanā gavesanā upāyo
atk-s0513a1:2381_8: brahmalokassā”ti evaṃ tāya brahmacariyesanāya pasuto anuyutto ussukkaṃ āpanno ahosinti dasseti.
atk-s0513a1:2381_9: Munīti “muni kho esa monatthāya paṭipanno”ti evaṃ lokena sambhāvito ahosinti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a1:2382_0: Evaṃ caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritvā bodhisatto maraṇakāle upaṭṭhitaṃ nirayanimittaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a1:2382_1: “idaṃ vatasamādānaṃ niratthaka”nti ñatvā taṅkhaṇaññeva taṃ laddhiṃ bhinditvā sammādiṭṭhiṃ gahetvā devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2383_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “ahaṃ tena samayena so ājīvako ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2387_0: Aniccā vata saṅkhārāti idaṃ satthā parinibbānamañce nipanno ānandattherassa “mā, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2387_2: Tathāgate hi jetavane viharante sāriputtatthero kattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ nāḷakagāmake jātovarake parinibbāyi,
atk-s0513a1:2387_4: Evaṃ parinibbute aggasāvakayuge “ahampi kusinārāyaṃ parinibbāyissāmī”ti anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno tattha
atk-s0513a1:2387_5: gantvā yamakasālānamantare uttarasīsake mañcake anuṭṭhānaseyyāya nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:2387_9: aññesaṃ campārājagahādīnaṃ mahānagarānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ bhagavā parinibbāyatū”ti yāci.
atk-s0513a1:2387_13: ahañhi pubbe sudassanacakkavattirājakāle imasmiṃ nagare vasiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2387_14: tadā idaṃ dvādasayojanikena ratanapākārena parikkhittaṃ mahānagaraṃ ahosī”ti vatvā therena yācito atītaṃ āharanto mahāsudassanasuttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2388_0: Tadā pana mahāsudassanaṃ sudhammapāsādā otaritvā avidūre sattaratanamaye tālavane paññattasmiṃ kappiyamañcake
atk-s0513a1:2388_1: dakkhiṇena passena anuṭṭhānaseyyāya nipannaṃ disvā “imāni te, deva,
atk-s0513a1:2388_3: ettha chandaṃ karohī”ti subhaddāya deviyā vutte mahāsudassano “mā devi evaṃ avaca,
atk-s0513a1:2388_5: mā apekkhaṃ akāsī’ti evaṃ maṃ ovadā”ti vatvā “kiṃkāraṇā,
atk-s0513a1:2388_7: Atha naṃ devī rodamānā akkhīni puñchitvā kicchena kasirena tathā vatvā rodi paridevi.
atk-s0513a1:2388_12: mā saddamakatthā”ti sabbe nivāretvā deviṃ āmantetvā “mā tvaṃ devi rodi,
atk-s0513a1:2388_14: Tilaphalamattopi hi saṅkhāro nicco nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:2388_15: sabbepi aniccā bhedanadhammā evā”ti vatvā deviṃ ovadanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2392_0: Tattha aniccā vata saṅkhārāti bhadde subhaddādevi,
atk-s0513a1:2392_1: yattakā kehici paccayehi samāgantvā katā khandhāyatanādayo saṅkhārā,
atk-s0513a1:2392_11: sabbe hete uppādadhammino ceva vayadhammino ca uppajjanabhijjanasabhāvāyeva,
atk-s0513a1:2392_18: Tesaṃ uppāde satiyeva ca ṭhiti nāma hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2392_22: Iti sabbepi saṅkhārā tīṇi lakkhaṇāni patvā tattha tattheva nirujjhanti,
atk-s0513a1:2392_23: tasmā sabbepime aniccā khaṇikā ittarā adhuvā pabhaṅguno calitā samīritā anaddhaniyā payātā tāvakālikā nissārā,
atk-s0513a1:2392_27: evaṃ pana gaṇha tesaṃ vūpasamo sukhoti,
atk-s0513a1:2393_0: Evaṃ mahāsudassano amatamahānibbānena desanāya kūṭaṃ gahetvā avasesassapi mahājanassa “dānaṃ detha,
atk-s0513a1:2393_2: uposathakammaṃ karothā”ti ovādaṃ datvā devalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2394_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2398_0: Samatittikaṃ anavasesakanti idaṃ satthā sumbharaṭṭhe sedakaṃ nāma nigamaṃ upanissāya aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe
atk-s0513a1:2399_5: sā kho panassa janapadakalyāṇī paramapāsāvinī nacce,
atk-s0513a1:2399_10: Atha puriso āgaccheyya jīvitukāmo amaritukāmo sukhakāmo dukkhapaṭikūlo.
atk-s0513a1:2399_13: samatittiko telapatto antarena ca mahājanakāyassa antarena ca janapadakalyāṇiyā pariharitabbo,
atk-s0513a1:2399_14: puriso ca taṃ ukkhittāsiko piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhissati ‘yattheva naṃ thokampi chaḍḍessasi,
atk-s0513a1:2399_18: api nu so puriso amuṃ telapattaṃ amanasikaritvā bahiddhā pamādaṃ āhareyyā”ti?
atk-s0513a1:2399_29: evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘kāyagatā no sati bhāvitā bhavissati susamāraddhā’ti evañhi vo,
atk-s0513a1:2401_1: janapadakalyāṇīti janapadamhi kalyāṇī uttamā chasarīradosarahitā pañcakalyāṇasamannāgatā.
atk-s0513a1:2401_13: vayokalyāṇanti imehi pana pañcahi kalyāṇehi samannāgatattā pañcakalyāṇasamannāgatā nāma.
atk-s0513a1:2401_15: attano sarīrobhāseneva dvādasahatthe ṭhāne ālokaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a1:2401_18: Cattāro panassā hatthapādā mukhapariyosānañca lākhārasaparikammakataṃ viya rattapavāḷarattakambalasadisaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a1:2401_20: Vīsati nakhapattāni maṃsato amuttaṭṭhāne lākhārasapūritāni viya,
atk-s0513a1:2401_23: Dvattiṃsa dantā suphusitā sudhotavajirapanti viya khāyanti.
atk-s0513a1:2401_25: Vīsativassasatikāpi pana samānā soḷasavassuddesikā viya hoti nibbalipalitā.
atk-s0513a1:2402_5: Nacce ca gīte ca uttamappavatti seṭṭhakiriyā.
atk-s0513a1:2403_0: Atha puriso āgaccheyyāti na attano ruciyā āgaccheyya,
atk-s0513a1:2403_2: athevaṃ mahājanamajjhe janapadakalyāṇiyā naccamānāya “sādhu sādhū”ti sādhukāresu aṅguliphoṭanesu celukkhepesu
atk-s0513a1:2403_3: ca pavattamānesu taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā rājā bandhanāgārato ekaṃ corapurisaṃ pakkosāpetvā nigaḷāni chinditvā
atk-s0513a1:2403_4: samatittikaṃ suparipuṇṇaṃ telapattaṃ tassa hatthe datvā ubhohi hatthehi daḷhaṃ gāhāpetvā ekaṃ asihatthaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2403_5: purisaṃ āṇāpesi “etaṃ gahetvā janapadakalyāṇiyā samajjaṭṭhānaṃ gaccha.
atk-s0513a1:2403_6: Yattheva cesa pamādaṃ āgamma ekampi telabinduṃ chaḍḍeti,
atk-s0513a1:2403_8: So puriso asiṃ ukkhipitvā taṃ tajjento tattha nesi.
atk-s0513a1:2403_9: So maraṇabhayatajjito jīvitukāmatāya pamādavasena taṃ amanasikaritvā sakimpi akkhīni ummīletvā taṃ janapadakalyāṇiṃ na olokesi.
atk-s0513a1:2404_0: Upamā kho myāyanti ettha pana telapattassa tāva kāyagatāsatiyā opammasaṃsandanaṃ katameva.
atk-s0513a1:2404_1: Ettha pana rājā viya kammaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2404_5: Iti bhagavā “kāyagatāsatiṃ bhāvetukāmena bhikkhunā telapattahatthena tena purisena viya satiṃ avissajjetvā
atk-s0513a1:2404_6: appamattena kāyagatāsati bhāvetabbā”ti imaṃ suttaṃ āharitvā dassesi.
atk-s0513a1:2405_0: Bhikkhū imaṃ suttañca atthañca sutvā evamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a1:2405_2: tena purisena kataṃ tathārūpiṃ janapadakalyāṇiṃ anoloketvā telapattaṃ ādāya gacchantenā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2405_8: Yaṃ pana pubbe paṇḍitā appamādena satiṃ avissajjetvā abhisaṅkhataṃ dibbarūpampi indriyāni bhinditvā anoloketvāva gantvā rajjaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2406_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa rañño puttasatassa sabbakaniṭṭho hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:2406_2: Tadā ca rañño gehe paccekabuddhā bhuñjanti,
atk-s0513a1:2406_5: lacchāmi nu kho ahaṃ imasmiṃ nagare kulasantakaṃ rajjaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2406_8: So dutiyadivase paccekabuddhesu āgatesu dhamakaraṇaṃ ādāya pānīyaṃ parissāvetvā pāde dhovitvā telena
atk-s0513a1:2406_9: makkhetvā tesaṃ antarakhajjakaṃ khāditvā nisinnakāle vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno tamatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2406_11: na tvaṃ imasmiṃ nagare rajjaṃ labhissasi,
atk-s0513a1:2406_12: ito pana vīsayojanasatamatthake gandhāraraṭṭhe takkasilānagaraṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0513a1:2406_13: tattha gantuṃ sakkonto ito sattame divase rajjaṃ lacchasi.
atk-s0513a1:2406_15: taṃ aṭaviṃ pariharitvā gacchantassa yojanasatiko maggo hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2406_18: Tattha yakkhiniyo antarāmagge gāme ca sālāyo ca māpetvā upari suvaṇṇatārakavicittavitānaṃ mahārahaseyyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2406_19: paññāpetvā nānāvirāgapaṭasāṇiyo parikkhipitvā dibbālaṅkārehi attabhāvaṃ maṇḍetvā sālāsu nisīditvā āgacchante
atk-s0513a1:2406_20: purise madhurāhi vācāhi saṅgaṇhitvā “kilantarūpā viya paññāyatha,
atk-s0513a1:2406_21: idhāgantvā nisīditvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā gacchathā”ti pakkositvā āgatāgatānaṃ āsanāni datvā attano rūpalīlāvilāsehi
atk-s0513a1:2406_22: palobhetvā kilesavasike katvā attanā saddhiṃ ajjhācāre kate tattheva ne lohitena paggharantena khāditvā
atk-s0513a1:2406_29: Sace indriyāni bhinditvā tā anoloketvā satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā gamissasi,
atk-s0513a1:2407_1: tumhākaṃ ovādaṃ gahetvā kiṃ tā olokessāmī”ti paccekabuddhehi parittaṃ kārāpetvā parittavālukañceva parittasuttañca
atk-s0513a1:2407_2: ādāya paccekabuddhe ca mātāpitaro ca vanditvā nivesanaṃ gantvā attano purise āha –
atk-s0513a1:2407_5: Atha naṃ pañca janā āhaṃsu “mayampi anugacchāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2407_7: antarāmagge kira yakkhiniyo rūpādigocare manusse evañcevañca rūpādīhi palobhetvā gaṇhanti,
atk-s0513a1:2407_11: mayaṃ tumhehi saddhiṃ gacchantā attano piyāni rūpādīni olokessāma,
atk-s0513a1:2407_13: Bodhisatto “tena hi appamattā hothā”ti te pañca jane ādāya maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0513a1:2408_1: Tesu rūpagocaro puriso tā yakkhiniyo oloketvā rūpārammaṇe paṭibaddhacitto thokaṃ ohīyi.
atk-s0513a1:2408_10: “Tena hi paññāyissasī”ti itare cattāro ādāya agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2408_12: Tā attanā saddhiṃ ajjhācāre kate taṃ tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā purato gantvā aññaṃ sālaṃ māpetvā nānātūriyāni gahetvā gāyamānā nisīdiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2408_14: Purimanayeneva tampi khāditvā purato gantvā nānappakāre gandhakaraṇḍake pūretvā āpaṇaṃ pasāretvā nisīdiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2408_16: Tampi khāditvā purato gantvā nānaggarasānaṃ dibbabhojanānaṃ bhājanāni pūretvā odanikāpaṇaṃ pasāretvā nisīdiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2408_18: Tampi khāditvā purato gantvā dibbasayanāni paññāpetvā nisīdiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2409_1: ahaṃ taṃ khāditvāva nivattissāmī”ti bodhisattassa pacchato pacchato agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2409_2: Aṭaviyā parabhāge vanakammikādayo yakkhiniṃ disvā “ayaṃ te purato gacchanto puriso kiṃ hotī”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2409_4: ayaṃ evaṃ sukumālā pupphadāmasadisā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā kumārikā attano kulaṃ chaḍḍetvā bhavantaṃ takketvā nikkhantā,
atk-s0513a1:2409_5: kasmā etaṃ akilametvā ādāya na gacchasī”ti? “Nesā, ayyā,
atk-s0513a1:2409_9: purisā nāma kuddhakāle attano pajāpatiyo yakkhiniyopi karonti petiniyopī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2409_10: Sā gacchamānā gabbhinivaṇṇaṃ dassetvā puna sakiṃ vijātavaṇṇaṃ katvā puttaṃ aṅkena ādāya bodhisattaṃ anubandhi,
atk-s0513a1:2409_12: Bodhisattopi tatheva vatvā gacchanto takkasilaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:2409_14: Bodhisatto nagaradvāraṃ gantvā ekissā sālāya nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:2409_15: Sā bodhisattassa tejena pavisituṃ asakkontī dibbarūpaṃ māpetvā sālādvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2410_0: Tasmiṃ samaye takkasilarājā uyyānaṃ gacchanto taṃ disvā paṭibaddhacitto hutvā “gaccha,
atk-s0513a1:2410_6: etāya me pañca manussā khāditā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2410_7: Sāpi “purisā nāma ayyā kuddhakāle yaṃ icchanti,
atk-s0513a1:2410_10: Rājā “assāmikabhaṇḍaṃ nāma rājasantakaṃ hotī”ti yakkhiniṃ pakkosāpetvā ekahatthipiṭṭhe nisīdāpetvā nagaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2410_11: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pāsādaṃ abhiruyha taṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:2411_0: So nhātavilitto sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā sirīsayanaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0513a1:2411_1: Sāpi yakkhinī attano upakappanakaṃ āhāraṃ āharitvā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā sirisayane raññā saddhiṃ nipajjitvā
atk-s0513a1:2411_2: rañño rativasena sukhaṃ samappitassa nipannakāle ekena passena parivattitvā parodi.
atk-s0513a1:2411_7: ahaṃ sapattīnaṃ antare vasamānā kathāya uppannāya ‘ko tuyhaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā gottaṃ vā jātiṃ vā jānāti,
atk-s0513a1:2411_8: tvaṃ antarāmagge disvā ānītā nāmā’ti sīse gahetvā nippīḷiyamānā viya maṅku bhavissāmi.
atk-s0513a1:2411_9: Sace tumhe sakalarajje issariyañca āṇañca mayhaṃ dadeyyātha,
atk-s0513a1:2411_10: koci mayhaṃ cittaṃ kopetvā kathetuṃ na sakkhissatī”ti. “Bhadde,
atk-s0513a1:2411_13: Ye pana rājāṇaṃ kopetvā akattabbaṃ karonti,
atk-s0513a1:2411_15: Iminā kāraṇena na sakkā tuyhaṃ sakalaraṭṭhe vā nagare vā issariyañca āṇañca dātu”nti. “Tena hi, deva,
atk-s0513a1:2411_16: sace raṭṭhe vā nagare vā āṇaṃ dātuṃ na sakkotha,
atk-s0513a1:2411_17: antonivesane antovaḷañjanakānaṃ upari mama vasaṃ vattanatthāya āṇaṃ dethā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2411_18: Rājā dibbaphoṭṭhabbena baddho tassā vacanaṃ atikkamituṃ asakkonto “sādhu, bhadde,
atk-s0513a1:2411_20: tvaṃ ete attano vase vattāpehī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2411_21: Sā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā rañño niddaṃ okkantakāle yakkhanagaraṃ gantvā yakkhe pakkositvā attanā rājānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2411_22: jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā aṭṭhimattaṃ sesetvā sabbaṃ nhārucammamaṃsalohitaṃ khādi,

atk-s0513a1:2412_0: Punadivase dvāraṃ yathāpihitameva disvā manussā pharasūhi kavāṭāni koṭṭetvā anto pavisitvā sabbaṃ nivesanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2412_1: aṭṭhikaparikiṇṇaṃ disvā “saccaṃ vata so puriso āha ‘nāyaṃ mayhaṃ pajāpati,
atk-s0513a1:2412_3: Rājā pana kiñci ajānitvā taṃ gahetvā attano bhariyaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2412_4: sā yakkhe pakkositvā sabbaṃ janaṃ khāditvā gatā bhavissatī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2412_5: Bodhisattopi taṃ divasaṃ tassāyeva sālāyaṃ parittavālukaṃ sīse katvā parittasuttañca parikkhipitvā khaggaṃ gahetvā ṭhitakova aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2412_6: Manussā sakalarājanivesanaṃ sodhetvā haritūpalittaṃ katvā upari gandhehi vilimpitvā pupphāni vikiritvā
atk-s0513a1:2412_7: pupphadāmāni osāretvā dhūmaṃ datvā navamālā bandhitvā sammantayiṃsu “ambho,
atk-s0513a1:2412_8: yo puriso dibbarūpaṃ māpetvā pacchato āgacchantiṃ yakkhiniṃ indriyāni bhinditvā olokanamattampi na akāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2412_10: tādise purise rajjaṃ anusāsante sabbaraṭṭhaṃ sukhitaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2412_12: Atha sabbe amaccā ca nāgarā ca ekacchandā hutvā bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “deva,
atk-s0513a1:2412_13: tumhe imaṃ rajjaṃ kārethā”ti nagaraṃ pavesetvā ratanarāsimhi ṭhapetvā abhisiñcitvā takkasilarājānaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2412_14: So cattāri agatigamanāni vajjetvā dasa rājadhamme akopetvā dhammena rajjaṃ kārento dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2413_0: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2417_5: Evaṃ sacittamanurakkheti taṃ telabharitaṃ pattaṃ viya attano cittaṃ kāyagatāsatiyā gocare ceva sampayuttasatiyā
atk-s0513a1:2417_6: cāti ubhinnaṃ antare pakkhipitvā yathā muhuttampi bahiddhā gocare na vikkhipati,
atk-s0513a1:2419_0: Cittassa damatho sādhu, cittaṃ dantaṃ sukhāvaha”nti. ;
atk-s0513a1:2422_0: Cittaṃ rakkhetha medhāvī, cittaṃ guttaṃ sukhāvahaṃ”. ;
atk-s0513a1:2436_0: Patthayāno disaṃ agatapubbanti imasmiṃ kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhāne kammaṃ ārabhitvā anamatagge saṃsāre agatapubbaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2436_1: disaṃ patthento pihento vuttanayena sakaṃ cittaṃ rakkheyyāti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2438_0: Puttadārā disā pacchā, mittāmaccā ca uttarā.
atk-s0513a1:2440_0: Etā disā namasseyya, alamatto kule gihī”ti. –

atk-s0513a1:2446_0: Esā disā paramā setaketu, yaṃ patvā dukkhī sukhino bhavantī”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:2447_4: Anamatagge pana saṃsāre kenaci bālaputhujjanena supinenapi agatapubbatāya agatapubbā disā nāmāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2448_0: Evaṃ satthā nibbānena desanāya kūṭaṃ gahetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2452_0: Jīvakañca mataṃ disvāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ nāmasiddhikaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2452_1: Eko kira kulaputto nāmena pāpako nāma.
atk-s0513a1:2452_2: So sāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajito bhikkhūhi “ehāvuso, pāpaka,
atk-s0513a1:2452_4: pāpakā”ti vuccamāno cintesi “loke pāpakaṃ nāma lāmakaṃ kāḷakaṇṇibhūtaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0513a1:2452_15: Athekadivasaṃ dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:2452_16: asuko kira bhikkhu nāmasiddhiko maṅgalaṃ nāmaṃ āharāpetī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2452_19: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2453_0: Atīte takkasilāyaṃ bodhisatto disāpāmokkho ācariyo hutvā pañca māṇavakasatāni mante vācesi.
atk-s0513a1:2453_1: Tasseko māṇavo pāpako nāma nāmena. So “ehi, pāpaka, yāhi,
atk-s0513a1:2453_8: janapadacārikaṃ caritvā attano abhirucitaṃ ekaṃ maṅgalanāmaṃ gahetvā ehi,
atk-s0513a1:2453_9: āgatassa te nāmaṃ parivattetvā aññaṃ nāmaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2453_10: So “sādhū”ti pātheyyaṃ gahetvā nikkhanto gāmena gāmaṃ caranto ekaṃ nagaraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:2453_11: Tattha ceko puriso kālakato jīvako nāma nāmena.
atk-s0513a1:2453_12: So taṃ ñātijanena āḷāhanaṃ nīyamānaṃ disvā “kiṃ nāmako esa puriso”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2453_19: So taṃ kathaṃ sutvā nāme majjhatto hutvā antonagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:2454_0: Athekaṃ dāsiṃ bhatiṃ adadamānaṃ sāmikā dvāre nisīdāpetvā rajjuyā paharanti,
atk-s0513a1:2454_2: So antaravīthiyā gacchanto taṃ pothiyamānaṃ disvā “kasmā imaṃ pothethā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2454_6: Nāmena dhanapālī samānāpi bhatimattaṃ dātuṃ na sakkotīti dhanapāliyopi adhanapāliyopi duggatā honti,
atk-s0513a1:2454_9: So nāme majjhattataro hutvā nagarā nikkhamma maggaṃ paṭipanno antarāmagge maggamūḷhapurisaṃ disvā “ambho kiṃ karonto vicarasī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2454_15: nāmaṃ nāma paṇṇattimattaṃ tvaṃ pana bālo maññeti”.
atk-s0513a1:2454_16: So nāme atimajjhatto hutvā bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ, tāta,
atk-s0513a1:2454_26: Bodhisatto tena diṭṭhañca katañca saṃsandetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2458_0: Tattha punarāgatoti imāni tīṇi kāraṇāni disvā puna āgato, ra-kāro sandhivasena vutto.
atk-s0513a1:2463_0: Sādhu kho paṇḍito nāmāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kūṭavāṇijaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2463_1: Sāvatthiyañhi dve janā ekato vaṇijjaṃ karontā bhaṇḍaṃ sakaṭenādāya janapadaṃ gantvā laddhalābhā paccāgamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2463_2: Tesu kūṭavāṇijo cintesi “ayaṃ bahū divase dubbhojanena dukkhaseyyāya kilanto,
atk-s0513a1:2463_3: idāni attano ghare nānaggarasehi yāvadatthaṃ subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā ajīrakena marissati.
atk-s0513a1:2463_4: Athāhaṃ imaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ tayo koṭṭhāse katvā ekaṃ tassa dārakānaṃ dassāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2463_7: sve bhājessāmā”ti bhaṇḍaṃ bhājetuṃ na icchi.
atk-s0513a1:2463_8: Atha naṃ paṇḍitavāṇijo akāmakaṃ nippīḷetvā bhājāpetvā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā katapaṭisanthāro “atipapañco te kato,
atk-s0513a1:2463_9: idhāgantvāpi cirena buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ āgatosī”ti vutte taṃ pavattiṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:2463_14: pubbe paṇḍitepi vañcetuṃ ussahī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2464_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto bārāṇasiyaṃ vāṇijakule nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:2464_2: So vayappatto aññena vāṇijena saddhiṃ ekato hutvā vaṇijjaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a1:2464_4: Te bārāṇasito pañcahi sakaṭasatehi bhaṇḍaṃ ādāya janapadaṃ gantvā vaṇijjaṃ katvā laddhalābhā puna bārāṇasiṃ āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2464_5: Atha nesaṃ bhaṇḍabhājanakāle atipaṇḍito āha “mayā dve koṭṭhāsā laddhabbā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2464_12: tvaṃ kasmā dve koṭṭhāse laddhuṃ arahasī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2464_14: Evaṃ te kathaṃ vaḍḍhetvā kalahaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2465_0: Tato atipaṇḍito “attheko upāyo”ti cintetvā attano pitaraṃ ekasmiṃ susirarukkhe pavesetvā “tvaṃ amhesu
atk-s0513a1:2465_1: āgatesu ‘atipaṇḍito dve koṭṭhāse laddhuṃ arahatī’ti vadeyyāsī”ti vatvā bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “samma,
atk-s0513a1:2465_2: mayhaṃ dvinnaṃ koṭṭhāsānaṃ yuttabhāvaṃ vā ayuttabhāvaṃ vā esā rukkhadevatā jānāti, ehi,
atk-s0513a1:2465_3: taṃ pucchissāmā”ti taṃ tattha netvā “ayye rukkhadevate,
atk-s0513a1:2465_5: Athassa pitā saraṃ parivattetvā “tena hi kathethā”ti āha. “Ayye,
atk-s0513a1:2465_12: Bodhisatto evaṃ vinicchitaṃ aṭṭaṃ sutvā “idāni devatābhāvaṃ vā adevatābhāvaṃ vā jānissāmī”ti palālaṃ āharitvā susiraṃ pūretvā aggiṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2465_13: atipaṇḍitassa pitā jālāya phuṭṭhakāle aḍḍhajjhāmena sarīrena upari āruyha sākhaṃ gahetvā olambanto bhūmiyaṃ patitvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2467_0: “Sādhu kho paṇḍito nāma, na tveva atipaṇḍito;
atk-s0513a1:2469_0: Tattha sādhu kho paṇḍito nāmāti imasmiṃ loke paṇḍiccena samannāgato kāraṇākāraṇaññū puggalo sādhu sobhano.
atk-s0513a1:2469_1: Atipaṇḍitoti nāmamattena atipaṇḍito kūṭapuriso na tveva varaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2469_4: Te ubhopi majjhe bhinditvā samaññeva koṭṭhāsaṃ gaṇhitvā yathākammaṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a1:2470_0: Satthā “pubbepi esa kūṭavāṇijoyevā”ti imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –

atk-s0513a1:2474_2: Ekasmiṃ pana samaye bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitvā “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:2474_3: dasabalena saṃkhittena kathitaṃ dhammasenāpati sāriputto vitthārena byākāsī”ti therassa guṇaṃ kathayamānā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2474_6: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2474_8: sāriputto idāneva mayā saṃkhittena bhāsitaṃ vitthārena byākaroti,
atk-s0513a1:2475_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni
atk-s0513a1:2475_1: uggaṇhitvā kāme pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pañcābhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā himavante vihāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2475_3: Athassa jeṭṭhantevāsiko vassārattasamaye upaḍḍhaṃ isigaṇaṃ ādāya loṇambilasevanatthāya manussapathaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2475_6: kataro vo guṇo laddho”ti adhigamaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2475_8: Bodhisattā hi arūpasamāpattilābhino hutvāpi abhabbaṭṭhānattā āruppe na nibbattanti.
atk-s0513a1:2475_9: Antevāsikā “ācariyassa adhigamo natthī”ti āḷāhane sakkāraṃ na kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2476_0: Jeṭṭhantevāsiko āgantvā “kahaṃ ācariyo”ti pucchitvā “kālakato”ti sutvā “api ācariyaṃ adhigamaṃ pucchitthā”ti āha. “Āma,
atk-s0513a1:2476_4: athassa amhehi sakkāro na kato”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2476_7: Te tasmiṃ punappunaṃ kathentepi na saddahiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2476_8: Bodhisatto taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “andhabālā mama jeṭṭhantevāsikassa vacanaṃ na saddahanti.
atk-s0513a1:2476_9: Imaṃ tesaṃ kāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissāmī”ti brahmalokā āgantvā assamapadamatthake mahantenānubhāvena ākāse
atk-s0513a1:2476_10: ṭhatvā jeṭṭhantevāsikassa paññānubhāvaṃ vaṇṇento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2479_0: Ekova seyyo puriso sapañño, yo bhāsitassa vijānāti attha”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2480_1: Samāgatānanti sannipatitānaṃ bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānituṃ asakkontānaṃ bālānaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2480_2: Kandeyyuṃ te vassasataṃ apaññāti te evaṃ samāgatā apaññā ime bālatāpasā viya vassasatampi vassasahassampi rodeyyuṃ parideveyyuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2480_3: rodamānāpi pana atthaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ vā neva jāneyyunti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a1:2480_4: Ekova seyyo puriso sapaññoti evarūpānaṃ bālānaṃ parosahassatopi eko paṇḍitapurisova seyyo varataroti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2480_6: Yo bhāsitassa vijānāti atthaṃ ayaṃ jeṭṭhantevāsiko viyāti.
atk-s0513a1:2481_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto ākāse ṭhitova dhammaṃ desetvā tāpasagaṇaṃ bujjhāpetvā brahmalokameva gato.
atk-s0513a1:2482_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2486_0: Asātaṃ sātarūpenāti idaṃ satthā kuṇḍiyanagaraṃ upanissāya kuṇḍadhānavane viharanto koliyarājadhītaraṃ suppavāsaṃ upāsikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2486_1: Sā hi tasmiṃ samaye satta vassāni kucchinā gabbhaṃ pariharitvā sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhā ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2486_3: Sā evaṃ adhimattavedanābhibhūtāpi “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā,
atk-s0513a1:2486_4: yo evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0513a1:2486_8: yattheva rūpaṃ dukkhaṃ natthī”ti imehi tīhi vitakkehi adhivāsesi.
atk-s0513a1:2486_9: Sā sāmikaṃ pakkosetvā tañca attano pavattiṃ vandanasāsanañca ārocetuṃ satthu santikaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:2486_10: Satthā vandanasāsanaṃ sutvāva “sukhinī hotu suppavāsā koliyadhītā,
atk-s0513a1:2486_11: sukhinī arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyatū”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2486_12: Saha vacaneneva pana bhagavato suppavāsā koliyadhītā sukhinī arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0513a1:2486_13: Athassā sāmiko gehaṃ gantvā taṃ vijātaṃ disvā “acchariyaṃ vata,
atk-s0513a1:2486_14: bho”ti ativiya tathāgatassa ānubhāvena acchariyabbhutacittajāto ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2487_0: Suppavāsāpi puttaṃ vijāyitvā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa dānaṃ dātukāmā puna nimantanatthāya taṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:2487_1: Tena kho pana samayena mahāmoggallānassa upaṭṭhākena buddhappamukho saṅgho nimantito hoti.
atk-s0513a1:2487_2: Satthā suppavāsāya dānassa okāsadānatthāya theraṃ tassa santikaṃ pesetvā taṃ saññāpetvā sattāhaṃ tassā dānaṃ paṭiggahesi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena.
atk-s0513a1:2487_3: Sattame pana divase suppavāsā puttaṃ sīvalikumāraṃ maṇḍetvā satthārañceva bhikkhusaṅghañca vandāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2487_4: Tasmiṃ paṭipāṭiyā sāriputtattherassa santikaṃ nīte thero tena saddhiṃ “kacci te, sīvali,
atk-s0513a1:2487_7: svāhaṃ satta vassāni lohitakumbhiyaṃ vasi”nti therena saddhiṃ evarūpaṃ kathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2487_8: Suppāvāsā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “sattāhajāto me putto anubuddhena dhammasenāpatinā saddhiṃ mantetī”ti somanassappattā ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2487_9: Satthā “api nu suppavāse aññepi evarūpe putte icchasī”ti āha. “Sace, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2487_12: Satthā udānaṃ udānetvā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:2487_13: Sīvalikumāropi kho sattavassikakāleyeva sāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajitvā paripuṇṇavasso upasampadaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2487_14: puññavā lābhaggappatto hutvā pathaviṃ unnādetvā arahattaṃ patvā puññavantānaṃ antare etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:2488_1: sīvalitthero nāma evarūpo mahāpuñño patthitapatthano pacchimabhavikasatto satta vassāni lohitakumbhiyaṃ vasitvā sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhabhāvaṃ āpajji,
atk-s0513a1:2488_3: kiṃ nu kho kammaṃ akaṃsū”ti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2488_6: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:2488_7: sīvalino mahāpuññatova satta vassāni lohitakumbhiyaṃ nivāso ca sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhabhāvappatti ca attanā katakammamūlakāva,
atk-s0513a1:2488_8: suppavāsāyapi satta vassāni kucchinā gabbhapariharaṇadukkhañca sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhadukkhañca attanā katakammamūlakamevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2489_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2489_1: vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā pitu accayena rajjaṃ patvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:2489_2: Tasmiṃ samaye kosalamahārājā mahantena balenāgantvā bārāṇasiṃ gahetvā rājānaṃ māretvā tasseva aggamahesiṃ attano aggamahesiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2489_3: Bārāṇasirañño pana putto pitu maraṇakāle niddhamanadvārena palāyitvā balaṃ saṃharitvā bārāṇasiṃ āgantvā
atk-s0513a1:2489_4: avidūre nisīditvā tassa rañño paṇṇaṃ pesesi “rajjaṃ vā detu yuddhaṃ vā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2489_6: Rājakumārassa pana mātā taṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā “yuddhena kammaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a1:2489_8: tato dārūdakabhattaparikkhayena kilantamanussaṃ nagaraṃ vināva yuddhena gaṇhissasī”ti paṇṇaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:2489_9: So mātu sāsanaṃ sutvā satta divasāni sañcāraṃ pacchinditvā nagaraṃ rundhi,
atk-s0513a1:2489_10: nāgarā sañcāraṃ alabhamānā sattame divase tassa rañño sīsaṃ gahetvā kumārassa adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2489_11: Kumāro pana nagaraṃ pavisitvā rajjaṃ gahetvā jīvitapariyosāne yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2490_0: So etarahi satta divasāni sañcāraṃ pacchinditvā nagaraṃ rundhitvā gahitakammanissandena satta vassāni
atk-s0513a1:2490_2: Yaṃ pana so padumuttarassa bhagavato pādamūle “lābhīnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti mahādānaṃ datvā patthanaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2490_3: yañca vipassibuddhakāle nāgarehi saddhiṃ sahassagghanakaṃ guḷadadhiṃ datvā patthanamakāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2490_6: tātā”ti pesitabhāvena satta vassāni kucchinā gabbhaṃ pariharitvā sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhā jātā.
atk-s0513a1:2491_0: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2495_1: Pamattamativattatīti asātaṃ appiyaṃ dukkhanti etaṃ tividhampi etena sātarūpādinā ākārena sativippavāsavasena
atk-s0513a1:2495_2: pamattaṃ puggalaṃ ativattati abhibhavati ajjhottharatīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2495_3: Idaṃ bhagavatā yañca te mātāputtā iminā gabbhapariharaṇagabbhavāsasaṅkhātena asātādinā pubbe nagararundhanasātādipatirūpakena ajjhotthaṭā,
atk-s0513a1:2495_4: yañca idāni sā upāsikā punapi sattakkhattuṃ evarūpaṃ asātaṃ appiyaṃ dukkhaṃ pemavatthubhūtena puttasaṅkhātena
atk-s0513a1:2496_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2509_0: Ekova seyyo puriso sapañño, yo bhāsitassa vijānāti attha”nti. –
atk-s0513a1:2510_0: Idaṃ jātakaṃ vatthuto ca veyyākaraṇato ca samodhānato ca parosahassajātakasadisameva.
atk-s0513a1:2510_4: evaṃ olokentāpi pana atthaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ vā na passanti,
atk-s0513a1:2514_0: Yo dukkhaphuṭṭhāya bhaveyya tāṇanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ paṇṇikaṃ upāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2514_1: So kira sāvatthivāsī upāsako nānappakārāni mūlapaṇṇādīni ceva lābukumbhaṇḍādīni ca vikkiṇitvā jīvikaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0513a1:2514_2: Tassekā dhītā abhirūpā pāsādikā ācārasīlasampannā hirottappasamannāgatā kevalaṃ niccappahasitamukhā.
atk-s0513a1:2514_3: Tassā samānakulesu vāreyyatthāya āgatesu so cintesi “imissā vāreyyaṃ vattati,
atk-s0513a1:2514_5: Kumārikādhamme pana asati kumārikāya parakulaṃ gatāya mātāpitūnaṃ garahā hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2514_8: So ekadivasaṃ dhītaraṃ pacchiṃ gāhāpetvā paṇṇatthāya araññaṃ gantvā vīmaṃsanavasena kilesasannissito
atk-s0513a1:2514_9: viya hutvā rahassakathaṃ kathetvā taṃ hatthe gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:2514_15: atthi dāni te kumārikādhammo”ti. “Āma, tāta, atthi.
atk-s0513a1:2514_16: Mayā hi lobhavasena na koci puriso olokitapubbo”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2514_17: So dhītaraṃ assāsetvā gharaṃ netvā maṅgalaṃ katvā parakulaṃ pesetvā “satthāraṃ vandissāmī”ti gandhamālādihattho
atk-s0513a1:2514_18: jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā pūjetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi,
atk-s0513a1:2514_22: tvaṃ pana na idāneva evaṃ vīmaṃsasi,
atk-s0513a1:2514_23: pubbepi vīmaṃsiyevā”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2515_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto araññe rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2515_2: Tena pana sā vīmaṃsanatthāya hatthe gahitamattā paridevamānā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2517_0: “Yo dukkhaphuṭṭhāya bhaveyya tāṇaṃ, so me pitā dubbhi vane karoti;
atk-s0513a1:2518_0: Sā kassa kandāmi vanassa majjhe, yo tāyitā so sahasaṃ karotī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2519_0: Tattha yo dukkhaphuṭṭhāya bhaveyya tāṇanti kāyikacetasikehi dukkhehi phuṭṭhāya tāyitā paritāyitā patiṭṭhā bhaveyya.
atk-s0513a1:2519_1: So me pitā dubbhi vane karotīti so mayhaṃ dukkhaparitāyako pitāva imasmiṃ vane evarūpaṃ mittadubbhi kammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a1:2519_2: attano jātāya dhītari vītikkamaṃ kātuṃ maññatīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2519_5: Yo tāyitā so sahasaṃ karotīti yo mayhaṃ tāyitā rakkhitā avassayo bhavituṃ arahati,
atk-s0513a1:2520_3: So taṃ gharaṃ netvā maṇḍetvā maṅgalaṃ katvā parakulaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:2521_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a1:2522_2: taṃ kāraṇaṃ paccakkhato diṭṭharukkhadevatā pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a1:2526_0: Yattha verī nivisatīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anāthapiṇḍikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2526_1: Anāthapiṇḍiko kira bhogagāmaṃ gantvā āgacchanto antarāmagge core disvā “antarāmagge vasituṃ na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2526_2: sāvatthimeva gamissāmī”ti vegena goṇe pājetvā sāvatthimeva āgantvā punadivase vihāraṃ gato satthu etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:2526_3: Satthā “pubbepi gahapati paṇḍitā antarāmagge core disvā antarā avilambamānā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gamiṃsū”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2527_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi hutvā ekaṃ gāmakaṃ nimantanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2527_1: bhuñjanatthāya gantvā paccāgacchanto antarāmagge core disvā antarāmagge avasitvāva vegena goṇe pājento
atk-s0513a1:2527_2: attano gehameva āgantvā nānaggarasehi bhuñjitvā mahāsayane nisinno “corānaṃ hatthato muccitvā nibbhayaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2527_3: attano gehaṃ āgatomhī”ti udānavasena imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2529_0: “Yattha verī nivisati, na vase tattha paṇḍito;
atk-s0513a1:2530_0: Ekarattaṃ dirattaṃ vā, dukkhaṃ vasati verisū”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2531_2: Na vase tattha paṇḍitoti so verīpuggalo yasmiṃ ṭhāne patiṭṭhito hutvā vasati,
atk-s0513a1:2531_3: tattha paṇḍito paṇḍiccena samannāgato na vaseyya.
atk-s0513a1:2531_7: verīnañhi antare vasanto ekāhampi dvīhampi dukkhameva vasatīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2532_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto udānaṃ udānetvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2533_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā ahameva bārāṇasiseṭṭhi ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2537_0: Catubbhi aṭṭhajjhagamāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ dubbacabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2537_3: Tasmiñhi kāle uracakkaṃ ukkhipitvā niraye paccamāno eko nerayikasatto “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2537_4: kiṃ nu kho pāpakammaṃ akāsi”nti bodhisattaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2537_5: Bodhisatto “tayā idañcidañca pāpakammaṃ kata”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2542_0: Tattha catubbhi aṭṭhajjhagamāti samuddantare catasso vimānapetiyo labhitvā tāhi asantuṭṭho atricchatāya parato gantvā aparā aṭṭha adhigatosīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2542_2: Atricchaṃ cakkamāsadoti evaṃ sakalābhena asantuṭṭho atra atra icchanto parato parato lābhaṃ patthento idāni cakkamāsado idaṃ uracakkaṃ pattosi.
atk-s0513a1:2542_3: Tassa te evaṃ icchāhatassa posassa taṇhāya hatassa upahatassa tava cakkaṃ bhamati matthake.
atk-s0513a1:2542_5: ayacakkanti imesu dvīsu khuradhāraṃ ayacakkaṃ tassa matthake punappunaṃ patanavasena bhamantaṃ disvā evamāha.
atk-s0513a1:2542_6: Vatvā ca pana attano devalokameva gato.
atk-s0513a1:2542_7: Sopi nerayikasatto attano pāpe khīṇe yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2543_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2547_0: Bahumpetaṃ vane kaṭṭhanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ uttasitabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2547_1: So kira sāvatthivāsī eko kulaputto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā maraṇabhīruko ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2547_2: rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu vātassa vā vījantassa sukkhadaṇḍakassa vā patantassa pakkhicatuppadānaṃ vā saddaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2547_8: Tassa so maraṇabhīrukabhāvo bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:2548_1: asuko nāma bhikkhu maraṇabhīruko maraṇaṃ bhāyati,
atk-s0513a1:2548_2: bhikkhunā nāma ‘avassaṃ mayā maritabba’nti maraṇassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2548_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte taṃ bhikkhuṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ maraṇabhīruko”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2549_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto himavante rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2549_1: Tasmiṃ kāle bārāṇasirājā attano maṅgalahatthiṃ āneñjakāraṇaṃ sikkhāpetuṃ hatthācariyānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2549_2: Taṃ āḷāne niccalaṃ bandhitvā tomarahatthā manussā parivāretvā āneñjakāraṇaṃ kārenti.
atk-s0513a1:2549_3: So taṃ kāraṇaṃ kāriyamāno vedanaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto āḷānaṃ bhinditvā manusse palāpetvā himavantaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:2549_6: vātasaddāni sutvā kampamāno maraṇabhayatajjito soṇḍaṃ vidhunitvā vegena palāyati,
atk-s0513a1:2549_7: āḷāne bandhitvā āneñjakāraṇaṃ karaṇakālo viyassa hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2549_8: kāyassādaṃ vā cittassādaṃ vā alabhanto kampamāno vicarati.
atk-s0513a1:2550_0: Rukkhadevatā taṃ disvā khandhaviṭape ṭhatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2553_0: Tassa ce bhāyasi nāga, kiso nūna bhavissasī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2554_1: yaṃ etaṃ dubbalaṃ kaṭṭhaṃ puratthimādibhedo vāto bhañjati,
atk-s0513a1:2554_5: evaṃ sante niccaṃ bhīto maṃsalohitakkhayaṃ patvā kiso nūna bhavissasi,
atk-s0513a1:2554_6: imasmiṃ pana vane tava bhayaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:2555_0: Evaṃ devatā tassa ovādaṃ adāsi, sopi tato paṭṭhāya nibbhayo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2556_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a1:2560_0: Sukhaṃ vata maṃ jīvantanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto thullakumārikāpalobhanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2560_2: Taṃ pana bhikkhuṃ satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2560_3: bhagavā”ti vutte “kattha te cittaṃ paṭibaddha”nti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2560_5: Atha naṃ satthā “ayaṃ te bhikkhu anatthakārikā,
atk-s0513a1:2560_6: pubbepi tvaṃ etaṃ nissāya sīlabyasanaṃ patvā kampanto vicaramāno paṇḍite nissāya sukhaṃ labhī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2561_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārenteti atītavatthupi cūḷanāradakassapajātakeyeva āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2561_1: Tadā pana bodhisatto sāyaṃ phalāphale ādāya āgantvā paṇṇasālādvāraṃ vivaritvā pavisitvā puttaṃ cūḷatāpasaṃ etadavoca “tāta,
atk-s0513a1:2561_5: ajja pana ekampi akatvā kasmā dummukho pajjhāyanto nipannosī”ti? “Tāta,
atk-s0513a1:2561_6: tumhesu phalāphalatthāya gatesu ekā itthī āgantvā maṃ palobhetvā ādāya gantuṃ ārabhi,
atk-s0513a1:2561_7: ahaṃ pana ‘tumhehi vissajjito gamissāmī’ti na gacchiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2561_10: Bodhisatto “na sakkā etaṃ nivattetu”nti ñatvā “tena hi, tāta, gaccha,
atk-s0513a1:2561_11: esā pana taṃ netvā yadā macchamaṃsādīni vā khāditukāmā bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2561_14: Tadā mayhaṃ guṇaṃ saritvā palāyitvā idheva āgaccheyyāsī”ti vissajjesi.
atk-s0513a1:2561_16: Atha naṃ sā attano vasaṃ gametvā “maṃsaṃ āhara,
atk-s0513a1:2561_17: macchaṃ āharā”ti yena yena atthikā hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2561_19: Tadā so “ayaṃ maṃ attano dāsaṃ viya kammakāraṃ viya ca katvā pīḷetī”ti palāyitvā pitu santikaṃ āgantvā pitaraṃ vanditvā ṭhitakova imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2565_0: Tattha sukhaṃ vata maṃ jīvantanti tāta,
atk-s0513a1:2565_6: cāṭito vā kūpato vā udakaussiñcanaghaṭikāyetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2565_11: Corī jāyappavādenāti “bhariyā”ti nāmena ekā corī maṃ madhuravacanena upalāpetvā tattha netvā telaṃ loṇañca yañca aññaṃ icchati,
atk-s0513a1:2565_13: dāsaṃ viya kammakāraṃ viya ca katvā āharāpetīti tassā aguṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2566_4: So na cirasseva abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca uppādetvā brahmavihāre bhāvetvā saddhiṃ pitarā brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2567_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a1:2572_0: Sādhū kho sippakaṃ nāmāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ haṃsapaharanakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2572_1: So kireko sāvatthivāsī kulaputto sālittakasippe nipphattiṃ patto.
atk-s0513a1:2572_3: So ekadivasaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā sāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajitvā upasampadaṃ labhi,
atk-s0513a1:2572_6: So ekadivasaṃ ekaṃ daharabhikkhuṃ ādāya aciravatiṃ gantvā nhāyitvā nadītīre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2572_7: Tasmiṃ samaye dve setahaṃsā ākāsena gacchanti.
atk-s0513a1:2572_8: So taṃ daharaṃ āha “imaṃ pacchimahaṃsaṃ sakkharāya akkhimhi paharitvā pādamūle pātemī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2572_14: “Tena hi upadhārehī”ti ekaṃ tikhiṇasakkharaṃ gahetvā aṅguliyā pariyante katvā tassa haṃsassa pacchato khipi.
atk-s0513a1:2572_16: haṃso “parissayena bhavitabba”nti nivattitvā saddaṃ sotuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:2572_17: Itaro tasmiṃ khaṇe ekaṃ vaṭṭasakkharaṃ gahetvā tassa nivattitvā olokentassa parabhāge akkhiṃ pahari.
atk-s0513a1:2572_20: Tato tato bhikkhū āgantvā garahitvā “ananucchavikaṃ te kata”nti satthu santikaṃ netvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2572_21: iminā idaṃ nāma kata”nti tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2572_25: pubbepi kusaloyeva ahosī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2573_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa amacco ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2573_1: Tasmiṃ kāle rañño purohito atimukharo hoti bahubhāṇī,
atk-s0513a1:2573_2: tasmiṃ kathetuṃ āraddhe aññe okāsameva na labhanti.
atk-s0513a1:2573_3: Rājā cintesi “kadā nu kho etassa vacanupacchedakaṃ kañci labhissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2573_4: So tato paṭṭhāya tathārūpaṃ ekaṃ upadhārento vicarati.
atk-s0513a1:2573_5: Tasmiṃ kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ eko pīṭhasappī sakkharākhipanasippe nipphattiṃ patto hoti.
atk-s0513a1:2573_6: Gāmadārakā taṃ rathakaṃ āropetvā ākaḍḍhamānā bārāṇasinagaradvāramūle eko viṭapasampanno mahānigrodho atthi,
atk-s0513a1:2573_7: tattha ānetvā samparivāretvā kākaṇikādīni datvā “hatthirūpakaṃ kara,
