atk-s0513a1:2635_17: Kevaṭṭā “macchā jālaṃ phāletvā gatā”ti maññamānā jālakoṭiyaṃ gahetvā ukkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2635_18: Te dvepi macchā jālato muccitvā udake patiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2635_19: Iti tehi mitacintiṃ nissāya jīvitaṃ laddhaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2636_0: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2640_2: Ubho tattha samāgatāti mitacintiṃ nissāya laddhajīvitā tattha udake puna ubhopi janā mitacintinā saddhiṃ samāgatāti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2641_0: Evaṃ satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a1:2641_2: Tadā bahucintī ca appacintī ca ime dve ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2645_0: Yāyaññe manusāsatīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ anusāsikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2645_1: Sā kira sāvatthivāsinī ekā kuladhītā pabbajitvā upasampannakālato paṭṭhāya samaṇadhamme ananuyuttā āmisagiddhā
atk-s0513a1:2645_2: hutvā yattha aññā bhikkhuniyo na gacchanti,
atk-s0513a1:2645_5: Sā rasataṇhāya bajjhitvā “sace imasmiṃ padese aññāpi bhikkhuniyo piṇḍāya carissanti,
atk-s0513a1:2645_8: evaṃ mayā kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā bhikkhunūpassayaṃ gantvā “ayye,
atk-s0513a1:2645_14: mā tattha piṇḍāya caritthā”ti bhikkhuniyo anusāsati.
atk-s0513a1:2645_15: Tassā vacanaṃ sutvā ekā bhikkhunīpi taṃ padesaṃ gīvaṃ parivattetvā na olokesi.
atk-s0513a1:2645_16: Tassā ekasmiṃ divase tasmiṃ padese piṇḍāya carantiyā vegenekaṃ gehaṃ pavisantiyā caṇḍo meṇḍako paharitvā ūruṭṭhikaṃ bhindi.
atk-s0513a1:2645_17: Manussā vegena upadhāvitvā dvidhā bhinnaṃ ūruṭṭhikaṃ ekato bandhitvā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ mañcenādāya bhikkhunūpassayaṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2645_18: Bhikkhuniyo “ayaṃ aññā bhikkhuniyo anusāsitvā sayaṃ tasmiṃ padese carantī ūruṭṭhikaṃ bhindāpetvā āgatā”ti parihāsaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2645_19: Tampi tāya katakāraṇaṃ na cirasseva bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2646_1: asukā anusāsikā bhikkhunī aññaṃ anusāsitvā sayaṃ tasmiṃ padese caramānā caṇḍena meṇḍakena ūruṃ bhindāpesī”ti tassā aguṇakathaṃ kathesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2646_4: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2646_8: niccakālaṃ dukkhameva anubhotī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2647_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto araññe sakuṇayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā vayappatto sakuṇajeṭṭhako
atk-s0513a1:2647_2: Tassa tattha vasanakāle ekā caṇḍasakuṇikā mahāvattanimaggaṃ gantvā gocaraṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0513a1:2647_3: Sā tattha sakaṭehi patitāni vīhimuggabījādīni labhitvā “yathā idāni imaṃ padesaṃ aññe sakuṇā nāgacchanti,
atk-s0513a1:2647_4: tathā karissāmī”ti cintetvā sakuṇasaṅghassa ovādaṃ deti “vattanimahāmaggo nāma sappaṭibhayo,
atk-s0513a1:2648_0: Sā ekadivasaṃ vattanimahāmagge carantī atimahāvegena āgacchantassa yānassa saddaṃ sutvā nivattitvā oloketvā “dūre tāvā”ti caratiyeva.
atk-s0513a1:2648_1: Atha naṃ yānaṃ vātavegena sīghameva sampāpuṇi,
atk-s0513a1:2648_4: Sakuṇajeṭṭhako sakuṇe samānento taṃ adisvā “anusāsikā na dissati,
atk-s0513a1:2648_6: Sakuṇā upadhārentā taṃ mahāmagge dvidhā chinnaṃ disvā sakuṇajeṭṭhakassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2648_7: Sakuṇajeṭṭhako “sā aññā sakuṇikā vāretvā sayaṃ tattha caramānā dvidhā chinnā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2651_0: Sāyaṃ vipakkhikā seti, hatā cakkena sāsikā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2652_3: Sāyaṃ vipakkhikā setīti sā esā vihatapakkhā hutvā mahāmagge sayati.
atk-s0513a1:2652_4: Hatā cakkena sāsikāti yānacakkena hatā sāsikā sakuṇikāti.
atk-s0513a1:2653_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2653_1: “tadā anusāsikā sakuṇikā ayaṃ anusāsikā bhikkhunī ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2657_0: Atikaramakarācariyāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ dubbacabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2657_1: Tassa vatthu navakanipāte gijjhajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2657_2: Satthā pana taṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantetvā “bhikkhu na tvaṃ idāneva dubbaco,
atk-s0513a1:2657_4: Dubbacabhāveneva paṇḍitānaṃ ovādaṃ akaronto sattippahārena jīvitakkhayaṃ pattosī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2658_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto laṅghanaṭakayoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā vayappatto paññavā upāyakusalo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2658_1: So ekassa laṅghanakassa santike sattilaṅghanasippaṃ sikkhitvā ācariyena saddhiṃ sippaṃ dassento vicarati.
atk-s0513a1:2658_2: Ācariyo panassa catunnaṃyeva sattīnaṃ laṅghanasippaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0513a1:2658_4: So ekadivasaṃ ekasmiṃ gāmake sippaṃ dassento surāmadamatto “pañca sattiyo laṅghissāmī”ti paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:2658_10: So suṭṭhu mattatāya “tvañhi mayhaṃ pamāṇaṃ na jānāsī”ti tassa vacanaṃ anādiyitvā catasso laṅghitvā pañcamāya
atk-s0513a1:2658_11: sattiyā daṇḍake madhukapupphaṃ viya āvuto paridevamāno nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:2658_12: Atha naṃ bodhisatto “paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ akatvā imaṃ byasanaṃ pattosī”ti imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2662_0: Tattha atikaramakarācariyāti ācariya ajja tvaṃ atikaraṃ akari,
atk-s0513a1:2662_1: attano karaṇato atirekaṃ karaṇaṃ akarīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2662_2: Mayhampetaṃ na ruccatīti mayhaṃ antevāsikassapi samānassa etaṃ tava karaṇaṃ na ruccati,
atk-s0513a1:2662_3: tena te ahaṃ paṭhamameva kathesinti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a1:2662_4: Catutthe laṅghayitvānāti catutthe sattithale apatitvā attānaṃ laṅghayitvā.
atk-s0513a1:2662_5: Pañcamāyasi āvutoti paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ aggaṇhanto idāni pañcamāya sattiyā āvutosīti.
atk-s0513a1:2662_6: Idaṃ vatvā ācariyaṃ sattito apanetvā kattabbayuttakaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2663_0: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2667_0: Accuggatātibalatāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kokālikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2667_1: Tassa vatthu terasakanipāte takkāriyajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2667_4: kokāliko idāneva attano vācaṃ nissāya naṭṭho,
atk-s0513a1:2668_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2668_1: sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā kāme pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pañcābhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattesi.
atk-s0513a1:2668_2: Himavantappadese sabbo isigaṇo sannipatitvā taṃ ovādācariyaṃ katvā parivāresi.
atk-s0513a1:2668_3: So pañcannaṃ isisatānaṃ ovādācariyo hutvā jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷanto himavante vasati.
atk-s0513a1:2668_4: Tadā eko cettha paṇḍurogī tāpaso kuṭhāriṃ gahetvā kaṭṭhaṃ phāleti.
atk-s0513a1:2668_5: Atheko mukharatāpaso tassa santike nisīditvā “idha pahāraṃ dehi,
atk-s0513a1:2668_6: idha pahāraṃ dehī”ti taṃ tāpasaṃ rosesi.
atk-s0513a1:2668_7: So kujjhitvā “na dāni me tvaṃ dāruphālanasippaṃ sikkhāpanakācariyo”ti tiṇhaṃ kuṭhāriṃ ukkhipitvā naṃ ekappahāreneva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2668_9: Tadā assamato avidūre ekasmiṃ vammikapāde eko tittiro vasati.
atk-s0513a1:2668_10: So sāyaṃ pātaṃ tasmiṃ vammikamatthake ṭhatvā mahāvassitaṃ vassati.
atk-s0513a1:2668_11: Taṃ sutvā eko luddako “tittirena bhavitabba”nti cintetvā saddasaññāya tattha gantvā taṃ vadhitvā ādāya gato.
atk-s0513a1:2669_0: Bodhisatto tassa saddaṃ asuṇanto “asukaṭṭhāne tittiro vasati,
atk-s0513a1:2669_1: kiṃ nu kho tassa saddo na sūyatī”ti tāpase pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2669_3: So ubhopi tāni kāraṇāni saṃsandetvā isigaṇamajjhe imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2673_3: Tittiraṃ vātivassitanti yathā tittiraṃ ativassitaṃ hanati,
atk-s0513a1:2673_4: tathā evarūpā vācā dummedhaṃ bālapuggalaṃ hanatīti.
atk-s0513a1:2674_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto isigaṇassa ovādaṃ datvā cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2675_2: kokāliko idāneva attano vacanaṃ nissāya naṭṭho,
atk-s0513a1:2675_3: pubbepi naṭṭhoyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2679_0: Nācintayanto purisoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto uttaraseṭṭhiputtaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2679_1: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira uttaraseṭṭhi nāma ahosi mahāvibhavo.
atk-s0513a1:2679_2: Tassa bhariyāya kucchiyaṃ eko puññavā satto brahmalokā cavitvā paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā vayappatto abhirūpo pāsādiko ahosi brahmavaṇṇī.
atk-s0513a1:2679_3: Atha ekadivasaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ kattikachaṇe nakkhatte ghuṭṭhe sabbo loko nakkhattanissito ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2679_4: Tassa sahāyakā aññe seṭṭhiputtā sapajāpatikā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2679_5: Uttaraseṭṭhiputtassa pana dīgharattaṃ brahmaloke vasitattā kilesesu cittaṃ na allīyati.
atk-s0513a1:2679_6: Athassa sahāyakā “uttaraseṭṭhiputtassapi ekaṃ itthiṃ ānetvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti sammantayitvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā “samma,
atk-s0513a1:2679_8: tuyhampi ekaṃ itthiṃ ānetvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2679_9: “Na me attho itthiyā”ti ca vuttepi punappunaṃ nibandhitvā sampaṭicchāpetvā ekaṃ vaṇṇadāsiṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2679_10: katvā tassa gharaṃ netvā “tvaṃ seṭṭhiputtassa santikaṃ gacchā”ti sayanigharaṃ pesetvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2679_11: Taṃ sayanigharaṃ paviṭṭhampi seṭṭhiputto neva oloketi, nālapati.
atk-s0513a1:2679_12: Sā cintesi “ayaṃ evaṃ rūpasobhaggappattaṃ uttamavilāsasampannaṃ maṃ neva oloketi, nālapati,
atk-s0513a1:2679_13: idāni naṃ attano itthikuttalīlāya olokāpessāmī”ti itthilīlaṃ dassentī pahaṭṭhākārena aggadante vivaritvā hasitaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2679_16: sakalampi taṃ sarīraṃ aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikā viya paññāyi.
atk-s0513a1:2680_0: Taṃ tassa gharā otiṇṇaṃ eko issaro antaravīthiyaṃ disvā paribbayaṃ datvā attano gharaṃ nesi,
atk-s0513a1:2680_2: Vaṇṇadāsiyā mātā dhītu āgamanaṃ adisvā seṭṭhiputtānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “kahaṃ sā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2680_3: Te uttaraseṭṭhiputtassa gharaṃ gantvā “kahaṃ sā”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2680_5: Athassā mātā rodantī “dhītaraṃ me na passāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2680_6: dhītaraṃ me samānethā”ti uttaraseṭṭhiputtaṃ ādāya rañño santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2680_7: Rājā aṭṭaṃ vinicchinanto “ime te seṭṭhiputtā vaṇṇadāsiṃ ānetvā tuyhaṃ adaṃsū”ti pucchi. “Āma, devā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2680_15: Atha naṃ pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā “rājāṇaṃ karissāmā”ti gahetvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2680_16: “Seṭṭhiputtaṃ kira vaṇṇadāsiṃ samānetuṃ asakkontaṃ rājā rājāṇaṃ kāretī”ti sakalanagaraṃ ekakolāhalaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2680_17: Mahājano ure hatthe ṭhapetvā “kiṃ nāmetaṃ, sāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2680_19: Seṭṭhipi puttassa pacchato pacchato paridevanto gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:2681_0: Seṭṭhiputto cintesi “idaṃ mayhaṃ evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ agāre vasanabhāvena uppannaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2681_3: Sāpi kho vaṇṇadāsī taṃ kolāhalasaddaṃ sutvā “kiṃsaddo nāmeso”ti pucchitvā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā vegena otaritvā “ussaratha,
atk-s0513a1:2681_5: maṃ rājapurisānaṃ daṭṭhuṃ dethā”ti attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0513a1:2681_6: Rājapurisā taṃ disvā mātaraṃ paṭicchāpetvā seṭṭhiputtaṃ muñcitvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2681_7: So sahāyakaparivutova nadiṃ gantvā sasīsaṃ nhāyitvā gehaṃ gantvā bhuttapātarāso mātāpitaro vanditvā pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2681_8: anujānāpetvā cīvarasāṭake ādāya mahantena parivārena satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā
atk-s0513a1:2681_9: pabbajjañca upasampadañca labhitvā avissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhāno vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā na cirasseva arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2682_1: uttaraseṭṭhiputto attano bhaye uppanne sāsanassa guṇaṃ jānitvā ‘imamhā dukkhā muccamāno pabbajissāmī’ti cintetvā tena sucintitena maraṇamutto ceva,
atk-s0513a1:2682_2: pabbajito ca aggaphale patiṭṭhito”ti tassa guṇakathaṃ kathesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2682_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2682_7: uttaraseṭṭhiputtova attano bhaye uppanne ‘iminā upāyena imamhā dukkhā muccissāmī’ti cintetvā maraṇabhayā mutto,
atk-s0513a1:2682_8: atīte paṇḍitāpi attano bhaye uppanne ‘iminā upāyena imamhā dukkhā muccissāmā’ti cintetvā maraṇabhayato mucciṃsuyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2683_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto cutipaṭisandhivasena parivattanto vaṭṭakayoniyaṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2683_1: Tadā eko vaṭṭakaluddako araññā bahū vaṭṭake āharitvā gehe ṭhapetvā gocaraṃ datvā mūlaṃ gahetvā āgatāgatānaṃ hatthe vaṭṭake vikkiṇanto jīvikaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0513a1:2683_2: So ekadivasaṃ bahūhi vaṭṭakehi saddhiṃ bodhisattampi gahetvā ānesi.
atk-s0513a1:2683_3: Bodhisatto cintesi “sacāhaṃ iminā dinnaṃ gocarañca pānīyañca paribhuñjissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2683_4: ayaṃ maṃ gahetvā āgatānaṃ manussānaṃ dassati.
atk-s0513a1:2683_7: atha maṃ milāyantaṃ disvā manussā na gaṇhissanti.
atk-s0513a1:2683_10: So tathā karonto milāyitvā aṭṭhicammamatto ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2683_12: Luddako bodhisattaṃ ṭhapetvā sesesu vaṭṭakesu parikkhīṇesu pacchiṃ nīharitvā dvāre ṭhapetvā bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2683_13: hatthatale katvā “kiṃ nu kho ayaṃ vaṭṭako”ti cintetvā oloketuṃ āraddho.
atk-s0513a1:2683_14: Athassa pamattabhāvaṃ ñatvā bodhisatto pakkhe pasāretvā uppatitvā araññameva gato.
atk-s0513a1:2683_15: Aññe vaṭṭakā taṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho na paññāyasi,
atk-s0513a1:2683_16: kahaṃ gatosī”ti pucchitvā “luddakena gahitomhī”ti vutte “kinti katvā muttosī”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2683_17: Bodhisatto “ahaṃ tena dinnaṃ gocaraṃ aggahetvā pānīyaṃ apivitvā upāyacintāya mutto”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2687_1: puriso dukkhaṃ patvā “iminā nāma upāyena imamhā dukkhā muccissāmī”ti acintayanto attano dukkhā mokkhasaṅkhātaṃ visesaṃ nādhigacchati.
atk-s0513a1:2687_2: Idāni pana mayā cintitakammassa phalaṃ passa.
atk-s0513a1:2687_4: maraṇato ca bandhanato ca muttosmi ahanti.
atk-s0513a1:2688_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2692_0: Amātāpitarasaṃvaddhoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ akālarāviṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2692_1: So kira sāvatthivāsī kulaputto sāsane pabbajitvā vattaṃ vā sikkhaṃ vā na uggaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:2692_6: paṭhamayāmepi majjhimayāmepi pacchimayāmepi pabuddhapabuddhakkhaṇeyeva mahāsaddaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a1:2692_9: asuko nāma bhikkhu evarūpe ratanasāsane pabbajitvā vattaṃ vā sikkhaṃ vā kālaṃ vā akālaṃ vā na jānātī”ti tassa aguṇakathaṃ kathesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2692_12: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2692_16: kālākālaṃ ajānanabhāvena ca gīvāya vaṭṭitāya jīvitakkhayaṃ patto”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2693_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto sabbasippesu
atk-s0513a1:2693_1: pāraṃ gantvā bārāṇasiyaṃ disāpāmokkho ācariyo hutvā pañcasate māṇave sippaṃ vāceti.
atk-s0513a1:2693_2: Tesaṃ māṇavānaṃ eko kālarāvī kukkuṭo atthi,
atk-s0513a1:2693_3: te tassa vassitasaddena uṭṭhāya sippaṃ sikkhanti.
atk-s0513a1:2693_6: Atheko māṇavako susānavane dārūni uddharanto ekaṃ kukkuṭaṃ disvā ānetvā pañjare ṭhapetvā paṭijaggati.
atk-s0513a1:2693_7: So susāne vaḍḍhitattā “asukavelāya nāma vassitabba”nti ajānanto kadāci atirattiṃ vassati,
atk-s0513a1:2693_9: Māṇavā tassa atirattiṃ vassitakāle sippaṃ sikkhantā yāva aruṇuggamanā sikkhituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0513a1:2693_11: Atipabhāte vassitakāle sajjhāyassa okāsameva na labhanti.
atk-s0513a1:2693_12: Māṇavā “ayaṃ atirattiṃ vā vassati atipabhāte vā,
atk-s0513a1:2693_13: imaṃ nissāya amhākaṃ sippaṃ na niṭṭhāyissatī”ti taṃ gahetvā gīvaṃ vaṭṭetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā “akālarāvī
atk-s0513a1:2693_15: Ācariyo “ovādaṃ aggahetvā saṃvaḍḍhitabhāvena maraṇaṃ patto”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2696_0: Nāyaṃ kālaṃ akālaṃ vā, abhijānāti kukkuṭo”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2697_0: Tattha amātāpitarasaṃvaddhoti mātāpitaro nissāya tesaṃ ovādaṃ aggahetvā saṃvaḍḍho.
atk-s0513a1:2697_3: Nāyaṃ kālaṃ akālaṃ vāti “imasmiṃ kāle vassitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2697_4: imasmiṃ na vassitabba”nti evaṃ vassitabbayuttakaṃ kālaṃ vā akālaṃ vā esa kukkuṭo na jānāti,
atk-s0513a1:2697_6: Idaṃ kāraṇaṃ dassetvā bodhisatto yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2698_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2702_0: Abaddhā tattha bajjhantīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ciñcamāṇavikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2702_1: Tassā vatthu dvādasakanipāte mahāpadumajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2703_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto purohitassa gehe nibbattitvā vayappatto pitu accayena tasseva purohito ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2703_4: Sā evamāha “na mayhaṃ añño varo nāma dullabho,
atk-s0513a1:2703_5: ito pana te paṭṭhāya aññā itthī kilesavasena na oloketabbā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2703_6: So paṭikkhipitvā punappunaṃ nippīḷiyamāno tassā vacanaṃ atikkamituṃ asakkonto sampaṭicchitvā tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:2703_7: soḷasasu nāṭakitthisahassesu kilesavasena ekitthimpi na olokesi.
atk-s0513a1:2704_1: paccante ṭhitā yodhā corehi saddhiṃ dve tayo saṅgāme katvā “ito uttari mayaṃ na sakkomā”ti rañño paṇṇaṃ pesesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2704_2: Rājā tattha gantukāmo balakāyaṃ saṃharitvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “bhadde,
atk-s0513a1:2704_9: mayā nivattitu”nti punappunaṃ raññā paṭikkhittā āha “tena hi ekekaṃ yojanaṃ gantvā mayhaṃ sukhadukkhajānanatthaṃ ekekaṃ manussaṃ peseyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2704_10: Rājā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā bodhisattaṃ nagare ṭhapetvā mahantena balakāyena nikkhamitvā gacchanto
atk-s0513a1:2704_11: yojane yojane ekekaṃ purisaṃ “amhākaṃ ārogyaṃ ārocetvā deviyā sukhadukkhaṃ jānitvā āgacchā”ti pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:2704_12: Sā āgatāgataṃ purisaṃ “rājā kimatthaṃ taṃ pesetī”ti pucchitvā “tumhākaṃ sukhadukkhajānanatthāyā”ti vutte
atk-s0513a1:2704_13: “tena hi ehī”ti tena saddhiṃ asaddhammaṃ paṭisevati.
atk-s0513a1:2704_14: Rājā dvattiṃsayojanamaggaṃ gacchanto dvattiṃsa jane pesesi,
atk-s0513a1:2704_15: sā sabbehipi tehi saddhiṃ tatheva akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2705_0: Rājā paccantaṃ vūpasametvā janapadaṃ samassāsetvā puna āgacchantopi tatheva dvattiṃsa jane pesesi,
atk-s0513a1:2705_2: Rājā āgantvā jayakkhandhāvāraṭṭhāne ṭhatvā “nagaraṃ paṭijaggāpetū”ti bodhisattassa paṇṇaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:2705_3: Bodhisatto sakalanagaraṃ paṭijaggāpetvā rājanivesanaṃ paṭijaggāpento deviyā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2705_4: Sā bodhisattassa rūpasobhaggappattaṃ kāyaṃ disvā saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontī “ehi, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a1:2705_9: na sakkā mayā evaṃ kātu”nti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2705_16: “Ahaṃ pana jānamāno evarūpaṃ sāhasiyakammaṃ na karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2705_21: attabhāvasahassepi sīse chijjante na sakkā mayā evarūpaṃ kātu”nti. Sā “hotu,
atk-s0513a1:2705_22: jānissāmī”ti bodhisattaṃ tajjetvā attano gabbhaṃ pavisitvā sarīre nakhavaḷañjaṃ dassetvā telena gattāni
atk-s0513a1:2705_23: abbhañjitvā kiliṭṭhavatthaṃ nivāsetvā gilānālayaṃ katvā dāsiyo āṇāpesi ‘raññā kahaṃ devī’ti vutte ‘gilānā’ti
atk-s0513a1:2706_1: Rājā nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pāsādaṃ āruyha deviṃ apassanto “kahaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2706_3: Sopi sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā tassā piṭṭhiṃ parimajjanto “kiṃ te, bhadde,
atk-s0513a1:2706_11: Tumhehi nagaraṃ rakkhanatthāya ṭhapito purohito “tumhākaṃ nivesanaṃ paṭijaggāmī”ti idhāgantvā attano
atk-s0513a1:2706_12: vacanaṃ akarontiṃ maṃ paharitvā attano manaṃ pūretvā gatoti.
atk-s0513a1:2706_13: Rājā aggimhi pakkhittaloṇasakkharā viya kodhena taṭataṭāyanto sirigabbhā nikkhamitvā dovārikapādamūlikādayo pakkosāpetvā “gacchatha, bhaṇe,
atk-s0513a1:2706_14: purohitaṃ pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā vajjhabhāvappattaṃ katvā nagarā nīharitvā āghātanaṃ netvā sīsamassa chindathā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2706_15: Te vegena gantvā taṃ pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā vajjhabheriṃ carāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2707_2: ajja dānāhaṃ attano baleneva attānaṃ mocessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2707_4: tumhe maṃ mārentā rañño dassetvāva mārethā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2707_12: mayā rañño sāpateyye ācikkhite pacchā kātabbaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2707_16: kasmā te evarūpaṃ pāpakammaṃ kata”nti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2707_21: lobhavasena paresaṃ itthī akkhīni ummīletvāpi na olokitapubbā,
atk-s0513a1:2707_25: Sā pana bālā lobhavasena maṃ hatthe gahetvā mayā paṭikkhittā maṃ tajjetvā attanā kataṃ pāpaṃ uttānaṃ katvā mama ācikkhitvā antogabbhaṃ paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0513a1:2707_27: paṇṇaṃ gahetvā pana āgatā catusaṭṭhi janā sāparādhā,
atk-s0513a1:2707_30: Rājā te catusaṭṭhi jane bandhāpetvā deviṃ pakkosāpetvā “tayā etehi saddhiṃ pāpaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2707_32: devā”ti vutte te pacchābāhaṃ bandhāpetvā “imesaṃ catusaṭṭhijanānaṃ sīsāni chindathā”ti āṇāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2708_9: Tasmā etissāpi khamathā”ti nānappakārena rājānaṃ saññāpetvā te catusaṭṭhipi jane tañca bālaṃ mocāpetvā sabbesaṃ yathāsakāni ṭhānāni dāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2708_10: Evaṃ te sabbe mocetvā sakaṭṭhāne patiṭṭhāpetvā bodhisatto rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:2708_11: andhabālānaṃ nāma avatthukena vacanena abandhitabbayuttakāpi paṇḍitā pacchābāhaṃ baddhā,
atk-s0513a1:2708_12: paṇḍitānaṃ kāraṇayuttena vacanena pacchābāhaṃ baddhāpi muttā.
atk-s0513a1:2708_14: paṇḍitā baddhepi mocentī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2711_0: Baddhāpi tattha muccanti, yattha dhīrā pabhāsare”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2712_0: Tattha abaddhāti abandhitabbayuttā. Pabhāsareti pabhāsanti vadanti kathenti.
atk-s0513a1:2713_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto imāya gāthāya rañño dhammaṃ desetvā “mayā imaṃ dukkhaṃ agāre vasanabhāvena laddhaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2713_3: devā”ti pabbajjaṃ anujānāpetvā assumukhaṃ ñātijanaṃ mahantañca vibhavaṃ pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0513a1:2713_4: himavante vasanto abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2714_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2724_0: Kare sarikkhoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anāthapiṇḍikassa mittaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2724_1: Anāthapiṇḍikassa hi mittasuhajjañātibandhavā ekato hutvā “mahāseṭṭhi ayaṃ tayā jātigottadhanadhaññādīhi neva sadiso,
atk-s0513a1:2724_5: Anāthapiṇḍiko pana “mittasanthavo nāma hīnehipi samehipi atirekehipi kattabboyevā”ti tesaṃ vacanaṃ aggahetvā
atk-s0513a1:2724_6: bhogagāmaṃ gacchanto taṃ kuṭumbarakkhakaṃ katvā agamāsīti sabbaṃ kāḷakaṇṇivatthusmiṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2724_7: Idha pana anāthapiṇḍikena attano ghare pavattiyā ārocitāya satthā “gahapati,
atk-s0513a1:2724_10: mitto nāma attanā samopi hīnopi seṭṭhopi gahetabbo.
atk-s0513a1:2724_12: idāni tāva tvaṃ attano nīcamittaṃ nissāya kuṭumbassa sāmiko jāto,
atk-s0513a1:2724_13: porāṇā pana nīcamittaṃ nissāya vimānasāmikā jātā”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2725_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto rañño uyyāne kusanāḷigacche devatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2725_1: Tasmiṃyeva ca uyyāne maṅgalasilaṃ nissāya ujugatakkhandho parimaṇḍalasākhāviṭapasampanno rañño santikā laddhasammāno rucamaṅgalarukkho atthi,
atk-s0513a1:2725_5: Tadā rājā ekasmiṃ ekatthambhake pāsāde vasati,
atk-s0513a1:2725_10: ekaṃ sāratthambhaṃ āharitvā taṃ niccalaṃ karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2725_12: devā”ti rañño vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā tadanucchavikaṃ rukkhaṃ pariyesamānā aññattha adisvā uyyānaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a1:2725_13: taṃ mukhakarukkhaṃ disvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ, tātā,
atk-s0513a1:2725_14: diṭṭho vo tadanucchaviko rukkho”ti vutte “diṭṭho, deva,
atk-s0513a1:2725_15: apica taṃ chindituṃ na visahāmā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2725_17: Mayañhi aññattha rukkhaṃ apassantā uyyānaṃ pavisimha,
atk-s0513a1:2725_18: tatrapi ṭhapetvā maṅgalarukkhaṃ aññaṃ na passāma.
atk-s0513a1:2725_19: Iti naṃ maṅgalarukkhatāya chindituṃ na visahāmāti.
atk-s0513a1:2725_23: Te “sādhū”ti balikammaṃ gahetvā uyyānaṃ gantvā “sve chindissāmā”ti rukkhassa balikammaṃ katvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2726_0: Rukkhadevatā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “sve mayhaṃ vimānaṃ nāsessanti,
atk-s0513a1:2726_1: dārake gahetvā kuhiṃ gamissāmī”ti gantabbaṭṭhānaṃ apassantī puttake gīvāya gahetvā parodi.
atk-s0513a1:2726_2: Tassā sandiṭṭhasambhattā rukkhadevatā āgantvā “kiṃ eta”nti pucchitvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ sutvā sayampi vaḍḍhakīnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2726_3: paṭikkamanūpāyaṃ apassantiyo taṃ parissajitvā rodituṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2726_4: Tasmiṃ samaye bodhisatto “rukkhadevataṃ passissāmī”ti tattha gantvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ sutvā “hotu,
atk-s0513a1:2726_7: sve vaḍḍhakīnaṃ āgatakāle mama kāraṇaṃ passathā”ti tā devatā samassāsetvā punadivase vaḍḍhakīnaṃ āgatavelāya
atk-s0513a1:2726_8: kakaṇṭakavesaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhakīnaṃ purato gantvā maṅgalarukkhassa mūlantaraṃ pavisitvā taṃ rukkhaṃ susiraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2726_9: viya katvā rukkhamajjhena abhiruhitvā khandhamatthakena nikkhamitvā sīsaṃ kampayamāno nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:2726_10: Mahāvaḍḍhakī taṃ kakaṇṭakaṃ disvā rukkhaṃ hatthena paharitvā “susirarukkho eso nissāro,
atk-s0513a1:2726_11: hiyyo anupadhāretvāva balikammaṃ karimhā”ti ekaghanaṃ mahārukkhaṃ garahitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:2726_12: Rukkhadevatā bodhisattaṃ nissāya vimānassa sāminī jātā.
atk-s0513a1:2727_0: Tassā paṭisanthāratthāya sandiṭṭhasambhattā bahū devatā sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2727_1: Rukkhadevatā “vimānaṃ me laddha”nti tuṭṭhacittā tāsaṃ devatānaṃ majjhe bodhisattassa guṇaṃ kathayamānā “bho, devatā,
atk-s0513a1:2727_2: mayaṃ mahesakkhā hutvāpi dandhapaññatāya imaṃ upāyaṃ na jānimha,
atk-s0513a1:2727_3: kusanāḷidevatā pana attano ñāṇasampattiyā amhe vimānasāmike akāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2727_4: mitto nāma sadisopi adhikopi hīnopi kattabbova.
atk-s0513a1:2727_5: Sabbepi hi attano thāmena sahāyakānaṃ uppannaṃ dukkhaṃ nittharitvā sukhe patiṭṭhāpentiyevā”ti mittadhammaṃ vaṇṇetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2729_0: “Kare sarikkho atha vāpi seṭṭho, nihīnako vāpi kareyya eko;
atk-s0513a1:2730_0: Kareyyumete byasane uttamatthaṃ, yathā ahaṃ kusanāḷi rucāya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2731_0: Tattha kare sarikkhoti jātiādīhi sadisopi mittadhammaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0513a1:2731_1: Atha vāpi seṭṭhoti jātiādīhi adhikopi kareyya.
atk-s0513a1:2731_2: Nihīnako vāpi kareyya ekoti eko jātiādīhi hīnopi mittadhammaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0513a1:2731_3: Tasmā sabbepi ete mittā kātabbāyevāti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a1:2731_5: Kareyyumete byasane uttamatthanti sabbepete sahāyassa byasane uppanne attano attano pattabhāraṃ vahamānā uttamatthaṃ kareyyuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2731_11: yathā ahaṃ rucāyaṃ nibbattadevatā ayañca kusanāḷidevatā,
atk-s0513a1:2731_13: tatrapāhaṃ mahesakkhāpi samānā attano uppannadukkhaṃ bālatāya anupāyakusalatāya harituṃ nāsakkhiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2731_14: imaṃ pana appesakkhampi samānaṃ paṇḍitadevataṃ nissāya dukkhato muttomhi.
atk-s0513a1:2731_15: Tasmā aññehipi dukkhā muccitukāmehi samavisiṭṭhabhāvaṃ anoloketvā hīnopi paṇḍito mitto kātabboti.
atk-s0513a1:2732_0: Rucādevatā imāya gāthāya devasaṅghassa dhammaṃ desetvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā saddhiṃ kusanāḷidevatāya yathākammaṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a1:2733_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2737_0: Yasaṃ laddhāna dummedhoti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2737_3: āveḷāveḷābhūtā yamakayamakabhūtā ghanabuddharasmiyo vissajjentaṃ paramasobhaggappattaṃ attabhāvañca oloketvā
atk-s0513a1:2737_6: ‘Buddhā nāma evarūpena sīlena samādhinā paññāya vimuttiyā vimuttiñāṇadassanena samannāgatā’ti vuccamāne vaṇṇaṃ sahituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a1:2737_10: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2737_12: idāneva devadatto mama vaṇṇe bhaññamāne usūyaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a1:2738_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhe rājagahanagare ekasmiṃ magadharāje rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto hatthiyoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:2738_1: sabbaseto ahosi heṭṭhā vaṇṇitasadisāya rūpasampattiyā samannāgato.
atk-s0513a1:2738_2: Atha naṃ “lakkhaṇasampanno aya”nti so rājā maṅgalahatthiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2738_3: Athekasmiṃ chaṇadivase sakalanagaraṃ devanagaraṃ viya alaṅkārāpetvā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ maṅgalahatthiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2738_4: abhiruhitvā mahantena rājānubhāvena nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2738_5: Mahājano tattha tattha ṭhatvā maṅgalahatthino rūpasobhaggappattaṃ sarīraṃ disvā “aho rūpaṃ, aho gati, aho līḷā,
atk-s0513a1:2738_7: evarūpo nāma sabbasetavaravāraṇo cakkavattirañño anucchaviko”ti maṅgalahatthimeva vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0513a1:2739_0: Rājā maṅgalahatthissa vaṇṇaṃ sutvā sahituṃ asakkonto usūyaṃ uppādetvā “ajjeva taṃ pabbatapāde pātetvā
atk-s0513a1:2739_1: jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessāmī”ti hatthācariyaṃ pakkosāpetvā “kinti katvā tayā ayaṃ nāgo sikkhāpito”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2739_8: “Tena hi ehī”ti sayaṃ otaritvā hatthācariyaṃ āropetvā pabbatapādaṃ gantvā hatthācariyena hatthipiṭṭhiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2739_9: nisīditvāva hatthimhi vepullapabbatamatthakaṃ āropite sayampi amaccagaṇaparivuto pabbatamatthakaṃ abhiruhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2739_10: hatthiṃ papātābhimukhaṃ kāretvā “tvaṃ ‘mayā esa susikkhāpito’ti vadesi,
atk-s0513a1:2739_11: tīhiyeva tāva naṃ pādehi ṭhapehī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2739_12: Hatthācariyo piṭṭhiyaṃ nisīditvāva “bho tīhi pādehi tiṭṭhā”ti hatthissa paṇhikāya saññaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2739_15: mahāsatto dve pacchimapāde ukkhipitvā purimapādehi aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2739_16: “Pacchimapādehiyevā”ti vuttepi dve purimapāde ukkhipitvā pacchimapādehi aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2739_17: “ekenā”ti vuttepi tayo pāde ukkhipitvā ekeneva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2740_1: “sakalajambudīpe iminā sadiso susikkhito hatthī nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:2740_2: nissaṃsayaṃ panetaṃ esa papāte pātetvā māretukāmo bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2740_4: ayaṃ rājā taṃ papāte pātetvā māretukāmo,
atk-s0513a1:2740_6: Sace te ākāsena gantuṃ balaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a1:2740_7: maṃ yathānisinnaṃyeva ādāya vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā bārāṇasiṃ gacchā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2740_8: Puññiddhiyā samannāgato mahāsatto taṅkhaṇaññeva ākāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2740_13: tādisā nāma mandapuññā evarūpaṃ vāhanaṃ labhitvā tassa guṇaṃ ajānantā tañceva vāhanaṃ avasesañca yasasampattiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2740_14: nāsentiyevā”ti vatvā hatthikkhandhe nisinnova imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2744_1: tādiso dummedho nippañño puggalo parivārasampattiṃ labhitvā attano anatthaṃ carati.
atk-s0513a1:2744_3: So hi yasamadamatto kattabbākattabbaṃ ajānanto attano ca paresañca hiṃsāya paṭipajjati.
atk-s0513a1:2745_0: Evaṃ imāya gāthāya rañño dhammaṃ desetvā “tiṭṭha dāni tva”nti vatvā ākāse uppatitvā bārāṇasinagaraṃ gantvā rājaṅgaṇe ākāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2745_1: Sakalanagaraṃ saṅkhubhitvā “amhākaṃ rañño ākāsena setavaravāraṇo āgantvā rājaṅgaṇe ṭhito”ti ekakolāhalaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2745_7: tātā”ti vutte “rājagahato”ti vatvā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:2745_9: kataṃ idhāgacchantenā”ti tuṭṭhahaṭṭho nagaraṃ sajjāpetvā vāraṇaṃ maṅgalahatthiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā sakalarajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2745_10: tayo koṭṭhāse katvā ekaṃ bodhisattassa adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2745_13: Bodhisattassa āgatakālato paṭṭhāyeva pana rañño sakalajambudīpe rajjaṃ hatthagatameva jātaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2745_14: So jambudīpe aggarājā hutvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2746_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2750_0: Asabbatthagāmiṃ vācanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lāḷudāyittheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2750_1: So kira dhammaṃ kathento “imasmiṃ ṭhāne idaṃ kathetabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2750_2: imasmiṃ ṭhāne idaṃ na kathetabba”nti yuttāyuttaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0513a1:2750_4: sandhisiṅghāṭakesu cā”ti idaṃ avamaṅgalaṃ maṅgalaṃ katvā anumodanaṃ katheti.
atk-s0513a1:2750_5: Avamaṅgalesu anumodanaṃ karonto “bahū devā manussā ca,
atk-s0513a1:2750_6: maṅgalāni acintayu”nti vatvā “evarūpānaṃ maṅgalānaṃ satampi sahassampi kātuṃ samatthā hothā”ti vadati.
atk-s0513a1:2750_12: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2750_14: lāḷudāyī idāneva dandhaparisakkano yuttāyuttaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0513a1:2750_16: niccaṃ lāḷakoyeva eso”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2751_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbattitvā vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2751_1: sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā bārāṇasiyaṃ disāpāmokkho ācariyo hutvā pañca māṇavakasatāni sippaṃ vācesi.
atk-s0513a1:2751_2: Tadā tesu māṇavesu eko dandhaparisakkano lāḷako māṇavo dhammantevāsiko hutvā sippaṃ uggaṇhāti,
atk-s0513a1:2751_6: Athekadivasaṃ bodhisatto sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā sayane nipanno taṃ māṇavaṃ hatthapādapiṭṭhiparikammāni katvā gacchantaṃ āha “tāta,
atk-s0513a1:2751_8: Māṇavo ekaṃ pādaṃ upatthambhetvā ekassa upatthambhakaṃ alabhanto attano ūrumhi ṭhapetvā rattiṃ khepesi.
atk-s0513a1:2752_0: Bodhisatto paccūsasamaye uṭṭhāya taṃ disvā “kiṃ, tāta,
atk-s0513a1:2752_2: ekassa mañcapādassa upatthambhakaṃ alabhanto ūrumhi ṭhapetvā nisinnomhī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2752_3: Bodhisatto saṃviggamānaso hutvā “ayaṃ ati viya mayhaṃ upakāro,
atk-s0513a1:2752_4: ettakānaṃ pana māṇavakānaṃ antare ayameva dandho sippaṃ sikkhituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a1:2752_5: kathaṃ nu kho ahaṃ imaṃ paṇḍitaṃ kareyya”nti cintesi.
atk-s0513a1:2752_7: ahaṃ imaṃ māṇavaṃ dāruatthāya paṇṇatthāya ca vanaṃ gantvā āgataṃ ‘ajja te kiṃ diṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2752_9: Atha me ‘idaṃ nāma ajja mayā diṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2752_11: Atha naṃ ‘tayā diṭṭhañca katañca kīdisa’nti pucchissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2752_12: so ‘evarūpaṃ nāmā’ti upamāya ca kāraṇena ca kathessati.
atk-s0513a1:2752_13: Iti naṃ navaṃ navaṃ upamañca kāraṇañca kathāpetvā iminā upāyena paṇḍitaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2752_15: ito paṭṭhāya dāruatthāya vā paṇṇatthāya vā gataṭṭhāne yaṃ te tattha diṭṭhaṃ vā sutaṃ vā bhuttaṃ vā pītaṃ vā khāditaṃ vā hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2753_0: So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā ekadivasaṃ māṇavehi saddhiṃ dāruatthāya araññaṃ gato tattha sappaṃ disvā āgantvā “ācariya,
atk-s0513a1:2753_9: Māṇavo puna ekadivasaṃ araññe hatthiṃ disvā “hatthī me ācariya diṭṭho”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2753_16: Ayaṃ pana bālatāya vibhajitvā kathetuṃ asakkonto soṇḍaṃ sandhāya kathesi maññe”ti tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2753_20: Ācariyo “thokaṃ patirūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ kathesī”ti tuṇhī jāto.
atk-s0513a1:2754_0: Punekadivasaṃ nimantane ekacce māṇavā guḷaṃ dadhinā bhuñjiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2754_3: ajja mayaṃ dadhinā khīrena ca bhuñjimhā”ti vatvā “dadhikhīraṃ nāma kīdisaṃ hotī”ti vutte “seyyathāpi naṅgalīsā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2754_4: Ācariyo “ayaṃ māṇavo ‘sappo naṅgalīsasadiso’ti kathento tāva sukathitaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0513a1:2754_5: ‘hatthī naṅgalīsasadiso’ti kathentenāpi soṇḍaṃ sandhāya lesena kathitaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2754_7: ‘dadhikhīrāni pana niccaṃ paṇḍarāni pakkhittabhājanasaṇṭhānānī’ti idha sabbena sabbaṃ upamaṃ na kathesi,
atk-s0513a1:2754_8: na sakkā imaṃ lāḷakaṃ sikkhāpetu”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2757_0: Nāyaṃ dadhiṃ vedi na naṅgalīsaṃ, dadhippayaṃ maññati naṅgalīsa”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2758_1: yā vācā opammavasena sabbattha na gacchati,
atk-s0513a1:2758_2: taṃ asabbatthagāmiṃ vācaṃ bālo dandhapuggalo sabbattha bhāsati,
atk-s0513a1:2758_5: Evaṃ vadanto nāyaṃ dadhiṃ vedi na naṅgalīsaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2758_14: kiṃ imināti antevāsikānaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathetvā paribbayaṃ datvā taṃ uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a1:2759_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2763_0: Vāyametheva purisoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ vattasampannaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2763_1: So kira sāvatthivāsī kulaputto sāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajito vattasampanno ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2763_3: cuddasasu mahāvattesu asītikhandhakavattesu ca paripūrakārīyeva hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2763_7: Manussā tassa vattasampattiyaṃ pasīditvā pañcasatamattāni dhuvabhattāni adaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2763_11: asuko nāma bhikkhu attano vattasampattiyā mahantaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ nibbattesi,
atk-s0513a1:2763_12: etaṃ ekaṃ nissāya bahūnaṃ phāsuvihāro jāto”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2763_15: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2763_18: pubbepetaṃ ekaṃ nissāya pañca isisatāni phalāphalatthāya araññaṃ agantvā eteneva ānītaphalāphalehi yāpesu”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2764_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2764_5: Atha tesu tāpasesu eko tāpaso tesaṃ pipāsadukkhaṃ disvā ekaṃ rukkhaṃ chinditvā doṇiṃ katvā pānīyaṃ ussiñcitvā doṇiṃ pūretvā tesaṃ pānīyaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2764_6: Bahūsu sannipatitvā pānīyaṃ pivantesu tāpasassa phalāphalatthāya gamanokāso nāhosi.
atk-s0513a1:2764_8: Migagaṇā cintesuṃ “ayaṃ amhākaṃ pānīyaṃ dento phalāphalatthāya gantuṃ okāsaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0513a1:2764_11: Te katikaṃ akaṃsu “ito paṭṭhāya pānīyaṃ pivanatthāya āgacchantena attano balānurūpena phalāphalaṃ gahetvāva āgantabba”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2764_12: Te tato paṭṭhāya ekeko tiracchāno attano attano balānurūpena madhuramadhurāni ambajambupanasādīnigahetvāva āgacchati.
atk-s0513a1:2764_13: Ekassa atthāya ābhataṃ phalāphalaṃ aḍḍhateyyasakaṭabhārappamāṇaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2765_0: Bodhisatto taṃ disvā “ekaṃ nāma vattasampannaṃ nissāya ettakānaṃ tāpasānaṃ phalāphalatthāya agantvā yāpanaṃ uppannaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2765_1: vīriyaṃ nāma kātabbamevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2768_0: Vāyāmassa phalaṃ passa, bhuttā ambā anītiha”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2769_5: Iti mahāsatto “vāyāmo nāmesa saphalova hotī”ti isigaṇaṃ ālapanto “vāyāmassa phalaṃ passā”ti āha. Kīdisaṃ?
atk-s0513a1:2769_9: Tesu sampannatarānaṃ ussannatarānaṃ vā vasena “ambā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2769_10: Ye imehi pañcahi isisatehi sayaṃ araññaṃ agantvā ekassa atthāya ānītā ambā bhuttā,
atk-s0513a1:2769_13: “iti āha iti āhā”ti evaṃ itihītihena gahetabbaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2770_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2774_0: Bahumpi so vikattheyyāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ vikatthakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2775_0: Atīte pana bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2775_4: Seṭṭhiputte lekhaṃ sikkhante dāsopissa phalakaṃ vahamāno gantvā teneva saddhiṃ lekhaṃ sikkhi,
atk-s0513a1:2775_7: So anukkamena vacanakusalo vohārakusalo yuvā abhirūpo ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2775_9: So seṭṭhighare bhaṇḍāgārikakammaṃ karonto cintesi “na maṃ ime sabbakālaṃ bhaṇḍāgārikakammaṃ kāressanti,
atk-s0513a1:2775_10: kiñcideva dosaṃ disvā tāḷetvā bandhitvā lakkhaṇena aṅketvā dāsaparibhogenapi paribhuñjissanti.
atk-s0513a1:2775_11: Paccante kho pana seṭṭhissa sahāyako seṭṭhi atthi,
atk-s0513a1:2775_12: yaṃnūnāhaṃ seṭṭhissa vacanena lekhaṃ ādāya tattha gantvā ‘ahaṃ seṭṭhiputto’ti vatvā taṃ seṭṭhiṃ vañcetvā tassa dhītaraṃ gahetvā sukhaṃ vaseyya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2775_13: So sayameva paṇṇaṃ gahetvā “ahaṃ asukaṃ nāma mama puttaṃ tava santikaṃ pahiṇiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2775_16: tasmā tvaṃ imassa dārakassa attano dhītaraṃ datvā etaṃ tattheva vasāpehi,
atk-s0513a1:2775_17: ahampi okāsaṃ labhitvā āgamissāmī”ti likhitvā seṭṭhisseva muddikāya lañjetvā yathārucitaṃ paribbayañceva
atk-s0513a1:2775_18: gandhavatthādīni ca gahetvā paccantaṃ gantvā seṭṭhiṃ disvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2776_6: Tasmiṃ khaṇe kaṭāhako “idaṃ disvā jānissathā”ti paṇṇaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2776_7: Seṭṭhi paṇṇaṃ vācetvā “idānāhaṃ jīvāmi nāmā”ti tuṭṭhacitto dhītaraṃ datvā patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2776_9: So yāgukhajjakādīsu vā vatthagandhādīsu vā upanītesu “evampi nāma yāguṃ pacanti,
atk-s0513a1:2776_15: pupphāni ganthituṃ na jānantī”ti vatthakammantikādayo garahati.
atk-s0513a1:2777_3: Tesu eko tattha gantvā taṃ disvā sañjānitvā attānaṃ ajānāpetvā āgantvā bodhisattassa ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:2777_4: Bodhisatto taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “ayuttaṃ tena kataṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2777_5: gantvā naṃ gahetvā āgacchissāmī”ti rājānaṃ āpucchitvā mahantena parivārena nikkhami.
atk-s0513a1:2777_6: “Seṭṭhi kira paccantaṃ gacchatī”ti sabbattha pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:2777_7: Kaṭāhako “seṭṭhi kira āgacchatī”ti sutvā cintesi “na so aññena kāraṇena āgacchissati,
atk-s0513a1:2777_12: Mama sāmikassa paṭipathaṃ gantvā dāsakammaṃ katvā tameva ārādhessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2777_13: So tato paṭṭhāya parisamajjhe evaṃ bhāsati “aññe bālamanussā attano bālabhāvena mātāpitūnaṃ guṇaṃ ajānantā
atk-s0513a1:2777_14: tesaṃ bhojanavelāya apacitikammaṃ akatvā tehi saddhiṃyeva bhuñjanti,
atk-s0513a1:2777_15: mayaṃ pana mātāpitūnaṃ bhojanakāle paṭiggahaṃ upanema,
atk-s0513a1:2777_18: pānīyampi bījanimpi gahetvā upatiṭṭhāmā”ti yāva sarīravaḷañjanakāle udakakalasaṃ ādāya paṭicchannaṭṭhānagamanā
atk-s0513a1:2778_0: So evaṃ parisaṃ uggaṇhāpetvā bodhisattassa paccantasamīpaṃ āgatakāle sasuraṃ avoca “tāta,
atk-s0513a1:2778_1: mama kira pitā tumhākaṃ dassanatthāya āgacchati,
atk-s0513a1:2778_6: Kaṭāhako bahuṃ paṇṇākāramādāya mahantena parivārena gantvā bodhisattaṃ vanditvā paṇṇākāraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2778_7: Bodhisattopi paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā pātarāsakāle khandhāvāraṃ nivāsetvā sarīravaḷañjanatthāya paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:2778_8: Kaṭāhako attano parivāraṃ nivattetvā kalasaṃ ādāya bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā udakakiccapariyosāne pādesu patitvā “sāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2778_13: natthi te mama santikā antarāyo”ti samassāsetvā paccantanagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:2778_16: Atha naṃ ekāya velāya sukhanisinnaṃ paccantaseṭṭhi āha “mahāseṭṭhi,
atk-s0513a1:2778_17: mayā tumhākaṃ paṇṇaṃ disvāva tumhākaṃ puttassa dārikā dinnā”ti bodhisatto kaṭāhakaṃ puttameva katvā tadanucchavikaṃ piyavacanaṃ vatvā seṭṭhiṃ tosesi.
atk-s0513a1:2778_18: Tato paṭṭhāya kaṭāhakassa mukhaṃ ulloketuṃ samattho nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0513a1:2779_1: sīse me ūkā vicināhī”ti vatvā taṃ āgantvā ūkā gahetvā ṭhitaṃ piyavacanaṃ vatvā “kathehi, amma,
atk-s0513a1:2779_2: kacci te mama putto sukhadukkhesu appamatto,
atk-s0513a1:2779_3: ubho janā sammodamānā samaggavāsaṃ vasathā”ti pucchi. “Tāta,
atk-s0513a1:2779_4: mahāseṭṭhi tumhākaṃ puttassa añño doso natthi,
atk-s0513a1:2779_7: apica te ahaṃ tassa mukhabandhanamantaṃ dassāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2779_8: taṃ tvaṃ sādhukaṃ uggaṇhitvā mama puttassa bhojanakāle garahantassa uggahitaniyāmeneva purato ṭhatvā
atk-s0513a1:2779_9: vadeyyāsī”ti gāthaṃ uggaṇhāpetvā katipāhaṃ vasitvā bārāṇasimeva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2779_10: Kaṭāhakopi bahuṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ ādāya anumaggaṃ gantvā bahudhanaṃ datvā vanditvā nivatti.
atk-s0513a1:2779_11: So bodhisattassa gatakālato paṭṭhāya atirekamānī ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2779_12: So ekadivasaṃ seṭṭhidhītāya nānaggarasabhojanaṃ upanetvā kaṭacchuṃ ādāya parivisantiyā bhattaṃ garahituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:2779_13: Seṭṭhidhītā bodhisattassa santike uggahitaniyāmeneva imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2783_1: aññaṃ janapadaṃ gatoti yo attano jātibhūmito aññaṃ janapadaṃ gato hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2783_5: Anvāgantvāna dūseyyāti imaṃ tāva vāraṃ sāmikassa paṭipathaṃ gantvā dāsakiccassa katattā kasāhi paharitvā
atk-s0513a1:2783_8: puna aññasmiṃ āgamanavāre tava sāmiko anvāgantvāna dūseyya,
atk-s0513a1:2783_9: imaṃ gehaṃ anuāgantvā kasābhighātehi ceva lakkhaṇāhananena ca jātippakāsanena ca taṃ dūseyya upahaneyya.
atk-s0513a1:2783_10: Tasmā imaṃ anācāraṃ pahāya bhuñja bhoge kaṭāhaka,
atk-s0513a1:2783_11: mā pacchā attano dāsabhāvaṃ pākaṭaṃ kāretvā vippaṭisārī ahosīti ayamettha seṭṭhino adhippāyo.
atk-s0513a1:2784_0: Seṭṭhidhītā pana etamatthaṃ ajānantī uggahitaniyāmena byañjanameva payirudāhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2784_1: Kaṭāhako “addhā seṭṭhinā mama kulaṃ ācikkhitvā etissā sabbaṃ kathitaṃ bhavissatī”ti tato paṭṭhāya puna bhattaṃ garahituṃ na visahi,
atk-s0513a1:2785_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā kaṭāhako vikatthakabhikkhu ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2789_0: Tathevekassa kalyāṇanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kosalarañño asilakkhaṇapāṭhakaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2789_1: So kira kammārehi rañño asīnaṃ āhaṭakāle asiṃ upasiṅghitvā asilakkhaṇaṃ udāharati.
atk-s0513a1:2789_6: Atheko kammāro asiṃ katvā kosiyaṃ sukhumaṃ maricacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā rañño asiṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2789_8: Brāhmaṇassa asiṃ ākaḍḍhitvā upasiṅghantassa maricacuṇṇāni nāsaṃ pavisitvā khipitukāmataṃ uppādesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2789_9: Tassa khipantassa nāsikā asidhārāya paṭihatā dvidhā chijji.
atk-s0513a1:2789_10: Tassevaṃ nāsikāya chinnabhāvo bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:2789_12: rañño kira asilakkhaṇapāṭhako asiṃ upasiṅghanto nāsikaṃ chindāpesī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2789_15: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2789_17: idāneva so brāhmaṇo asiṃ upasiṅghanto nāsikāchedaṃ patto,
atk-s0513a1:2790_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente tassa asilakkhaṇapāṭhako brāhmaṇo ahosīti sabbaṃ paccuppannavatthusadisameva.
atk-s0513a1:2790_1: Rājā pana tassa vejje datvā nāsikākoṭiṃ phāsukaṃ kārāpetvā lākhāya paṭināsikaṃ kāretvā puna taṃ upaṭṭhākameva akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2790_3: ekā dhītā ceva bhāgineyyo ca ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2790_4: So ubhopi te attano santikeyeva vaḍḍhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2790_5: Te ekato vaḍḍhantā aññamaññaṃ paṭibaddhacittā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2790_6: Rājāpi amacce pakkosāpetvā “mayhaṃ bhāgineyyopi imassa rajjassa sāmikova,
atk-s0513a1:2790_7: dhītaraṃ etasseva datvā abhisekamassa karomī”ti vatvā puna cintesi “mayhaṃ bhāgineyyo sabbathāpi ñātakoyeva,
atk-s0513a1:2790_8: etassa aññaṃ rājadhītaraṃ ānetvā abhisekaṃ katvā dhītaraṃ aññassa rañño dassāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2790_11: So amaccehi saddhiṃ sammantetvā “ubhopete visuṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti bhāgineyyaṃ aññasmiṃ nivesane,
atk-s0513a1:2791_0: Te soḷasavassuddesikabhāvaṃ pattā ativiya paṭibaddhacittā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2791_1: Rājakumāro “kena nu kho upāyena mātuladhītaraṃ rājagehā nīharāpetuṃ sakkā bhaveyyā”ti cintento “attheko
atk-s0513a1:2791_2: upāyo”ti mahāikkhaṇikaṃ pakkosāpetvā tassā sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ datvā “kiṃ mayā kattabba”nti vutte “amma,
atk-s0513a1:2791_4: kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ vatvā yathā mama mātulo rājā dhītaraṃ antogehā nīharāpeti,
atk-s0513a1:2791_9: ahaṃ rājadhītaraṃ asukadivase nāma rathaṃ āropetvā bahuāvudhahatthe purise ādāya mahantena parivārena
atk-s0513a1:2791_10: susānaṃ gantvā maṇḍalapīṭhikāya heṭṭhāmañce matamanussaṃ nipajjāpetvā uparimañce rājadhītaraṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a1:2791_11: gandhodakaghaṭānaṃ aṭṭhuttarasatena nhāpetvā kāḷakaṇṇiṃ pavāhessāmī”ti evaṃ vatvā rājadhītaraṃ susānaṃ nessāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2791_12: tvaṃ amhākaṃ tattha gamanadivase amhehi puretarameva thokaṃ maricacuṇṇaṃ ādāya āvudhahatthehi attano
atk-s0513a1:2791_13: manussehi parivuto rathaṃ abhiruyha susānaṃ gantvā rathaṃ susānadvāre ekapadese ṭhapetvā āvudhahatthe
atk-s0513a1:2791_14: manusse susānavanaṃ pesetvā sayaṃ susāne maṇḍalapīṭhikaṃ pasāretvā matako viya paṭikujjo hutvā nipajja.
atk-s0513a1:2791_15: Ahaṃ tattha āgantvā tava upari mañcakaṃ attharitvā rājadhītaraṃ ukkhipitvā mañce sayāpessāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2791_16: tvaṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe maricacuṇṇaṃ nāsikāya pakkhipitvā dve tayo vāre khipeyyāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2791_17: Tayā khipitakāle mayaṃ rājadhītaraṃ pahāya palāyissāma.
atk-s0513a1:2791_18: Atha tvaṃ rājadhītaraṃ sīsaṃ nhāpetvā sayampi sīsaṃ nhāyitvā taṃ ādāya attano nivesanaṃ gaccheyyāsīti.
atk-s0513a1:2792_4: Sā nikkhamanadivase kumārassa saññaṃ datvā mahantena parivārena susānaṃ gacchantī ārakkhamanussānaṃ bhayajananatthaṃ āha –
atk-s0513a1:2792_5: “mayā rājadhītāya mañce ṭhapitakāle heṭṭhāmañce matapuriso khipissati,
atk-s0513a1:2792_6: khipitvā ca heṭṭhāmañcā nikkhamitvā yaṃ paṭhamaṃ passissati,
atk-s0513a1:2792_9: Rājakumāro puretaraṃ gantvā vuttanayeneva tattha nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:2792_10: Mahāikkhaṇikā rājadhītaraṃ ukkhipitvā maṇḍalapīṭhikāṭhānaṃ gacchantī “mā bhāyī”ti saññāpetvā mañce ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:2792_11: Tasmiṃ khaṇe kumāro maricacuṇṇaṃ nāsāya pakkhipitvā khipi.
atk-s0513a1:2792_12: Tena khipitamatteyeva mahāikkhaṇikā rājadhītaraṃ pahāya mahāravaṃ ravamānā sabbapaṭhamaṃ palāyi,
atk-s0513a1:2792_13: tassā palātakālato paṭṭhāya ekopi ṭhātuṃ samattho nāma nāhosi,
atk-s0513a1:2792_15: Kumāro yathāsammantitaṃ sabbaṃ katvā rājadhītaraṃ ādāya attano nivesanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2793_0: Ikkhaṇikā gantvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:2793_2: pāyāse chaḍḍitasappi viya jāta”nti sampaṭicchitvā aparabhāge bhāgineyyassa rajjaṃ datvā dhītaraṃ mahādeviṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:2793_3: So tāya saddhiṃ samaggavāsaṃ vasamāno dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:2793_5: Tassekadivasaṃ rājūpaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā paṭisūriyaṃ ṭhatvā upaṭṭhahantassa lākhā vilīyi,
atk-s0513a1:2793_13: mayaṃ pana khipantā mātuladhītaraṃ labhitvā rajjaṃ pāpuṇimhā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2796_0: Tasmā sabbaṃ na kalyāṇaṃ, sabbaṃ vāpi na pāpaka”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2797_0: Tattha tathevekassāti tadevekassa. Ayameva vā pāṭho. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0513a1:2798_0: Iti so imāya gāthāya taṃ kāraṇaṃ āharitvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2799_0: Satthā imāya desanāya lokasammatānaṃ kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ anekaṃsikabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2803_0: Te desā tāni vatthūnīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ vikatthakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2804_0: Idha panesa bārāṇasiseṭṭhino dāso kalaṇḍuko nāma ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2804_1: Tassa palāyitvā paccantavāsiseṭṭhino dhītaraṃ gahetvā mahantena parivārena vasanakāle bārāṇasiseṭṭhi
atk-s0513a1:2804_3: kalaṇḍukaṃ pariyesā”ti attanā puṭṭhaṃ sukapotakaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:2804_4: Sukapotako ito cito ca vicaranto taṃ nagaraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:2804_5: Tasmiñca kāle kalaṇḍuko nadīkīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmo bahuṃ mālāgandhavilepanañceva khādanīyabhojanīyāni ca gāhāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2804_6: nadiṃ gantvā seṭṭhidhītāya saddhiṃ nāvaṃ āruyha udake kīḷati.
atk-s0513a1:2804_7: Tasmiñca padese nadīkīḷaṃ kīḷantā issarajātikā tikhiṇabhesajjaparibhāvitaṃ khīraṃ pivanti,
atk-s0513a1:2804_8: tena tesaṃ divasabhāgampi udake kīḷantānaṃ sītaṃ na bādhati.
atk-s0513a1:2804_9: Ayaṃ pana kalaṇḍuko khīragaṇḍūsaṃ gahetvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā taṃ khīraṃ nuṭṭhubhati.
atk-s0513a1:2804_10: Nuṭṭhubhantopi udake anuṭṭhubhitvā seṭṭhidhītāya sīse nuṭṭhubhati.
atk-s0513a1:2804_11: Sukapotakopi nadītīraṃ gantvā ekissā udumbarasākhāya nisīditvā oloketvā kalaṇḍukaṃ sañjānitvā seṭṭhidhītāya sīse nuṭṭhubhantaṃ disvā “are,
atk-s0513a1:2804_14: khīragaṇḍūsaṃ gahetvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā jātisampannāya sukhasaṃvaḍḍhāya seṭṭhidhītāya sīse mā nuṭṭhubhi,
atk-s0513a1:2804_15: attano pamāṇaṃ na jānāsī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2807_0: Anuvicca kho taṃ gaṇheyyuṃ, piva khīraṃ kalaṇḍukā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2808_0: Tattha te desā tāni vatthūnīti mātukucchiṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0513a1:2808_6: Atha kho dāsikucchiyaṃ tvaṃ vasi ceva patiṭṭhito cāti.
atk-s0513a1:2808_7: Ahañca vanagocaroti tiracchānabhūtopi etamatthaṃ jānāmīti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a1:2808_8: Anuvicca kho taṃ gaṇheyyunti evaṃ anācāraṃ caramānaṃ mayā gantvā ārocite anuvicca jānitvā tava sāmikā
atk-s0513a1:2808_9: tāḷetvā ceva lakkhaṇāhatañca katvā taṃ gaṇheyyuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2808_11: tasmā attano pamāṇaṃ ñatvā seṭṭhidhītāya sīse anuṭṭhubhitvā piva khīraṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2809_0: Kalaṇḍukopi suvapotakaṃ sañjānitvā “maṃ pākaṭaṃ kareyyā”ti bhayena “ehi, sāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2809_3: gīvaṃ pana me vaṭṭetvā māretukāmo”ti ñatvāva “na me tayā attho”ti tato uppatitvā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā yathādiṭṭhaṃ seṭṭhino vitthārena kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2809_4: Seṭṭhi “ayuttaṃ tena kata”nti vatvā gantvā tassa āṇaṃ kāretvā bārāṇasimeva naṃ ānetvā dāsaparibhogena paribhuñji.
atk-s0513a1:2810_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2814_0: Yo ve dhammaṃ dhajaṃ katvāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kuhakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2814_1: Tadā hi satthā tassa kuhakabhāve ārocite “na,
atk-s0513a1:2815_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mūsikayoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā vuḍḍhimanvāya
atk-s0513a1:2815_1: mahāsarīro sūkaracchāpakasadiso hutvā anekasatamūsikāhi parivuto araññe viharati.
atk-s0513a1:2815_2: Atheko siṅgālo ito cito ca vicaranto taṃ mūsikayūthaṃ disvā “imā mūsikā vañcetvā khādissāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0513a1:2815_3: mūsikānaṃ āsayassa avidūre sūriyābhimukho vātaṃ pivanto ekena pādena aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2815_4: Bodhisatto gocarāya caramāno taṃ disvā “sīlavā eso bhavissatī”ti tassa santikaṃ gantvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2815_7: “Cattāro pāde bhūmiyaṃ aṭhapetvā kasmā ekeneva ṭhitosī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2815_8: “Mayi cattāro pāde pathaviyaṃ ṭhapente pathavī vahituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a1:2815_15: Bodhisatto tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “sīlavā eso bhavissatī”ti tato paṭṭhāya mūsikagaṇena saddhiṃ sāyaṃ pātaṃ tassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:2816_0: Athassa upaṭṭhānaṃ katvā gamanakāle siṅgālo sabbapacchimaṃ mūsikaṃ gahetvā maṃsaṃ khāditvā ajjhoharitvā mukhaṃ puñchitvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0513a1:2816_6: kiṃ nu kho eta”nti bodhisattassa taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2816_7: Bodhisatto “kena nu kho kāraṇena musikā tanuttaṃ gatā”ti cintento siṅgāle āsaṅkaṃ ṭhapetvā “vīmaṃsissāmi
atk-s0513a1:2816_8: na”nti upaṭṭhānakāle sesamūsikā purato katvā sayaṃ pacchato ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2816_10: bodhisatto attano gahaṇatthāya taṃ pakkhandantaṃ disvā nivattitvā “bho siṅgāla,
atk-s0513a1:2816_12: paresaṃ pana vihiṃsanatthāya dhammaṃ dhajaṃ katvā carasī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2818_0: “Yo ve dhammaṃ dhajaṃ katvā, nigūḷho pāpamācare;
atk-s0513a1:2819_0: Vissāsayitvā bhūtāni, biḷāraṃ nāma taṃ vata”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2820_0: Tattha yo veti khattiyādīsu yo kocideva.
atk-s0513a1:2820_1: Dhammaṃ dhajaṃ katvāti dasakusalakammapathadhammaṃ dhajaṃ karitvā,
atk-s0513a1:2820_2: kūṭaṃ karonto viya ussāpetvā dassentoti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2820_4: Biḷāraṃ nāma taṃ vatanti taṃ evaṃ dhammaṃ dhajaṃ katvā raho pāpāni karontassa vataṃ kerāṭikavataṃ nāma hotīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2821_0: Mūsikarājā kathentova uppatitvā tassa gīvāyaṃ patitvā hanukassa heṭṭhā antogalanāḷiyaṃ ḍaṃsitvā galanāḷiṃ phāletvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2821_1: Mūsikagaṇo nivattitvā siṅgālaṃ “muru murū”ti khāditvā agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2822_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2826_0: Nāyaṃ sikhā puññahetūti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kuhakaññeva bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2827_0: Atītasmiñhi bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mūsikarājā hutvā araññe vasati.
atk-s0513a1:2827_1: Atheko siṅgālo davaḍāhe uṭṭhite palāyituṃ asakkonto ekasmiṃ rukkhe sīsaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2827_3: rukkhaṃ āhacca ṭhitaṭṭhāne pana matthake cūḷā viya thokāni lomāni aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2827_4: So ekadivasaṃ soṇḍiyaṃ pānīyaṃ pivanto chāyaṃ olokento cūḷaṃ disvā “uppannaṃ dāni me bhaṇḍamūla”nti araññe
atk-s0513a1:2827_5: vicaranto taṃ mūsikādariṃ disvā “imā mūsikā vañcetvā khādissāmī”ti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva avidūre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2827_6: Atha naṃ bodhisatto gocarāya caranto disvā “sīlavā aya”nti saññāya upasaṅkamitvā “tvaṃ kinnāmosī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2827_12: tumhākaṃ pātova nikkhamitvā gocarāya gamanakāle ‘ettakā’ti gaṇetvā paccāgamanakālepi gaṇessāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2827_15: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā nikkhamanakāle “eko dve tayo”ti gaṇetvā paccāgamanakālepi tatheva gaṇetvā sabbapacchimaṃ gahetvā khādati.
atk-s0513a1:2828_0: Idha pana mūsikarājā nivattitvā ṭhito “bho aggikabhāradvāja,
atk-s0513a1:2828_1: nāyaṃ tava dhammasudhammatāya matthake cūḷā ṭhapitā,
atk-s0513a1:2828_2: kucchikāraṇā pana ṭhapitā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2831_0: Nāguṭṭhigaṇanaṃ yāti, alaṃ te hotu aggikā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2832_1: ayaṃ mūsikagaṇo aṅguṭṭhagaṇanaṃ na gacchati na upeti na pūreti,
atk-s0513a1:2832_3: Alaṃ te hotu aggikāti siṅgālaṃ nāmena ālapanto āha.
atk-s0513a1:2832_6: Amhehi vā tayā saddhiṃ saṃvāso alaṃ hotu,
atk-s0513a1:2832_7: na mayaṃ idāni tayā saddhiṃ vasissāmātipi attho.
atk-s0513a1:2833_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā siṅgālo ayaṃ bhikkhu ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2837_0: Yathā vācā ca bhuñjassūti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ mātugāmaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2837_1: Sā kirekassa saddhāsampannassa upāsakabrāhmaṇassa brāhmaṇī dussīlā pāpadhammā rattiṃ aticaritvā divā
atk-s0513a1:2837_2: kiñci kammaṃ akatvā gilānālayaṃ dassetvā nitthunamānā nipajjati.
atk-s0513a1:2837_3: Atha naṃ brāhmaṇo “kiṃ te bhadde aphāsuka”nti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2837_10: Sā pana brāhmaṇassa gehaṃ paviṭṭhakāle nipajjati,
atk-s0513a1:2838_0: Atha brāhmaṇo “imissā sarīre vijjhanavātānaṃ pariyanto na paññāyatī”ti ekadivasaṃ gandhamālādīni ādāya
atk-s0513a1:2838_1: jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ pūjetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā “kiṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a1:2838_3: brāhmaṇiyā kira me sarīre vātā vijjhanti,
atk-s0513a1:2838_4: svāhaṃ tassā sappitelādīni ceva paṇītapaṇītabhojanāni ca pariyesāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2838_7: Ahaṃ taṃ paṭijaggantova idhāgamanassa okāsaṃ na labhāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2838_9: ‘evaṃ nipannassa mātugāmassa roge avūpasamante idañcidañca bhesajjaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti pubbepi te paṇḍitehi kathitaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2838_10: bhavasaṅkhepagatattā pana na sallakkhesī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2839_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbattitvā vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2839_1: sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā bārāṇasiyaṃ disāpāmokkho ācariyo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2839_2: Ekasatarājadhānīsu khattiyakumārā ca brāhmaṇakumārā ca yebhuyyena tasseva santike sippaṃ uggaṇhanti.
atk-s0513a1:2839_3: Atheko janapadavāsī brāhmaṇamāṇavo bodhisattassa santike tayo vede aṭṭhārasa ca vijjāṭṭhānāni uggaṇhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2839_4: bārāṇasiyaṃyeva kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapetvā divase divase dvattikkhattuṃ bodhisattassa santikaṃ āgacchati.
atk-s0513a1:2839_5: Tassa brāhmaṇī dussīlā ahosi pāpadhammāti sabbaṃ paccuppannavatthusadisameva.
atk-s0513a1:2840_0: Bodhisatto pana “iminā kāraṇena ovādagahaṇāya okāsaṃ na labhāmī”ti vutte “sā māṇavikā imaṃ vañcetvā nipajjatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2840_1: ñatvā “tassā rogānucchavikaṃ bhesajjaṃ ācikkhissāmī”ti cintetvā āha “tāta,
atk-s0513a1:2840_2: tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya tassā sappikhīrarasādīni mā adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2840_3: gomutte pana pañcapaṇṇāni phalādīni ca pakkhipitvā koṭṭetvā navatambalohabhājane pakkhipitvā lohagandhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2840_4: gāhāpetvā rajjuṃ vā yottaṃ vā rukkhaṃ vā lataṃ vā gahetvā ‘idaṃ te rogassa anucchavikabhesajjaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2840_6: uṭṭhāya vā tayā bhuttabhattassa anucchavikaṃ kammaṃ karohī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthaṃ vadeyyāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2840_8: atha naṃ rajjuyā vā yottena vā rukkhena vā latāya vā katici pahāre paharitvā kesesu gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvā kapparena potheyyāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2840_17: Māṇavo “na tvaṃ attano ruciyā pivissasī”ti rajjuṃ gahetvā “attano rogassa anucchavikaṃ bhesajjaṃ vā piva,
atk-s0513a1:2840_18: yāgubhattānucchavikaṃ kammaṃ vā karohī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2843_0: Ubhayaṃ te na sameti, vācā bhuttañca kosiye”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2844_0: Tattha yathāvācā ca bhuñjassūti yathā te vācā,
atk-s0513a1:2844_2: “vātā me vijjhantī”ti vācāya anucchavikameva katvā bhuñjassūti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2844_6: Yathābhuttañca byāharāti yaṃ yathā te bhuttaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2844_10: atha vā arogamhīti yathābhūtameva vatvā kammaṃ karohīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2844_12: vācābhuttañca kosiyeti yā ca te ayaṃ vācā “vātā maṃ vijjhantī”ti yañca te idaṃ paṇītabhojanaṃ bhuttaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2845_0: Evaṃ vutte kosiyabrāhmaṇadhītā “ācariyena ussukkaṃ āpannakālato paṭṭhāya na sakkā mayā esa vañcetuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2845_1: uṭṭhāya kammaṃ karissāmī”ti uṭṭhāya kammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2845_3: idāni na sakkā ito paṭṭhāya puna evarūpaṃ kātu”nti ācariye gāravena pāpakammatopi viramitvā sīlavatī ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2845_4: Sāpi brāhmaṇī “sammāsambuddhena kiramhi ñātā”ti sattharipi gāravena na puna anācāraṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2846_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2855_0: Asampadānenitarītarassāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2855_1: Tasmiñhi kāle bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso devadatto,
atk-s0513a1:2855_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2856_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhe rājagahe ekasmiṃ magadharaññe rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tasseva seṭṭhi ahosi asītikoṭivibhavo saṅkhaseṭṭhīti nāmena.
atk-s0513a1:2856_3: Tesu bārāṇasiyaṃ pīḷiyaseṭṭhissa kenacideva kāraṇena mahantaṃ bhayaṃ uppajji,
atk-s0513a1:2856_5: So daliddo appaṭisaraṇo hutvā bhariyaṃ ādāya saṅkhaseṭṭhiṃ paccayaṃ katvā bārāṇasito nikkhamitvā padasāva
atk-s0513a1:2856_7: So taṃ disvāva “sahāyo me āgato”ti parissajitvā sakkārasammānaṃ katvā katipāhaṃ vītināmetvā ekadivasaṃ “samma,
atk-s0513a1:2856_13: mā bhāyī”ti bhaṇḍāgāraṃ vivarāpetvā cattālīsa hiraññakoṭiyo dāpetvā sesampi paricchadaparivāraṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2856_14: attano santakaṃ saviññāṇakaṃ aviññāṇakaṃ majjhe bhinditvā upaḍḍhameva adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2856_15: So taṃ vibhavaṃ ādāya puna bārāṇasiṃ gantvā nivāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:2857_1: So attano paṭisaraṇaṃ upadhārento “sahāyassa me mahāupakāro kato,
atk-s0513a1:2857_4: tassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti cintetvā bhariyaṃ ādāya padasāva bārāṇasiṃ gantvā bhariyaṃ āha “bhadde,
atk-s0513a1:2857_5: tava mayā saddhiṃ antaravīthiyā gamanaṃ nāma na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2857_6: mayā pesitayānamāruyha mahantena parivārena pacchā āgamissasi.
atk-s0513a1:2857_8: tāva idheva hohī”ti vatvā taṃ sālāya ṭhapetvā sayaṃ nagaraṃ pavisitvā seṭṭhissa gharaṃ gantvā “rājagahanagarato
atk-s0513a1:2857_9: tumhākaṃ sahāyo saṅkhaseṭṭhi nāma āgato”ti ārocāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2857_10: So “āgacchatū”ti pakkosāpetvā taṃ disvā neva āsanā vuṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2857_18: nivāpaṃ gahetvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne pacāpetvā bhuñjitvā gacchatha,
atk-s0513a1:2857_19: puna amhākaṃ gharaṃ mā pavisathā”ti vatvā “mayhaṃ sahāyassa dussante bandhitvā ekaṃ bahalapalāpatumbaṃ dehī”ti dāsaṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2857_20: Taṃ divasaṃ kira so rattasālīnaṃ sakaṭasahassamattaṃ ophunāpetvā koṭṭhāgāraṃ pūrāpesi,
atk-s0513a1:2857_21: cattālīsakoṭidhanaṃ gahetvā āgato akataññū mahācoro sahāyakassa tumbamatte palāpe dāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2857_22: Dāso pacchiyaṃ ekaṃ palāpatumbaṃ pakkhipitvā bodhisattassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2858_1: “ayaṃ asappuriso mama santikā cattālīsakoṭidhanaṃ labhitvā idāni palāpatumbaṃ dāpesi,
atk-s0513a1:2858_4: Athassa etadahosi “ayaṃ tāva akataññū mittadubbhī katavināsakabhāvena mayā saddhiṃ mittabhāvaṃ bhindi.
atk-s0513a1:2858_5: Sacāhaṃ etena dinnaṃ palāpatumbaṃ lāmakattā na gaṇhissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2858_7: Andhabālā parittakaṃ laddhaṃ aggaṇhantā mittabhāvaṃ vināsenti,
atk-s0513a1:2858_8: ahaṃ pana etena dinnaṃ palāpatumbaṃ gahetvā mama vasena mittabhāvaṃ patiṭṭhāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2858_9: So palāpatumbaṃ dussante bandhitvā pāsādā oruyha sālaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2858_12: “Bhadde amhākaṃ sahāyo pīḷiyaseṭṭhi palāpatumbaṃ datvā amhe ajjeva vissajjesī”ti. Sā “ayya,
atk-s0513a1:2858_14: kiṃ etaṃ cattālīsakoṭidhanassa anucchavika”nti rodituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:2858_16: ahaṃ tena saddhiṃ mittabhāvabhedanabhayena mama vasena mittabhāvaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ gaṇhiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2858_17: tvaṃ kiṃkāraṇā rodasī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2861_0: Tasmā harāmi bhusaṃ aḍḍhamānaṃ, mā me mitti jīyittha sassatāya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2862_4: Bālassa mittāni kalībhavantīti dandhassa apaññassa mittāni kalīni kāḷakaṇṇisadisāni honti,
atk-s0513a1:2862_6: Tasmā harāmi bhusaṃ aḍḍhamānanti tena kāraṇena ahaṃ sahāyena dinnaṃ ekapalāpatumbaṃ harāmi gaṇhāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0513a1:2862_11: Mā me mitti jīyittha sassatāyanti mama sahāyena saddhiṃ mitti mā bhijjittha,
atk-s0513a1:2863_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe saṅkhaseṭṭhinā pīḷiyaseṭṭhissa dinno kammantadāso sālādvārena āgacchanto seṭṭhibhariyāya
atk-s0513a1:2863_2: rodanasaddaṃ sutvā sālaṃ pavisitvā attano sāmike disvā pādesu nipatitvā roditvā kanditvā “kimatthaṃ idhāgatattha,
atk-s0513a1:2863_6: mā cintayitthā”ti ubhopi assāsetvā attano gehaṃ netvā gandhodakena nhāpetvā bhojetvā “sāmikā,
atk-s0513a1:2863_7: vo āgatā”ti sesadāse sannipātetvā dassetvā katipāhaṃ vītināmetvā sabbe dāse gahetvā rājaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā uparavaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2863_9: te sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2864_0: Rājā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā ubhopi seṭṭhī pakkosāpetvā saṅkhaseṭṭhiṃ pucchi “saccaṃ kira tayā mahāseṭṭhi pīḷiyaseṭṭhissa cattālīsakoṭidhanaṃ dinna”nti? “Āma, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:2864_1: mama sahāyassa maṃ takketvā rājagahaṃ āgatassa na kevalaṃ dhanaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2864_2: sabbaṃ vibhavajātaṃ saviññāṇakaṃ aviññāṇakaṃ dve koṭṭhāse katvā samabhāge adāsinti.
atk-s0513a1:2864_4: “Tayā panassa taññeva takketvā āgatassa atthi koci sakkāro vā sammāno vā kato”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2864_6: Api pana te etassa palāpatumbamattaṃ dussante pakkhipāpetvā dāpitaṃ atthīti.
atk-s0513a1:2864_8: Rājā “kiṃ kātabba”nti amaccehi saddhiṃ mantetvā taṃ paribhāsitvā “gacchatha,
atk-s0513a1:2864_9: pīḷiyaseṭṭhissa ghare sabbaṃ vibhavaṃ saṅkhaseṭṭhissa dethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2864_14: Bodhisatto sabbaṃ attano dinnavibhavaṃ paṭilabhitvā dāsaparivuto rājagahameva gantvā kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapetvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2865_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2869_0: Kusalūpadese dhitiyā daḷhāya cāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ajapālanigrodhe māradhītānaṃ palobhanasuttantaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2871_0: Tā tattha panudī satthā, tūlaṃ bhaṭṭhaṃva māluto”ti. ;
atk-s0513a1:2872_0: Evaṃ yāva pariyosānā tassa suttantassa kathitakāle dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitā bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:2872_1: sammāsambuddho māradhītaro anekasatānipi dibbarūpāni māpetvā palobhanatthāya upasaṅkamantiyo akkhīnipi ummīletvā na olokesi,
atk-s0513a1:2872_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2872_7: idāneva mayhaṃ sabbāsave khepetvā sabbaññutaṃ sampattassa māradhītānaṃ anolokanaṃ nāma acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2872_8: ahañhi pubbe bodhiñāṇaṃ pariyesamāno sakilesakālepi abhisaṅkhataṃ dibbarūpaṃ indriyāni bhinditvā kilesavasena
atk-s0513a1:2872_9: anoloketvāva gantvā mahārajjaṃ pāpuṇi”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2873_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto bhātikasatassa kaniṭṭho ahosīti sabbaṃ heṭṭhā takkasilājātake vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2873_1: Tadā pana takkasilānagaravāsīhi bahinagare sālāyaṃ bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā yācitvā rajjaṃ paṭicchāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2873_2: abhiseke kate takkasilānagaravāsino nagaraṃ devanagaraṃ viya,
atk-s0513a1:2873_4: Tadā bodhisatto nagaraṃ pavisitvā rājabhavane pāsāde mahātale samussitasetacchattaṃ ratanavarapallaṅkaṃ abhiruyha devarājalīlāya nisīdi,
atk-s0513a1:2873_5: amaccā ca brāhmaṇagahapatikādayo ca khattiyakumārā ca sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā parivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2873_6: devaccharāpaṭibhāgā soḷasasahassanāṭakitthiyo naccagītavāditakusalā uttamavilāsasampannā naccagītavāditāni payojesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2873_7: Gītavāditasaddena rājabhavanaṃ meghatthanitapūritā mahāsamuddakucchi viya ekaninnādaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2873_8: Bodhisatto taṃ attano sirisobhaggaṃ olokayamānova cintesi “sacāhaṃ tāsaṃ yakkhinīnaṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ dibbarūpaṃ olokessaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2873_11: Paccekabuddhānaṃ pana ovāde ṭhitabhāvena idaṃ mayā sampatta”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2873_12: Evañca pana cintetvā udānaṃ udānento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2875_0: “Kusalūpadese dhitiyā daḷhāya ca, anivattitattā bhayabhīrutāya ca;
atk-s0513a1:2876_0: Na rakkhasīnaṃ vasamāgamimhase, sa sotthibhāvo mahatā bhayena me”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2877_2: Dhitiyā daḷhāya cāti daḷhāya dhitiyā ca,
atk-s0513a1:2877_4: Anivattitattā bhayabhīrutāya cāti bhayabhīrutāya anivattitatāya ca.
atk-s0513a1:2877_7: Idaṃ ubhayampi mahāsattassa “yakkhiniyo nāmetā manussakhādikā”ti bheravārammaṇaṃ disvāpi nāhosi.
atk-s0513a1:2877_9: Bhayabhīrutāya abhāveneva bheravārammaṇaṃ disvāpi anivattanabhāvenāti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2877_10: Na rakkhasīnaṃ vasamāgamimhaseti yakkhakantāre tāsaṃ rakkhasīnaṃ vasaṃ na agamimha.
atk-s0513a1:2877_11: Yasmā amhākaṃ kusalūpadese dhiti ca daḷhā ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2877_13: tasmā rakkhasīnaṃ vasaṃ na agamimhāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a1:2877_14: Sa sotthibhāvo mahatā bhayena meti so mayhaṃ ayaṃ ajja mahatā bhayena rakkhasīnaṃ santikā pattabbena
atk-s0513a1:2878_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto imāya gāthāya dhammaṃ desetvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2879_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2879_1: “ahaṃ tena samayena takkasilaṃ gantvā rajjappattakumāro ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2883_0: Khemaṃ yahinti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2883_1: So hi bhikkhu satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā paccantaṃ gantvā ekaṃ gāmakaṃ upanissāya araññasenāsane vassaṃ upagañchi.
atk-s0513a1:2883_2: Tassa paṭhamamāseyeva piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa paṇṇasālā jhāyittha.
atk-s0513a1:2883_3: So vasanaṭṭhānābhāvena kilamanto upaṭṭhākānaṃ ācikkhi. Te “hotu, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2883_7: So senāsanasappāyābhāvena kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a1:2883_8: So nimittamattampi anuppādetvā vutthavasso jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:2883_9: Satthā tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “kiṃ nu kho te, bhikkhu,
atk-s0513a1:2883_13: tiracchānāpi attano sappāyāsappāyaṃ ñatvā sappāyakāle vasitvā asappāyakāle vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya aññattha agamaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2883_14: tvaṃ kasmā attano sappāyāsappāyaṃ na aññāsī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2884_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sakuṇayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patvā sobhaggappatto

atk-s0513a1:2884_7: So kuddhamānaso rattibhāge sabbesaṃ sakuṇānaṃ sannipatitvā rukkhasākhāsu nipannakāle paṭhamaṃ tāva uddhanāropitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2884_8: viya udakaṃ pakkudhāpetvā dutiyavāre dhūmaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā tatiyavāre tālakkhandhappamāṇaṃ jālaṃ uṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2884_9: Bodhisatto udakato jālaṃ uṭṭhahamānaṃ disvā “bho, sakuṇā,
atk-s0513a1:2886_0: “Khemaṃ yahiṃ tattha arī udīrito, dakassa majjhe jalate ghatāsano;

atk-s0513a1:2888_10: Saraṇājja no bhayanti ajja amhākaṃ saraṇato bhayaṃ jātaṃ,

atk-s0513a1:2899_4: Etaṃ ubhayaṃ vivajjayāti etaṃ ubhayampi saññibhavañca asaññibhavañca vivajjaya pajahāti antevāsikaṃ ovadati.

atk-s0513a1:2909_2: Yodha paññāya gādhatīti yo puggalo idha sattaloke idaṃ kasiṇadvayaṃ paññāya gādhati,

atk-s0513a1:2909_10: hoti ābhassarūpagoti so puggalo tathā katvā paṭiladdhena dutiyena jhānena ābhassarabrahmalokūpago hotīti.
atk-s0513a1:2910_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto tāpase bodhetvā jeṭṭhantevāsikassa guṇaṃ kathetvā brahmalokameva gato.
atk-s0513a1:2911_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2915_0: Yaṃ laddhaṃ tena tuṭṭhabbanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2915_1: Sāvatthiyañhi aññataro upāsako bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ lasuṇena pavāretvā khettapālaṃ āṇāpesi “sace bhikkhuniyo āgacchanti,
atk-s0513a1:2915_2: ekekāya bhikkhuniyā dve tayo bhaṇḍike dehī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2915_3: Tato paṭṭhāya bhikkhuniyo tassa gehampi khettampi lasuṇatthāya gacchanti.
atk-s0513a1:2915_4: Athekasmiṃ ussavadivase tassa gehe lasuṇaṃ parikkhayaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2915_5: Thullanandā bhikkhunī saparivārā gehaṃ gantvā “lasuṇenāvuso attho”ti vatvā “natthayye,
atk-s0513a1:2915_7: khettaṃ gacchathā”ti vuttā khettaṃ gantvā na mattaṃ jānitvā lasuṇaṃ āharāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2915_8: Khettapālo ujjhāyi “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo na mattaṃ jānitvā lasuṇaṃ harāpessantī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:2915_9: Tassa kathaṃ sutvā yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā, tāpi,
atk-s0513a1:2915_12: Ujjhāyitvā ca pana bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2915_14: mahiccho puggalo nāma vijātamātuyāpi appiyo hoti amanāpo,
atk-s0513a1:2915_18: uppannaṃ vā pana lābhaṃ thiraṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0513a1:2915_22: uppannaṃ vā pana lābhaṃ thiraṃ kātuṃ sakkotī”tiādinā nayena bhikkhūnaṃ tadanucchavikaṃ dhammaṃ kathetvā “na,
atk-s0513a1:2916_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto aññatarasmiṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2916_1: Tassa vayappattassa samānajātikā kulā pajāpatiṃ āhariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2916_2: Tassā nandā nandāvatī sundarīnandāti tisso dhītaro ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2916_3: Tāsu patikulaṃ agatāsuyeva bodhisatto kālaṃ katvā suvaṇṇahaṃsayoniyaṃ nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:2916_5: So vayappatto suvaṇṇasañchannaṃ sobhaggappattaṃ mahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ disvā “kuto nu kho cavitvā ahaṃ idhūpapanno”ti
atk-s0513a1:2916_6: āvajjento “manussalokato”ti ñatvā puna “kathaṃ nu kho me brāhmaṇī ca dhītaro ca jīvantī”ti upadhārento
atk-s0513a1:2916_7: “paresaṃ bhatiṃ katvā kicchena jīvantī”ti ñatvā cintesi “mayhaṃ sarīre sovaṇṇamayāni pattāni koṭṭanaghaṭṭanakhamāni,
atk-s0513a1:2916_9: tena me pajāpati ca dhītaro ca sukhaṃ jīvissantī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2916_11: brāhmaṇī ca dhītaro ca bodhisattaṃ disvā “kuto āgatosi,
atk-s0513a1:2916_13: “Ahaṃ tumhākaṃ pitā kālaṃ katvā suvaṇṇahaṃsayoniyaṃ nibbatto tumhe daṭṭhuṃ āgato.
atk-s0513a1:2916_14: Ito paṭṭhāya tumhākaṃ paresaṃ bhatiṃ katvā dukkhajīvikāya jīvanakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a1:2916_16: taṃ vikkiṇitvā sukhena jīvathā”ti ekaṃ pattaṃ datvā agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2916_17: So eteneva niyāmena antarantarā āgantvā ekekaṃ pattaṃ deti,
atk-s0513a1:2916_18: brāhmaṇī ca dhītaro ca aḍḍhā sukhitā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2917_3: idānissa āgatakāle sabbāni pattānipi luñcitvā gaṇhāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2917_4: Tā “evaṃ no pitā kilamissatī”ti na sampaṭicchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2917_5: Brāhmaṇī pana mahicchatāya puna ekadivasaṃ suvaṇṇahaṃsarājassa āgatakāle “ehi tāva,
atk-s0513a1:2917_6: sāmī”ti vatvā taṃ attano santikaṃ upagataṃ ubhohi hatthehi gahetvā sabbapattāni luñci.
atk-s0513a1:2917_7: Tāni pana bodhisattassa ruciṃ vinā balakkārena gahitattā sabbāni bakapattasadisāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2917_9: Atha naṃ sā mahācāṭiyaṃ pakkhipitvā posesi.
atk-s0513a1:2917_10: Tassa puna uṭṭhahantāni pattāni setāni sampajjiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2917_11: So sañjātapatto uppatitvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gantvā na puna āgamāsi.

atk-s0513a1:2927_8: Kāṇamātā “ettakaṃ kālaṃ vasitvā kathaṃ tucchahatthāva gamissasī”ti pūvaṃ paci.
atk-s0513a1:2927_9: Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe eko piṇḍacāriko bhikkhu tassā nivesanaṃ agamāsi,

atk-s0513a1:2927_14: tassapi tathevāti evaṃ catunnaṃ janānaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2927_21: Tayopi vāre teneva upāyena gamanaṃ na sampajji,
atk-s0513a1:2927_23: Kāṇā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā rodamānā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2928_0: Satthā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kāṇamātāya nivesanaṃ gantvā paññattāsane
atk-s0513a1:2928_2: “Iminā nāma kāraṇenā”ti ca sutvā kāṇamātaraṃ samassāsetvā dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ agamāsi.

atk-s0513a1:2929_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto pāsāṇakoṭṭakakule nibbattitvā vayappatto pariyodātasippo ahosi.

atk-s0513a1:2929_8: Atha sā mūsikā gocarāya caramānā bodhisattaṃ punappunaṃ passantī uppannasinehā hutvā cintesi “mayhaṃ dhanaṃ bahu nikkāraṇena nassissati,

atk-s0513a1:2929_15: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā kahāpaṇaṃ ādāya gharaṃ gantvā ekena māsakena maṃsaṃ kiṇitvā āharitvā tassā adāsi.
