atk-s0513a1:2931_17: Evaṃ anukkamena sabbampi dhanaṃ bodhisattasseva adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2931_18: Te ubhopi yāvajīvaṃ mettiṃ abhinditvā yathākammaṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a1:2932_0: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2935_0: Tatiyo ca catuttho ca, idaṃ te babbukā bila”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2936_2: Dutiyo tattha jāyatīti yattha eko mūsikaṃ vā maṃsaṃ vā labhati,
atk-s0513a1:2936_5: Evaṃ te tadā cattāro biḷārā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2936_6: Hutvā ca pana divase divase maṃsaṃ khādantā te babbukā idaṃ phalikamayaṃ bilaṃ urena paharitvā sabbepi jīvitakkhayaṃ pattāti.
atk-s0513a1:2937_0: Evaṃ satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2941_0: Kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedhāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kuhakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2942_0: Atīte pana bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto godhāyoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:2942_1: Tadā eko pañcābhiñño uggatapo tāpaso ekaṃ paccantagāmaṃ nissāya araññāyatane paṇṇasālāyaṃ vasati,
atk-s0513a1:2942_3: Bodhisatto tassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ekasmiṃ vammike vasati,
atk-s0513a1:2942_4: vasanto ca pana divase divase dve tayo vāre tāpasaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ atthūpasaṃhitañca
atk-s0513a1:2942_5: vacanaṃ sutvā tāpasaṃ vanditvā vasanaṭṭhānameva gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:2942_7: Pakkamante ca pana tasmiṃ sīlavatasampanne tāpase añño kūṭatāpaso āgantvā tasmiṃ assamapade vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:2942_8: Bodhisatto “ayampi sīlavā”ti sallakkhetvā purimanayeneva tassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2943_0: Athekadivasaṃ nidāghasamaye akālameghe vuṭṭhe vammikehi makkhikā nikkhamiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2943_2: Gāmavāsino nikkhamitvā makkhikākhādakā godhā gahetvā siniddhasambhārasaṃyuttaṃ ambilānambilaṃ godhāmaṃsaṃ sampādetvā tāpasassa adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2943_3: Tāpaso godhāmaṃsaṃ khāditvā rasataṇhāya baddho “idaṃ maṃsaṃ atimadhuraṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2943_4: kissa maṃsaṃ nāmeta”nti pucchitvā “godhāmaṃsa”nti sutvā “mama santikaṃ mahāgodhā āgacchati,
atk-s0513a1:2943_6: Cintetvā ca pana bhājanañca sappiloṇādīni ca āharāpetvā ekamante ṭhapetvā muggaramādāya kāsāvena paṭicchādetvā
atk-s0513a1:2943_7: paṇṇasālādvāre bodhisattassa āgamanaṃ olokayamāno upasantūpasanto viya hutvā nisīdi bodhisatto sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0513a1:2943_8: “tāpasassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti nikkhamitvā upasaṅkamantova tassa indriyavippakāraṃ disvā cintesi “nāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2943_10: ajjesa maṃ olokentopi duṭṭhindriyo hutvā oloketi,
atk-s0513a1:2943_12: So tāpasassa heṭṭhāvāte ṭhatvā godhāmaṃsagandhaṃ ghāyitvā “iminā kūṭatāpasena ajja godhāmaṃsaṃ khāditaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2943_13: tenesa rasataṇhāya baddho ajja maṃ attano santikaṃ upasaṅkamantaṃ muggarena paharitvā maṃsaṃ pacitvā
atk-s0513a1:2943_14: khāditukāmo bhavissatī”ti tassa santikaṃ anupagantvāva paṭikkamitvā vicarati.
atk-s0513a1:2944_0: Tāpaso bodhisattassa anāgamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “iminā ‘ayaṃ maṃ paharitukāmo’ti ñātaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2944_2: anāgacchantassāpissa kuto muttī”ti muggaraṃ nīharitvā khipi.
atk-s0513a1:2944_4: Bodhisatto vegena vammikaṃ pavisitvā aññena chiddena sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā “ambho kūṭajaṭila,
atk-s0513a1:2944_5: ahaṃ tava santikaṃ upasaṅkamanto ‘sīlavā’ti saññāya upasaṅkamiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2944_6: idāni pana te mayā kūṭabhāvo ñāto,
atk-s0513a1:2944_7: tādisassa mahācorassa kiṃ iminā pabbajjāliṅgenā”ti vatvā taṃ garahanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2946_0: “Kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha, kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā;
atk-s0513a1:2948_0: Tattha kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedhāti ambho dummedha,
atk-s0513a1:2948_2: pabbajjāguṇarahitassa kiṃ te tāhi jaṭāhīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2948_3: Kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyāti ajinasāṭiyā anucchavikassa saṃvarassa abhāvakālato paṭṭhāya kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā.
atk-s0513a1:2948_4: Abbhantaraṃ te gahananti tava abbhantaraṃ hadayaṃ rāgadosamohagahanena gahanaṃ paṭicchannaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2948_5: Bāhiraṃ parimajjasīti so tvaṃ abbhantare gahane nhānādīhi ceva liṅgagahanena ca bāhiraṃ parimajjasi,
atk-s0513a1:2948_6: taṃ parimajjanto kañjikapūritalābu viya visapūritacāṭi viya āsīvisapūritavammiko viya gūthapūritacittaghaṭo viya ca bahimaṭṭhova hosi,
atk-s0513a1:2949_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto kūṭatāpasaṃ tajjetvā vammikameva pāvisi, kūṭatāpasopi tato pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:2950_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2954_0: Akkhī bhinnā paṭo naṭṭhoti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2954_1: Tadā kira dhammasabhāyaṃ bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:2954_2: seyyathāpi nāma chavālātaṃ ubhatopadittaṃ majjhe gūthagataṃ nevāraññe kaṭṭhatthaṃ pharati,
atk-s0513a1:2954_4: evameva devadatto evarūpe niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā ubhato bhaṭṭho ubhato paribāhiro jāto,
atk-s0513a1:2954_9: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2954_12: atītepi ubhato bhaṭṭho ahosiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2955_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2955_2: Atheko bāḷisiko baḷisaṃ ādāya daharena puttena saddhiṃ yasmiṃ sobbhe pakatiyāpi bāḷisikā macche gaṇhanti,
atk-s0513a1:2955_5: Bāḷisiko taṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ asakkonto cintesi “ayaṃ baḷiso mahāmacche laggo bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2955_6: puttakaṃ mātu santikaṃ pesetvā paṭivissakehi saddhiṃ kalahaṃ kārāpemi,
atk-s0513a1:2955_7: evaṃ ito na koci koṭṭhāsaṃ paccāsīsissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2955_11: So puttaṃ pesetvā baḷisaṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ asakkonto rajjucchedanabhayena uttarisāṭakaṃ thale ṭhapetvā udakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2955_12: otaritvā macchalobhena macchaṃ upadhārento khāṇukehi paharitvā dvepi akkhīni bhindi.
atk-s0513a1:2955_14: So vedanāppatto hutvā hatthena akkhīni uppīḷayamāno gahetvā udakā uttaritvā kampamāno sāṭakaṃ pariyesati.
atk-s0513a1:2956_0: Sāpissa bhariyā “kalahaṃ katvā kassaci apaccāsīsanabhāvaṃ karissāmī”ti ekasmiṃyeva kaṇṇe tālapaṇṇaṃ piḷandhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2956_1: ekaṃ akkhiṃ ukkhalimasiyā añjetvā kukkuraṃ aṅkenādāya paṭivissakagharaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2956_2: Atha naṃ ekā sahāyikā evamāha “ekasmiṃyeva te kaṇṇe tālapaṇṇaṃ piḷandhitaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2956_4: piyaputtaṃ viya kukkuraṃ aṅkenādāya gharato gharaṃ gacchasi,
atk-s0513a1:2956_7: tvaṃ pana maṃ akāraṇena akkosasi paribhāsasi,
atk-s0513a1:2956_8: idāni taṃ gāmabhojakassa santikaṃ gantvā aṭṭha kahāpaṇe daṇḍāpessāmī”ti evaṃ kalahaṃ katvā ubhopi gāmabhojakassa santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2956_9: Kalahe visodhiyamāne tassāyeva matthake daṇḍo pati.
atk-s0513a1:2956_10: Atha naṃ bandhitvā “daṇḍaṃ dehī”ti pothetuṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2957_1: araññe cassā patino taṃ byasanaṃ disvā khandhantare ṭhitā “bho purisa,
atk-s0513a1:2959_0: “Akkhī bhinnā paṭo naṭṭho, sakhigehe ca bhaṇḍanaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:2960_0: Ubhato paduṭṭhā kammantā, udakamhi thalamhi cā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2961_0: Tattha sakhigehe ca bhaṇḍananti sakhī nāma sahāyikā,
atk-s0513a1:2961_1: tassā ca gehe tava bhariyāya bhaṇḍanaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2961_2: bhaṇḍanaṃ katvā bandhitvā pothetvā daṇḍaṃ dāpiyati.
atk-s0513a1:2961_3: Ubhato paduṭṭhā kammantāti evaṃ tava dvīsupi ṭhānesu kammantā paduṭṭhāyeva bhinnāyeva.
atk-s0513a1:2961_6: akkhibhedena paṭanāsena ca udake kammantā paduṭṭhā,
atk-s0513a1:2962_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā bāḷisiko devadatto ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2966_0: Niccaṃ ubbiggahadayāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ñātatthacariyaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2967_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kākayoniyaṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2967_1: Athekadivasaṃ rañño purohito bahinagare nadiyaṃ nhāyitvā gandhe vilimpitvā mālaṃ piḷandhitvā varavatthanivattho nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:2967_4: ahaṃ imassa brāhmaṇassa matthake sarīravaḷañjaṃ pātessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2967_7: issarajanena ca saddhiṃ veraṃ nāma pāpakaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2967_10: “Tena hi paññāyissasī”ti vatvā itaro kāko palāyi.
atk-s0513a1:2967_11: So toraṇassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ sampatte brāhmaṇe olambakaṃ cālento viya tassa matthake vaccaṃ pātesi.
atk-s0513a1:2968_0: Tasmiṃ kāle ekā bhatiyā vīhikoṭṭikadāsī vīhiṃ gehadvāre ātape pattharitvā rakkhantī nisinnāva niddaṃ okkami.
atk-s0513a1:2968_1: Tassā pamādaṃ ñatvā eko dīghalomako eḷako āgantvā vīhiṃ khādi,
atk-s0513a1:2968_4: tatiyampi tassā tatheva niddāyanakāle āgantvā vīhiṃ khādi.
atk-s0513a1:2968_5: Sāpi taṃ tikkhattuṃ palāpetvā cintesi “ayaṃ punappunaṃ khādanto upaḍḍhavīhiṃ khādissati,
atk-s0513a1:2968_8: Sā alātaṃ gahetvā niddāyamānā viya nisīditvā vīhikhādanatthāya eḷake sampatte uṭṭhāya alātena eḷakaṃ pahari,
atk-s0513a1:2968_10: So sarīre jhāyante “aggiṃ nibbāpessāmī”ti vegena gantvā hatthisālāya samīpe ekissā tiṇakuṭiyā sarīraṃ ghaṃsi,
atk-s0513a1:2968_15: Vejjā hatthī aroge kātuṃ asakkontā rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2968_23: Rājā “tena hi kāke māretvā vasaṃ āharathā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2968_24: Tato paṭṭhāya kāke māretvā vasaṃ alabhitvā tattha tattheva rāsiṃ karonti,
atk-s0513a1:2969_1: Atheko kāko gantvā kākānaṃ uppannabhayaṃ bodhisattassa ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:2969_2: So cintesi “ṭhapetvā maṃ añño mayhaṃ ñātakānaṃ uppannabhayaṃ harituṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:2969_3: harissāmi na”nti dasa pāramiyo āvajjetvā mettāpāramiṃ purecārikaṃ katvā ekavegena pakkhanditvā vivaṭamahāvātapānena
atk-s0513a1:2969_5: Atha naṃ eko manusso gahitukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2969_8: Mahāsatto thokaṃ vissamitvā mettāpāramiṃ āvajjetvā heṭṭhāsanā nikkhamitvā rājānaṃ āha –
atk-s0513a1:2969_10: raññā nāma chandādivasena agantvā rajjaṃ kāretuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0513a1:2969_16: Sace hi rājāno yaṃ kayiramānaṃ na nipphajjati,
atk-s0513a1:2969_21: Taṃ sutvā rājā pasannacitto bodhisattassa kañcanabhaddapīṭhaṃ dāpetvā tattha nisinnassa pakkhantarāni
atk-s0513a1:2969_22: satapākasahassapākatelehi makkhāpetvā kañcanataṭṭake rājārahaṃ subhojanaṃ bhojāpetvā pānīyaṃ pāyetvā
atk-s0513a1:2969_25: kena kāraṇena nesaṃ vasā na hotī”ti bodhisatto “iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenā”ti sakalanivesanaṃ ekaravaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2972_0: Tasmā nesaṃ vasā natthi, kākānamhāka ñātina”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2973_1: kākā nāma niccaṃ ubbiggamānasā bhayappattāva viharanti,
atk-s0513a1:2973_3: khattiyādayo manussepi itthipurisepi kumārakumārikādayopi viheṭhentā kilamentāva vicaranti,
atk-s0513a1:2973_4: tasmā imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi nesaṃ amhākaṃ ñātīnaṃ kākānaṃ vasā nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a1:2974_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto imaṃ kāraṇaṃ uttānaṃ katvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:2974_1: raññā nāma anisamma anupadhāretvā kammaṃ na kattabba”nti rājānaṃ bodhesi.
atk-s0513a1:2974_3: Bodhisatto rajjaṃ raññoyeva paṭidatvā rājānaṃ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā sabbasattānaṃ abhayaṃ yāci.
atk-s0513a1:2974_4: Rājā tassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sabbasattānaṃ abhayaṃ datvā kākānaṃ nibaddhadānaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:2974_5: Divase divase taṇḍulambaṇassa bhattaṃ pacitvā nānaggarasehi omadditvā kākānaṃ dīyati,
atk-s0513a1:2975_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2985_0: Na pāpajanasaṃsevīti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ekaṃ vipakkhaseviṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2986_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto godhāyoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:2986_1: So vayappatto nadītīre mahābile anekagodhāsataparivāro vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:2986_2: Tassa putto godhāpillako ekena kakaṇṭakena saddhiṃ santhavaṃ katvā tena saddhiṃ sammodamāno viharanto “kakaṇṭakaṃ parissajissāmī”ti avattharati.
atk-s0513a1:2986_3: Tassa tena saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ godhārājassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2986_8: Sace tvaṃ tena saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ karissasi,
atk-s0513a1:2986_9: taṃ kakaṇṭakaṃ nissāya sabbampetaṃ godhākulaṃ vināsaṃ pāpuṇissati,
atk-s0513a1:2986_10: ito paṭṭhāya etena saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ mā akāsī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2986_12: Bodhisatto punappunaṃ kathentopi tassa tena saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ vāretuṃ asakkonto “avassaṃ amhākaṃ etaṃ kakaṇṭakaṃ nissāya bhayaṃ uppajjissati,
atk-s0513a1:2986_13: tasmiṃ uppanne palāyanamaggaṃ sampādetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ekena passena vātabilaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2987_4: So kilamanto cintesi “sace ayaṃ aññāni katipayāni divasāni maṃ evaṃ parissajissati,
atk-s0513a1:2987_6: ekena luddakena saddhiṃ ekato hutvā imaṃ godhākulaṃ vināsessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2987_7: Athekadivasaṃ nidāghasamaye meghe vuṭṭhe vammikamakkhikā uṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2987_8: tato tato godhā nikkhamitvā makkhikāyo khādanti.
atk-s0513a1:2987_9: Eko godhāluddako godhābilaṃ bhindanatthāya kuddālaṃ gahetvā sunakhehi saddhiṃ araññaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:2987_10: Kakaṇṭako taṃ disvā “ajja attano manorathaṃ pūressāmī”ti taṃ upasaṅkamitvā avidūre nipajjitvā “bho purisa,
atk-s0513a1:2987_14: aggiñca palālañca ādāya ehī”ti taṃ tattha netvā “imasmiṃ ṭhāne palālaṃ pakkhipitvā aggiṃ datvā dhūmaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2987_15: katvā samantā sunakhe ṭhapetvā sayaṃ mahāmuggaraṃ gahetvā nikkhantā nikkhantā godhā paharitvā māretvā
atk-s0513a1:2987_16: rāsiṃ katvā yāhī”ti evañca pana vatvā “ajja paccāmittassa piṭṭhiṃ passissāmī”ti ekasmiṃ ṭhāne sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:2987_19: godhā dhūmandhā maraṇabhayatajjitā nikkhamitvā palāyituṃ āraddhā.
atk-s0513a1:2988_0: Bodhisatto “kakaṇṭakaṃ nissāya bhayaṃ uppanna”nti ñatvā “pāpapurisasaṃsaggo nāma na kattabbo,
atk-s0513a1:2988_2: ekassa pāpakakaṇṭakassa vasena ettakānaṃ godhānaṃ vināso jāto”ti vātabilena palāyanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2992_1: pāpajanasaṃsevī puggalo accantasukhaṃ ekantasukhaṃ nirantarasukhaṃ nāma na edhati na vindati na paṭilabhati.
atk-s0513a1:2992_4: Yathā kakaṇṭakato godhākulaṃ sukhaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0513a1:2992_5: evaṃ pāpajanasaṃsevī puggalo sukhaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0513a1:2992_6: Pāpajanaṃ pana sevanto ekanteneva kaliṃ pāpeti attānaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2992_8: ekanteneva pāpasevī attānañca aññe ca attanā saddhiṃ vasante vināsaṃ pāpeti.
atk-s0513a1:2993_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2993_2: bodhisattassa putto anovādako godhāpillako vipakkhasevī bhikkhu,
atk-s0513a1:2997_0: Etañhi te durājānanti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattassa vadhāya parisakkanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2997_6: sayameva pana kilanto”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2998_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto siṅgālayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā siṅgālarājā hutvā siṅgālagaṇaparivuto susānavane vihāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2998_4: Athettha sambahulā dhuttā bahuṃ surañca maṃsañca āharāpetvā maṇḍitapasādhitā gāyitvā gāyitvā surañca pivanti,
atk-s0513a1:2998_9: “Maṃsaṃ khīṇa”nti ca vutte “mayi ṭhite maṃsakkhayo nāma natthī”ti vatvā “āmakasusāne matamanussamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2998_10: khādanatthāya āgate siṅgāle māretvā maṃsaṃ āharissāmī”ti muggaraṃ gahetvā niddhamanamaggena nagarā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a1:2998_11: susānaṃ gantvā muggaraṃ gahetvā matako viya uttāno nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:2998_12: Tasmiṃ khaṇe bodhisatto siṅgālagaṇaparivuto tattha gato taṃ disvā “nāyaṃ matako”ti ñatvāpi “suṭṭhutaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2998_13: upaparikkhissāmī”ti tassa adhovātena gantvā sarīragandhaṃ ghāyitvā tathatovassa amatakabhāvaṃ ñatvā “lajjāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2998_14: naṃ uyyojessāmī”ti gantvā muggarakoṭiyaṃ ḍaṃsitvā ākaḍḍhi,
atk-s0513a1:2998_16: upasaṅkamantampi na olokento naṃ gāḷhataraṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0513a1:2998_19: na mayi muggaraṃ ākaḍḍhante gāḷhataraṃ gaṇheyyāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2998_20: iminā kāraṇena tava matakabhāvo vā amatakabhāvo vā dujjāno”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:3001_0: Yassa te kaḍḍhamānassa, hatthā daṇḍo na muccatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3002_0: Tattha etañhi te durājānanti etaṃ kāraṇaṃ tava duviññeyyaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:3002_1: Yaṃ sesi matasāyikanti yena kāraṇena tvaṃ matasāyikaṃ sesi,
atk-s0513a1:3002_3: Yassa te kaḍḍhamānassāti yassa tava daṇḍakoṭiyaṃ gahetvā kaḍḍhiyamānassa hatthato daṇḍo na muccati,
atk-s0513a1:3002_4: so tvaṃ tathato matako nāma na hosīti.
atk-s0513a1:3003_0: Evaṃ vutte so dhutto “ayaṃ mama amatakabhāvaṃ jānātī”ti uṭṭhāya daṇḍaṃ khipi,
atk-s0513a1:3003_5: maṃ virajjhantopi tvaṃ aṭṭha mahāniraye soḷasa ca ussadaniraye aviraddhoyevā”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:3003_6: Dhutto kiñci alabhitvā susānā nikkhamitvā parikhāyaṃ nhāyitvā āgatamaggeneva nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:3004_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:3008_0: Lasī ca te nipphalitāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattassa gayāsīse sugatālayassa dassitabhāvaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:3008_1: Devadatto hi parihīnajjhāno lābhasakkāraparihīno “attheko upāyo”ti cintetvā satthāraṃ pañca vatthūni
atk-s0513a1:3008_2: yācitvā alabhamāno dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ saddhivihārike adhunā pabbajite dhammavinayamhi akovide pañcasate
atk-s0513a1:3008_3: bhikkhū gahetvā gayāsīsaṃ gantvā saṅghaṃ bhinditvā ekasīmāyaṃ āveṇikaṃ saṅghakammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3008_4: Satthā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ñāṇaparipākakālaṃ ñatvā dve aggasāvake pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:3008_5: Te disvā devadatto tuṭṭhamānaso rattiṃ dhammaṃ desayamāno “buddhalīlaṃ karissāmī”ti sugatālayaṃ dassento “vigatathinamiddho kho,
atk-s0513a1:3008_11: Dve aggasāvakā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā maggaphalehi pabodhetvā sabbe ādāya veḷuvanameva paccāgamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3009_0: Kokāliko vihāraṃ tucchaṃ disvā devadattassa santikaṃ gantvā “āvuso devadatta,
atk-s0513a1:3009_1: parisaṃ te bhinditvā dve aggasāvakā vihāraṃ tucchaṃ katvā gatā,
atk-s0513a1:3009_2: tvaṃ pana niddāyasiyevā”ti vatvā uttarāsaṅgamassa apanetvā bhittiyaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ phusanto viya paṇhiyā naṃ hadaye pahari.
atk-s0513a1:3009_6: tumhākaṃ gatakāle devadatto kiṃ akāsī”ti? Bhante,
atk-s0513a1:3009_7: devadatto amhe disvā “buddhalīlaṃ karissāmī”ti sugatālayaṃ dassetvā mahāvināsaṃ pattoti.
atk-s0513a1:3009_9: devadatto idāneva mama anukaronto vināsaṃ patto,
atk-s0513a1:3009_10: pubbepi pattoyevā”ti vatvā therena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:3010_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kesarasīho hutvā himavantappadese kañcanaguhāyaṃ vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:3010_1: So ekadivasaṃ kañcanaguhāya nikkhamitvā vijambhitvā catuddisaṃ oloketvā sīhanādaṃ naditvā gocarāya pakkanto
atk-s0513a1:3010_2: mahāmahiṃsaṃ vadhitvā varamaṃsaṃ khāditvā ekaṃ saraṃ otaritvā maṇivaṇṇassa udakassa kucchiṃ pūretvā guhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3010_4: Atheko siṅgālo gocarappasuto sahasāva sīhaṃ disvā palāyituṃ asakkonto sīhassa purato pādesu patitvā nipajji. “Kiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:3010_9: varamaṃsāni taṃ khādāpessāmī”ti vatvā siṅgālaṃ ādāya kañcanaguhaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3011_0: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ guhāya nipannakova sīho āha “gaccha jambuka,
atk-s0513a1:3011_1: pabbatasikhare ṭhatvā pabbatapāde sañcarantesu hatthiassamahiṃsādīsu yassa maṃsaṃ khāditukāmosi,
atk-s0513a1:3011_2: taṃ oloketvā āgantvā ‘asukamaṃsaṃ khāditukāmomhī’ti vatvā maṃ vanditvā ‘viroca,
atk-s0513a1:3011_4: ahaṃ taṃ vadhitvā madhuramaṃsaṃ khāditvā tuyhampi dassāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3011_5: Siṅgālo pabbatasikharaṃ abhiruhitvā nānappakāre mige oloketvā yasseva maṃsaṃ khāditukāmo hoti,
atk-s0513a1:3011_6: kañcanaguhaṃ pavisitvā tameva sīhassa ārocetvā pādesu patitvā “viroca,
atk-s0513a1:3011_8: Sīho vegena pakkhanditvā sacepi mattavaravāraṇo hoti,
atk-s0513a1:3011_9: tattheva naṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā sayampi varamaṃsaṃ khādati,
atk-s0513a1:3011_11: Siṅgālo kucchipūraṃ maṃsaṃ khāditvā guhaṃ pavisitvā niddāyati.
atk-s0513a1:3011_12: So gacchante gacchante kāle mānaṃ vaḍḍhesi “ahampi catuppadova,
atk-s0513a1:3011_13: kiṃkāraṇā divase divase parehi posiyamāno viharāmi,
atk-s0513a1:3011_14: ito paṭṭhāya ahampi hatthiādayo hanitvā maṃsaṃ khādissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:3011_16: sāmī’ti vuttameva padaṃ nissāya varavāraṇe vadheti,
atk-s0513a1:3011_18: jambukā’ti maṃ vadāpetvā ekaṃ varavāraṇaṃ vadhitvā maṃsaṃ khādissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3012_1: mayā dīgharattaṃ tumhehi vadhitavaravāraṇānaṃ maṃsaṃ khāditaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:3012_2: ahampi ekaṃ varavāraṇaṃ māretvā maṃsaṃ khāditukāmo,
atk-s0513a1:3012_4: tumhe pabbatapāde vicarantaṃ varavāraṇaṃ oloketvā mama santikaṃ āgantvā ‘viroca,
atk-s0513a1:3012_10: vāraṇaṃ vadhitvā maṃsaṃ khādanasamattho siṅgālo nāma loke natthi,
atk-s0513a1:3012_13: So evaṃ vuttepi viramituṃ na icchi,
atk-s0513a1:3012_15: Sīho taṃ vāretuṃ asakkonto sampaṭicchitvā “tena hi mama vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā nipajjā”ti jambukaṃ kañcanaguhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3012_16: nipajjāpetvā sayaṃ pabbatapāde mattavaravāraṇaṃ oloketvā guhādvāraṃ gantvā “viroca,
atk-s0513a1:3012_18: Siṅgālo kañcanaguhāya nikkhamitvā vijambhitvā catuddisaṃ oloketvā tikkhattuṃ vassitvā “mattavaravāraṇassa
atk-s0513a1:3012_19: kumbhe patissāmī”ti pakkhanditvā virajjhitvā pādamūle pati.
atk-s0513a1:3012_20: Vāraṇo dakkhiṇapādaṃ ukkhipitvā tassa sīsaṃ akkami,
atk-s0513a1:3012_22: Athassa sarīraṃ vāraṇo pādena saṅgharitvā rāsiṃ katvā upari laṇḍaṃ pātetvā koñcanādaṃ nadanto araññaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:3013_0: Bodhisatto imaṃ pavattiṃ disvā “idāni viroca, jambukā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:3015_0: “Lasī ca te nipphalitā, matthako ca padālito;
atk-s0513a1:3016_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, ajja kho tvaṃ virocasī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3017_2: Evaṃ bodhisatto imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:3018_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:3022_0: Bahumpetaṃ asabbhi jātavedāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ājīvakānaṃ micchātapaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:3022_1: Tadā kira ājīvakā jetavanapiṭṭhiyaṃ nānappakāraṃ micchātapaṃ caranti.
atk-s0513a1:3022_2: Sambahulā bhikkhū tesaṃ ukkuṭikappadhānavaggulivatakaṇṭakāpassayapañcātapatapanādibhedaṃ micchātapaṃ disvā bhagavantaṃ pucchiṃsu “atthi nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:3022_3: imaṃ micchātapaṃ nissāya kusalaṃ vā vuḍḍhi vā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3022_6: evarūpaṃ micchātapaṃ nissāya kusalaṃ vā vuḍḍhi vā atthi,
atk-s0513a1:3022_7: pubbe paṇḍitā ‘evarūpaṃ tapaṃ nissāya kusalaṃ vā vuḍḍhi vā bhavissatī’ti saññāya jātaggiṃ gahetvā araññaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3022_8: pavisitvā aggijuhanādivasena kiñci vuḍḍhiṃ apassantā aggiṃ udakena nibbāpetvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:3022_9: abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇā ahesu”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:3023_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:3023_1: Tassa jātadivase mātāpitaro jātaggiṃ gahetvā ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:3023_2: Atha naṃ soḷasavassakāle etadavocuṃ “mayaṃ te, putta,
atk-s0513a1:3023_7: aggiṃ gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā aggiṃ paricaranto mahābrahmānaṃ ārādhetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo hohī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3023_8: So “na mayhaṃ agārena attho”ti aggiṃ gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā assamapadaṃ māpetvā aggiṃ paricaranto araññe vihāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3023_9: So ekadivasaṃ paccantagāmake godakkhiṇaṃ labhitvā taṃ goṇaṃ assamapadaṃ netvā cintesi “aggibhagavantaṃ gomaṃsaṃ khādāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3023_12: gāmato loṇaṃ āharitvā aggibhagavantaṃ saloṇakaṃ khādāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3023_13: So taṃ tattheva bandhitvā loṇatthāya gāmakaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3023_14: Tasmiṃ gate sambahulā luddakā taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgatā.
atk-s0513a1:3023_15: Goṇaṃ disvā vadhitvā maṃsaṃ pacitvā khāditvā naṅguṭṭhañca jaṅghañca cammañca tattheva chaḍḍetvā avasesamaṃsaṃ ādāya agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3024_0: Brāhmaṇo āgantvā naṅguṭṭhādimattameva disvā cintesi “ayaṃ aggibhagavā attano santakampi rakkhituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a1:3024_3: natthi itonidānaṃ kusalaṃ vā vuḍḍhi vā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3024_5: tvaṃ attanopi santakaṃ rakkhituṃ asakkonto maṃ kadā rakkhissasi,
atk-s0513a1:3024_7: ettakenapi tussāhī”ti naṅguṭṭhādīni aggimhi pakkhipanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:3027_0: Maṃsārahassa natthajja maṃsaṃ, naṅguṭṭhampi bhavaṃ paṭiggahātū”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3028_3: Aggi hi jātamattova vediyati paññāyati pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0513a1:3028_5: Yaṃ taṃ vāladhinābhipūjayāmāti yaṃ ajja mayaṃ attanopi santakaṃ rakkhituṃ asamatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ vāladhinā abhipūjayāma,
atk-s0513a1:3028_7: Maṃsārahassāti maṃsaṃ arahassa tuyhaṃ natthi ajja maṃsaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:3028_8: Naṅguṭṭhampi bhavaṃ paṭiggahātūti attano santakaṃ rakkhituṃ asakkonto bhavaṃ imaṃ sajaṅghacammaṃ naṅguṭṭhampi paṭiggaṇhātūti.
atk-s0513a1:3029_0: Evaṃ vatvā mahāsatto aggiṃ udakena nibbāpetvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:3030_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “nibbutaggitāpaso ahameva tena samayenā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3034_0: Na tvaṃ rādha vijānāsīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto purāṇadutiyikāpalobhanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:3034_2: Satthā pana taṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantetvā “bhikkhu mātugāmo nāma arakkhiyo,
atk-s0513a1:3034_3: ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā rakkhantāpi rakkhituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0513a1:3034_4: Tvampi pubbe etaṃ ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā rakkhantopi rakkhituṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0513a1:3034_5: idāni kathaṃ rakkhissasī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:3035_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sukayoniyaṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:3035_1: Kāsiraṭṭhe eko brāhmaṇo bodhisattañca kaniṭṭhabhātarañcassa puttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā posesi.
atk-s0513a1:3035_4: Tassa pana brāhmaṇassa bhariyā anācārā hoti dussīlā.
atk-s0513a1:3035_5: So vohāratthāya gacchanto ubhopi bhātaro āha – “tātā,
atk-s0513a1:3035_6: sace vo mātā brāhmaṇī anācāraṃ ācarati,
atk-s0513a1:3035_11: Evaṃ brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ sukānaṃ niyyādetvā vohāratthāya gato.
atk-s0513a1:3036_0: Tassa pana gatadivasato paṭṭhāya brāhmaṇī aticarituṃ āraddhā,
atk-s0513a1:3036_2: tassā kiriyaṃ disvā rādho bodhisattaṃ āha – “bhātika,
atk-s0513a1:3036_3: amhākaṃ pitā ‘sace vo mātā anācāraṃ ācarati,
atk-s0513a1:3036_8: tvaṃ attano abyattatāya bālabhāvena evaṃ vadesi,
atk-s0513a1:3036_9: mātugāmaṃ nāma ukkhipitvā carantāpi rakkhituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0513a1:3036_11: na taṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:3040_3: aḍḍharatte anāgate paṭhamayāmeyeva ettakā janā āgatā,
atk-s0513a1:3040_7: Virattā kosiyāyaneti mātā no kosiyāyanī brāhmaṇī virattā amhākaṃ pitari nippemā jātā.
atk-s0513a1:3040_8: Sacassā tasmiṃ sineho vā pemaṃ vā bhaveyya,
atk-s0513a1:3040_9: na evarūpaṃ anācāraṃ kareyyāti imamatthaṃ etehi byañjanehi pakāsesi.
atk-s0513a1:3041_0: Evaṃ pakāsetvā ca pana brāhmaṇiyā saddhiṃ rādhassa vattuṃ na adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3041_1: Sāpi yāva brāhmaṇassa anāgamanā yathāruciyā vicari.
atk-s0513a1:3041_4: Bodhisatto brāhmaṇassa sabbaṃ yathābhūtaṃ kathetvā “kiṃ te, tāta,
atk-s0513a1:3041_6: amhehi mātuyā dosassa kathitakālato paṭṭhāya na sakkā idha vasitu”nti brāhmaṇassa pāde vanditvā saddhiṃ rādhena uppatitvā araññaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3042_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:3042_2: “Tadā brāhmaṇo ca brāhmaṇī ca eteyeva dve janā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:3046_0: Api nu hanukā santāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule mahallake bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:3046_1: Te kira gihikāle sāvatthiyaṃ kuṭumbikā aḍḍhā mahaddhanā aññamaññasahāyakā ekato hutvā puññāni karontā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā “mayaṃ mahallakā,
atk-s0513a1:3046_3: satthu santike ramaṇīye buddhasāsane pabbajitvā dukkhassantaṃ karissāmā”ti sabbaṃ sāpateyyaṃ puttadhītādīnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3046_4: datvā assumukhaṃ ñātisaṅghaṃ pahāya satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yācitvā pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3046_5: Pabbajitvā pana pabbajjānurūpaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ na kariṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:3046_7: gihikāle viya pabbajitakālepi vihārapariyante paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā ekatova vasiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3046_8: Piṇḍāya carantāpi aññattha agantvā yebhuyyena attano puttadārasseva gehaṃ gantvā bhuñjiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3046_9: Tesu ekassa purāṇadutiyikā sabbesampi mahallakattherānaṃ upakārā ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:3046_10: tasmā sesāpi attanā laddhaṃ āhāraṃ gahetvā tassāyeva gehe nisīditvā bhuñjanti.
atk-s0513a1:3046_13: Atha te mahallakattherā vihāraṃ gantvā aññamaññaṃ gīvāsu gahetvā “madhurahattharasā upāsikā kālakatā”ti vihārapaccante rodantā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3046_14: Tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā ito cito ca bhikkhū sannipatitvā “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:3046_16: Te “amhākaṃ sahāyassa purāṇadutiyikā madhurahattharasā kālakatā amhākaṃ ativiya upakārā,
atk-s0513a1:3046_17: ‘idāni kuto tathārūpiṃ labhissāmā’ti iminā kāraṇena rodimhā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3047_0: Tesaṃ taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:3047_1: iminā nāma kāraṇena mahallakattherā aññamaññaṃ gīvāsu gahetvā vihārapaccante rodantā vicarantī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3047_4: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:3047_7: pubbepete imaṃ kākayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā samudde mataṃ nissāya ‘samuddaudakaṃ ussiñcitvā etaṃ nīharissāmā’ti
atk-s0513a1:3047_8: vāyamantā paṇḍite nissāya jīvitaṃ labhiṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:3048_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto samuddadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:3048_1: Atheko kāko attano bhariyaṃ kākiṃ ādāya gocaraṃ pariyesamāno samuddatīraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3048_2: Tasmiṃ kāle manussā samuddatīre khīrapāyāsamacchamaṃsasurādīhi nāgabalikammaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3048_3: Atha so kāko balikammaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā khīrādīni disvā saddhiṃ kākiyā khīrapāyāsamacchamaṃsādīni bhuñjitvā bahuṃ suraṃ pivi.
atk-s0513a1:3048_4: Te ubhopi surāmadamattā “samuddakīḷaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti velante nisīditvā nhāyituṃ ārabhiṃsu athekā ūmi āgantvā kākiṃ gahetvā samuddaṃ pavesesi.
atk-s0513a1:3048_7: Athassa paridevanasaddaṃ sutvā bahū kākā sannipatitvā “kiṃkāraṇā rodasī”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3048_10: Atha nesaṃ etadahosi “idaṃ samuddaudakaṃ nāma amhākaṃ kiṃ pahosi,
atk-s0513a1:3048_11: udakaṃ ussiñcitvā samuddaṃ tucchaṃ katvā sahāyikaṃ nīharissāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3048_12: Te mukhaṃ pūretvā pūretvā udakaṃ bahi chaḍḍenti,
atk-s0513a1:3048_13: loṇūdakena ca gale sussamāne uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya thalaṃ gantvā vissamanti.
atk-s0513a1:3049_0: Te hanūsu kilantesu mukhesu sukkhantesu akkhīsu rattesu dīnā kilantā hutvā aññamaññaṃ āmantetvā “ambho,
atk-s0513a1:3049_3: samuddaṃ tucchaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissāmā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a1:3053_0: Tattha api nu hanukā santāti api no hanukā santā,
atk-s0513a1:3053_2: Oramāma na pāremāti mayaṃ attano balena mahāsamuddaudakaṃ ākaḍḍhāma osārema,
atk-s0513a1:3053_3: tucchaṃ pana naṃ kātuṃ na sakkoma.
atk-s0513a1:3054_0: Evañca pana vatvā sabbepi te kākā “tassā kākiyā evarūpaṃ nāma tuṇḍaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:3054_4: Sā no imaṃ corasamuddaṃ nissāya naṭṭhā”ti bahuṃ vippalapiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3054_5: Te evaṃ vippalapamāne samuddadevatā bheravarūpaṃ dassetvā palāpesi,
atk-s0513a1:3055_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:3059_0: Nayidaṃ dukkhaṃ aduṃ dukkhanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:3059_1: So hi bhagavatā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhito”ti vutte “sacca”nti vatvā “kena ukkaṇṭhāpitosī”ti
atk-s0513a1:3059_2: ca puṭṭho “purāṇadutiyikāyā”ti vatvā “madhurahattharasā, bhante, sā itthī,
atk-s0513a1:3059_3: na sakkomi taṃ vinā vasitu”nti āha.
atk-s0513a1:3059_4: Atha naṃ satthā “esā te bhikkhu anatthakārikā,
atk-s0513a1:3059_5: pubbepi tvaṃ etaṃ nissāya sūle uttāsito etaññeva patthayamāno kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatto,
atk-s0513a1:3059_6: idāni naṃ kasmā puna patthesī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:3060_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ākāsaṭṭhadevatā ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:3060_4: Ekassa pana duggatamanussassa ekameva ghanasāṭakayugaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:3060_5: So taṃ sudhotaṃ dhovāpetvā obhañjāpetvā satavalikaṃ sahassavalikaṃ kāretvā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:3060_7: ekaṃ kusumbharattaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā tava kaṇṭhe laggā kattikarattivāraṃ caritu”nti. “Bhadde,
atk-s0513a1:3060_14: purisassa icchāya sati kiṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:3060_21: rattibhāge andhakāre sati purisassa agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3060_22: Iti so tāya punappunaṃ kathentiyā kilesavasena tassā vacanaṃ gahetvā “hotu bhadde,
atk-s0513a1:3060_23: mā cintayitthā”ti taṃ samassāsetvā rattibhāge jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā nagarā nikkhamitvā rañño kusumbhavatthuṃ gantvā vatiṃ madditvā antovatthuṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:3060_24: Ārakkhamanussā vatisaddaṃ sutvā “coro coro”ti parivāretvā gahetvā paribhāsitvā koṭṭetvā bandhitvā pabhātāya rattiyā rañño dassesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:3060_27: Atha naṃ pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā vajjhabheriyā vajjamānāya nagarā nikkhamāpetvā sūle uttāsesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:3060_29: kākā sīse nilīyitvā kaṇayaggasadisehi tuṇhehi akkhīni vijjhanti.
atk-s0513a1:3061_0: So tathārūpampi dukkhaṃ amanasikaritvā tameva itthiṃ anussaritvā “tāya nāmamhi ghanapuppharattavatthanivatthāya
atk-s0513a1:3061_1: kaṇṭhe āsattabāhuyugaḷāya saddhiṃ kattikarattivārato parihīno”ti cintetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:3063_0: “Nayidaṃ dukkhaṃ aduṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ maṃ tudati vāyaso;
atk-s0513a1:3065_1: yaṃ maṃ tudati vāyasoti yañca idaṃ sūle lagganapaccayaṃ kāyikacetasikadukkhaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:3065_2: yañca lohamayehi viya tuṇḍehi vāyaso tudati,
atk-s0513a1:3065_4: aduṃ dukkhaṃ etaṃyeva pana me dukkhanti attho. Kataraṃ?
atk-s0513a1:3065_7: yaṃ sā piyaṅgusāmā mama bhariyā ekaṃ kusumbharattaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā evaṃ ghanapuppharattena
atk-s0513a1:3065_8: vatthayugena acchannā mama kaṇṭhe gahetvā kattikarattivāraṃ nānubhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:3065_11: So evaṃ mātugāmaṃ ārabbha vippalapantoyeva kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:3066_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:3066_2: taṃ kāraṇaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā ṭhitā ākāsaṭṭhadevatā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:3070_0: Nāhaṃ punaṃ na ca punanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kilesaniggahaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:3070_1: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira pañcasatamattā sahāyakā mahāvibhavā seṭṭhiputtā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sāsane uraṃ
atk-s0513a1:3070_3: Athekadivasaṃ tesaṃ aḍḍharattasamaye kilesanissito saṅkappo uppajji.
atk-s0513a1:3070_4: Te ukkaṇṭhitvā attanā jahitakilese puna gaṇhituṃ cittaṃ uppādayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3070_5: Atha satthā aḍḍharattasamanantare sabbaññutaññāṇadaṇḍadīpakaṃ ukkhipitvā “katarāya nu kho ratiyā jetavane
atk-s0513a1:3070_6: bhikkhū viharantī”ti bhikkhūnaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ olokento tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abbhantare kāmarāgasaṅkappassa uppannabhāvaṃ aññāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3070_7: Satthā ca nāma ekaputtikā itthī attano puttaṃ viya,
atk-s0513a1:3070_8: ekacakkhuko puriso cakkhuṃ viya attano sāvake rakkhati.
atk-s0513a1:3070_9: Pubbaṇhādīsu yasmiṃ yasmiṃ samaye tesaṃ kilesā uppajjanti,
atk-s0513a1:3070_10: te tesaṃ kilese tato paraṃ vaḍḍhituṃ adatvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃyeva samaye niggaṇhāti.
atk-s0513a1:3070_11: Tenassa etadahosi “ayaṃ cakkavattirañño antonagareyeva corānaṃ uppannakālo viya vattati,
atk-s0513a1:3070_12: idāneva tesaṃ dhammadesanaṃ katvā te kilese niggaṇhitvā arahattaṃ dassāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3070_13: So surabhigandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā madhurassarena “ānandā”ti āyasmantaṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ ānandattheraṃ āmantesi.
atk-s0513a1:3070_18: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “sacāhaṃ teyeva pañcasate bhikkhū pakkosāpessāmi.
atk-s0513a1:3070_19: ‘Satthārā no abbhantare kilesānaṃ uppannabhāvo ñāto’ti saṃviggamānasā dhammadesanaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ na sakkhissantī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3070_22: bhante”ti avāpuraṇaṃ ādāya pariveṇena pariveṇaṃ āhiṇḍitvā sabbe bhikkhū gandhakuṭipariveṇe sannipātetvā buddhāsanaṃ paññapesi.
atk-s0513a1:3071_0: Satthā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya silāpathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahamāno sineru viya paññatte buddhāsane
atk-s0513a1:3071_2: Tāpi rasmiyo pātimattā chattamattā kūṭāgārakucchimattā chijjitvā chijjitvā gaganatale vijjulatā viya sañcariṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:3071_4: Bhikkhusaṅghopi satthāraṃ vanditvā garucittaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā rattakambalasāṇiyā parikkhipanto viya parivāretvā nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:3071_7: bhikkhunā nāma kāmavitakkaṃ byāpādavitakkaṃ vihiṃsāvitakkanti ime tayo akusalavitakke vitakketuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0513a1:3071_8: Anto uppannakileso hi ‘parittako’ti avamaññituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a1:3071_12: evameva appamattakopi kileso uppajjitvā vaḍḍhituṃ labhanto mahāvināsaṃ pāpeti.
atk-s0513a1:3071_13: Kileso nāmesa halāhalavisūpamo uppāṭitacchavigaṇḍasadiso āsīvisapaṭibhāgo asaniaggisadiso allīyituṃ na yutto āsaṅkitabbo.
atk-s0513a1:3071_14: Uppannuppannakkhaṇeyeva paṭisaṅkhānabalena bhāvanābalena yathā muhuttampi hadaye aṭṭhatvā paduminipattā udakabindu viya vivaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a1:3071_16: Porāṇakapaṇḍi tāpi appamattakampi kilesaṃ garahitvā yathā puna abbhantare nuppajjati,
atk-s0513a1:3072_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto siṅgālayoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā araññe nadītīre nivāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:3072_2: Siṅgālo gocarappasuto taṃ matahatthisarīraṃ disvā “mahā me gocaro uppanno”ti gantvā taṃ soṇḍe ḍaṃsi,
atk-s0513a1:3072_14: So “etthāpi natthi khāditabbayuttaka”nti sabbattha assādaṃ alabhanto vaccamagge ḍaṃsi,
atk-s0513a1:3072_16: So “laddhaṃ dāni me imasmiṃ sarīre mudu khāditabbayuttakaṭṭhāna”nti tato paṭṭhāya khādanto antokucchiṃ
atk-s0513a1:3072_17: pavisitvā vakkahadayādīni khāditvā pipāsitakāle lohitaṃ pivitvā nipajjitukāmakāle udaraṃ pattharitvā
atk-s0513a1:3073_3: kiṃ dāni me aññattha kamma”nti so aññattha agantvā hatthikucchiyaṃyeva maṃsaṃ khāditvā vasati.
atk-s0513a1:3073_4: Gacchante gacchante kāle nidāghe vātasamphassena ceva sūriyarasmisantāpena ca taṃ kuṇapaṃ sussitvā valiyo gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a1:3073_10: So nikkhamanadvāraṃ alabhanto bhayappatto hutvā sandhāvanto ito cito ca paharitvā nikkhamanadvāraṃ pariyesamāno vicarati.
atk-s0513a1:3073_11: Evaṃ tasmiṃ ukkhaliyaṃ piṭṭhapiṇḍi viya antokucchiyaṃ paccamāne katipāhaccayena mahāmegho pāvassi.
atk-s0513a1:3073_12: Atha naṃ kuṇapaṃ temetvā uṭṭhāya pakatisaṇṭhānena aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3073_13: Vaccamaggo vivaṭo hutvā tārakā viya paññāyi.
atk-s0513a1:3073_14: Siṅgālo taṃ chiddaṃ disvā “idāni me jīvitaṃ laddha”nti yāva hatthisīsā paṭikkamitvā vegena pakkhanditvā vaccamaggaṃ sīsena paharitvā nikkhami.
atk-s0513a1:3073_16: So tālakkhandhasadisena nillomena sarīrena ubbiggacitto muhuttaṃ dhāvitvā nivattitvā nisinno sarīraṃ oloketvā “idaṃ dukkhaṃ mayhaṃ na aññena kataṃ,
atk-s0513a1:3073_17: lobhahetu pana lobhakāraṇā lobhaṃ nissāya mayā etaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0513a1:3073_18: ito dāni paṭṭhāya na lobhavasiko bhavissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:3073_19: puna hatthisarīraṃ nāma na pavisissāmī”ti saṃviggahadayo hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:3075_0: “Nāhaṃ punaṃ na ca punaṃ, na cāpi apunappunaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:3077_4: tato ca punāti vuttavārato puna tatopi ca punappunaṃ vāraṇasarīrasaṅkhātaṃ hatthibondiṃ na pavekkhāmi.
atk-s0513a1:3077_7: tathā hi ahaṃ imasmiññeva pavesane bhayatajjito maraṇabhayena santāsaṃ saṃvegaṃ āpāditoti.
atk-s0513a1:3078_0: Evañca pana vatvā tatova palāyitvā puna taṃ vā aññaṃ vā hatthisarīraṃ nivattitvāpi na olokesi.
atk-s0513a1:3079_1: anto uppannakilesassa nāma vaḍḍhituṃ adatvā tattha tattheva naṃ niggaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi.
atk-s0513a1:3079_2: Saccapariyosāne pañcasatāpi te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:3083_0: Ekapaṇṇo ayaṃ rukkhoti idaṃ satthā vesāliṃ upanissāya mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ viharanto vesālikaṃ duṭṭhalicchavikumāraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:3083_1: Tasmiñhi kāle vesālinagaraṃ gāvutagāvutantare tīhi pākārehi parikkhittaṃ tīsu ṭhānesu gopuraṭṭālakayuttaṃ paramasobhaggappattaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:3083_2: Tattha niccakālaṃ rajjaṃ kāretvā vasantānaññeva rājūnaṃ satta sahassāni satta satāni satta ca rājāno honti,
atk-s0513a1:3083_6: Tesaṃ rājakumārānaṃ antare eko duṭṭhalicchavikumāro nāma ahosi kodhano caṇḍo pharuso sāhasiko,
atk-s0513a1:3083_7: daṇḍena ghaṭṭitaāsīviso viya niccaṃ pajjalito kodhena.
atk-s0513a1:3083_8: Tassa purato dve tīṇi vacanāni kathetuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a1:3083_12: Athassa mātāpitūnaṃ etadahosi “ayaṃ kumāro atipharuso sāhasiko,
atk-s0513a1:3083_13: ṭhapetvā sammāsambuddhaṃ añño imaṃ vinetuṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:3083_15: Te taṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā āhaṃsu “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:3083_16: ayaṃ kumāro caṇḍo pharuso kodhena pajjalati,
atk-s0513a1:3084_1: imesu nāma sattesu caṇḍena pharusena sāhasikena viheṭhakajātikena na bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:3084_2: pharusavāco ca nāma vijātamātuyāpi pitunopi puttadārassapi bhātibhaginīnampi pajāpatiyāpi mittabandhavānampi appiyo hoti amanāpo,
atk-s0513a1:3084_5: khādituṃ āgacchanto yakkho viya ca ubbejanīyo hutvā dutiyacittavāre nirayādīsu nibbattati.
atk-s0513a1:3084_6: Diṭṭheyeva ca dhamme kodhano puggalo maṇḍitapasādhitopi dubbaṇṇova hoti,
atk-s0513a1:3084_7: puṇṇacandasassirikampissa mukhaṃ jālābhihatapadumaṃ viya malaggahitakañcanādāsamaṇḍalaṃ viya ca virūpaṃ hoti duddasikaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:3084_8: Kodhaṃ nissāya hi sattā satthaṃ ādāya attanāva attānaṃ paharanti,
atk-s0513a1:3084_12: Evaṃ kodhavasena kālaṃ katvā nirayādīsu uppajjanti,
atk-s0513a1:3084_13: viheṭhakajātikāpi diṭṭheva dhamme garahaṃ patvā kāyassa bhedā nirayādīsu uppajjanti,
atk-s0513a1:3084_14: puna manussattaṃ labhitvā vijātakālato paṭṭhāya rogabahulāva honti.
atk-s0513a1:3084_15: Cakkhurogo sotarogotiādīsu ca rogesu ekato uṭṭhāya ekasmiṃ patanti,
atk-s0513a1:3084_16: rogena aparimuttāva hutvā niccaṃ dukkhitāva honti,
atk-s0513a1:3084_17: tasmā sabbesu sattesu mettacittena hitacittena muducittena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:3084_18: Evarūpo hi puggalo nirayādibhayehi na parimuccatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3084_19: So kumāro satthu ovādaṃ sutvā ekovādeneva nihatamāno danto nibbisevano mettacitto muducitto ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:3084_20: Aññaṃ akkosantampi paharantampi nivattitvā na olokesi,
atk-s0513a1:3085_0: Tassa taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:3085_3: sammāsambuddho pana taṃ ekovādeneva dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā mattavaravāraṇaṃ viya samuggahitāneñjakāraṇaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3085_7: hatthidammo sārito ekaṃyeva disaṃ dhāvati puratthimaṃ vā pacchimaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā dakkhiṇaṃ vā.
atk-s0513a1:3085_13: arahatā sammāsambuddhena purisadammo sārito aṭṭha disā vidhāvati,
atk-s0513a1:3085_16: so vuccati ‘yoggācariyānaṃ anuttaro purisadammasārathī’ti. Na hi, āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:3085_20: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:3085_23: pubbepāhaṃ imaṃ ekovādeneva damesi”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:3086_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3086_1: tayo vede sabbasippāni ca uggahetvā kiñci kālaṃ gharāvāsaṃ vasitvā mātāpitūnaṃ accayena isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3086_2: pabbajitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā himavante vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:3086_3: Tattha ciraṃ vasitvā loṇambilasevanatthāya janapadaṃ gantvā bārāṇasiṃ patvā rājuyyāne vasitvā punadivase
atk-s0513a1:3086_4: sunivattho supāruto tāpasākappasampanno bhikkhāya nagaraṃ pavisitvā rājaṅgaṇaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:3086_5: Rājā sīhapañjarena olokento taṃ disvā iriyāpathe pasīditvā “ayaṃ tāpaso santindriyo santamānaso yugamattadaso,
atk-s0513a1:3086_6: padavāre padavāre sahassatthavikaṃ ṭhapento viya sīhavijambhitena āgacchati.
atk-s0513a1:3086_8: imassa tenabbhantare bhavitabba”nti cintetvā ekaṃ amaccaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0513a1:3086_13: devā”ti bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā hatthato bhikkhābhājanaṃ gahetvā “kiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:3086_21: Amacco gantvā bodhisattaṃ vanditvā yācitvā rājanivesanaṃ pavesesi.
atk-s0513a1:3087_0: Rājā bodhisattaṃ vanditvā samussitasetacchatte kañcanapallaṅke nisīdāpetvā attano paṭiyattaṃ nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhojetvā “kahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:3087_7: amhākaññeva uyyāne vasathā”ti paṭiññaṃ gahetvā sayampi bhuñjitvā bodhisattaṃ ādāya uyyānaṃ gantvā paṇṇasālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3087_8: māpetvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāpi kāretvā pabbajitaparikkhāre datvā uyyānapālaṃ paṭicchāpetvā nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:3087_10: Rājāpissa divase divase dvattikkhattuṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:3088_0: Tassa pana rañño duṭṭhakumāro nāma putto ahosi caṇḍo pharuso,
atk-s0513a1:3088_5: evaṃ kātuṃ na labbhā”ti kujjhitvā kathentāpi kathaṃ gāhāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3088_6: Rājā cintesi “ṭhapetvā mama ayyaṃ himavantatāpasaṃ añño imaṃ kumāraṃ dametuṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:3088_8: So kumāraṃ ādāya bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:3088_11: tumhe naṃ ekena upāyena sikkhāpethā”ti kumāraṃ bodhisattassa niyyādetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:3088_12: Bodhisatto kumāraṃ gahetvā uyyāne vicaranto ekato ekena,
atk-s0513a1:3088_13: ekato ekenāti dvīhiyeva pattehi ekaṃ nimbapotakaṃ disvā kumāraṃ āha – “kumāra,
atk-s0513a1:3088_14: etassa tāva rukkhapotakassa paṇṇaṃ khāditvā rasaṃ jānāhī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:3088_15: So tassa ekaṃ pattaṃ khāditvā rasaṃ ñatvā “dhī”ti saha kheḷena bhūmiyaṃ nuṭṭhābhi.
atk-s0513a1:3088_19: vaḍḍhanto pana bahū manusse māressatī”ti taṃ nimbapotakaṃ uppāṭetvā hatthehi parimadditvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:3092_1: Na bhūmyā caturaṅguloti bhūmito caturaṅgulamattampi na vaḍḍhito.
atk-s0513a1:3092_4: Evaṃ khuddakopi samāno evarūpena tittakena paṇṇena samannāgatoti attho.
atk-s0513a1:3092_5: Mahāyaṃ kiṃ bhavissatīti yadā panāyaṃ vuddhippatto mahā bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:3092_7: addhā manussamārako bhavissatīti etaṃ uppāṭetvā madditvā chaḍḍesinti āha.
atk-s0513a1:3093_3: kuto imaṃ nissāya vuḍḍhī’ti uppāṭetvā madditvā chaḍḍesi?
atk-s0513a1:3093_5: evameva tava raṭṭhavāsinopi ‘ayaṃ kumāro daharakāleyeva evaṃ caṇḍo pharuso,
atk-s0513a1:3093_6: mahallakakāle rajjaṃ patvā kiṃ nāma karissati,
atk-s0513a1:3093_7: kuto amhākaṃ etaṃ nissāya vuḍḍhī’ti tava kulasantakaṃ rajjaṃ adatvā nimbapotakaṃ viya taṃ uppāṭetvā raṭṭhā pabbājanīyakammaṃ karissanti,
atk-s0513a1:3093_8: tasmā nimbarukkhapaṭibhāgataṃ hitvā ito paṭṭhāya khantimettānuddayasampanno hohī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3093_9: So tato paṭṭhāya nihatamāno nibbisevano khantimettānuddayasampanno hutvā bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhatvā pitu
atk-s0513a1:3093_10: accayena rajjaṃ patvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3094_3: pubbepāhaṃ etaṃ damesiṃyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:3098_0: Asantaṃ yo paggaṇhātīti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ajātasattussa rañño asantapaggahaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:3098_1: So hi buddhānaṃ paṭikaṇṭakabhūte dussīle pāpadhamme devadatte pasīditvā taṃ asantaṃ asappurisaṃ paggayha
atk-s0513a1:3098_2: “tassa sakkāraṃ karissāmī”ti bahuṃ dhanaṃ pariccajitvā gayāsīse vihāraṃ kāretvā tasseva vacanaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:3098_3: pitaraṃ dhammarājānaṃ sotāpannaṃ ariyasāvakaṃ ghātetvā attano sotāpattimaggassa upanissayaṃ bhinditvā
atk-s0513a1:3098_5: So hi “devadatto pathaviyaṃ paviṭṭho”ti sutvā “kacci nu kho mampi pathavī gileyyā”ti bhītatasito rajjasukhaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0513a1:3098_11: ādittāya lohapathaviyā uttānakaṃ nipajjāpetvā ayasūlehi koṭiyamānaṃ viya ca samanupassi.
atk-s0513a1:3098_12: Tenassa pahaṭakukkuṭasseva muhuttampi kampamānassa avatthānaṃ nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0513a1:3098_13: So sammāsambuddhaṃ passitukāmo khamāpetukāmo pañhaṃ pucchitukāmo ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:3098_14: attano pana aparādhamahantatāya upasaṅkamituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0513a1:3099_0: Athassa rājagahanagare kattikarattivāre sampatte devanagaraṃ viya nagare alaṅkate mahātale amaccagaṇaparivutassa
atk-s0513a1:3099_1: kañcanāsane nisinnassa jīvakaṃ komārabhaccaṃ avidūre nisinnaṃ disvā etadahosi “jīvakaṃ gahetvā sammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0513a1:3099_3: na kho pana sakkā mayā ujukameva vattuṃ ‘ahaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:3099_7: pariyāyena pana rattisampadaṃ vaṇṇetvā ‘kaṃ nu khvajja mayaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā payirupāseyyāma,
atk-s0513a1:3099_8: yaṃ no payirupāsataṃ cittaṃ pasīdeyyā’ti vakkhāmi,
atk-s0513a1:3099_9: taṃ sutvā amaccā attano attano satthārānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathessanti,
atk-s0513a1:3099_11: Atha naṃ gahetvā satthu santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3099_12: So pañcahi padehi rattiṃ vaṇṇesi “lakkhaññā vata bho dosinā ratti,
atk-s0513a1:3099_17: kaṃ nu khvajja mayaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā payirupāseyyāma,
atk-s0513a1:3100_6: Rājā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:3100_7: So hi jīvakasseva mahāamaccassa kathaṃ paccāsīsati.
atk-s0513a1:3100_8: Jīvakopi “raññā maṃ ārabbha kathiteyeva jānissāmī”ti avidūre tuṇhī nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:3100_12: Tasmiṃ khaṇe jīvako uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā “eso, deva,
atk-s0513a1:3100_13: bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho amhākaṃ ambavane viharati saddhiṃ aḍḍhateḷasehi bhikkhusatehi.
atk-s0513a1:3100_14: Taṃ kho pana bhagavantaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato”ti nava arahādiguṇe vatvā jātito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:3100_15: pubbanimittādibhedaṃ bhagavato ānubhāvaṃ pakāsetvā “taṃ bhagavantaṃ devo payirupāsatu,
atk-s0513a1:3101_2: hatthiyānāni kappāpehī”ti yānāni kappāpetvā mahantena rājānubhāvena jīvakambavanaṃ gantvā tattha maṇḍalamāḷe
atk-s0513a1:3101_3: bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ tathāgataṃ disvā santavīcimajjhe mahānāvaṃ viya niccalaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ito cito
atk-s0513a1:3101_4: ca anuviloketvā “evarūpā nāma me parisā na diṭṭhapubbā”ti iriyāpatheyeva pasīditvā saṅghassa añjaliṃ
atk-s0513a1:3101_5: paggaṇhitvā thutiṃ katvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno sāmaññaphalapañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:3101_6: Athassa bhagavā dvīhi bhāṇavārehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ sāmaññaphalasuttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:3101_7: So suttapariyosāne attamano bhagavantaṃ khamāpetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:3101_13: rājā issariyassa kāraṇā pitaraṃ dhammikaṃ dhammarājānaṃ jīvitā na voropessatha,
atk-s0513a1:3101_14: imasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ uppajjissatha.
atk-s0513a1:3101_15: Devadattaṃ nissāya asantapaggahaṃ katvā sotāpattiphalā parihīno”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:3102_1: ajātasattu kira asantapaggahaṃ katvā dussīlaṃ pāpadhammaṃ devadattaṃ nissāya pitughātakakammassa katattā sotāpattiphalā parihīno,
atk-s0513a1:3102_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:3102_7: ajātasattu idāneva asantapaggahaṃ katvā mahāvināsaṃ patto,
atk-s0513a1:3102_8: pubbepesa asantapaggaheneva attānaṃ nāsesī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:3103_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mahāvibhave brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto
atk-s0513a1:3103_1: takkasilaṃ gantvā sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā bārāṇasiyaṃ disāpāmokkho ācariyo hutvā pañca māṇavakasatāni
atk-s0513a1:3103_3: Tesu māṇavesu eko sañjīvo nāma māṇavo atthi,
atk-s0513a1:3103_5: So uṭṭhāpanakamantameva gahetvā paṭibāhanamantaṃ pana aggahetvāva ekadivasaṃ māṇavehi saddhiṃ dāruatthāya
atk-s0513a1:3103_6: araññaṃ gantvā ekaṃ matabyagghaṃ disvā māṇave āha “bho,
atk-s0513a1:3103_11: Evañca pana vatvā te māṇavā rukkhaṃ abhiruhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3103_12: Sañjīvo mantaṃ parivattetvā matabyagghaṃ sakkharāhi pahari,
atk-s0513a1:3103_13: byaggho uṭṭhāya vegenāgantvā sañjīvaṃ galanāḷiyaṃ ḍaṃsitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā tattheva pati,
atk-s0513a1:3104_0: Māṇavā dārūni ādāya āgantvā taṃ pavattiṃ ācariyassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:3104_2: asantapaggahakārā nāma ayuttaṭṭhāne sakkārasammānaṃ karontā evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭilabhantiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:3107_0: Tameva ghāsaṃ kurute, byaggho sañjīviko yathā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3108_0: Tattha asantanti tīhi duccaritehi samannāgataṃ dussīlaṃ pāpadhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:3108_1: Yo paggaṇhātīti khattiyādīsu yo koci evarūpaṃ dussīlaṃ pabbajitaṃ vā cīvarādisampadānena,
atk-s0513a1:3108_4: Asantaṃ cūpasevatīti yo ca evarūpaṃ asantaṃ dussīlaṃ upasevati bhajati payirupāsati.
atk-s0513a1:3108_5: Tameva ghāsaṃ kuruteti tameva asantapaggaṇhakaṃ so dussīlo pāpapuggalo ghasati saṃkhādati vināsaṃ pāpeti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0513a1:3108_7: yathā sañjīvena māṇavena mantaṃ parivattetvā matabyaggho sañjīviko jīvitasampadānena sampaggahito attano
atk-s0513a1:3108_8: jīvitadāyakaṃ sañjīvameva jīvitā voropetvā tattheva pātesi,
atk-s0513a1:3108_10: so dussīlo taṃ attano sampaggāhakameva vināseti.
atk-s0513a1:3109_0: Bodhisatto imāya gāthāya māṇavānaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:3110_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
